description: THIS IS A SCREEN ADAPTATION OF EXCERPTS IN THE OF ROLANDO GALMAN, BENIGNO AQUINO'S FELLED ASSASSIN, PARTICULARLY INCIDENTS RELATED TO THE AQUINO ASSASSINATION.
An American tourist and Montenegrin tour guide form a deep connection, after a chance meeting takes the two on a soul-searching road trip through the Balkans.
A concert pianist loses his hands in a car crash, but a surgeon gives him new ones. The experimental medical procedure goes awry when the new hands drive the pianist mad.
When the elder brother finds out that his young brother is in love with a girl who dance in a club, he brings another girl to put her in his brother's way.
Film director Akbar, after his extremely successful first film, decides to base his second film on the life of a very popular yesteryear actress Malavika, whose present whereabouts are not known.
Wuyou, part of a secret security operative, teams up with local intelligence in South East Asia to rescue kidnapped foreign royalty.

Steve spawns in a Minecraft world. He gets the essentials. He collects materials, makes a new home, has adventures, and gets new friends. Then a problem rises from the dark... Will Steve and his friends find a way to save the Overworld?
Vanesha had the chance to kill her boyfriend, Arya. Arya, however, did not recognize her and confess that they never had a relationship.
In 2017, director Denise Castro wants to shoot her most personal work: A new adaptation of Bram Stoker's novel Dracula.
A plains-woman faces the harshness and isolation of the untamed land in the Western frontier of the late 1800s.
It follows Kendra as she sets off on her own for the first time to college. When she meet's her film class partner Ben, she tries her hardest to keep things professional.
The bisexual owner of a record store and a new girl in town bond over Jack Kerouac. Meanwhile, a girl in her class falls in love with her.
The struggle between a youngster and a cop. When the policeman snatches the youngster's money, he must find a unique way to get his money back.
A man on a murder spree meets his match in a brilliant police officer, and a cat-and-mouse game ensues.
An Artist discovers who murdered his parents and through his art installation brings them to justice.

In politically charged 1967 Hong Kong, an ambitious actress and an unlicensed taxi driver living in the same apartment building build a relationship that is constantly impacted by their individual goals and the heated times.
An operetta of old Spain with Jose Mojica as a swashbuckling adventurer who, despite tremendous odds, saves Manolita Saval from marrying a wicked nobleman.
A young couple's marriage becomes threatened when an attractive female occultist enters their lives, enticing them into a strange world of drugs, sex, and satanic rites.
Geography professor Jean has divorced his wife. His mistress has also left him. He has to do everything he can to be able to win his young daughter Isabelle's love and affection.

movie_name: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 4 - Ghost Stands Alone
description: When the riot squad starts shooting citizens during the holiday season, the Major and her team must track down a terrorist hacker who operates under the name Fire-Starter.
3 women are sent to intercept a major drug deal at a diner at 3 AM and get the money. Simple - save for Murphy's law: Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.
Chander is a very successful criminal lawyer decides to settle down in a village and look after his land after his father's death.

movie_name: The Bride with White Hair II
description: On Kit and Lyre's wedding night, Lien Ni-Chang, the bride with white hair kidnaps Lyre and takes her to her harem of fighting women to indoctrinate her against Kit. Kit tries to lead a rescue party and go up against the formidable enemies.

Arjun, a Pandava, learns the art of warfare from Drona and becomes his most skilled student. Meanwhile, Duryodhana and his uncle, Shakuni, conspire to win over everything that belongs to the Pandavas.
A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.
After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroines Black Canary, Huntress, and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

A melodramatic film about a fisherman who disappeared at sea. After many years, he returns and finds out that his wife has a different family. The fisherman does not disturb his beloved wife and secretly leaves his native place.
In the remote Southern Ocean, a jaded trawler captain is forced to take desperate measures when members of her roughneck crew begin turning up dead.
A ferocious, prehistoric Megalodon has returned to the surface, terrorizing a group of oil rig workers and members of a local fishing village.
Ghostly apparitions, demon possessions, a psych ward filled with psychopathic maniacs. The truth is in the numbers.
A team of specialist exorcists find themselves in a desperate battle with evil forces as they attempt to transport a powerful demon cross-country.
A group of teenagers inspired by a high school "Create Your Own Urban Legend" project quickly get out of hand in their desire for more "likes" and going viral with deadly consequences.

A man who's been in love with his sister since childhood returns after a year's absence to find she has married. Soon, several women in the area start turning up dead with strange wounds on their necks.
Jeb and Amber Wayne embark on a murderous road trip as they hunt for the man that witnessed their gruesome ministry.

It is a murder mystery which draws its inspiration from the real-life murders in Kerala and explores how a person can be framed and labelled a criminal, even if there is no solid proof of their guilt.
A a child, Anu Tong witnesses the murder of her family. Years later, after intense Kung Fu training, she is back for revenge.
Two families are brought together by the return of one family's son -- a reunion that conjures up old ghosts and issues that must be addressed.

A Miami cop learns that her father, who was the sheriff of her small hometown, has been murdered by an armed gang that has taken over the town. She brings four of her Miami cop friends to help clean out the town.

For millenniums Bigfoot has silently protected the world and man from himself, yet the evil of industry brings him out of the darkness to battle for the total control of nature; the North Dakota Badlands live up to its name-Hell on earth.
James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.
There are no winners in war - The true story of Harry the die-hard as he battles on with a conscience in tumultuous times.
The spirit of a comatose teenage girl possesses the body of a newcomer to her girls boarding school to enact bloody revenge against the elitist, lingerie-clad coeds responsible for her condition.

Lizzie only request of her "Male of Honor" Marshall is that he doesn't bring his hated ex Marie to her destination wedding. But lovesick Marshall brings her as his plus one, and Marie does everything in her power to wreck Lizzie's big day.
Master of the "Palm Of Death" is recruited by a Qing government official to collect a manuscript written by the leader of the Ming rebels and kill all those who get in his way.

This is a wonderful story of a matchmaking event in Italy. Young men and women are escorted to a midsummer dance. There is a man who coordinates the proper arrangements and the mountain villages send their youth.
We hear the breath of a girl sleeping. We see eyes open in fear. Another location. Another time. Real or not? Dream or real nightmare?
An uncomfortable evening among strangers turns ominous when a young couple on a weekend getaway inadvertently intrude on a criminal couple's hideout.
Taking up the concept of "The ABCs of Death", 26 French-speaking directors receive one of the 26 letters of the alphabet and they stage a story about fear with the help of this letter.
Two juvenile convicts escape from prison - one for revenge and the other for romance. With a ruthless warden determined to catch them, do they succeed?
Kelvin is an average teenager with an extraordinary talent - parkour. After his detective father is shot, Kelvin is forced to question his moral boundaries: how far will he go for family and friends?
A medieval warrior's gruesome collection of heads is missing only one - the monster that killed his daughter years ago.
During a Caribbean vacation, a British civil servant finds herself falling in love with a Russian Agent.

Imprisoned Harry Lomart is a vicious, brute of a man and yet he is prepared to do his long jail term as he is confident that on his release his beautiful wife Pat will be waiting for him, but a visit from Pat brings him his worst nightmare.
Eve was abandoned as a baby at Christmas. When she is unable to move on with her life because of the mystery, her boyfriend hires a private investigator to find her parents.
An author tells the story of how, as a young boy growing up in a 1960s small town, he was haunted after witnessing the murder of a little girl.
A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

When the stars reveal the next 90 days are very auspicious for marriage, a headstrong 30-something Sri Lankan woman reluctantly enlists her high maintenance mother to find 101 suitors from which to select her perfect astrological match.

Awoken by screams in the night, young Evelyn Whipley is found drenched in blood and mysteriously bound to the bed - A Gothic Horror set in the 1940s, a psychosexual thriller disguised as traditional Ghost Story.
Atlantic Flight was designed as a vehicle for Dick Merrill, a real-life pilot then very much in the news because of his record-breaking flights.

movie_name: H. G. Wells' the Crystal Egg
description: After being taken in by his Uncle Cave, a young boy attempts to uncover the hidden secret of a strange crystal egg in his possession
Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.
Reb Brown stars as a highly trained DEA agent who goes to Southeast Asia on a high-risk mission to free a drug dealer (Mike Monty) from nasty terrorists so that he can face trial back in the U.S.

Dilan and Milea officially date. But Dilan is threatened to be expelled from school due to involves in gang fights. One day, when he is planning to fight again, Milea asks him to quit the motorcycle gang or their relationship ends.

A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers.
Two lonely, retired septuagenarians, an unkempt, hard-drinking Irish sea captain, and a fussy, well-mannered Cuban barber form an uneasy friendship.
A surreal journey of a brilliant woman dealing with trauma from her past, a potential apocalypse and the loss of her husband as she attempts to create a machine to bring him back to life.
A man who wakes up from a coma to find himself uploaded with the minds of four dead serial-murder suspects. These hold the only clues for the police to track down the last surviving victim.
In this episode captain Drummond tries to find the killer of various people. All assassinations were provoked by a diamond of great value, but Drummond will face the danger.
The line between good and evil starts to blur after the death of her child pushes a strong and successful cop into a dangerous game of revenge.

When a group of young people explore an abandoned mansion, they awaken the restless spirits that haunt the dark halls. Unable to hide from the vengeful ghosts of Serbia's dark past, can they find a way out before it is too late?

Judyta is a middle-aged housewife whose peaceful life suddenly falls apart due to divorce. But soon she finds the strength to carry on fighting for her happiness, a place in the sun and love of her life.
Learning that Emel and Kudret got married, Kudret seeks to escape from the prison to get revenge on both.
A former vaudevillian gifted at impersonation assists a mad scientist in reanimating corpses and soon goes mad himself.
P.J. heads home for Christmas after 7 years of not seeing his family. His family is excited to see him but he's less than thrilled with the idea.
While occupying The Gunter Hotel, two guests and three employees begin to discover this hotel's true nature.
Kana is a girl who so obsessed with Korean styles so she convinces Mara, her sister to travel to South Korea together. Chai, Kana's best friend is secretly loves her.

Anti-Semitic Nazi propaganda film that "shows" how Jewish textile company owners are sabotaging the German linen industry by buying linen from Ireland instead of having it produced in "the Fatherland".
A long forgotten mass murderer returns to the town of Black Ridge to finish what he started nearly 30 years before.
A group of friends experiences psychedelic horrors after they get high on magic mushrooms and fall prey to a team of psychotic killers.

Follows Nina, a talented pianist who has lupus. She forges an unexpected yet strong connection with Gabriel, one of the doctors on the team who takes care of her and gives her to confidence to play with a huge orchestra in São Paulo.
The process of making a wine gains macabre and deadly outlines when the subjects who drink it are sample of a molecular experiment.
Cabral is a 60 year old playwright, and he's been married to Glorinha for half her life. Now they're getting bored...
He is the LAWMAN. His hands are LIGHTNING-FAST against evil. She is the HEIRESS TEMPTUOUS. What brings her to this place?

Under the Athenian night sky, before the silent threat of an imminent socio-economic crisis, a young man goes for a stroll and meets the love of his life. Does fate govern one's existence? What would have happened if he stayed in, instead?

Mitsuomi Kozuka quits his job in Tokyo to return to his rural hometown for the first time in a decade. There, he meets Yamato Kumai, who convinces him to help out on his farm, where their relationship grows and changes them both.
Shekharan is a noble gangster and his trusted henchman is Madhvan. When the Kotturan brothers try to plot against Shekharan, Madhavan strives to save his employer from their evil intentions.
Humiliated and down on his luck, a superintendent turns his life around when he decides to write a book.
A world renowned firm in New York hires a beautiful, vivacious woman as an escort to its' serious director in order to solve the company's plummeting sales.
Two factions face off in an impoverished region, but tensions heighten when a biker gang joins the fray.
A couple driving to a cemetery looking for inspiration for a horror story encounters the dancing dead.
LBW is a movie discussing about different phases of love and life. Love is precious, how it works out and changes the minds of human beings is the basic story of the film.
The Augustine Interfaith Order of Hellbound Saints, a team of blasphemous ministers who live in a constant state of debauchery, work to drag the worst of demons back to Hell.

Michael helms his ancestral family in Kochi, inspiring fear and respect through his past. When a few younger members of the household find his power over their lives too aggravating, they join hands with foes to clamp down on him.
Story about a struggling farmer from Haiti struggle to fit in the US lifestyle culture as he constantly runs to into trouble.
A composite of three re-edited episodes from the 1952 TV series, Gangbusters, released to theatres in 1957 as a feature film. Gang Busters (1954) was a similar effort.
The movie is another adaptation of Jack Finney's science fiction novel, about alien pod people who make perfect duplicates of humans.
A police officer and a master thief join forces in order to free a village from the clutches of an evil landowner.
"Berlin for Heroes" tells about different love stories of people who has come to Berlin from abroad - with different intentions but similar problems.
A young journalist goes deep undercover within a mountain commune and becomes manipulated by a duplicitous cult leader.
Gabriel the archangel fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the city's inhabitants.

movie_name: Main Viyah Nahi Karona Tere Naal
description: A Canadian YouTuber visits Punjab for the first time and falls in love with a desi rooted girl from Punjab who eventually helps him discover his roots.
With one of their own missing, a group of friends travel to the remote Florida everglades where they discover that an ancient, malevolent curse is tracking them.
Solider Allan is forced to destroy a forest in order so save his family. He then try's to bring the people responsible for his family's capture to justice.

This time Santo and Blue Demon must take on a 300 year-old witch with a really bad attitude. She raises a legion of zombies and sends them to fight Santo in his home and in the rings. Talk about a rude interruption to a wrestling match .
One parting married couple, plus two guys and two gals, interact during a Thanksgiving weekend at a roomy home in the Colorado Rockies.
A cocky fiction writer pursues a snobbish bookstore employee, and they go on a long, ill-fated date one night in Los Angeles.

Two escaped brothers track down the people who sentenced them to death row, including a doctor and the judge. But when they get to the D.A. and his family they have an especially lengthy revenge plot in mind for them.
China, 1861: After rescuing the Qing prince from rebels, General Su retires to start a martial arts school. His foster brother betrays him and Su barely survives. Su has a new enemy to defeat.

movie_name: Schoolgirl Report 10: Every Girl Starts Sometime
description: This chapter in the Schoolgirl Report series revolves around a "morality class" at a girls' school, in which a number of the students' experiences factor into the lessons to be learned....                See full synopsis »
The Future Past explores the intricacy of a relationship between a young Brooklyn couple, Doris and John, at three distinct periods of their lives.

A young mother has her child forcibly taken from her womb and left for dead in this post-apocalyptic revenge-thriller. Able to sew herself together and recover, she embarks on a trail of bloody revenge to find and rescue her child.
A woman travels home with her two kids for her sister's wedding but finds herself defending her family against blood-seeking pensioners.
A young Russian boxer makes a comeback after going against all odds. When he accidentally kills his opponent in the ring, the son of a powerful mafia kingpin, he must fight for his own life.
A man finds an empty bottle, a seemingly random gift from above, and is reminded of a greater find. Found explores the metaphor of the found treasure in two separate but intertwining plots.
Set in 1930s London, this movie involves stage actors and actresses and their experiences with love and revenge.

HOGTOWN is a black and white dramatic feature set circa 1919 in Chicago. It begins with the investigation into the disappearance of a millionaire theatre owner and plays out against the backdrop of the horrific race riots of that summer.
A cheerful cab driver and his lookalike both fall in love and end up making bad decisions, including kidnapping a small child.

Garrett, an emotionally-troubled young man, is sent to a clinic, whispering soothing promises of perfection. By planting characteristics directly into his own body, he's relieved of his dark visions, but pays the price for purity of mind.

The fate of three people -- an old China hand (Jack), a Taiwanese girl from the wrong side of town (Sung-nee) and an American engineer (Marty) -- intersect in the days before a cross-strait political crisis threatens to engulf Taiwan.

On trial for murdering his girlfriend, philandering stockbroker Larry Ballentine takes the stand to claim his innocence and describe the actual, but improbable-sounding, sequence of events that led to her death.

A urban family allows their niece to come live with them after her parents die. Little does the family know that Abigail has a dark side and will need the help of her family and a priest to purify her soul
Mari and her friend Déia discover about the affair of her husband with another woman in a accidental phone call.
An aspiring painter meets eccentric locals and a fellow New Yorker while working on a barn in Norway.
Steve and Ray are trapped in a cursed forest known as the Lenzi Forest. It is full of evil and Demons. Hazmat soldiers are led by a ruthless Major to destroy the evil and send it back to hell.
Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.
Buck and Jessica's merry little Christmas together takes a dangerous turn when their journey through the wild turns into a battle for survival.

Innocent Lust mirrors Hollywoods current teen flicks where young adolescents go out looking for sex. Incensed by a friend that flaunt his sexy girlfriend in front of them, three young ...                See full synopsis »

Both Radha and Nirmala love a young man named Gopi. But Nirmala's father wants to make Gopi marry Nirmala in order to grab his property. But she realizes that Gopi and Radha are in love and tries to unite them.
A Japanese gangster is forced to work for the police to find out who is responsible for the robbery of a truck full of gold.
A wealthy Hollywood tycoon is framed for murder and sent to the electric chair without the customary last dinner. Years later he comes back looking for revenge, and he's hungry.
Trapper Flint Mitchell and other mountain men from the Rendezvous join forces to enter virgin trapping territory but must contend with a resentful Blackfoot chief.
A nuclear powered bus driving cross-country, from New York City to Colorado, is destined for disaster due to the machinations of a mysterious group allied with the oil lobby.
In a post-apocalyptic Texas, a band of warriors fight against a fascist regime that is trying to take control of all surviving population.
Inner city kids from a poor neighborhood go up against the undefeated Beverly Hills Junior National Karate Team.
The story deals with a juvenile delinquent gang surviving through petty thievery. However, everything gets screwed up when they accidentally steal big bucks from the Yakuza.
The 4 gang members, who were framed in the bank robbery, now escape from the prison. While they look for revenge with Haku Kale, Haku has his own plan of robbing next bank.

A young American doctor grieving over the death of her fiancé, encounters a lonely, wandering ghost on Christmas Eve, and discovers that the details match an urban legend that dates back to World War II.
A poor and lonely coal seller trades his heart to a demon of the forest, hoping to improve his condition. It won't be long before the consequences of his actions catch up to him.
Two opposing high school cliques have been enemies longer than anyone can remember. Follow Fred through high school as he is a witness of and a pawn to this deadly game of street dominance.
Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.
A dutiful daughter reluctantly agrees to take part in her corrupt father's plan to defraud a trusting Count. She vows to reverse the injustice she has inflicted with surprising consequences.
Karan Thapar, a wealthy young man, is saved by Raj Malhotra, a poor guy, from a near-death accident, which gives rise to their unending tale of friendship and brotherhood.
Suicidal Rob starts dating a colleague at the supermarket. But whenever they have sex, his dead girlfriend, Nina, pops up.
When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

movie_name: Authentic True Account: Osaka Shock Tactics
description: There is almost non-stop action and violent brutality guys get cooked to death in oil drums, fires erupt and car explode.
A young woman gets closely watched by her jealous fiance while she is trying to deliver cakes to customers' houses.

Pensive musical about two young men, Moritz and Bertram, employed as waiter and pianist at a cabaret, located in a forest reserve. Here, they ruminate about life and love while having relationships with the some of the singing girls.
A couple of revenge seeking ghosts haunts an innocent man, and the people surrounding him, to get justice for their murders.
A young couple is menaced by an evil doctor who wants lead the boy to drug addiction and lead the girl to his arms.
Four months after the death of her husband, a woman on the brink of motherhood is tormented in her home by a strange woman who wants her unborn baby.

An ex-gangster who after being released from prison attempts to get on the straight and narrow. When that doesn't work out, he is pulled back into crime, building his empire as a kingpin, only to have it taken away as fast as he gained it.
After meeting one day, the famous reggaeton singer Gabo Gabeau asks Daniela, one of his fans, to sleep with his friend Gerardo, but the situation gets out of control.
Wanting to learn from the best, aspiring boxer Alice Long is taken under the wing of infamous boxing legend, Sensei Sydney, to learn the ancient technique 'Thumb of Maui'.

After landing a job at a local video store called Happy Films, Daniel starts receiving threatening home made DVD's in the drop box. Now he must piece together a killer's puzzle before time runs out for him and the people he cares about.
Ran Keo tracks down his brother's (Vichet) murder to avenge his death by assassinate every member of the crime syndicate responsible.

It seemed perfect - a new house, a new marriage, a child soon to be born. But when Sarah and Matt invite their friends to celebrate, the situation turns deadly as they enter a burned-out prison on a ghost hunt.
2 young women looking for a weekend of fun get more than they bargained for on the 'Wrong Side of The Tracks'.
An alternative romantic comedy about a couple attempting to navigate their pronounced age difference and the bi-polar, well meaning Mom who stands in their way in this left-of-center crime caper.
Set in 1930s prohibition, a corrupt cop discovers that the popular speakeasy in town has been infiltrated by vampires.
The year is 2036 and Earth has been invaded: hope lies with the last Robo Warrior - a towering fighting machine.
When a masked serial killer terrorizes an all-girls rehabilitation camp, the troubled teens must return to their bad-girl ways in the hopes of escaping the camp-turned-torture-chamber.
The life story of the brave soldiers of the Pakistan Army, mainly the Pakistan Air Force. Outlining their lives, relationships, duty and hardships.
A former actress, unjustly sent to prison eight years earlier, is forced to testify against a mafia hit man.
After moving to a vineyard to start a new life with her husband, a pregnant woman begins to experience terrifying visions.
A sadistic teenager searching for "Daddy" murders and dismembers anybody who picks her up hitch-hiking.

In late 18th century ice is a commodity more valuable than gold. When corrupt officials conspire to form a monopoly and fix its price, a gang of 11 professionals is formed to steal all the royal ice blocks in five storage for a night

A frustrated U.S. attorney, a pretty NCIS officer and a rogue FBI agent secretly team with the La Cosa Nostra to battle the Colombian drug cartels and end the war on drugs pushing the law to its limits. It's all about the money.

When five elite Urban Explorers accidentally stumble upon an ancient government conspiracy, it leads them on an epic journey, which unbeknown to everyone unleashes a lethal terror that is unlike anyone has ever seen before.
A mad scientist inadvertently unleashes the apocalypse while attempting to create an addictive additive for a greedy manufacturer.
During a weekend in a place with an obscure past, Sérgio and Marcos face supernatural threats that reveal a dark destiny.
Swashbuckling adventures of young army recruit Fanfan la Tulipe during the reign of King Louis XV in 18th Century France.
A small-town waitress vies with a sassy city slicker for the attention of the town's most eligible bachelor.
Three young women - a movie star, a spoilt daughter of a millionaire and her desperate friend - are all willing to find a phenomenal man of their dreams.
Based on the true story of the first-ever registered encounter by the Mumbai Police, which took place on November 1, 1982.
A small-town school teacher leads an apparently normal life, including a longtime boyfriend. But she secretly has several lesbian affairs until the women in her life start being brutally murdered.

When a married couple moves into a flat that is haunted by a spirit, a series of inexplicable experiences drive the wife to near madness. Now, the husband must protect his wife to save their marriage.
When an alien race invades and begins to brainwash humans to carry out acts of destruction, the rest of humanity must rely on an untested giant robot to save the Earth.
The descent of a brilliant doctor into darkness after a terminal cancer diagnosis wrecks his perfect world.
Very rare and seldom-seen, youth-oriented racing movie. It is the story of a young man's dream to get a ride in a top-fuel dragster.
A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.
Three Sicilian female student from Corleone burn by accident a bag with one million euros. They'll be forced to become professional robbers.
Young people are successful in challenging the traditional custom of arranged marriages in Taohuagou village in the Zhongyuan mountains.

An ex-cop gets pulled back in an undercover mission for the FBI by his former partner. The mission is to catch drug runners, but it is also sting operation against dirty cops, some of whom set up the ex-cops' dismissal from the force.
Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.
Two former Confederate captains set out to recover diamonds hidden in the mountains of Arkansas but a native spirit named Chikara is said to protect the sacred mountains against intruders.

The legend of the haunted Faulkner school, lures teens into amateur ghost hunting. But in 2011 when one of the teens disappears it begins a new legend. Five years later - more will die discovering the truth.
A rich girl falls for an older hippie boy. Her parents don't approve and try to stop her from seeing him.
A man inherits a vast tract of land from his Grandfather out West and then is swindled out of it. He and his relatives must fight to get it back.

Gabriel meets Alejandra at a nightclub and can't stop thinking about her. But she doesn't feel the same way. When the girl of your dreams doesn't like you back, what are you willing to do to get her to fall in love?

A disgruntled Viscountess devises a plan to get rid of a peasant village and its occupants from her land in Victorian Ireland. Her malevolence and hostility obtains her goals with haunting repercussions, but at what cost?
He has been a good man all his life. A dutiful son, a loving brother and a considerate friend. However one day, armed thugs barged into his quiet life and murder his family.
bioSEct is a mysterious research facility / compound under investigation for dubious practices within and around biosecurity, food security space.
Émilie meets Camille who is attracted to Nora, who crosses paths with Amber. Three girls and a boy - They're friends, sometimes lovers and often both.

Anna is a 1994 Indian Telugu film, directed by Muthyala Subbaiah. and produced by Medikonda Murali Krishna. The film stars Rajasekhar, Gautami, Roja and Pradeep Shakthi lead roles. The music of the film was composed by M. M. Keeravani.
An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.
In 1960s Dublin a young girl becomes involved with an older man, a much-travelled and still married land-owner.
Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.
Thursday morning. Zagreb, Jerusalem, London, Cologne, Prague. Five people. Getting up. Going to work. In five cities-hives, like bees. Looking for the sweeter life then the one they are living now.

Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes unimaginable secrets.
Following the mysterious murder of her teenage son, 29 year-old beauty Miriam becomes a U.S. Border Patrol Agent in hopes of finding her son's killer.
The battle between a broken female priest and the "The Father" of all evil for the soul of a boy and the human race during the final days of Earth's first luxury resort space station: The Georgetown.
After Los Angeles is invaded by an army of subterranean monsters, a small group of people must fight for survival in the deserted metropolis.
More races and challenges for soon-to-be-graduate/drift racer Takumi Fujiwara. Of course, with all the bells and whistles of a big screen production.
An unknown virus begins to spread infecting the local population almost instantly, but footage found by the CDC of one man's survival may just help them find a cure.
Before they become the elite warriors that form 300, the children of Sparta must first undergo the Agoge. This is where there are forged, like blades, into men.
Firebird follows a handsome, soulful young soldier who embarks on a clandestine sexual affair with a charismatic fighter pilot on a Soviet Air Force Base at the height of 1970's Communist rule.

In this sequel to Psycho-Pass TV show, Inspector Tsunemori is sent to a neighboring war-torn nation, where the Sibyl System is being introduced as an experiment, to find Shinya Kogami, her former enforcer who went rogue three years ago.
The life of a deaf African American woman in the early 1900s parallels with another living in the 1990s.

In this prequel to 'Tell Me How' (2018), Matt and Damien are meeting up for another night a frivolity when Matt discovers life isn't all about 'Netflix and chill' but appreciating the moment in front of you.
The new sheriff of a small town in Oklahoma with its own sinister brand of justice contends with a growing meth problem and the arrival of a high-profile mobster.
When a traumatized teen searches for answers to a recent suicide he's lured into a surreal world by a powerful psychedelic drug that unleashes a deadly force and a horrifying family secret.
After squandering his inheritance, a gambling addict befriends a prostitute who decides to help him find his daughter, while avoiding the local gangsters who want him to repay his debts.
In a future where a plague has infected much of the population, two brothers are tasked with traveling to Canada to retrieve a mysterious package.

The Central Bureau of Investigation deputes two officers to investigate the disappearance of three medical students, which they believe to be an incident of 'honour killing' in a small, closed community.
Three inept night watchmen, aided by a young rookie and a fearless tabloid journalist, fight an epic battle for their lives against a horde of hungry vampires.
The captain Alekos Nikolopoulos doesn't get along with his wife. One day, he receives a letter from a woman he had met before the war who reminds him that she is pregnant.
A young woman and her brother explore the history of their grandfather, who died in the WW2. They start contacting the men who flew with him, asking them about who he was.

A group of young Muay Thai experts led by David are forced to use their deadly training to protect themselves when the local extortionist threatens to kill their mentors daughter if he doesn't give up his bar.
The true story of an English boxer incarcerated in one of Thailand's most notorious prisons as he fights in Muay Thai tournaments to earn his freedom.

A cop framed for murder is the only one not in cryosleep when a team of thieves boards the armored treasury spaceship he's on to steal its load - 40 billion universal dollars - and then ram the ship into a comet to cover their tracks.
Ex-con Chick Hewes (Regis Toomey) tries to go straight with the help of wife Molly (Clara Bow), but circumstances force the couple into involvement in a serious crime.
Jake has to go to brother's wedding in Hawaii. He hires a bride to pretend he's engaged as his brother is marrying his ex. Anna the rental bride falls for Jake.

Local Kung Fu's plot revolves around Charlie, "an ordinary boy from Guwahati with a delicate stomach", his girlfriend and a number of madcap characters such as a wannabe local don and a thief who is rumoured to roam naked.

5 beautiful girls win a contest to star in a new reality show. Spend a night in a haunted house, and the first one to make contact with a ghost will win. But the house is really haunted by a killer who intends that none of them will win.
Four expert thieves attempt to steal every famous artwork that is haunting their mutual psychotherapist. A detective attempts to find out who the "Collector" is.
Twelve years after a virus turns the world's population into ravenous killers, the last community of uninfected survivors find out they may not be alone.
A shipwrecked Viking awakens on a strange island, prowled by terrifying beasts and a Forgotten God, and has to escape before he is doomed to spend eternity there.
A family have a secret that's been passed down the male bloodline. A twist in fate changes all that.
A newlywed couple who go on their honeymoon in St Jean Le Vieux, France are kidnapped by a local mysterious cult.
Deep in a remote marshland, three young biologists conduct research but when they encounter evil, science ends and survival begins.

Tarzan reunites with his royal mother, only to face certain death after the sinister plan of the kingdom's wicked prime minister. However, a kind-hearted mermaid comes to the rescue. Can Tarzan restore peace and stability?
The masters of the Six Major Sects are trapped in Wan On Temple, each of whom was hit with the Ten Scents Poisonous Powder, and have lost all their martial powers.
Four bounty hunters wanders the apocalyptic wasteland, with a prisoner they are going to exchange for clean water. But dangers lurk everywhere.
A cruel twist of fate catapults small time crook Mickey Skinner into the big league, as head of a brutal London gang poised on the brink of a lucrative human-trafficking deal

Five strangers - newlywed serial killers, a suicidal, depressed policemen, and two young runaways with a secret - become suspects and potential victims when a masked murderer makes its presence known in an isolated mountain town.

A rich family's son falls in love with a woman who will only marry him once he becomes a Kung-Fu Master. In this 'Dramedy' He becomes a legendary hero, by attempting to save the emperor, during his true quest of love.

After returning home from their honeymoon. Ben discovers that a ghost -with designs on Beth, his beautiful wife- appears in their bedroom. Each night the ghost appears to be growing in human form, lust, and power.
Life is not so easy when you have an incurable disease. However, life becomes precious when you find something which is truly important for you. No matter where you stand.
A whimsical saga of a young man whose two life-consuming passions are unraveling traffic gridlock and an avant-garde dancer. A romantic comedy.
A retired MMA world champion gets caught up in an underground fight club called the "Blood Circus" and must fight to survive and save his family.
A group of estranged friends gather for a night of tradition which takes a deadly turn after old secrets and wounds resurface.
The year is 2015 and overpopulation and famine have plunged our planet into chaos and one desperate survivor finds himself being hunted and pursued by hordes of rage-crazed zombies.
From International Fantasy Artist Dorian Cleavenger comes 4 stories of the bizarre and macabre in this unique journey of altered realities.
A Chinatown detective traces the death of his Kung Fu master to a mystical city hidden in the streets of San Francisco.

The movie is set in Belarus, where a team of counter-intelligence officers is given only three days to find a German radio operator posing as a Soviet soldier, behind soviet lines, on the eve of a major offensive.
After a young couple moves into a remote farmhouse with their infant son, the woman's struggles with postpartum psychosis begin to intensify...as the house reveals secrets of its own.

movie_name: Mad Mission V: The Terracotta Hit
description: Two friends who own an investment firm turn to a policeman friend for help when they are framed for robbery by a gang of antiquities smugglers.
When Syamsul sees his family die at the hands of the diabolical Topeng (Mask), he amasses a team of powerful Silat warriors to destroy his siege in Api city.

movie_name: Psyched by the 4D Witch (A Tale of Demonology)
description: Novice witch Cindy is transported into a world of safe sex by the voice of Abigail from the 17th century.
The Devil has a phone number, and if you call him on your mobile phone at midnight, he will grant your wish. In return however, he will control your life for the duration of the call.
Turn the lights off and pull the covers up because we have another set of morbid tales for your innocent eyes to view. The glamorous horror host, LeiLuna, returns.
A young girl named October tries to outrun her dark past and escape her deviant Grandfather but she will need the help of an imaginary friend named Jack The Rabbit.
Jackson and Emily aren't like the other kids. Two burgeoning sociopaths on the brink of total meltdown. Ticking time bombs seeking revenge. Who will unravel first?
When faced with an ethical dilemma, ultimately it forces one to decide what's more important: accomplishing one's goals of success or following conscience into doing what's right.
A space soldier from another world is caught up in a galactic race war, between her kind "The Kaa'Ren's" and the shape-shifting alien reptoids called "The Brotha's" .

An epic story of good versus evil. An unexpected alliance forms when a vampire, werewolf and banshee must come together to defend the world from Brutus, a tyrant banished from Earth, and his army of demonic minions.

Angrezi Mein Kehte Hein is a family drama and explores changing relationships between a middle aged couple. Its about the realization that sometimes just loving someone is not enough and expressing that love is equally important.

20 years after a horrific accident during a small town school play, students at the school resurrect the failed show in a misguided attempt to honor the anniversary of the tragedy - but soon discover that some things are better left alone.
Following on from the events of The Mount, we revisit Philomena's home in what is promised to be a larger and darker spectacle than the first instalment.

A news team investigating rumors of aswang killings in a remote barrio are attacked by a group of soldiers, forcing them to run for their lives deep in the forest, where more mystery and danger lie in wait.
A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

Army vet Frank Mason has dementia and his son signs him up for a clinical trial of the military's latest drug for mental acuity in combat. But, no one can fathom the drug's side effect--turning people in to homicidal maniacs.
A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.
Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

movie_name: He's a Vampire, But at Least He's Jewish
description: Rachel's a nice Jewish girl whose family is constantly pressuring her to get married and start a family. She thinks she's finally found Mr. Right when she meets artist Max -- he's handsome AND Jewish. Too bad he's also a vampire.
A painter's life is forever changed when a mythical and deadly spirit from Celtic lore -- a Leannán Sí -- becomes his muse and lover.
A man struggles to separate the events that are real in his life, with the events that are part of his mental illness.

A confused and angry farm boy brought up under the strict and seemingly unforgiving guidance of an exacting and domineering father gains initiation to both romance and heroism during the Philippine Revolution of 1896.
The movie is set in Rajapalayam, where Guru Moorthy, referred as 'Kaalu' is a bigwig. A money-lender by profession, Guru is a rich and influential man in the town.
Stranded on an island during a zombie outbreak, a polyamorous triad sit down for dinner, but little do they know the island is the only place affected by the virus and will be bombed by midnight.

Earth 2245: 5 people are sent to a faraway planet to collect the mineral Stardust, which will be used to revive the dying Sun and save Earth. The spaceship also has a Dawnseeker, a killer of humans, that escapes upon reaching destination.

Charlie and Jimmy are making a movie, when an ventriloquist doll named Felix comes to them, they choose him as their antagonist but with the passage of time more sinister events begin to happen until they discover that he has his own mind.
Six stories, six directors, six unique short films, all under the backdrop of Bushwick, Brooklyn, each a different look into the theme of unconditional love.

The successful owner of the neighbourhood's souvlaki joint is a possessive and jealous husband who struggles to thwart the plans of the block's ambitious Casanovas. Clearly, this relationship doesn't work out; however, has his wife sinned?
Zombie Honeymoon is a gore-soaked exploration of how far the boundaries of true love can be pushed without reaching a breaking point.

In 'Taisho era' Japan, Yumeji lives above a shop with his wife Tamaki and sons making 'commercial' art. But he dreams of just painting for his art. One fateful day, he meets Hikono who becomes his muse.
Two former Catholic school classmates want to be movie makers despite their total lack of talent, contacts, or even a story to tell.
To catch the world's most wanted thief, an Interpol agent assembles a team of elite hackers to plan the ultimate crypto-currency heist.
The married Anna Karenina falls in love with Count Vronsky despite her husband's refusal to grant a divorce, and both must contend with the social repercussions.
A celebratory cliff jump turns to a nightmare injury which turns to a fight for survival on a remote island with no way up or out.
Featuring cannibals, zombies and other funny creatures, Blood Clots consists of seven carefully curated, bloody horror stories by seven different filmmakers.
The gunplay and murder-for-hire underworld inhabited between three young men happens again and again as parallel universes decide their fates.
Escaping from home, Ulker meets and marries a blind composer in the hotel where she is staying, but suffering does not leave Ulker in her new life.
A film school student is trying to create his first movie, but cannot find the money for it, until some guys from a mystery website he visited appear on his door and offer it to him.
A mysterious man returns to his former hometown to take revenge on the locals who murdered his parents when he was a boy.
The love and marriage story of Rabia, who was raised with religious education, and Italian pianist Peregrini, who became a Muslim for her sake.

movie_name: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
description: A slovenly cable repairman becomes a big city Health Inspector, and is tasked with uncovering the source of a food poisoning epidemic.
A psychiatrist must cure a young patient who presents himself as Don Juan, the world's greatest lover.
After the creation of the new world, a young, charming, rebellious, immortal being creates war in the most holy place in the history of the universe and is cast away from it and into the new world.
During WWII, husbandless New Zealand women meet and marry American soldiers who are fighting in the Pacific theater.
A wavering priest's faith is further tested when he hears the confession of a young murderer - who hasn't stopped killing.
Two neighbours in the housing blocks of Belgrade spark a friendship then a war as emotions and money take center stage. Based in part on the novel 'Poor Folk' by Fyodor Dostoyevsky.
An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.
The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

The best hit man in the country, Makoki, changes when he gets Chloe pregnant, a good girl with whom he will have to live for a week until his family gives him the go-ahead for the wedding and everything returns to normal .
Mario Balbuena, a honest cop, becomes the victim of an ambush by drug dealers and dirty cops, after that, he recruits a group of sleazy criminals in order to strike his revenge.
It is a first featured film of group of young guys in Korea. Director, producer, and actors are all friends.

Reunion of two former lovers brings the end to the society they are part of through hate through revenge and through bloodshed, especially when the lovers were obliged to stand against their associates and families.

Tong and his group of friends are in love with the same girl, Lin. Tong is forced to be supervised by another student due to his bad behavior. And his school life changes learning, playing and finding the first love.

Filipino police investigating a case involving cult massacres and alleged child sacrifices suspect that a former United States FBI agent living in seclusion in an island paradise may be the key to solving this macabre case.

In 1987, three friends vanish on a road trip to West Virginia. Thirty-four years later, footage of their final moments leaks onto YouTube, forcing viewers to question the existence of an ancient evil within the Appalachian woods.

movie_name: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
description: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.
After his parents split, Matthew Reaver struggles to believe in 'the one' while his mother faces the hardship of moving on.
Claire, while investigating a child abuse case, discovers that the family is being tormented by a supernatural entity.
When a nuclear war starts, the employees and inmates at a mental institution seek shelter in an underground bunker. They find themselves locked in and soon find that the inmates want to take over.
A Russian woman living in Memphis with a much older rock-'n'-roll legend experiences a personal awakening when her husband's estranged son comes to visit.
Central-West region of Brazil. A vast tropical savanna ecoregion called "Cerrado". And which brings a vast history of violence, brutality and struggle for honor.

Anthony Quinn and Sophia Loren star as longtime widower Frank and recently widowed Rose, lonely hearts who discover something special in The Black Orchid, a sensitive comedy romance directed by Martin Ritt (Norma Rae, Murphy's Romance).
"Swag" is a stylish music romance about a guy who is born into a rich family, but truly loves music.
A group of mercenaries are sent to an extraction assignment. They discover the things aren't as they seem and they find themselves in a game of survival.
Things are going to get nasty as 'mia noi' or mistresses and 'mia luang' or (legal) wives openly declare and wage war upon each other in this bullet-filled, bombs-abound movie.
A young woman who lives with her strict father works to become a a champion at Silat, Indonesia's version of kung fu.
Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.

movie_name: World Order: Three Days and Three Nights
description: When loner Veto meets a young journalist it changes his life forever as he is drawn into a conspiracy which is going on for centuries. He only survives due to the support of like-minded individuals.

movie_name: Let the Die Be Cast: Initium
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, two teenage Brothers face the struggle of their lives after stumbling across a Mediterranean village massacred years before by an aging Philosopher.
College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.
A love lorn London lawyer must travel to Kentucky and go toe-to-toe with a stubborn cowboy who doesn't want his family ranch bulldozed for development.

Greta is madly and deeply in lust for her straight room mate Cassandra. Too shy to confess her feelings, she writes passionate love letters, signing them "Jean Pierre." Her roommate is fixated so Greta hires an actor to play the fake Jean.
James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.
The story follows a young man and woman who go through various situations in their journey to find the right partner, which raises questions about traditional marriage and marriage based on love.

The 1940's: A young cadet drafted to war and a woman drafted to poverty both struggle to find their identities against the hardships and villains of the day in this sentimental tribute to the bygone era of silent film.
An urban crime drama, about Trent, a world renown safe cracker, his personal female Driver, and the Criminal who double crosses them.

A reporter investigates a mysterious crash and uncovers more than an object, but a massive government conspiracy. Inspired by the real life events of December 9, 1965 and one of America's most mysterious UFO incidents.
A man drowns himself in lake. As he is dying, he recalls the crucial moments of his life and the incidents that led to his final, fatal decision.
The Underground Railroad legend, but instead of humans oppressing humans, it's aliens oppressing humanity.

Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.
The story of 'Gunin' revolves around village exorcist Rojob Ali Gunin who possessed a vast spiritual power. The film follows the aftermath of Gunin's mysterious death.
A young woman goes to meet her estranged grandparents and ends up facing life-threatening situations.
Two hunters are forced to take refuge in a cabin with the survivors of a werewolf attack in XIX century Spain.
A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.
When the Great Mongolian army is about to invade Europe in 1242 it doesn't expect that a Hungarian castle and its Priest, Eusebius will stop it.
Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.
When Charles Milner was offered a job as head of security for one of Africa's largest foreign-owned companies, he and his wife, Sandra, thought it was the chance of a lifetime...they were wrong.
A young woman must escape from an office of sedated co-workers before a corrupt detective, in search of a password that only she knows, finds her.

TR, investigating contamination in the Western Territories, must foil a plot by The Commodore (David Woods) to use his inventor Professor Metz and benefactor Lady Victoria to double-cross the global superpowers.
An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.
1914 in a small Hungarian town. The journalist Sándor has a love affair with a girl but ruins it when he won't marry below his own ranks.

The relationship of a married couple takes an unexpected turn when the husband's boss gets the idea that their ad campaigns need spicing up with eroticism, and chooses his employee's wife as his assistant.
James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.
The first maritime anti-terrorist film in China tells the story of the anti-terrorist personnel of the Chinese police who work closely with the Chinese Navy to finally end the crisis.
A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

A joint Chinese-US excavation project in a remote Chinese province becomes a globally threatening disaster as an epidemic spreads, forcing infected people to go berserk to fulfill the prophecy of a disowned Han Emperor.

When a thirty-something couple set aside the home furnishings catalogue and decide to rekindle their relationship, they return to their old neighborhood and end up squatting illegally in their twenty-something lives.
Two brothers develop a very close relationship as they are growing up in an idyllic and happy family. When they are young adults their relationship becomes very intimate, romantic, and sexual.

Chief, a former US Marshall, has fallen on hard times after he led his team on a raid that went horribly wrong. As he struggles to pick up the pieces, he soon learns that there may be a larger conspiracy at hand.
A human becomes an unlikely rising star in the biggest fighting tournament in the galaxy that's dominated by alien species.

Convinced that a divorce would separate her from her little girl, Zohra cannot bring herself to leave her husband despite his violent behavior. She suffers his blows in silence. But all that changes when she meets Chang Sue.

When the wife of prominent lawyer Walter Briggs is kidnapped, he decides to take matters into his own hands. But things are not really what they seem and the abduction becomes more complicated for everyone involved.
In 2023 unidentifiable radiation left 99.5% of the world's female population sterile. Man's fate is now divided in to two paths: extinction or the beginning of a new dawn.

A brilliant doctor on a quest for revenge buys a young woman and trains her to be the ultimate assassin, implanting gun parts in her body that she must later assemble and use to kill her target before she bleeds to death.

Sheila Vane, daughter of Stanley, an English aristocrat, and Alice, a former maid of the Vane family, has displayed the traits of her aristocratic heritage since childhood. While living in ...                See full synopsis »
When the new don discovers that sadistic mobsters were responsible for the death of his young son, he wreaks a deadly revenge.
Mourning over the death of her beloved, Robin Hood, Maid Marian, wages a war to fight for a noble cause.
Horror gets Super Sized when Horny The Clown, the demonic mascot of "Hella-Burger," starts slashing Orange County teenagers with his meat cleaver from Hell.
An exotic plant in a downtown flower shop convinces the storekeeper's meek apprentice to resort to gruesome measures to keep it alive and make it grow.

movie_name: 15 Things You Didn't Know About Bigfoot (#1 Will Blow Your Mind)
description: (#1 Will blow your mind) A clickbait journalist is sent to the Appalachian foothills to cover a Bigfoot Convention where he discovers there's more to this listicle than meets the eye.
Battling a life-long curse of bad luck and her own self-doubt, a bumbling accountant relentlessly pursues her perfect match, despite her jinxed efforts scaring him off each time.
A mother and her young child undertake a dangerous journey from Ecuador to the United States after she's diagnosed with a life-threatening illness.

When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he has to find the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the legendary creature and set him free.

A massive montage of movie characters going to the movies. Clips from 100+ films are cut together to create a new cinema-going experience. Romance, musical, action, horror, noir, comedy - and countless characters watch in the dark with you.
Three friends who work as space Couriers help a creature called hydra in a form of a human woman and protect her from the evil men after her.
Four friends battle waves of looters when a savage riot breaks out in a neighboring city. Bullets will fly. Blood will be shed. Asses will be kicked. Will the price they have to pay be worth it?

'All about Love' is a love triangle story which involves two inseparable love birds (Chris Attoh) and (Katlego Danke) who faces the bitter side of love when cheating and betrayal hits their relationship.

Five years after being hospitalised, Derek is released into the care of his cousin, April. But Derek believes he's possessed, and a series of encounters leaves April to question if this is mental illness or something more sinister.
Sarah, Joseph and Frank are BFFs. Joseph and Sarah get married but the evening before she tells Frank with a kiss that it could've been him. Frank continues to have a thing for Sarah.

A photographer and models go to an abandoned castle to shoot some sexy covers for horror novels. Unbeknownst to them, the castle is inhabited by a lunatic who believes himself to be the reincarnated spirit of a 17th century executioner.

Six teenagers are whisked away to an uncharted land where they are given magical weapons to defeat a tyrannical king and with the help of a talking squirrel and dragons find the potion that will change stone back to people.

In an attempt to free their jailed terrorist boss Aslam, a group of terrorists plant a bomb on a flyover in Hyderabad. As fate has it, Krishna Vachan and Mango are caught in the chaos and unwittingly become a part of the terrorists' plan.
Flashbacks portray the heroics of two German fighter pilots in WWI and then the two are shown heading out to attack the British navy at the start of WWII.
Based on true documented story of a UFO landing in Flatwoods WV in 1952. HS teenagers search for clues to that event.They disappear. The parents & teacher search party also disappear.

An inventor creates a humanoid robot named Jet Jaguar that is seized by the undersea nation of Seatopia. Using Jet Jaguar as a guide, the Seatopians send Megalon as vengeance for the nuclear tests that have devastated their society.
A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

A precious golden cross and a regretful incident lead to a bitter conflict between a wealthy chief-shepherd and an impoverished young herder, who is about to lose his one true love forever. Will this mark the end of an ardent romance?
While on a weekend trip with his elusive father, Peter's efforts to reconnect are complicated by ever-escalating events.
Cursed before the womb, the devil's daughter is caught in a war between humans and demons, while falling in love with a human who has the power to save or destroy humanity.
Who are the black eyed children? Several children attend Camp Bluebird in the summer of 1978. A tragedy unfolds. Years later, are these the black eyed children who haunt a town in Massachusetts?
A teenage time traveler falls in love with a girl from another era and the two must find a way to live together in the same time.

movie_name: A Rainy Day in New York
description: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.
A duel between two master swordsmen for the hand of a beautiful young maiden leads to a 20-year-old grudge that proves deadly.
A couple of rich women get captured by a group of terrorists, a crack team of mercenaries called Operation Hit Squad are called in to rescue them.

Something lurks off the coast of Block Island, silently influencing the behavior of fisherman, Tom Lynch. After suffering a series of violent outbursts, he unknowingly puts his family in grave danger.
The life-changing journey of a young Pakistani cricketer and a college student who is an ardent admirer of him.
Itje (Velove Vexia), a village girl hopes her life will change drastically after marrying a French man, Clement (Nino Fernandez).

An American family on holiday in the Australian outback catch the attention of notorious serial killer Mick Taylor. A hellish nightmare ensues as the couple's two children escape only to be hunted by Australia's most infamous murderer.

movie_name: Long Arm of the Law: Part 3
description: Michal Mak's second sequel to his brother's action classic finds an ex-soldier/escaped death row prisoner fleeing to Hong Kong and forced to work for a gang of criminals when they kidnap the woman he loves.
The crew of a horror web series travels to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. It soon encounters much more than expected as it moves deeper inside the nightmarish old building.
A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

Against the backdrop of a cloudless summer, love's unforeseen complications will entwine an Athenian writer, a morosely beautiful daughter, and a scorned local suitor. And then, calamity strikes. Can love redeem the sad girl in black?

Police inspector Cheng is killed in the line of duty while trying to nab a crook. One of his close friends, Chang Lei, decides to take back his resignation letter and track down the crook at any cost.
Childhood friends and sweethearts are ready to get married. But they also want to experience being single before taking the plunge.

A fraternity-hazing prank goes terribly wrong and a psychotic killer is set loose. Now a relentless evil has been unleashed, and the coeds of Winfield College will face the bloody horror of HAPPY HELL NIGHT.
At a low point in his life, Agent 47 endeavors to regain his spot atop of pantheon of elite assassins.
A screwball sex comedy following two couples and their 10 rules to a happy, healthy, open relationship.

movie_name: Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon: The Movie
description: When the forces of the Dark Kingdom threaten to destroy the peace, four guardian warriors will awaken.

movie_name: Mamasapano: Now It Can Be Told
description: The film tells the story of the 44 Special Action Force (SAF) officers who died on their mission during the tragic Mamasapano clash of 2015.
In order to be accepted as a member of a fraternity, a freshman has to spend a night in an old cemetery... on LSD.

Stuart is a having a mid-life crisis. Desperate for something more in life, he tags along on his best friend's family vacation to Paris - then proposes to his friend's 26-year-old daughter, Rosalind, while standing under the Eiffel Tower.
A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.
A young student is falling in love and then becomes an artist making performances with paper dresses. One day he should decide what is the most important thing in his life.

In 1997, a young boy is out hunting with his grandfather, when he stumbles upon a mysterious staircase deep in the forest. The subsequent disappearance leaves locals baffled as to the fate of the wayward pair.
Planes started falling from the sky, power cuts all over the UK this one pulse has deleted the majority of the UK memories. Those who live outside of the south of the UK call it Total Dead Zone'.
When a squall kills most of the men of a fishing village, the women turn to a young manservant who finds that he can have his choice of wives.
Christian begins to work as a shelf stacker at a supermarket and finds himself in a new, unknown world: the long aisles, the bustle at the checkouts, the forklifts.

4 friends who played Little League have reunited to pay tribute to their teammates who were murdered 15 years earlier, only to have a vengeful masked killer with a weaponized baseball bat targeting them.

6 years after apartheid ended the president publicly announces a path for forgiveness and reconciliation, but behind closed doors several party members disagree and begin making plans to target former members of the apartheid regime.
Dennis, a painfully shy 38-year-old bodybuilder who lives with his mother, sets off to Thailand in search of love.

Rock star Jarvis Marshall returns to the village where he grew up when his estranged mother dies. He finds many of his childhood friends, including local Sweet Shop owner Katie Powell have never left.
After inheriting an isolated cabin with a bloody history, Barry Quint and his friend Glenn Robinson visit the property only to find that an ancient and cursed amulet has awakened the evil once more.
A young girl struggles to win the science fair amidst an absentee mother and a fungal monstrosity of a foster mother.
Four robbers attempt, between several misfortunes, to steal a famous statue from the museum of Delfi under the orders of a blackmailer.
A couple who struggle to keep their relationship under wraps are forced to deal with situations where their bond gets exposed and changes are bound to occur.
Two young woman, disheartened by their upbringing, develope a savory taste for money. With robbery and murder on the menu, their lives spiral out of control!
Kabira, an orphan, is raised in the house of poor Muslim weavers. He's different from the rest of his lot because of his peaceful demeanour, which allows him to question religion and practices.
A poor and wronged woman's son returns from the big city to avenge his father, a honest school teacher.
A successful male escort describes in a series of confessions his tangled romantic relationships with his two roommates and an older, enigmatic male client.
Jai and Rishi, two best friends, are introduced to Anu, while Radhika is in love with Rajesh. But things take a turn when Varun enters Radhika's life and Anu must decide whom to marry.
An ex-convict determined to go straight finds himself unwittingly drawn back into the lucrative drug trade.
The crew of a popular ghost hunting show gets more than they bargained for when they come across a location that's actually haunted.
A young scientist must find a way to save the world as it faces a new deadly threat while she adjusts to her new challenges.

The story of a man who returns home on Christmas to settle his estranged mother's estate. Once there, he discovers a diary that may hold secrets to his own past and of a beautiful young woman on a mysterious journey of her own.
An ensemble of interconnected twentysomethings struggle with the complications of life, work, and love as they cross paths in the city throughout one day.

After a shopping mall in Chennai had been hijacked by terrorists who held the visitors as hostages, Veera Raghavan, a spy also trapped in the mall, decides to save the hostages by eliminating the terrorists.

A mysterious new girl arrives in posh suburban neighborhood and quickly sets out to terrorize the town. As she starts breaking into homes and torturing the occupants, they begin to realize that she isn't just another girl next door.
A kid saves a dangerous dying fugitive and triggers off a chase between the hunter and the hunted and soon, the definitions blur.
Law and Chan are gamblers and friends. Forced into a battle with the Yakuza, How far will friendship go? A high stakes card game will settle it all.

In this allegory on capitalism, director of a known car corporation invites one of his employees to his country villa to give him the good news. He just got promoted. However, the old man is not what he seems and promotion has a price.
D.O.E. accused of murder, must escape to track down those responsible while being the target of a manhunt.
A group of teens travel to a secluded cabin in the woods to celebrate their graduation as they realize they're being stalked and hunted by a group of masked killers.
Driving all night, packed in one car, five high school friends avoid their final destination - home.
Dracula enslaves Dr. Irving Jekyll, turning him into the lycanthropic JackalMan, demanding that he lure female blood donors to his L. A. cabin retreat.
An employee, working for Gault Capital in L.A, gets targeted by a ruthless assassin and locked in the elevator after she uncovers a chilling secret.
A doctor is fired for breaking the rules and operating on a man with a case of appendicitis. This leads him to start thinking about setting up his own private practice for the "society" set.

movie_name: The Man Who Stole the Sun
description: A high school science teacher builds an atomic bomb and uses it to extort the nation, but cannot decide what he wants. Meanwhile, a determined cop is catching up to him, as is radiation poisoning.
Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.
Two friends embark on a camping trip as part of an impromptu bachelor party only to discover that a mythical creature inhabits the surrounding wilderness.

Down-and-out Frank spends his days drinking and begging in the local underpass until one day, a visit from a stranger changes his life forever. After a long day's begging on Guy Fawkes ...                See full synopsis »
Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.
A theatrical star abruptly leaves England to escape her secret past, while a newspaper reporter follows her trail to America to get the scoop.

movie_name: The Strange Love of Molly Louvain
description: Molly Louvain's plans for a respectable marriage with her sweetheart Ralph fall through so she takes to the road with a two-bit crook and becomes wanted by the police in connection with a high-profile crime.
A sailor returns from sea to discover that his ex-girlfriend is now a smuggler. She takes his new girlfriend hostage to gain his help with smuggling some stolen jewels out of the country.
PUNCH-FUL with unrestrained LAUGHTER - RIP-ROARING with mapcap ACTION - A-TINGLING with gay ROMANCE.
This is the Spanish-language version of Storm Over the Andes (1935), shot simultaneously with that film with a different cast and also directed by Christy Cabanne.
A BATTLE-SCARRED WORLD-WAR II GUERRILLA FIGHTER, WHO EXTENDED HIS STRUGGLE AS A REBEL IN POT-WAR YEARS, DECIDES TO SURRENDER AFTER HIDING IN HILLS FOR MORE THAN A DECADE.
On a starry night, Jack and Jill separately meet a fortune teller who predicts they will meet the love of their life before the end of the year, which happens to be only five days away.
While racing with her car a young girl Mahtab has an accident with a Taxi driver Arastoo. This lead them both to involve in more troubles and romantic adventures and know each other more.
Syreena must investigate the disappearance of her mother, Cinderella. A series of wild complications follow.
After a routine prison transfer crashes in the forest, young Inuit paramedic Melina finds herself surrounded by murderers with a mere 100 feet to climb out of a ditch to escape.

Multi award-winning film; including 2 BEST FILM trophies. Johnny comes home on Army leave to marry his fiance Estella. Strange and terrifying events trap the young couple on their honeymoon in a living nightmare.

Jimmy Wang Yu stars in Chang Cheh's The Trail Of The Broken Sword, a sword hero tragedy similar to Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, yet done 34 years earlier and without using special effects to make things look better than they are.
Three couples go into the mountains for an overnight hike, seeking relaxation and fresh air. Instead, they find themselves engulfed in terror as they fight to stay alive.
Two ice cream vendors war for territory, while their teens betray them by falling in love behind their backs.
A young girl develops a crush on the family employee, but she must help him clear his ex-wife's name of murder.
Boxer Joe Pendleton dies 50 years too soon due to a heavenly mistake, and is given a new life as a millionaire playboy.
Senior couple take their pretty daughter (Jean Parker) -- from their home and farm in Mid-America -- to Hollywood -- to become a movie star.
Two self-appointed Robin Hood cops who plan a theft that will set them up for retirement and get Internal Affairs off their backs once and for all.

A reformed hunter living in isolation on a wildlife sanctuary becomes involved in a deadly game of cat and mouse when he and the local Sheriff set out to track a vicious killer who may have kidnapped his daughter years ago.

A long forgotten ancient spacecraft discovered on Earth. Investigations carried out by Scout transport her to the moon whereupon she meets the impressive machines preserving the wisdom of that long lost civilization.
Erik, who comes from a wealthy family, must marry a stuck-up rich girl, but the one he really loves is the less-well-off Anna.
Troubled by a repeated experiences with violence a young man seeks the help of a noted Psychologist and group therapy in an attempt rid himself of bad dreams.

Vadakkanveettil kochu kunju is neglected by his family members due to life style and attitude. All others are in high profile.The family has huge wealth but really kochukunju is not a person as he seems.
The Thunderhawk team is back, this time they must take on a space outlaw and his gang of villainous aliens.

Three young people in Tokyo. Kuro is a girl working a part-time job at a bakery. Eito is a photographer. Gou is a theater director. These three individuals meet by coincidence and, as a means to escape reality, begin living together at a deserted inn near the sea.

A tough, honorable former Navy SEAL gets more than he bargained for, but more than he can handle, when he accepts a job captaining a ship for a mysterious, sexy woman who turns out to be the wife of a ruthless drug kingpin.

For a thousand years, the Reapers guarded mankind from the demons that wait in the dark. Now, at the beginning of a new age, the Reapers are betrayed and slaughtered. Only one Reaper remains - Red, and she's out to exact revenge.

Kaththi Sandai is the story of a farmer who becomes a Robin Hood style thief for the welfare of his village. He steals from the people who deny his village of its basic needs and uses the money for its development.
Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.
The good and evil within humanity collide in a horrific confrontation in this faithful retelling of Stevenson's classic story.
