An app-based driver for a rich clientele goes on a murder spree to prove a point about those who live in undeserved wealth, and a young couple who own a successful start-up are his next passengers.
A funny tale of a pretty pickpocket tangling with jewel heists, wallet snatching, and a drug trafficking ring.

A lesbian couple decides to fool a man into thinking that one of them is straight so she can get pregnant and then dump him. Of course it does not go smoothly and confused lies lead to a surprise ending.
A family is torn apart when the stepfather's PTSD appears to develop into something far more sinister...and possibly even supernatural.

An Anthology with three tales including the ghost of an 80's fitness guru, a Tattoo that won't stop spreading, and an Uber Driver that picks up her final customer for the night, not knowing that she's in for the ride of her life.
Jerimiah Johnson was a strange boy growing up. He could never decided what he wanted to be. Now he has chosen to be a ranger and help people to die.

A reporter and her cameraman connect a surviving Jonestown leader and a TV exec's missing son to a drug war where jungle installations are being massacred by an army of natives and a skilled white assassin.
As Deputy Director Reardon investigates the assassination attempt on the President he uncovers the unthinkable.
Private Targets is about a new elite classified fugitive tactical unit created by U.S. government track down, capture or eliminate America's most violent and rustles fugitives wanted dead or alive.
In an instant, as the action continues from the U.S. "Necroland" movie, 80% of the world's population has turned into rage humans.
After an unusual meteor shower leaves most of the human population blind, a merchant navy officer must find a way to conquer tall, aggressive plants which are feeding on people and animals.

The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street-smart girl to discover how he came to be.

A family of 5 heads out on a holiday vacation. After discovering a shortcut, they wind up broken down on Route 69. When a man happens along and offers assistance, they are relieved, until they discover they are being hunted one by one.

The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.
An astral traveling painter falls for a girl who also travels. Only to find out that she is more than he bargained for.
A movie which portrays the role of women in fields men dominate, the movie emphasizes on woman as taxi drivers.
It follows two gangsters who supply drugs. The British police forces try to capture them and break the gangs up.
Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.
A Minnesota community is being terrorized by a series of killings, targeting anyone who makes the headlines.

movie_name: Curse of the House of Savage
description: Four friends get more than they bargained for when a freak storm drives them into the House of Savage. Monsters, dangerous artifacts, and more threaten to make this night their last.

A Sicilian peasant begins the journey to the promised land and meets a beautiful Englishwoman. But neither is prepared for the harsh realities of Ellis Island. Can they make it through the golden door to the America of their dreams?

movie_name: Zai shuo yi ci wo yuan yi
description: When Luke proposes to Cai and hears a simple word "Sorry," he wakes up finding himself shaking on his bed. Luke tries again but is forced to return to the same morning of his proposal due to the repeated rejection.
An urban romantic comedy about a young San Diego policeman who travels to Los Angeles with his fiancée to meet her dysfunctional family and announce their engagement.

The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
From the people that brought you Steve Niles' Remains and Dead Souls comes a terrifying new anthology film based on the human senses...
Rrahman Fetahu and his two brothers in arms survive during the Yugoslavia war between Serbia and Kosovo.

12 'o' Clock revolves around a young girl Gauri who starts getting traumatised with frightening nightmares and incidents of eerie sleepwalking. What follows to extricate her from the possession forms the crux of the story.
A DEA Agent left for dead goes after the most dangerous crime families in Russia, Asia and Latin America responsible for wiping out his family.

Young scientist Bai Jingtian leads a group of people into the vast mountains in search of a murderous hydra. He thought it was just an ordinary scientific expedition. Unexpectedly, many dangers will follow one after another.
A man tries to recover a lost memory by returning to his family's Vermont vacation home where an unspeakable act took place leaving him institutionalized as a child.
They are the wealthiest players in town. Life cant be better, money, fame the girls but one thing they aim for is finding her and keeping her
Leslie, a tightly-wound corporate lawyer, finds the love of her life right under her upturned nose -- and it's her temporary secretary, Fred, which causes her all sorts of embarrassment.

movie_name: Karzan, il favoloso uomo della jungla
description: An expedition, financed by Lord Carter and led by Captain Fox, have as a goal to find and capture a jungle-man who lives in Africa.
Daniyar returns home from his travels, having left after the untimely death of his father only to discover that everyone in town is acting a little odd.

movie_name: The Siege and Fall of the Alamo
description: An account of the battle of the Alamo in San Antonio, Texas, during the Texan War of Independence against Mexico in 1836.
An elite crime-fighting unit in the court of the Chinese emperor relies on flying swords to defeat their enemies.
A thumb drive from the dark web reveals disturbing footage documenting three American filmmakers on a script writing trip to rural Quebec.
Three young ladies experience their first sexual encounters with the men of their dreams but soon they realize that there's more to life and love than sex.
A hospital psychiatrist's own sanity is pushed to the edge when a frightened amnesiac patient insists that he has died and brought something terrible back from the other side.
A woman whose car breaks down in the desert and attacked by bikers finds her way to a small town, where the town residents are terrorized by the psycho bikers.
A half-vampire/half-human struggles to find herself in a world where power, greed, and deception are rampant.

movie_name: The Strange Case of the Man and the Beast
description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.
A ferocious serial killer in a palace of students. One private detective from Valencia investigate to find him.

Nanchenkotta is beset by problems and civilian life there is a nightmare. However, the arrival of a fearless police officer with a strong sense of justice is about to change Nanchenkotta's law-and-order situation--once and for all.
One man exposes the truth behind the greed flooding the sports industry. He now must flee to the US before everyone involved exposes him as the anonymous source.

The main character of the movie - the ordinary guy, the driver whose life not really successfully develops. At last the destiny has smiled to him, he has met true love, but in the wedding day one more test falls to his lot.
A beautiful young woman left blind by a hit-and-run must unmask her attackers before they strike again and lay claim on her $500 million inheritance.

movie_name: Zombie Abomination: The Italian Zombie Movie - Part 1
description: While investigating the death of his twin brother, a special forces veteran, a sexy psychic, an evil succubus, her oafish boyfriend, two mysterious aliens and the Michigan Militia inadvertently join forces in a landfill of the living dead.
A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

GRS-CIA operative Rudy Rivera and two former GRS operatives/human trafficking NGOs are called to fulfill the last wishes of Rudy's estranged brother, Diego who spent the last seven years organ trafficking around the world.
An expecting mother suspects that her unborn baby is possessed by the demonic spirit of her dead mother while her wife questions her sanity.
A young women unravels the chilling truth behind the death of her lover and a bizarre family secret they guard at all costs.
He thought he was in control of his own life. Then he lost his wife and thought it was the hardest hit he could handle. It was not.

In the idyllic town of Mills falls, a daring group of kids stumble upon a dark secret at a farmhouse that left one dead, and the rest forever scarred. Ten years later, Melissa is released from a metal institution and back into town, where she must face the returning darkness, and ultimately find out of the evil is real, or simply descends from the wretched corners of her mind.
The story of two aging Canadian C-130 Hercules pilots ravaged by atrocities experienced together while flying humanitarian missions into the worst conflicts known in the late 20th century
A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a young girl. When her life is threatened by her father's connection with crime, he must call upon his abandoned skills to save her.
A literary editor doesn't know what to expect when she's sent to check-up on her publisher's reclusive horror writer.
The skunk ape, also known as the Florida Bigfoot has been rumored to be responsible for several murders in South Florida. A documentary crew sets out to uncover the truth.
A sociologist sends his friend, a psychologist, to a local detention center to obtain a delinquent teenager for a book he is writing.
Government agents battle a gang of Nazis who are trying to use the Orotron machine, which can turn seawater into gold.
Following the events in Rise of Redemption, The Future Rebellion start their own task force to take down the rest of the government and anyone who stands in their way.
A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.
A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.
When the happiness of his family is held to ransom by a violent crime lord, Ram sets out on a quest to destroy his nemesis and his criminal empire.
A leading advocate Parthasarthy Iyer hopes that his son Shiva will become like him. Alas, Shiva ends up as a criminal and is sent to jail for a murder.
A Wing Chun master has to defeat 8 martial arts schools to open his own school, yet he has become a chess piece to the local power dynamics.
A small time crook keeps trying to reunite with a woman who briefly sheltered him while he was on the run from the law.
Gilly, fresh out of prison, and J, a hustler with a major drug problem, just can't shake their criminal ways.

A "coming of age" family adventure feature. A father attempts to revive his deserted relationship between his daughter and his son by introducing them to a century old family secret that will take them on the ride of their lifetime.
Three friends discover a mysterious machine that takes pictures twenty-four hours into the future, and conspire to use it for personal gain, until disturbing and dangerous images begin to develop.

When a family moves into a suburban home, they discover that they are up against not one, but a trinity of sinister forces that make it clear that they are not welcome, and never will be. Inspired by real events.
It's the story of a young couple struggling with challenges of life. Both are aggressive and follow their own thoughts which affect their relationship. Their reunion becomes complicated gradually.
In 1916 as an officer in the Habsburg Army ethnic Romanian Apostol Bologa is torn between remaining loyal to the Habsburgs or deserting to the Romanian Army across enemy lines.
Set in the same world as Archon Defender, this film follows the quest of a young woman, Desmerelle, as she confronts Lorem to free her twin sister Phaetra from the machine.
Andre has known a lot of war, he comes to Los Angeles to change his life. Taking a job as a nightclub bouncer he learns, that for some men, change is impossible.
Dynamite fishing in a rural swamp revives a prehistoric gill monster that must have the blood of human females in order to survive.
A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.

Within the walls of the trendiest Chicago restaurants, behind the closed doors of private dinner parties, and on the banks of the Seine in Paris, OPEN TABLES explores true love, love lost and the importance of a good main course.

Margaretha receives bad news from her Danish relatives. A lawless horde off angry berserks, whose leader calls himself "Hvit Bjorn". They follow the bloody trail up to the far north, where the come across a half-devastated Viking village.
Bored New York office girl Teddy Shaw goes to a camp in the Catskill Mountains for rest and finds Chick Kirkland.
27 years ago Ben watched helplessly as his twin brother drowned in a lake. Now, amid a deadly pandemic, he returns to find forgiveness, but disturbs a watery guilt that threatens to pull him under.
New Yorker Ruby Weaver believes she has found the man of her dreams in Sam Deed, who is her best catch in some time--except that he assures her that he came from the future.
In his final film role, Nick Adams is a young mechanic who finds danger and romance in the exciting, sometimes unscrupulous world of stock-car racing.
The young woman, who has only one year to live, will choose a different method to die because she does not want to die of cancer.

Sophie escapes to her grandparents' house where her grandmother 10 blind dates plot. But when her ex-boyfriend turns up unexpectedly, Sophie is more confused than ever because maybe, she's started to have feelings for someone else.
The story of a man desperate to return his home to the beauty it once was and remove the corruption and violence from New York City.
The hero visits a town and meets a woman whose daughters were killed. He seeks the murderers, eventually encountering three men who he initially believes are the killers, though he learns otherwise.
A documentary crew accompany a group of illegal immigrants crossing the Border, but their plans run afoul when they are captured by a gang of sadistic radicals in New Mexico.
A Russian officer is sent to the U.S. to try and stop sleeper agents who will mindlessly attack government entities when they hear certain coded words.
Fifteen year old Parvathi manages to escape after witnessing her family getting murdered by Jagannatha Varma. She disguises herself as a boy and starts living as a servant in a house of bachelors.
When an extremist Middle Eastern presidential candidate threatens the security of the US and its allies, there's only one way to eliminate the threat silently.

Nika, a model/actress after losing her agency's representation works as an exotic dancer who eventually becomes an escort. She realizes that their is a "deeper allure" in life rather than just the day to day financial survival.
A group of industrialists file for a movement to secede the region of Long Island from New York to form the first ever socialist State of Long Island.

movie_name: Yi ma de hou xian dai sheng huo
description: Ye Rutang, a single-living woman in her late fifties, struggles to maintain a dignified life amid the dangers of Shanghai.

International terrorists get a surprise when their cargo turns out to contain living dinosaurs. The army commando team now have to think fast, if they want to prevent the extinction of the human species, instead of the reptiles.
Tired of getting burnt in relationships, a young man decides to give up on love and become a womanizer.
A strait-laced FBI agent and a hulking, big-hearted narcotics cop team up to track down a drug lord associated with a militant hate group.

movie_name: P Se Pyaar F Se Faraar
description: High-school sweethearts Suraj Maali and Janvi Singh are well aware of their diverse socio-economic backgrounds and so, the young lovers opt for marriage by elopement. This, in turn, conjures up a storm the couple isn't prepared for.

Takes place right after the events of The Million Dollar Tip (2014). Focuses on Will and how he is coping with the death of his best friend Evan, when all of the sudden his life is turned upside down once again by the mysterious Tip Man.
The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.
Walter "Posey" Fodrell, shares one of his memoirs of the historically secret band of vigilante civil rights soldiers known as the Padlock Men. The movement will never be the same.
Weary of business duties and a conventional home life, Lee Randon acquires a long-lost sense of excitement and romance with young flapper Claire Morris.
Surya, a police officer, is removed from a case when he is on the verge of tracing the culprit. However, when it is handed to his friend and he gets killed, Surya sets out to catch the killer.

A woman is raped and murdered during World War 2. Forty years later she returns to haunt her persecutors from the Tao Tao Mansion. A professor and his family move into the house, only to have the spirits take their son.
A group of adult film cast and crew members must discover what is causing their fellow stars to rabidly attack them.
Late 19th century - Gifted with musical genius and cursed with a monstrous face, Erik lives in hiding deep in the catacombs beneath the Paris Opera House.
Guerrino, a prematurely widowed businessman, falls in love with Chantal, a former paratrooper in the German army who changed sex a few years earlier.
A guy leaves his wife in Hong Kong and goes for business in mainland, where he meets a new girl and falls in love with her.
The story of a fictional late 19th Century robot utilized by such history-makers as Terry Roosevelt and Lawrence of Arabia.

Alexander the Great's sword is stolen from a museum as it holds special powers for the reincarnation of Alex. Illegal gladiator style duels are held around NYC. The cop investigating has visions of these fights.
A fashion model accepts a high paying assignment that takes place overnight with a mysterious photographer.
A gay couple in Seoul confront the uncertain prospect of military service and a hidden past from North Korea.

A woman traveling with her parents to her uncle's house crash near his house. Her parents die but she survives. She stays with her uncle, but it becomes clear that he and his son are planning something sinister for her.

Two brothers share a good relationship till a girl comes between them. Deepu is all set to go to Norway when he discovers that his brother Ramu's relationship with Ragini, who is dead. How is Deepu's GF Mouna connected to these events?
Jayadevan pretends to be a Swami with the help of his friends to get into the house where Athira lives, who he believes holds the key to find his missing friend.
A group of guys living in a Brooklyn brownstone find their way through the harsh realities of life as they enter into their 30's.
It's late at night at the private sanatorium, filled with rich drugged up kids, when an emergency case arrives that the staff cannot handle.

Lonely, angry Roger lost his job, his sanity, and custody of his son during COVID-19 and he's about out to go on a revenge mission on what he sees are the enemies of his life- society, celebrities, family, his boss, government, etc.
Justine Bateman rocks out as the leader of an all-girl band that struggles with men and drugs during a summer resort gig.
Left orphaned as a child, a relentless young doctor collides with a lethal drug operation as she pursues her parents' killer.
Somebody with very little Christmas spirit is killing anyone in a Santa suit one London holiday season, and Scotland Yard has to stop him before he makes his exploits an annual tradition.

Billie ventures to her parents old Strip club business to take some time out of her mundane life. The moment Billie enters, she triggers off a psychological nightmare that threatens to engulf and destroy her.

50-year-old Jim has constructed a perfect life in the world's most expensive city. When he is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success, while wrestling with resurfacing demons from his past.
In the City of Angels, a young Iowan girl (Frederick) fresh off the bus falls in love with a promising actor (Kirk).
Maria, a fearless soldier, and TS-347, a man with superhuman strength, are being pursued by a military cell responsible for scientific experiments that have resulted in a zombie apocalypse.

A retired US Army veteran takes matter in his own hands when his retirement funds have been wiped out by a con artist / "Wolf of Wall Street" type. This is a story that the "99%" will appreciate very much.
Aircraft are being shot down by a large black plane with a big "X" painted on the wing. The chief suspects are invited for the weekend to an old dark mansion.
Set during the 1950s on a British-ruled Caribbean island, this drama deals with local politics, interracial relationships, social inequality, racism, adultery, and murder.

Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate's former professor invites her to speak at her alma mater. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students.
The end of the world is upon us, as an anthology showing 5 short films detailing the beginning, middle, and aftermath of the apocalypse.

A couple of adventurous pilots-turned-pearl-divers encounter a helpless woman whose missionary parents have died. They entrust their cache of pearls to her, but discover that she is actually not what she claims.
A racist cop and his partner track down a serial killer murdering white woman using slave torture techniques.
Single and underemployed, John pledges to get his act together before he turns 30. When he meets the elegant young professional Vanessa, he thinks he's found the woman to elevate him.

In an abandoned asylum, doctors carry out secret experiments on unsuspecting patients. The experiments, codenamed Limes, are designed to cure violent episodes through new methods of brainwashing and mind manipulation.
After falling pregnant to Perth, her boyfriend's best friend, Ice commits suicide. She returns to haunt Perth while Tan seeks out the person who made her kill herself for his own revenge.

The murder of Gamadhi, whose victim was killed and the two officers in the Criminal Investigation Department, Abdulrahman and Nasser, are exposed to uncover the threads of the crime, but the strings of the crime are intertwined.

The story revolves around 14-year-old Jeremy, a shy boy who writes poetry and songs for his bullyish brother Shane and his band, but receives no credit or money for his efforts. The band is...                See full synopsis »

Three buddies Bhaskar, Chaitanya and Durga along with a stranger, venture into a forest and stay in a haunted guest house. They carry two cameras through which they start recording interesting and mysterious happenings.
The drama about a missing person case which has detectives scrambling to find the pregnant wife of an uncaring husband. When all avenues fail, a psychic tries to help.
srikanth a bachelor looks to marry in the process he selects three girls and how he struggled to get along the three girls is the crux of the story
Highschool sweethearts, forced to marry other people, cling to their past romance through the child they bore between them and who continues to act as their go-between
The Grand Prize charts the exploits of an all-wrestler gang of bikers as they traversed dusty Levantine highways.

movie_name: Naruto Shippûden: The Movie 3: Inheritors of the Will of Fire
description: Ninjas with bloodline limits begin disappearing in all the countries and blame points toward the fire nation. By Tsunade's order, Kakashi is sacrificed to prevent an all out war. Naruto fights through friends and foes to prevent his death.
In this romantic comedy, an eccentric girl forces a reluctant college student into an affair. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Song "Come Saturday Morning.

Will Henry is a newly single graphic novelist balancing parenting his young twin daughters and a classroom full of students while exploring and navigating the rich complexities of new love and letting go of the woman who left him.

Jasin and Caleb's eternal bliss is put to the test when Jasin's century old rival Demetrius returns to get his revenge. Power and passion collide when the two broods finally clash. Who will remain and who will be destroyed for eternity?
A daughter of the powerful Duke must show her courage and inventiveness to be with the man she loves.
A young Psychiatrist discovers that her Mother's death was not was it seems. Her battle with the unknown causes her to second guess everything she knows.
After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

A man is trapped in a murder conspiracy and no one believes him and gets further blackmailed by the killer. Now he must race against time to find out who is the real killer and uncover his secret motive behind it.
A post-apocalyptic Western that follows a group of gunslingers as they look to rid a small town of a zombie plague.

movie_name: Killer Poop 3: Night of the Living Poop
description: Zombies have come to life, past victims of the Killer Poop and when the zombies poop, well that poop is not your average day dump. It's zombified.
Four childhood friends are reunited when one of them surfaces after twenty years, forcing them to confront a creature straight out of a spine-chilling Moroccan legend.
A young man gets one last shot to become a professional water skier, but has to overcome his family and the rigors of the pro circuit to see if he has what it takes.
A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.
Suspected for killing the wealthy father of his lover, a man, formerly known as Mr.X, goes on the run from the Police.

Aries, a haunted freelance detective who only accepts cases involving children, breaks tradition to find a millionaire's missing girlfriend, only to be led into a nightmarish underworld from her own mysterious past.
AN EX-CONVICT IS FORCED TO GO BACK TO A LIFE OF CRIME BY A SYNDICATE BIG BOSS BUT GETS INVOLVED WITH THE LATTER'S GIRLFRIEND, THEREBY INCURRING HIS IRE.
In early twentieth century China, various criminals with different goals are connected to a Shanghai train, with many rich people on-board.
An update version of the best-selling novel and blockbuster movie, it tells the story of Scott Carey who shrinks to an incredible small size and must face the danger that he runs into.
Unni, a young man, comes home for a long leave. However, his housemaid who is a teenager, develops a secret liking towards him that torments her.
A Property Guardian looks after a country house for a week, only to find that it has a horrifying presence.

Manolo learns the techniques of his Master Cadona to participate in the "Brutal Kombat", a championship of fight to death against the best fighters of the world. Including China, Argentina, Mexico, Spain and Russia.
A radio station owner must perform dangerous publicity stunts in order to prevent his business being taken over by a big corporation.
An innocent essay in a college-creative writing class sets off a terrifying and deadly chain of events. Will they be able to stop her, or will she take them all?
After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire.
Three young martial arts masters emerge from the back streets of Hong Kong to help the powerless fight injustice.
During the Civil War, a group of Confederates escapes from the Union POW camp at Fort Bravo but has to contend with the desert, the Mescalero Apaches and the pursuing Union troops.
4 drug dealers call a truce and form an Alliance,but after 20 years of peace one member is forced to kill the others.
"I shouted one night" tells the story of several girls who will have a bad time in a day, very badly. A school from La Plata as the omnipresent scene in the seven women protagonists.

A journalist takes a bet that he can spend the night in a haunted castle on All Hallow's Eve. During his stay, he bears witness to the castle's gruesome past coming to life before him, and falls in love with a beautiful female ghost.
Two private investigators embark on an assignment which leads them into the hands of darkness. Neither investigator is prepared for what lays in wait.
Linden and Amy's relationship is in big trouble and after a night out they get into the wrong Taxi and their night out soon descends into a night of terror.

Two very different archaeologists are deputized in a global law enforcement division these Special Agents are called 'RED AGENTS.' They retrieve the illicit and illegal trafficking of Red Listed Objects in this high octane adventure.
A young couple on a motorway journey are drawn into a game of cat and mouse with a truck driver following a near accident.

A mediocre screenwriter is forced to write a zombie movie or be dumped by his Hollywood agent. When his screenplay bleeds into real life, he has to learn how to save the day in his fictional world in order to save the real world.
One man in a struggle to rebuild his life as a relationship spirals from perfect to the complete opposite.
A sexy black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.
A former police officer puts aside his differences with the force in order to track down his brother's murderer. He teams with a younger detective to bring the case home.

A couple with a BAD history of supernatural tornadoes move somewhere with no tornadoes until an earthquake hits unleashing monstrous, unnatural, snakes. No one told them that 2015 is the Year of the Snake.
Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy must stay one step ahead of the law as he hunts for the real killer.
Based on a true story. A modern day love story about two junkies exploring drug addiction and survival on the streets of Los Angeles.
Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.
A suicidal teenage boy is befriended by a sadistic serial killer, who vows to set him free of his drug-addicted family.
Lisa, a 12-year-old student confronts bullies in a magical journey in both real and virtual worlds, and learns valuable lessons about strength and family along the way.
Raped, beaten and left to die. Armed with revenge and a revolver, Hell has no fury like a woman scorned.

For Jules, life barely exists outside of work. For Lydia, life is her work. UNAVAILABLE is the story of two people trying to overcome their emotional fears and what it takes for them to break through their dysfunction.

High School super-jock Harvey just wants to drive his Jeep fast, talk trash with friends and get his freak on- but an act of violence towards a cyclist who dared to share his road may not end well for Beaver High's proudest Buckin' Beaver.

The carnival has made it to the small town of Latchley Iowa. Everyone is excited, until a massacre breaks out. All of it seems to center around one woman, Aria Wolfe. Is she innocent or was she part of the worst event in Iowa history?
When an Atlanta Police Officer is killed in cold blood his Navy SEAL brother must go undercover in order to track down his elusive killer.
A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.
A group of culture relics dealer plan a conspiracy to steal an ancient sword from a amateur film makers.
In this quest for sanctuary, love, and identity, a man and his uncle arrive in Hyderabad, where they capitalize on the uncle's resemblance to a local don.

Injured on the job Vasily Kuzyakin gets a ticket to the resort. There he meets femme fatale Raisa Zakharovna, and once under the charm, moves to live with her. Unfortunately, a new life is not all that sweet as dreamed hapless Vasily.
Two young English women go on a cycling tour of the French countryside. When one of them goes missing, the other begins to search for her. But who can she trust?
Crazy Clowns, Crooked Cops and lots of blood and guts... very Tarantinoesque view of a small Minnesota town.
A spaceship crashes upon an unexplored planet, and the rescuers sent to search for survivors discover that decades have passed due to time dilation.

A family curse confines orphaned twins Rachel and Edwards to their home, in punishment for their ancestors' sins. Bound to the rules of a haunting childhood lullaby, the twins must never let any outsiders inside the house.

After decades of political pressure and request from India to Great Britain regarding the return of India's most prized treasure without a resolution, an India commando decides to storm the Tower of London and take back the Kohinoor.
An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.
Sky, on a quest to spread her father's ashes, revisits her childhood Lodge with her husband and brother, only to be stalked by a dangerous entity disguised as a Park Ranger.

While aiming to complete her ailing twin's bucket list in time for Christmas, a wound tight CEO gets a crash course on taking risks beyond the boardroom, when she becomes the target of a charming internet prankster's high stakes dare.

movie_name: Lets Get Married or Break Up
description: A loving couple in their twenties begin to struggle when they arrive at various stages of a 21st century relationship.

movie_name: Satanic Panic 2: Battle of the Bands
description: Now they have to juggle being the biggest band on the planet, being government spies, growing egos and band rivalries as the Battle of the Bands approaches.
Two women, who are dissatisfied with the dishonesty they see in dating and relationships, decide to make a pact to spend 24 hours together hoping to find a new way to create intimacy.
An American virologist with his friends is caught in the middle of events occurring around the world in the period of the pandemic COVID-19.
Jake has to go to brother's wedding in Hawaii. He hires a bride to pretend he's engaged as his brother is marrying his ex. Anna the rental bride falls for Jake.
When a fellow bridge builder is killed in an accident, two of his co-workers take his now-orphaned daughter to New York to be adopted by relatives.
In a small northern island town, things go very very wrong when one guy accidentally contaminates the entire island and it is over run by werewolves in this horror/comedy monster-fest.
"The Kid" is a monk whose education in the aptly named "Crazy Lo Han Fist" finds him battling a cruel bandit's son and befriending an abused prostitute.

A serial killer is plaguing San Francisco, surgically removing the hearts of his victims. Assigned to the case is a weak-stomached homicide detective who investigates the possibility of black market organ transplants.
A deadly infection breaks out in Manhattan, causing humans to develop into blood-thirsty rat creatures.
A man tries to recover the sperm he had donated in times of need. But he finds out that three women may be already carrying his baby.

Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the house, blood on the walls, nothing alive, not even a mouse. Limbs hanging, placed with great care, and the ones who were left feared old Santa would soon be there.
After spending time in a mental hospital, a girl is reunited with her sister and returns home, only to see some truly strange events start to happen.
Villain makes Ravi Teja a police officer so that he can use him for his own purpose. But when he knows the truth things turn upside down.
A staid doctor's monotonous routine is shaken up when a gangster who is on the run decides to hide from the police in his clinic.

A small industrialist from Toulouse, goes to Paris to negotiate the buyout of his company from an American financial group. During his stay, the representative of the large firm calls on a luxury call girl to facilitate their "business".
A rock band called "The Clowns" comes under suspicion of murder when several prostitutes are killed by individuals made up like members of the band.

movie_name: The Loneliest Boy in the World
description: 'The Loneliest Boy in the World' is a modern fairytale - with zombies. A satire and a celebration of family values, of the imagery of horror films, of suburban life, of the American Dream and of the ultimate taboo; death.
In San Francisco, a villainous land owner with underworld connections seeks to steal the property of an old Spanish family.
When a lawyer's daughter is set to marry a retired policeman's son, the deep suspicion and disapproval of their parents turn the lovebirds into strange bedfellows.

Harishchandran wants to get his daughter married, but the thought of her leaving the house breaks his heart, so he decides to find a groom who is willing to live in his father-in-law's home after the wedding.
A undiscovered, unknown, new-thought, psychic mind doctor who has rejected the established opinions and ideas on the mind treats 6 patients whose lives are changed unalterably.

An Inspector is assigned to track down a large sum of stolen money. His investigations lead him to a couple of small time crooks, a village belle, a murder, an absconding suspect, and an international drug dealer.
A mysterious black briefcase. A journey from the farmlands to the urban landscape. A bug that isn't what it seems to be.
A shady drug addict accountant brings friends up to his bosses cabin for the weekend for a little vacation. As they attempt to have a good time an underage psychopath killer stalks them.
Jake, an ex-Motocross champion, is set up for a crime he has not committed. He now finds himself running from the government, and must find the man who set him up and to clean his name.
Kay and her eastern clan go out West to run the ranch left her by her grandfather. Badguys are out to ruin the ranch's irrigation system, so Autry lends a hand.
Two episodes of the TV series "The Persuaders" joined into a movie. Two playboys, Roger Moore, Tony Curtis, investigate crimes along the French Riviera.

Lavretsky returns to his estate after stay in Paris.Frustrated with life,in his wife's unfair, he falls in love with Lisa. Suddenly the arriving of Fëdors woman which before has been reported the death, completes the simple love.
A lesbian love story against the background of the extraordinary true-life rise of a Chilean, which came to be ruled by Amanda Huassaf.
A beautiful young girl parachutes onto a remote, isolated island, and finds herself taken prisoner by a gang of criminals hiding out there.

Julie, a college student, is sexually assaulted by two fellow students. Desperate for revenge, she makes contact with a necromancer, who begins using her demonic powers to get rid of any guy Julie hates.

Three ex-military robots are reprogrammed as teachers and secretly placed in a school where most students are part of organized gangs. They begin to respond violently to unruly students, and their military training starts to take over.

A group of retired spies once former enemies, are forced to work together in an attempt to retrieve a neutron bomb stolen by a group of new-wave, high-tech operatives who have supplanted them in the post-Cold War intelligence game.
A heroin addict undergoes a radical new kind of treatment for her condition; but the drug 'Deimosimine' instead creates for her a world of horror and blood. Is she the victim? The monster? Or both?
An undercover cop becomes embroiled in a battle with warring criminals who want to acquire a "black box," their ultimate key to a treasure.
A young woman inherited a mythical creature that demands her to sacrifice unborn babies to gain beauty and wealth.
Hanan is a famous singer who meets an aspiring director named Ahmed, and soon they fall in love despite the age difference between them.

movie_name: Love and Separation in Sri Lanka
description: A Japanese businessman is sent to Sri Lanka and meets a beautiful Japanese woman with a past. They befriend an old Japanese-Indian widow who has an estranged son in Japan.

In 1930s, a psychotic drifter who's after the mystery woman who covered his whole body in illustrations that foresee distant future shows three of them (The Veldt, The Long Rain and The Last Night of the World) to a mesmerized traveler.
A fur trapper takes a mute girl as his unwilling wife to live with him in his remote cabin in the woods.
Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young.
Out at sea, an evil twin throws his brother overboard, left for dead, he lands on an island, where he struggles with love, betrayal, and his brother's revenge.
After being attacked on the street, a young man enlists at a local dojo, led by a charismatic and mysterious sensei, in an effort to learn how to defend himself from future threats.

Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
LITO LAPID PLAYS THE ROLE OF A MYSTERIOUS, LEGENDARY FOLK HERO WHO WEARS A BLACK, A FILIPINO COUNTERPART OF THE SPANISH ZORRO.

An estranged brother and sister return home to scatter their father's ashes. However, they are forced to fight for their survival when they uncover a sinister human trafficking ring operating from within the isolated hills.
When American movie star Brody Walker is abducted during a brazen attack in Shanghai, it's up to former SWAT leader David Hendrix and local police detective John Lee to find him.
A lone drifter suffering from partial memory loss accepts a job to look after a psychologically troubled woman in an abandoned house on an isolated island.
The life of a foster family in South Central Los Angeles, a few weeks before the city erupts in violence following the verdict of the Rodney King trial.
A disturbed poet is driven to the point of insanity by the words he writes, which leads to twisted visions of dark and evil desires of lust, sex and torture.
Raised by compassionate wild animals as one of their own, a helpless eight-year-old girl grows into a beautiful, untamed woman and becomes Lady Tarzan: the fearless Queen of the Elephants.
A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.
Three friends from Alexandria singing in the popular Wedding accuse someone of murder and trying to prove his innocence in order to be able to marry his fiancee.

Ravi has weakness for women and gets into a physical relationship with ladies. One day, he falls in love with Bhavana. He has a heath issue, which requires blood. Why is he in a relationship with many women and what will happen to his love
High-tech mercenaries unwittingly sabotage the National Missile Defense System for a treasonous Air Force General, then stop him from launching a rogue nuclear attack on North Korea.
An app appears on a girl’s phone. What looked like a game is actually a connection to the world of the dead, which allows you to see them through the phone’s camera.

Tells the story of Sofia (Angie Cepeda), a Colombian college student struggling with immigration issues in LA, who accepts a $50,000 offer to rent her body and soul and become a surrogate mother to a wealthy couple.
After they lost their parents in a traffic accident, strange events begin to happen to Yeonhui and Yeonsu.
A TV channel would be the first in the world to send a martial arts contest through the Internet. The competition is the people with completely different backgrounds that will make up for the title.

Brilliant Cancer specialist Dr. Michael Durant is emotionally troubled, wrestling with the traumatic loss of his 10 year old daughter from Cancer. Immersing himself in his work in the ...                See full synopsis »
Two children raised by single parents attempt to reunite their parents to enjoy the happiness of a complete family.
Jeeva arrives in a village ruled by a cruel god-man and upon learning about his ancestors decides to fight against him.
Several members of the International Rescue crew attend the maiden flight of Brains' revolutionary craft Skyship One, unaware that they are being lured into a deadly trap.
A special forces team on a covert mission faces off with a terrorist group that will stop at nothing to achieve its deadly goal.
A happily married woman with an eight-year-old son suddenly decides to end her relationship with her second husband. His son thinks only a fairy can save their marriage. But do fairies exist?
Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.
Andre Laurent, the captain of a tugboat, married Yvonne ten years ago. She has a heart disease but does not want to tell him. She dreams he quits the job for they can live quietly.

While the Nazi regime subjugates European nations, in the Belgian Congo, nurse Rachel Cade tries to cure the local people. Colonel Derode falls in love with her, but an injured young American pilot upsets his plans.
Cry Now follows the electrifying sexy encounters between Vincent, a street poster artist, and Luzy, a tattoo designer. But Sofia, Vincent's obsessive ex-girlfriend, is not ready to let go.
A lorry Driver who was a police officer tries to protect his daughter from an unknown man who is hunting them.
Shunned by elite society as a member of the gig economy, a dog walker infiltrates an exclusive L.A. community with designs of reaching the top of the neighborhood's social ladder.

Zheng Zhi and Nina are starring together in a romantic movie. The director Mandy keeps picking apart Zheng Zhi's acting. It turns out that Mandy and Zheng Zhi are actually former lovers, and the movie's plot is their own story.
Tasked with transporting unknown cargo across the Antarctic tundra, A Navy SEAL leads a stealth mission manned by NASA scientists and researchers who uncover more than they bargained for.

Humans adapt to a synthetic environment, with new transformations and mutations. With his partner Caprice, Saul Tenser, celebrity performance artist, publicly showcases the metamorphosis of his organs in avant-garde performances.
The story of a group of promiscious yet level-headed women who fall into troubles in the fighting world.
When talk-radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.
A young woman visits her boyfriend's family home. There, she learns about a sinister history with his creepy neighbor and soon, all kinds of skeletons come out of the closet.

As a hurricane batters the coast a group of college friends head inland towards their hometown, but when their vehicle crashes, they find themselves stranded. Their only option, seek shelter in a nearby house that appears to be unoccupied.

Struggling to make tuition, Erika buys an antique salon chair to make cash styling hair in her dorm. But when friends start turning up dead, she must fight to destroy the force within The Chair before it kills her and everyone she loves.
A woman and her lover go on vacation with their friends to Pengantin Island that has Pengantin Waterfall, a waterfall that if we hope for something there, it will happen.
A top agent is drawn back in to do what he does best, catch bad guys. However, this time, the hunter becomes the hunted. Sequel to The Locator.

When Mavela, member of the notorious youth gang Black Bronx, falls madly in love with a boy from a rival gang, she is forced to make a choice between loyalty and love. A choice that will have dramatic consequences.
While in Moscow to attend a medical conference, an Indian doctor finds himself framed for a murder he didn't commit.

Jayanta and his daughter Dubori live a peaceful life, but one day Dubori is kidnapped by a man from Jayanta's past. A devoted father, Jayanta must become the man he once used to be in order to bring his daughter back home.
An escaped convict for negligent homicide returned to hometown after 15 years, only to be haunted by his past, and got mixed up in a scheme involving the daughter of his victim.
A man lost his wife whom he loved very much. Full of anger and wrath makes him a sniper who thirsts for blood and justice.
As a sorority initiation, two girls have to pose as hookers. Then they turn into zombies and start killing and eating the locals.
A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.
A man is killed and his friend is charged for the crime but he isn't guilty, he must now find the real murderer.
Chipo discovers an affair her husband is having with a young mistress and meets her behind his back. They develop a friendship and embark on a plan to punish him.
The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.
It's last call at Chics Bar, but before the night is over someone will return to settle their tab, permanently.
A group of students investigate the mysterious suicide case of an honor student. That leads them into the horrid situation.

When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

Broken Angel is a story of a brutal journey from a girl forced to live on the violence streets of Philadelphia after her abusive father abandoned her. She learned to survive and turned into a professional contract killer.

Ashal and Sara are in love with each other. Ashal has dreams of striking it rich before marital bliss but she wants to marry soon. Eventually, life brings him to Nisha, the person determined to make all his dreams come true.

High-schooler Finnigan Greed has found a stone that gives him superpowers. As he tries to hide his powers and new identity, he meets a new friend, Jordan Peralta, who just so happens to have similar powers.
Stefanus Taljaardt finds out he has a alter ego Blink Stefaans and all the decisions is suddenly made for him it make his life fun and easy
A single mother finds solace with a wealthy, but lonely hotel magnate, together they find love until her past comes back to confront her.
Four folk tales from Assam re-imagined as a narrative about four mothers, each facing demons of her own.
Myra Maynard, is plagued by a wide variety of metaphysical assaults by the corrupt Black Order, a secret organization which uses magic, curses and any supernatural means possible to achieve its ends.
After the death of her estranged grandmother, Zora inherits a home in the mysterious town of Bellmare, a land full of superstition, latent powers, and secrets.

In order to shoot a movie, a group of friends meet in an abandoned house in the forest. However, after nightfall the group finds itself confronted with monstrous phenomena: Exponential libido monkey, sadomasochistic serial killer .
A bus driver (Beom-soo Lee) with a love of music falls in love with one of his passengers (Eun-ju Lee) who happens to be blind.
An easily distracted youngster goes to great lengths to make sure that his girlfriend and her family members don't find out about his mental condition.
A distraught husband kidnaps the judge who freed his wife's killers on insufficient evidence. He gives him seven hours to find evidence that will put them away, or he'll kill his wife.
The siblings of two estranged lovers fall for each other, unaware of the violent past that drove them apart.

'Everbody Loves' is the English translation: as indeed they all here do as some fellahs get smitten by a couple of comely young fillies, whilst Mothers - (and one wife) - supervise / interfere, depending on your take on romance blossoming.
A race between secret service agency and underworld mafia to have classified information of the agency.
In Miami Beach, Vice City, a local young hustler and his ride or die girlfriend, is determined to make a come up like a drug cartel, but everything gets real over money and diamonds.

A Christmas party is interrupted by a violent psychopath in a Santa suit, a maniac with the powers of the Grim Reaper, a killer cheerleader, and a demonic ghost. There is no hope for them, watch as they DIE.
Johnny Quinn has been set up by a drug lord and must find a way to clear his name before the bad guys and his own agency put him in the ground.
During the weekend of their ten year reunion four old friends are trapped in a house by the man they allegedly assaulted in high school.
Andy Hardy goes to college after returning from World War II. He is in love with Kay Wilson this time.
In this thriller of escalating violence, four young girls head out on a camping trip. But the trip becomes tense when they cross paths with a couple of leering backwoodsmen who want the campers out.
A comedy horror - a group of city dwellers must fight for survival against a malevolent presence determined to block the purchase of remote West Skerra Lighthouse.

In 1880, a former Gunfighter, is released from Prison and sets out to reunite with a lost love, but finds himself befriended by five strangers as his journey leads him into a deadly confrontation with an old nemesis.
A high caste Brahmin household adopts an orphaned lower caste girl, but when a young man from their caste wishes to marry her without knowing her lineage, caste differences flare up again.
A demonic reincarnation of a Japanese general from the 10th century appears in the early 20th century Tokyo with a mission to destroy the blooming city.
Robbers, drug dealers and pimps are being killed in the streets. Quinn, a policeman with a mysterious past is on the case.

Bankrupt and disbarred, Parisian lawyer Pierre Martel heads for Algiers where he's supposed to rejoin his high-maintenance Italian girlfriend Sylvia but when she fails to show-up a heart-broken Pierre joins the French Foreign Legion.
A secret police unit above the law is established when an organized crime gang begins to wreak havoc internationally.
Story of a rendezvous in Paris which is prepared through telephone calls between a Berlin telephonist and his female colleague in Paris.

Trained to be a killer since he was a child, a lost man sets out to avenge his father. After years of chasing his father's murderer, he realizes that the real person who killed his father is the person that raised him..

An undercover DEA agent gets too emotionally involved. Daryl Woods is a highly respected New York City detective who comes dangerously close to the edge of sanity when he puts too much of himself into a drug investigation.
The Coast Guard attempts to break up a smuggling ring that traffics in contraband goods and illegal aliens.
Off the Spanish coast, two tug-boat captains are caught in a violent feud over a woman but their rivalry is set aside when a sinking freighter carrying explosives must be salvaged and towed to port.
After a robbery gone wrong, a band of criminals has to deal with the repercussions in a town of bad men, twisted psychopaths, and trigger-happy gangsters.

Lt. Bartkowiak with two members of ZWM is sent to a small town to build Polishness in the regained territories. Buy the population is terrorized by the Szczygiet gang and the new council leader Kukutka has been killed.
After screwing up a money exchange a Viennese small-time crook accompanied by a Russian hostess hits the road to the East.

Robert is obsessed with the idea of breaking a world record, whatever it is. Then he meets Laura; he follows her, looks for her, and they strike up a strange friendship, so he decides he wants to break that record with her.

A Qing encounters the photographer Xiao Qi at the full moon banquet of the daughter of the big brother Ren Ge at the corner of the Beiguan. They fall in love with each other. But, sadly, they aren't able to stay together at the end.
Belén is a street actress who lies to survive, Ernesto is a Cuban actor searching for an opportunity in Mexico, their encounter will change their lives forever.
Pachchi is an auto mechanic, who accidentally meets Preethi who is mentally retarded. Then he starts caring her and hospitalized her. After the treatment she starts searching for him everywhere.

A man named Adel. He is an elderly man who lives in a psychiatric clinic. The story talks about the period of Adel's life in the seventies . He is married to a girl called Nadia . The events revolve around the disappearance of Nadia.

movie_name: Jack Zollo: My Life in Crime
description: A true story of the most wanted criminal in Kenyan history who redeems himself to celebrity status after spending half his life in jail.
Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.
A cold-blooded killer infiltrates the lives of two actors who refuse to return stolen money that the killer claims belongs to him. A classic, film noir feast for the millenium.
Two parallel stories about unhappy marriages that take place during inter-war period in the Banat village within Romanian minority in Serbia.

The story of youth. Kakeru, a 15 year old boy, and Mii (Little My) , a female transfer student. They are two lonely teens who cannot find their place in life, but who gradually learn to relate to each other through the power of music.
A pretty factory girl falls for an ex con. He's still in love with his ex wife. Love triangle soon becomes even larger.
Nassau County, New York Police detective Jesse turns vigilante as she investigates her brother's murder and enters into a world of crime, corruption, and shocking deception.
The tale of a member of the persecuted burakumin community desperately trying to protect his identity so that he can live a normal life as a teacher.

This suspenseful award-winning legal drama features a rising female attorney struggling to uphold the law while tormented by the hypocrisy of her past. At what cost can she make amends, or is it too late?

When an expelled young man comes to NY to look for his missing father, he stays with a mysterious Ukrainian who may have caused his father's disappearance - as well as many other horrific and deadly crimes.
A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.
A boy who was abused in his childhood will get close to his boss's daughter in Istanbul, where he came for music education.

After crippling his best friend during a horrific accident, an emotionally broken diver risks his life and races against a ruthless art thief, to retrieve a valuable jewel that can pay to heal his buddy and repair their friendship.

Story begins in 1945 after mysterious deaths of Adolf Hitler and Subhash Chandra Bose. The Mystery ends in 2022 during Ukraine an Russia War. An unpredictable travel through history, mystery, action and thrills in this English 3D Film.
About the handsome first lieutenant Rudi von Dokonal, a dancer and charmer, a penniless gentleman, is the center of attention, along with evergreens like "Hungarian Rhapsody" to the "Night is ours".
Jay and Vijay who are ardent followers of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, seek help from Jiva and Shiva in order to bring justice to the ordinary people and farmers of Maharashtra.

Told in real time, The Last Moon follows the desperate bid for help from one brother to another when one of them is convinced he is a werewolf, blurring the line between reality and delusion until a disturbing twist changes everything.

In New York City, a young writer's resolute belief in true love is put to the test by a beautiful girl and her struggle with addiction. This original rock musical drama is made unique by its non-musical scenes spoken purely in verse.

movie_name: Vampire Penance: The Atonement of John Wolf
description: This film features a unique look at vampire folklore, and has the elements of action, drama, and a creepy as hell storyline. Evergreen means everlasting, and this story delves deep into the evergreen blood of these mythological creatures.
After discovering a secret box in the wall of her house, a demonic presence begins terrorizing a YouTuber, at 8 after 1:00am every night.
Five thieves try to find the sword Sanshinmaru in the town of Edo. But time is short and their goal is more than a simple robbery.
Mohan marries Chitra and they care for Mohan's brother Ramu. Mohan dies and Chitra falls in love with Ramu.
Four youngsters playing the game of 'Contacting Ghosts'. One of them sees a ghost with long hair and the horror begins.
Two polar opposites, brought together on a chaotic blind date in the heart of London, unexpectedly fall for each other despite their differences.
A notorious Serial Killer known as 'Cottontail' faces a slew of personal issues as he falls in love with the girl of his dreams, all the while trying to put together his ultimate 'Easter Egg Hunt'.

movie_name: There Is a New World Somewhere
description: Sylvia returns to her Texas hometown for a friend's wedding. There she meets Esteban, an electrifying stranger. He dares her to join him on a road trip through the Deep South.

A deranged masked Santa-Slayer comes to town for some yuletide-terror. He leaves behind a bloody trail of mutilated bodies as he hunts his way to the front steps of the town's most feared and notorious home.
Jeeva runs away to the city to avoid an arranged marriage. He finds a friend in Singam, a local goon. Together, the duo engage in a series of adventures and also get involved in many scuffles.
Got is a young and energetic racing man who hates his father. There is a reason for him to warp back in the year 1998, just a year before he was born, Got met his young father when he was Godfather.
A gunfighter defends his town when cattlemen threaten to destroy it by stampeding cattle through the farmlands.

A crack team of professional Zombie Hunters team with a top female British security agent to save her sister from a mad scientist and stop his plan to procreate a new half-human half-zombie master race.
Past Present Future is a feature-length film about two friends, Rachel and Noah, who have had an on-again, off-again relationship since high school, meeting up for the first time after years apart.
When a group of students are invited to party at their teacher's recently inherited mansion, little do they know they are being set up for the most terrifying night of their lives.
A beautiful female psychiatrist is brutally raped by someone disguised in a strange and exotic fashion - and left for dead at the foot of a precipice. Will someone find her and save her life?
Four law offenders were recruited, trained and then organized into a vigilante group to take down a crime syndicate.
A failed psychiatrist takes interest in her neighbor's daughter after beginning to believe she might be a sociopath.
The already rocky relationship of expecting lovers Lizbeth and Javier is put to the test when they become entangled with a disenchanted vampire couple.
After her brother is falsely implicated in a criminal case and murdered, the film shows the struggles of Rama in getting justice.
A thief pretends to be a cop in order to recover his diamond from a site that has been converted into the police headquarters. Although he becomes a favourite of the ACP, a colleague gets suspicious.
Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

Two supreme martial artists from Korea and Japan overcome their rivalries and become friends. They are shocked when they finally meet each other's wives as the women look identical and bear the same name.
The revenge of anwar against the terrorists who killed anwer's family in a bomb blast. After the Blast anwar plan a secrete mission to find the faces behind the Blast.
A solitary embalmer meets a charming and unemployed waiter who becomes his assistant, but the two get involved in a morbid and unhealthy professional and personal relationship.
Six friends must fight to survive through the night while trapped in a house with a psychotic killer, however, will they be able to work together when sins of the past reemerge.
When a drought threatens the lives of his villagers, Kadhirvel decides to dig a well and hire a renowned digger. Unfortunately, things do not get better for the villagers.
A talented Sous-Chef woos a variety of women with a view of using them to try and fulfill his dream.
A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

A card sharp gets caught cheating and winds up in a brawl. He is unjustly jailed for the death of a mob boss; and when he is released, he searches frantically for his wife and son, whom he has never seen.
Kataksha is a story about 4 friends who trapped in a haunted place. They are meeting with a stranger and then start a series of unusual incidents.
Tallinn, Estonia, days before outbreak of World War II. Hotel detective and Polish writer team up to find Tear of the Prince of Darkness, a legendary ring which can bring Satan's rule over the world.

A man transfers his mind to an android, and kidnaps a middle eastern prince, demanding a ransom. Meanwhile, he goes on a spree of raping and killing prostitutes. The police secret androids, Robotrix, are the only ones that could stop him.
A reality TV director copes with a spoiled celebutante and a show gone haywire when a masked killer starts bumping off the crew in this slasher-movie satire.
Detective drama with elements of comedy. The message of the movie is clear: Power destroys and degenerates everybody who's got it.
A group of airplane passengers encounter an otherworldly force shortly after takeoff and are thrown into a fight for their lives.
When a filthy rich guy met a poor gal and fell in love, his authoritative father disapproved their relationship owing to his girlfriend's complicated family background and a retarded brother.
Miss Bluebeard is a surviving 1925 silent film comedy directed by Frank Tuttle and starring Bebe Daniels. It is based on a play, Little Miss Bluebeard, by Avery Hopwood.
Gardener Napoleone takes a job in a southern-Italian villa and quickly finds himself embroiled in a menage-a-trois with Paola and her mother, which soon leads to sex, death and mayhem.
Follows a new couple and their families, who find themselves examining modern love and family dynamics amidst clashing cultures, societal expectations and generational differences.
Marcelo regresa a México desde EE.UU. y descubre que su amigo Tony es un agente secreto que está tratando de acabar el negocio de las drogas, sin embargo esta no sera la única sopresa que recibirá.
The conflicts between the Cypriot fighters and the English conquerors and the story of a family that give everything to the struggle for freedom.
Vikas and Ravi belong to an impoverished family from an Indian village. While Vikas gets married to the wealthy Nanda to escape his poor lifestyle, Ravi continues his education.
In Jakarta, five couples of varying ages and backgrounds experience the different stages of romantic love, from its giddy start to its painful end.

A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting, must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist.
A military drama about the lengths a man will go to defend his country and his family honor, even if it cost him his soul.
Pugazh, a young man, fights against a corrupt politician who wants to acquire the playground of his area, which he and his friends use for sports activities.
Devan is accused of murdering Jeeva, a photographer, as a video recording of the murder shows a man like him. When a CBI officer nabs Devan, he learns some bitter facts that makes him help Devan.
A young artist moves into an old apartment building in Brooklyn, New York, and his life begins to unravel by the appearance of a woman who was murdered in his bedroom during the 1940s.
A year in the life of a half-breed Gypsy as he tries, against the odds, to adjust to the 21st century and leave his roots behind.

Based on the depraved and libertine eroticism of the Marquis de Sade's "Justine or The Misfortunes of Virtue." A teenager who uses all social methods to preserve her virtue finds instead only incitement to vice.

Four people decide to join the army as it appears to be their best option. However, it turns out the army only plans on turning them into ultimate killing machines, they must fight back and save themselves.
A village is being oppressed by a four villains lead by chow chung until a beggar comes to town and teaches a young man and woman the 7 star grand mantis style of fighting.

movie_name: Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 - Sustainable War
description: In the year 2045, cybernetic mercenary Motoko Kusanagi returns to Section 9 to face a dangerous new threat: the posthumans. A feature-length recut of the first season of Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045.
Accused of a hideous crime they did not commit, the members of two rivaling gangs, persecuted by a bloodthirsty lynch mob, take refuge in an abandoned fort, taking two hostages with them.
The Thomas family goes out to their cabin in the woods to celebrate Christimas together with their daughter and her boyfriend, but their first Christmas together may be their last.
Set in the future when water is hard to find, a teenage boy sets out to protect his family and survive.

A village guy named Raghu fell in love with a girl. His friend aspired for a relationship with a senile But here, a twist has been happened. An MLA, along with Raghu and his family members have found missing abruptly.
On a business trip to Switzerland, Vijay meets Meenu and decides to get married to her. Meenu's brother Nagaraj asks Vijay to leave India and get settled in Switzerland with his family.

After serving sixteen years at her majesty's pleasure Bulla is out on the streets again, but things start to go wrong from the moment he steps out when he finds out he's lost everything on the outside world.
Deals with sweet,funny&hillarious incidents that takes place in a village when a miltry squards tend in a village as a report of terrorist attack.
Down-on-his-luck Hollywood producer Barry 'Dutch' Detweiler attempts to lure Fedora, a famous but reclusive film actress, out of retirement only to discover the horrible truth behind her success.
They won the hearts of millions, but as a German government takes on the world, a legendary racing team must drive for survival.
Three daughters of a tax officer, brought up by a maiden aunt, become engaged to three military men assigned to their small town.
In the 1890s, a Northern lawyer goes to New Orleans to aid the local reform league in their fight against the crooked lottery run by a Southern ex-general and his beautiful daughter.

A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

A troubled yet loving family man on a solo adventure deep in the wilderness has a gruesome accident and is the only witness to an unspeakable horror that forces him to fight for his life against a mysterious killer.

A specialized breed of humans, know as "Reapers", have the ability to kill someone with a simple touch. When one of the last two goes rouge, the other is recruited to bring him down. Based on the comic book "The Reaper".

Juana la Cubana es la cantante más famosa de su país, una isla que sufrió un golpe de estado años atrás. Pero los rebeldes la conocen como la Comandante Z, guerrera que lucha por la libertad del pueblo.
After surviving a traumatic car accident, a race car driver travels to the Cote D'Azur to recover but is plagued by an urge to strangle his wife.
When Avgi's uncle finds out that she is in love with Takis, he sends her home in Cephalonia to live with her family.
The spirit of a dead Chinese railway worker seeking revenge possesses the body of a lethal assassin!
A diverse cast of college students as they navigate a series of bizarre deaths that resemble urban legends linked to the darkest corners of social media.
A D-Day rescue mission turns ugly when a band of Allied soldiers battle with horrific experiments created by the Nazis.
When a one-night stand turns Ajay into a vampire, he decides misery really does love company and tries to suck his friends Teague and Floor into a life of bloodlust.
When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.
The film tells a story about the distrust, passion and spitefulness of two men of different origin and social position who fight for the love of a wonderful woman.
Two disreputable friends get tied in with a group of criminals who turn out to be excessively violent and deceptive.

Edmond Dantès had a bright future, but he's falsely accused of treason and imprisoned at Château d'If. After 20 years, he escapes to acquire a large fortune and returns as the Count of Monte Cristo to begin his quest for revenge.

Legend tells of a girl named Palmira. A teenager, becoming a beautiful woman, her normal small town life took an unexpected turn. A demon expelled from paradise falls in love with her, causing great misfortune; only one can defeat him.
An unhappily married aristocrat begins a torrid affair with the gamekeeper on her husband's country estate.

American and British companies compete for a government arms contract. The British stack the odds against the Americans while the Eastern Bloc resort to murder to steal the weapon that keeps the balance of power in the western hands.
Families gather together for a happy day, the wedding of their children. But it's also the time to reveal all their secrets.
When a deadly spirit gets accidentally released at a birthday/graduation party, the kids must overcome mistrust, jealousies, and resentments to survive.
A 2000 year old Beast with a taste for human flesh is awakened by an earthquake in a small, desert town.
A talented, ambitious, up-and-coming boxer bonds with a retired boxer to take down a ruthless money-hungry boxing promoter.
Isolated in a new world, Mila must battle her fragmented and shame-ridden future memories to prevent her present imprisonment from happening. Again.
Complications arise when a bored young wife embarks on an extra-marital affair with a stranger, leading to emotional turmoil and eventually, murder.

Jonathan Vandermark is a music teacher with a weakness for young men with great aspirations and without a pot to piss in. When Sebastian enters his life and takes advantage of John's charity, his life and afterlife will be changed forever.
An optimistic college graduate unexpectedly meets her dream older Asian man, but she is in a relationship with a jealous millennial who finds out about the affair.

movie_name: The Sorrowful Song of the Sea
description: This is a melodrama about the tragedy of two generations of father and son against the backdrop of Mount Hallasan on Jeju Island.
Danny O'Shea (Bobby Gordon) runs away from hone with his pet dog Rinty (Rin-Tin-Tin) and heads for a race track determined to become a famous jockey. Aided by Rinty he is soon riding in a big race.

An alien takes the form of a young Wisconsin widow's husband and makes her drive him to his departure point in Arizona. Distrustful government agents, along with a more ambivalent scientist, give pursuit in hopes of intercepting them.
In the aftermath of a traumatic event, a suburban husband and father buys a cutting edge home security system, only to find that it slowly destroys that which he most wants to protect.
The Puerto Rican owner of a Bronx strip joint who also heads a street gang that deals in drugs and stolen credit cards gets involved in a war with a local black gang.
Live-Action fan film web series of Naruto, a story about a boy and his goal to achieve and become one the greatest Shinobi facing many obstacles, to hope one day become the Hokage.
When a family man rents a secluded cabin in a remote village to spend some time on their broken family ties, one by one the family members' bodies are taken over by creatures living in a nearby well.
In the mythical land of Charmswood, young Marco is pursued by the forces of the wicked Lord Morok, catapulting him into an epic adventure that soon involves a stoic warrior and comical sorceress.
A group of friends that debunk monster myths online find themselves fighting for their lives when it turns out Manalligators live.

movie_name: Royal Angels - On Duty of Death
description: A computer disk that prints counterfeit money has been stolen and is up for sale to the highest bidder. A crack team of detectives set out to intercept the disk and use it as bait
A man at the end of his career is forced to fight one more time - His family aren't going to let that happen.
An expert assassin - trained since childhood to be the perfect killer - loses her memory during a mission in Thailand, and ends up in the care of a wry ex-policewoman and her boxing cohort.

The little mermaid, one of the daughters of the sea king, seeing the prince on the deck of a luxurious ship, falls in love with him. But during a storm, the ship crashes against a rock. The little mermaid saves her lover from death.
A hard-working white-collar girl from a middle-class family meets and falls in love with a young socialite, but she soon clashes with his family.
