Follows three players who knew each other when they were teenagers as they compete in a tennis tournament to be the world-famous grand slam winner, and reignite old rivalries on and off the court.
Abused by his older brother and step mother, a highschool student takes drastic steps to regain his independence.
A group of college students go out into the woods for a Halloween party, only to be killed one by one, by a clown who was burned alive 30 years ago by an angry mob.
They say our destiny is determined by the deed's of our forefathers , Cawnpore Villa is such a story which proves the same - UNTIL ???
After intimidating numerous towns and bullying the residents, Chan Wai Man goes on a fierce attack against the thugs responsible.

Cho-hye falls in love with a young man who works at a nearby music store. However, her workaholic husband finds out and he throws his wife out on the streets and forbidding her contact with their two young children
Murderous foreign agents are after a scientist who has invented an atomic engine that could change the future of rocketry.
In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.
A beautiful blonde bitten by Count Dracula 100 years previously is unearthed in Vienna, and soon she goes on a killing spree. The skeptical cop on the case falls for her.

movie_name: Black & White: The Dawn of Justice
description: A celebrated Police Officer teams up with another man with extremely opposite characteristics to protect the city from threats.

movie_name: The Man Who Saved the World
description: Two space cadets crash-land on a desert planet, where an evil wizard seeks the ultimate power to take over the world. Although the movie borrows some background footage from Star Wars, the plot is mostly unrelated.

In rural West Virginia, a group of diverse high school students must ban together for survival when a zombie apocalypse reaches their town. Red Dawn meets Dawn of the Dead in this pop culture throw back nostalgic action horror flick.
Paul Hubschmid is Paul Finney aka Upperseven, master of disguise. He's out to stop a diamond smuggling operation which fronts for a missile building project.
As tradition requires, on his 25th birthday, Tom must choose the girl of his dreams, eyes shut, by the sound of her voice alone.
In search for her missing sister, a young woman takes a job as a nurse to a young boy in a coma and hunts for clues in his sinister family home.
A reporter wakes up in a morgue and finds herself a member of the undead, before vowing revenge against the sect which put her there.
A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.
A lonesome man finds unexpected companionship in Veronica, a "Human Android". But little does he know about what goes on behind the scenes at "S.H.E Tech", the company that manufactured her.
Takes place two years after the events of BATMAN: Under the Red Hood (2021 Fan Film). After returning from hiatus, Bruce Wayne (AKA Batman) has entered a new prime as Gotham's caped crusader.
Three American friends travelling through Spain get stuck in a remote town where something very dangerous is changing the town's people.

Elderly widower Emmett Quinlanm survives a tornado due to an enchanted sword from the storm and is the only man who can face the otherworldly creatures the sword has drawn down to the Lone Star State.

movie_name: Chanoc en el foso de las serpientes
description: Chanoc is sent after 2 escaped black panthers but he will discover a beautiful woman who is the hostage of a criminal.
Members of a documentary crew meet a mysterious man who seems to possess supernatural powers at a crumbling manor.
A tiny mistake of train stuard leads to a giant fire. Unfortunately, there are almost no one to help people onboard.
A courier boy's life turn into unexpected consequences because of a courier received from a social service activist.
Surya is released from jail and goes to college in an attempt to lead a normal life, but he can not evade his past.

Believing that Saroj is taking advantage of his younger brother, Vijay, a crime reporter, marries her and abandons her soon after. Meanwhile, Laxmi, the daughter of Vijay's mentor, secretly loves him.
Captain Drummond and his girlfriend want to marry but a hidden treasure in the house in which they want to celebrate their marriage is complicating the situation.

Following the sudden death of their father, two brothers realize the greatest threat to their criminal empire might just be each other. A no-holds-barred battle for power ensues that threatens to destroy everything their old man built.
A middle class girl in a conservative world finds herself in a government run home for wayward girls and in a forbidden love affair.
Capt. Jim Gordon's command of the famed American mercenary fighter group in China is complicated by the recruitment of an old friend who is a reckless hotshot.

In a quest for to "find herself," 18-year-old Bria signs up for a group tour of Central America. But when she meets seasoned backpacker, Rowen, she ditches her group and joins him on a journey way off the beaten path.
An agent works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.
A Colombian drugs cartel joins forces with a group of Hong Kong Triads and the hottest Hitman on the planet, to ship two tonnes of cocaine into Australia and China.

After an unforeseen and violent affliction turns her world upside down, Rowena Hambleton struggles to survive night-to-night as she prowls the streets of Los Angeles. If there is a cure for what ails her, Rowena has yet to find it.
When an international team of documentarians join forces to cover one of the most ancient places in China known as Fengdu or Ghost City, they are left literally speechless.
Relationships end. Three looks at how women and men deal with that inevitability--with courage, with dignity, and sometimes with force.
A group of friends out to make a documentary about an abandoned mental hospital discover fear when reality itself begins to unravel and darkness consumes their world.

Anal retentive atheist social worker Jimmy stumbles upon a society of Angel and Demons, blending in with Humans. Bartering to assist in a grand quest, he has no choice but help end a war between good and Evil, But which side will he take?
A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.
A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.
After getting dumped by his slutty girlfriend, Caleb falls in love with Gwen. However, thanks to Caleb's roommate, Gwen thinks he's gay and sets him up with her roommate, Marc.
When a mysterious gangster starts sabotaging soccer team The Eagles' chance at winning the upcoming championship final, there is only one man who can save the day...Joe Bullet.
A teenage girl sets out to give a nebbish classmate the ultimate high school makeover. An updated remake of the 1999 film, 'She's All That'.
The movie revolves around Arunachalam (Rajini), who is the son of the VIP of a village who finds out about his past but destiny has its own play.
An innocent young man, Leo Campbell, finds himself wrongly targeted by a powerful mafia group. He confides in Detective Tom Shaw to help him find answers to why a bounty is on his life.
In order to conduct a study on the treatment of foreigners in Finland, a man borrows the identity of his immigrant friend.
The life of two 253rd generation cowboys, who lost both their parents in the fog of war. Separated and left as orphans turned child refugees. Only to return and find home after 27 years.
Mary, a fashion designer, and Akin, her arrogant boss, swap their phones by accident in a busy airport and must now carry out each other's assignments.

When a no-good band of thugs enter a quiet small town to unleash their terror, nothing could prepare them for the wrath of a gentle giant who would defend the honor of his one true love to the end of his life, and beyond.

Two sisters follow their missing father's footsteps, while fighting dark supernatural entities, human traffickers, and Adrenochrome-drinking monsters, uncovering an interdimensional conspiracy to enslave all mankind.

Love stories, a beauty parlor,a Moroccan nanny, children to educate and family feasts are what Isa,Alice,Léa and Nina share together because they are united by their Sephardi families and their friendship.
A new government agency with the right to domestic charter is reformed to prevent another terrorist attack in the United States.
The movie is about a soldier robot questioning why humans created them. While the other robot is loyal to humans and sacrificed himself to defeat the robot who is hell bent to destroy humans.
While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
When Seven people are involved in a notorious infidelity scandal, which involves; manipulation, disloyalty, unfaithfulness, deception and more.
After 11 years on a chain-gang, stagecoach robber Clay Hollister escapes prison and heads to the town where his brother hid the loot but the sheriff's posse is after him.
Our hero Naruto is caught in special chakra that propels him into the past. He finds himself in the City of Loran. As he encounters strange things, can he save the future with the past?
A CID Inspector infiltrates a gang of smugglers to uncover their operation but finds that his ex-girlfriend is now a member of the gang.
Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.
A vacationing family encounters an alien threat in this thriller based on the real-life Brown Mountain Lights phenomenon in North Carolina.

While investigating a haunted house a parapsychologist and his students are oblivious to the Mayan 2012 PANDEMIC that is striking the country. There are two options for the students and ghost hunters become a zombie or fight to stay alive.
In order to dissuade teenage girls from mauling him at concerts, a Mexican "Frank Sinatra" pretends an American soprano is his wife, and even persuades her to pose as such.

Michael Gordon is labeled as a cop killer and has the full wrath of law enforcement bearing down on him. He must find a way to clear his name while also try to survive the unforgiving elements of the Desert.
A police constable, who gets trapped in a building with his 10-year-old kid, and how they escape from the building surrounded by a group of the enemy.

8 contestants compete in 8 deadly, classic children's games. They seek fame beyond their wildest dreams, competing for the chance to take over the YouTube channel of the famous yet elusive masked YouTuber known only as "JaxPro".
A music executive lives a playboy lifestyle until he meets a woman who makes him change his attitude.
The Moreau Family travel around the UK putting on an underground variety show for an adult audience. But behind the curtain there is something more sinister going on than simple entertainment.

Two brothers and one little sister from Chinatown got themselves involved into the local gangster drug business, all because of the little brother who wants to make some quick money to help with the family.
Rotary, Pennsylvania was a nice place to live, until yesterday. A killer appeared without warning. He is on a murder spree, killing whoever he can.
Based on facts, a disturbed main character in a story focused on the importance of love, trust and human emotions.
The story revolves around a former boxer DODA from a small town. The film goes through the journey of Doda, and how he can survive and overcome his past and make things right once again.

Tugomir, a student, wants to write a dissertation on Love, but fails to complete it before being obligatory drafted in the army. There, he succumbs to paranoia that his girlfriend is cheating on him. He decides to cheat on her too.
Young Danny Flynn is released from prison 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.
An ambitious news team's exclusive interview with an at-large serial killer veers toward bloodshed and shocking revelations.
Rudra, a small-time burglar gets into a palace full of ghosts. Along with the ghost, she finds out the mystery about the owner of the palace- Annabelle Sethupathi.

After her mother suffers from an attack that puts her in a state of permanent catatonia, her only two daughters will be forced to take care of their mother, unaware of a new sinister presence that has come to live with them in the house.
Five luchadores (Blue Demon, Mil Mascaras, El Medico Asesino, La Sombra Vengadora, Tinieblas plus Black Shadow) face off against a mad scientist and his army of powerful wrestling midgets.

A farmer opposes his daughter marrying a young music teacher (who a visitor from town also has eyes on) and prefers she marry a rich shopkeeper.The drama culminates with a fire in a barn where the touring Vienna Boys Choir are rehearsing.
A horror movie star returns to his famous role after years in a mental institution. But the character seems to be committing murders independent of his will.

movie_name: The United States of Horror: Chapter 1
description: Narrated by the legendary Doug Bradley, this horror anthology includes a range of hair-raising segments from the various states of the USA.
US sleuth Whispering Smith arrives in London on vacation, but soon becomes embroiled in a murder case.

A boy declares his love for his girlfriend, only to die the same night. He is brought back to life by his mother as a flesh-craving zombie, who sires more teen undead while trying to control his, er, appetite for his beloved.
The most secret and elite Special Forces unit know as The Wing discovers details of all their past operations have been leaked to their international enemies.

Jonathan (Corey Landis) has a great life until Vladimir (Stuart Rigby), a mysterious stranger, destroys it all. To win it back, Jonathan joins forces with Abraham Van Helsing (Keith Reay) but prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice.
In 1870 Texas, a man comes home to find his father murdered. He trails an outlaw until he discovers he's part of a gang. He calls in the Texas Rangers.

Jeb's out of jail, Billy's escapes sanitarium. Bedford's retired. Maddie Marsh is the new sheriff. Bedford ac kills Billy. Thelma-lou is kidnapped. It's a mad, quick dash for the cash. Where is the money? Finders Keepers, Creepers.

Two young Saudi-Americans leave their comfy L.A. life to return to the ruins of Al Ula where their oldest brother disappeared 15 years ago. What they find might solve the mystery of his disappearance, if it doesn't kill them first.

A young African American, Jake Jackson, is a happy, honest, law-abiding citizen who through many unfortunate events, experiences a full array of prejudices until he captures single-handedly the serial killer, David Fletcher, and his luck changes.

A young woman's life spirals wildly out-of-control as she is haunted by childhood memories of sexual abuse and murder. Voices and hallucinations invade her reality, twisting into a terrifying nightmare for which there is no escape.
Hunted by the authorities after shooting a Russian prince in a duel in St. Petersburg, a Finnish baron flees to his homeland and disguises as a drifter to avoid getting caught.
A young boy learns how to be a king with the help of a wizard. A live-action adaptation of Disney's animated feature film, "The Sword in the Stone."
Pushed over the edge, 3 environment friendly bank robbers set out to rob a bank and record their heist.
Emma moves to a ranch with her son after a divorce and befriends the older Murphy, but things turn complicated when her ex shows up.

The established relationship between university student Bruno and aspiring photographer Carla is thrown into turmoil when Bruno feels drawn to sexy karate instructor/break dancer Rai. Complications ensue.

An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.
Alice and Tommaso have been together for many years. When they invite their friends to dinner, everyone thinks they'll announce they're getting married. Instead, they are breaking up.
A biology teacher looks for young suicidal women online to satisfy his taste for blood. Rather than violent, his acts are quite peaceful and always consented.
A Polynesian sailor unjustly imprisoned after defending himself against a colonial bully is relentlessly persecuted by his island's martinet French governor.
A blind sculptor works on his magnum opus unaware that the skeletons he has been using for armatures are the remains of the victims of his evil wife and that he is the next target.
5 Girls takes place in modern day and features 5 women who band together against a common enemy. Their journey is full of twists and turns. Do they have what it takes to do the unthinkable?
Witnessing murder, Lorena, a reporter, escapes with the victims' five-year-old daughter and begins to run for their lives.
A young, petty thief attempts to steal from noxious businessman Lucius Foy and inadvertently becomes the subject of a dangerous corporate training regime.
A series of gruesome accidents plague a small American farming community in the summer of 1935, encircling two identical twin brothers and their family.
Two aspiring musicians with distinct backgrounds face adversity after choosing love and their music.
A Finnish man goes to the city to find a job after the mine where he worked is closed and his father commits suicide.
Susan Forster suffers a life-changing event that causes her whole family to re-examine their very lives.
Their women having been enslaved by the local pack of lesbian vampires thanks to an ancient curse, the remaining menfolk of a rural town send two hapless young lads out onto the moors as a sacrifice.

movie_name: The Diary of an Innocent Boy
description: Young innocent aristocrat Benjamin comes to live with his Countess aunt. Her lover teaches him the techniques of seduction and sends him to test them, first on the maids, then on the upper class Anne and finally on the countess herself.

El quiere quedarse con los muebles. Ella detesta que la llame amor. Una vida juntos para terminar tan sólo unidos por el casamiento de su hija, Agustina.Mientras Daniela se encarga de los ...                See full synopsis »
After being rejected from the police academy, a mild-mannered young man travels to Bangkok where he and an energetic distant relative must solve a murder case.

A propagandist film shot by Japanese filmmakers in occupied Korea and with the involvement of a Korean film crew, designed to arouse among young Koreans enthusiasm over the new law on the call of Koreans to the Japanese army.
A beautiful girl is humiliated by powerful people both in the human world and dragon palace, and tries to suicide with her lover.

To avoid life in prison, a former SAS captain must travel to Hong Kong and become a hitman. A chance meeting with a streetwise girl challenges him to reveal the darker nature of his employers, forcing them to battle for their lives.
After a career-ending accident, former NFL recruit Ian Hunter is back on campus-and he's ready to get his new game on.
A photographer who lives in an apartment building takes sneak photos of women in their apartments. One day he accidentally photographs a murder, and the killer goes after him.
Nira, Raka, Leo, Maya and Sisi make a horror film for their college assignment. They went to a sugar factory which is said to be very haunted.
A young woman relives childhood trauma when she senses her boyfriend is about to propose. Now, they must sort through the fear holding them apart ... before her past destroys their future.

During his investigations in an increasingly criminal metropolis, detective Jimmy Cloud gets into a world of gangsters, espionage, murder, prostitution and drugs, in which a terrorist group also targets his girlfriend to stop him.

On the night before his wedding, a young man plays poker with friends. When the game is raided by the police, he escapes into a Turkish bath on ladies night, ending up disguised in drag and with difficult explanations to make.
One of director Koto's bloodiest, most evocative, skilfully orchestrated fight scenes, Poetic, gut-wrenching and, at times, very moving.

A desperate single mother moves with her three children into the notorious, supposedly haunted, real-life Amityville house to try and use its dark powers to cure her comatose son. Things go horribly wrong.

American woman occasionally gets to wild taiga in the Urals. Oddish forester agrees to take her to nearest city on his flying trike. But soon he falls in love with her and suggests to fly on his trike to Colorado.
Two Brothers need to hide from their Parole Officer when his visit happens at the same time that a girl overdoses in the apartment.
As a mysterious planet hurls itself toward Earth, an enigmatic extraterrestrial scout arrives on a remote Scottish island with unknown intentions.
When two young poor men save a rich man who has decided to suicide and take care of him, he learns about the other part of the society and poor people's life.
When Parasuram, an investigative journalist, exposes the illegal activities of B. R., an influential industrialist, B. R. kills his siblings. Parasuram then vows to avenge their deaths.
Sanju, a jobless computer engineer, who has to pay his debt to 'Vaddi' Raja, an unkind money lender, elopes with his lover Ammu as her father refuses to get her married to the jobless Sanju.
Jasper Faux, a member of an elite organization called "Kaizen", is exiled and left for dead. Instead of revenge, Jasper sets out to find the truth.
The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.
Approaching Shadows is a story of true love and the acceptance of death, told through the vehicle of a horror-road movie.
One brother is happily married; the other is a lonely billionaire. When things get tough, a wife must make a dangerous choice.
Bose is recruited as security head for a minister after he saves him from kidnappers. However, he shoots at the minister when he misbehaves with a girl, due to which his family is abducted.
Chung is a reformed professional fighter who has to hide his identity and take revenge on Black and White Fan, after they murder his family.

Internet producers are invited to a party at the haunted house Scarsdale Manor, where they must discover the dark secret of the Manor and the true purpose of their presence in the house while trying to stay alive.
Sex games by students at a junior high school are exposed by the principal and teachers, but the tables are turned in favor of the students.
Detective Nelson Grim tracks a supernatural killer through the seamy underworld of black magic and voodoo.
Two best friends compete in a series of rap battles to win the grand prize while dodging other competing lyricists trying to take their lives.
A group of teenagers in San Francisco discover a nest of homicidal monsters living in a tower of the Golden Gate Bridge, but when they try to tell authorities, no one believes them.
Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.
Evil mastermind Karla plans a robbery with her powerful army of zombie robots but a superhero group known as Los Jaguares will do anything to stop her.

movie_name: MUDA When Time Is All That Matters
description: Muda: When Time Is All That matters- An independent feature film from Writer / Director Prinze Whyee, Producer / Creative Director Wlatee Pryce, and cinematographer Rowland Williams.
Just a few years after WWII, a spy must observe his lover as she lives undercover with another man, a possible Russian agent.
A wealthy couple, unsatisfied in the bedroom, hire a virile young man as a groundskeeper. Affairs, deception, and murder ensue.
College student Regina wins a getaway vacation at the quiet Red Wolf Inn, which is run by a friendly elderly couple, but it gradually becomes clear that something is amiss.

A military veteran Biker and a teenage girl from the nice part of town. Both now trying to come to terms with the fact that they just meet and are father and daughter. Her mother was murdered and he is not about to let the killers go free.
A schoolgirl and six of her classmates travel to her aunt's country home, which turns out to be haunted.

Billy, a brave filmmaker. Finds a secluded site thought to house an urban spirit. Billy decides to camp at the site....alone. Billy was never seen alive again. This is his footage, the tape was found near his hanging body.

The story takes place in old Mexico, where a masked rider (Talmadge) and an impoverished girl (Bedford) fall in love, against her father's wishes. When she leaves with him, her father sends...                See full synopsis »

After venturing down a secluded back road on a cross country relocation trip, a young city couple find themselves on the run from a rural family who, for their own protection, mean to sacrifice them to a sinister woodland evil.

Vincent and Agathe live together since many years. They're not married. Vincent had to move to Nice because of some professional projects. Agathe keeps living in Paris. Now Agathe discovers she's pregnant. Must they marry?
On Halloween night, four teenage witches run off to the woods to discover their new found power, but they soon find they are in over their heads.
In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.
Web loses his brother in an extreme sports accident. When he learns it may have been murder he searches, from America to his ancestral home in China, pursuing answers and vengeance.
A ruthless contract killer is hired by a crime boss from Gothenburg, but everything goes wrong. Dragonetti becomes possessed and the murders begin.
Once upon a time there was young Yang Luchan, degraded into slavery and robbery, who at last became the Yang Tai Chi master... this is his story.

Peter is a writer with a first work that became a Best Seller. And three novels more than anyone knows. On the verge of losing hope, the writer will try to write his best work, no matter what the cost.
Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

After a wild party in Las Vegas, one of billionaire Tony Mastrano's girlfriends disappears. She's been kidnapped by the Russian mob, looking to settle a score that dates back to her childhood in Moscow.

Novelist Grace Montague returns to her home to finish her latest book. In the town famous for its rare Blue Moon Ball, Grace finds her first love, Sean, desperate to save the town's historic ballroom from closure, and he needs her help.

Eun-ah, a barmaid, has a child by a customer whom she has fallen in love with. However the customer's wife soon arrives and claims the right to raise Eun-ah's child as her own. Shortly after, Eun-ah learns that she is dying from TB
During the South African 70's, a young nurse ruffles feathers as she shows a small town, and its golden boy, what it means to be an independent woman.

movie_name: Detective K: Secret of the Lost Island
description: Joseon's top detective Kim Min attempts to track down those responsible for circulating massive amounts of counterfeit silver bullion in Joseon. He also tries to find the missing sibling of a young girl.

movie_name: Mais Forte que o Mundo: A História de José Aldo
description: The Story of longtime UFC Featherweight champion and the struggles facing him on the road to the top.
When Kate finds that her usual remedies cannot cure the sickness within, she goes on the hunt to find something she will be able to keep down. This neo-noir horror will sure turn your stomach.
The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.
Female adventurer Parker joins a crew of male trophy hunters in a remote wilderness park. Their goal: slaughter genetically recreated dinosaurs for sport using rifles, arrows, and grenades.
Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

An ex-con moves into an old apartment building, where he encounters a domestic problem involving a police officer, his wife, and their daughter. When he tries to intervene, however, a mysterious curse entraps him.

The happy life of a successful American ballerina takes an unexpected turn when she gets introduced to a new drug and slowly slides into the secret circle of the Chinese Triads, becoming their latest Starlet.
The story of British explorer Robert Falcon Scott's 1912 expedition and his quest to be the first to reach the South Pole.
A mysterious traveler blackmailed Ethan Kopek, a young TSA agent, to let a dangerous package slip through security and onto a Christmas Day flight.
Habib and Maryam love each other and want to get marry but another guy Akbar first go to her father and proposes for her. Meanwhile the father is in debt to Changiz which makes him to face him.
On Halloween night, we follow a troublesome brother and sister, an abused wife, and a sleazy politician who all get kidnapped by a villainous group called F.R.E.A.K.

Newspaper staffer Alice Woods persuades the editor to allow her to chase a story, that of prizefight contender Martin, who is about to fight for the championship. However, he does not know that his manager is preparing to double-cross him.
Fifth brother is separated from his kin whilst fighting the marauding Lao, and is nursed back to health in a monastery. He is befriended by Grinder, a monk whose job is to mill wheat.
Otowaya's official job is an employment agency but also he takes charge of killing villains with money.
A Soviet veteran of the war in Afghanistan joins up with a gang of crooks after returning to life as a civilian.
After his wife's death, a man struggles to raise his children alone, quickly learning that nothing can separate a mother from her children.
Something goes terribly wrong when a band of Latin sisters and their brother attempt a violent robbery in order to make their first indie film.
Muthuraj lives with his parents in a village but wants to be an actor. He goes to the city and bags the role of a junior artist. An associate director spots him and casts him as the main lead.

A wealthy couple, Imre and Justine, are visiting the deep forests of Romania and find themselves at the mercy of Waldemar Daninsky, THE WEREWOLF. Waldemar and Justine must travel to London to seek the help from of Dr. Jekyll's grandson.
A foul-mouthed finishing school graduate mistakenly winds up on an ill-fated fishing boat and faces the wrath of a crew that considers him bad luck.
Jekyll is autistic scienist that wants to create cure for cancer but he didnt know it will be his nightmare
A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

1846: When American settlers rebel against Mexican rule in California Carlos Aceves returns from Spain to Monterey to defend his father's estate and help their friends against the subsequent invasion of American troups and ships.
Four young women watch their dreams become nightmares as a weekend getaway in the desert turns deadly.
When Anna is dumped once again and decides never to fall in love again only to 'use' men from now on, she meets the perfect man. Twice. In one day. And they are roommates!
A family vacation is turned into a nightmare when they are abducted by a family of deranged killers in this "Texas Chainsaw" style comedy sci-fi horror thriller romantic drama.
A famous actor is asked to play the role of his lookalike army major and eventually battle his enemies.
In rural India, a young woman named LILA and her mother VINATA, a temple dancer wed to a Hindu god, find themselves on the fringes of society, struggling to make ends meet.

15-year-old Caro is one of the inconspicuous students in her school. One day she get noted by a handsome, wealthy Turkish guy who is 5 years older than her. Since they start seeing each other she turns into a totally different person.
After killing her abusive husband, a young woman finds that it is harder to move on with her life than she immediately thought she would be, which yields horrific results for those closest to her.
A gang of 5 Goondas are hired to kill a lady. But without their knowledge somebody was out there to do the job....
A young couple's much anticipated romantic weekend together turns into the worst nightmare imaginable.
Sebas, a former police officer, searches for his missing companion, meanwhile, an intriguing new neighbor moves in next to Vicente de León, a peculiar comic artist.
A group of college students form a music troupe. However, their dreams of becoming musicians come to a halt when the main singer of the troupe falls in love with a girl.
A hunting party in the forests of Washington inadvertently kill an eagle. There truck disappears and suddenly they become the hunted. They try to make it to safety before they also disappear.
When a boy slips into a coma he must fight 'The Evil Ones' in order to get back to his body - and back into the world of the living.
Love, humiliation and politics play out in a distant village of China during the cultural revolution.
In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.
After double-crossing the crime family he used to work for, a hit man must enroll in the Witness Protection Program. Unfortunately, he isn't very well protected.

Yellow Flower dramatizes the erogenous encounters of a group of Asian men and women who explore the limits of their own sexuality by participating in deviant, perverse, and bizarre coital acts with one another.
Seven episodes, each taking place on a different day of the week, on the theme of suicide and violent death.

Believing their deceased son isn't at peace, Molly and Tom ask a medium to make contact. But after they invite a vengeful demon to cross over, the couple must enlist the help of a disgraced priest to attempt a dangerous exorcism.

A group of friends go against warnings not to camp in the local woods, where a legendary monster named Little Sister is rumored to exist. As they defy all advice, one by one they soon fall victim to a family of deformed killers.
After being possessed by the spirit of her late brother, a wicked doll terrorizes a woman and her loved ones.
When a single mother begins to experience symptoms of the stigmata, she seeks the help of a local priest and nun to help her understand what is seen and unseen.
The story of two men, one married, the other the lover of the other's wife, who meet in the trenches of the First World War, and how their tale becomes a microcosm for the horrors of war.
Pat and Max are in love and share an intimate relationship. However, after Max receives his surgeon's diploma, his parents have arranged a marriage for him with a woman from a rich, good background.

Firat, who started working in a factory after his release from prison, quits his job due to a slander thrown at him. He starts drug smuggling under the influence of his old friends who are involved in illegal business.

Cyrus, Leia, Dasha, Max are still students. They have everything - for the first time. The first words of love, first sex, first joint dreams, first mistakes, first disappointments and first discoveries.

After many years at sea, a coarse seaman returns to his home in the beautiful island of Andros, unbeknownst to him that his wife wants to marry their daughters to landsmen. Would the captain ever allow a marriage to a stalwart mariner?
Gül, a young woman, runs a tavern with her father. Rose, the joy of the neighborhood, fascinates everyone with her voice. Gul's life changes when she meets the rich Irfan.
They sought sanctuary. They found him. 'An ex-serviceman is forced to seek refuge for his team and the family in their charge in rural Scotland, with devastating consequences'
Dushyant and Jaya are childhood friends. In spite of his familys poverty, Dushyant has one great ambition in life: to become a successful singer. Will he achieve his ambition?

Clara meets Victor, a passionate about the occult during her vacation. They form a group that meets to make a Ouija session. A being called Audscias contact them. Sessions become more demanding . Then strange things start happening.
After the Cold War, a former government official is removed by civilian control and left to retire in the wilderness.
Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.
This is the story of one gay boy who suffers from appearance-complex, starts stealing his ideal friend's photos at Gay dating application.

In 19th century Austria, a newlywed couple in an old castle soon are targeted by a savage vampire who is hellbent on destroying both their entire lives when he centers his main focus on the bride. Complications ensue for everyone involved.
In nineteenth-century California, two children listen to the adventures of a grandfather who fought against the Yankee invaders. At that time a mysterious man, dressed in masked black, appeared.
A former sheriff's deputy hunts down a hatchet wielding serial killer in a bunny suit, known as The Bunny Man.

Victoria is a bit sad due due to a break-up with her boyfriend, Matt. Her best friend Lilly tries to cheer her up, but fails. One day a strange character wearing a clown mask appears on her computer screen.

The untitled crime thriller will chronicle the real-life escapades and escapes of charismatic criminal Faïd, whose obsession with Hollywood films inspired his career of armed robberies and breakouts from prison.
The matriarch of a prominent Negros family lies on her death bed. Her children return to their ancestral home to deal with issues of inheritance and their dark family history.
Two cops one being bad and the other wanting to be like her father and be the governor become partners and fall in love.

The true meaning of Christmas comes home to the Rivera household in a very unexpected way. With Mum expecting a new baby and Dad facing work challenges, young Josie takes it upon herself to make sure the family has a wonderful Christmas.
Ashok is in love with his boss' daughter, Nirmala. To convince Viswanathan, he seeks his best friend Vasu's help, who disguises as his father.

A Vietnamese servant girl, Mui, observes lives within two different Saigon families: the first, a woman textile seller with three boys and a frequently absent husband; the second, a handsome young pianist with his fiancée.

movie_name: Artists in Agony: Hitmen at the Coda Teahouse
description: A mockumentary dark comedy where a camera crew follows four hitmen who end up getting killed in the infamous Coda Teahouse Massacre.

The mysterious death of three English tourists, who were visiting a forest in North of Iran, is the only thing on Officer Mohebbi's mind. However, the case of these tourists is not the only one that has been reported...
A boy and a girl who are friends from their childhood fight and break up during their school and college. They meet again at the age of 25 and fall in love.
Ferdinand de Lesseps, disappointed in love, is sent as a junior diplomat to the Isthmus of Suez, and realizes it's just the place for a canal.
When ghosts invade their vacation home, a successful artist and his family hire an exorcist who may be more frightening than the spirits he's been hired to destroy.
This feature is a classic first-love and coming-of-age story set in the exciting political context of 1981.

3 templars must lead a group of travelers to a distant town, but the road is long and dangerous. The travelers don't get along and the group is attacked by a group of bandits. The group unites to survive.

movie_name: Ancient Evil: Scream of the Mummy
description: Six young archaeology students discover the remains of an ancient Aztec mummy and accidentally unleash the fury of an evil god.

Released after 8 years in prison, Adrien finds his family home. He discovers that his wife Teresa has moved in with Roger, and his children make the 400 blows and his former accomplices are not decided to give him his share of the booty.
Three friend's video documented holidays in Stockholm of "Party, Drugs and Swedish Girls" get interrupted by a serial killer.
A horror junkie and his friends sign up with a company that brings their customer's greatest fears to life.
Bill's honeymoon in France isn't off to the greatest start. Alone with only his best friend Dave and girlfriend Shelly, secrets emerge in the tranquil beauty of Provence.
The gripping, real life, account of two travelers thrust into the deadly world of international corruption and cocaine cartels.Set in Colombia and Panama from 1994 to 1997.

A persuasive and disturbing con man inserts himself into the lives of vulnerable students in the Summer after Freshman year. Over the course of the Summer his true devious and murderous intentions come to the surface.
The young leader of an indigenous tribe must face a group of soldiers who want to take them off their land.

When a creative, sensitive teen from a dysfunctional family meets a beautiful, enigmatic runaway; his life is turned upside down when he travels the dark path with her toward parties and drug addiction.
A Mayan God of Death known as the Camazotz (thought by many to be the great-great-grandfather of the Dracula myth).

This is the story about man who had a great way. His adventures and losses, his life make you to be surprised. We invite you in the middle ages - a times of darkness, of heroes, of big power and of eternity love.
When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive.

movie_name: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Her
description: Told from the female perspective, the story of a couple trying to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.
When American soldiers inadvertently steal Attila the Hun's secret riches, the wrath of the barbarian is awakened; the mummified warrior will stop at nothing to kill the intruders.

Lars meets the smoldering Karis at a nightclub. Instantly drawn to each other, they embark on a night of frenzied sex. What follows is a riveting story of obsession, lust and revenge, ultimately revealing that everyone has their own truth.
A haunted Scottish castle is dismantled and transported to Florida, bringing the family ghost along with it.
A portrait of contemporary youth culture, where the lines between reality and fiction are blurred with often frightening results.
When a teenager finds himself caught in a glitchy-glitzy reality with his onscreen male idol, he does all he can to be possessed by this man and ignore the violent clues of how he got there.
Jessica and Sean run into each other at their twenty year high school reunion and spend an evening together that has been twenty years in the making.

A true-life incident, Hell 14 is the story of wrath, revenge, love and parental affection. A malicious attempt of dark magic on Emma changes the fate of the family. After 14 years of agony a renowned mentalist Edward Blalock releases Emma.
Toni discovers his new friend, a talented free-diver, is being forced to help dangerous smugglers steal national treasures from an underwater cave.
A wealthy playboy surreptitiously romances a scullery maid to gain access to her mistress with whom he is in love, but doesn't count on the maid falling in love with him.

When the two feuding sheriffs on duty restart the remaining appliances of Dr. Sutters ill fated experiment, not only all hell breaks loose, but the prisoners and the resident officers will suffer punishment they never signed up for.
the political advisor to the French emperor Napoleon, and the Austrian emperor Franz I, arrange a marriage between Napoleon and the Austrian archduchess Marie-Luise in order to prevent another war.
Haunted by his past, Prithvi remains a poor performer at the workplace. He begins to move on with the help of his girlfriend. But, all hell breaks loose, when she is kidnapped by mysterious bikers.
Dramatisation based on real events, brings together different people during an attempted coup on the Bosphorus Bridge in Istanbul in 2016.
007 is assigned to track and find out who killed Dimitri and CIA Agent Jennie Weldon. Q helps Bond with the location and the name of the man that killed them.
Following a group of adolescent boxers and their formerly incarcerated coach in Southeast Washington DC on the road to defend their national titles.
On a soul-searching camping trip, a conflicted man encounters a presence that gifts him with the touch of death.

For action and suspense - For passionate love and romance - his is Henry Duval, alias Tony Roldan Interpol Agent XR-7 everything about him was tailored impeccably to fit the title - a beautiful woman - as daring decoy - to trap the spy.
A double-cross in an arms deal prompts Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to raid a US Army weapons depot in Columbus, New Mexico.

Ina, whose ex-boyfriend runs off, leaving her in debt, manages to catch on a cunning con artist who tries to con her. But instead of turning him to the police, she hires this con artist to swindle her ex-boyfriend to get revenge.

A painter moves into a haunted mansion with his wife. The spirit takes over his wife's body and begins to lead him to a his past. Why does the trapped soul seek revenge? Is there a love story that remains unfinished?
Yep that is right,you never know how the day will go in the hood.Typical day when Dominique's mom take him to the store to buy a lottery scratch off ticket because he got an honor roll in school.
When poor peasants kidnap a magistrate's daughter to coerce him into reducing their unfair taxes, a wandering ronin decides to give them some help.
Artist returns to Santorini, where she spent her childhood, to face the ghosts of her past and her present.
Two young scientists are swept up in a government plot to suppress the truth about a biological disaster at a genetic research facility.
Butch Cassidy, Sundance Kid and Bill Carver rob a train and go to Mexico to start a legitimate business but a Pinkerton man trails them and Mexican bandits want the trio's capital.

Daniel, the driver of a very special taxi in Marseille, gets a famous soccer player to the stadium in time and later helps his clumsy police friend Émilien catch the dangerous Belgian after he escaped on Émilien's guard.

A zamindar takes an affinity to two extremely playful half-brothers who openly con people for a living. But a local animal smuggler steps in to disrupt the harmony in the lives of the zamindar and his adopted family.
Max and Min are about to break up. They argue endlessly about dividing their possessions, including their cat, Meowzaki, whom they have named after their favourite filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki.
A foster mother begins experiencing psychic visions after the psychotic biological mother of her foster daughter begins stalking them.
Three young men vacationing in Bangkok, Thailand meet a Thai woman who ends up dead the next morning. Upon returning to the states, the men are haunted by the vengeful spirit of the woman.
Paranormal Attraction tells the dark and sinister tale of a young woman, Sara Myer (Brooklyn Haley), who moves into an abandoned house with a tragic and mysterious past.
This five part WW2 epic drama gives a dramatized detailed account of the five major eastern front Soviet campaigns against Nazi Germany.
On the day of her wedding to Jimmie, Mary finds she has not lost her affection for another sweetheart, Joe. A confrontation arises when Jimmie discovers that Joe has come along on their honeymoon.
Police Commissioner Dario Mauri investigates the activities of a drug ring led by Don Domenico Laurenzi.
A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.
A teenage boy aspires to be a priest. But he's tormented by a demon bent on possessing him. Will his faith be enough to save his soul?

movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

movie_name: Las ratas no duermen de noche
description: A mad doctor performs a head transplant on an injured criminal, which results in him being even more dangerous and murderous than before.
Vishamakaran is an authentic Melodrama with a combination of romance and emotional elements. The plot revolves around a Bigamy love portion with Manipulation as it's core content.
A romantic teen comedy about the rivalry between an Agrentinian man and a young American for the love of a beautiful girl from a rich family.

movie_name: Persona 3 the Movie: #2 Midsummer Knight's Dream
description: Makoto Yuki's story continues as new Shadows, allies, Personas, powers and foes carrying the potential are introduced.
Tensions run high when a young female architect moves to a small but uniquely-built rural town and unwittingly falls in love with the son of the man responsible for the town's misfortune.
Four girls travel to a party in an isolated house in Spain and one by one the guests are brutally murdered. The race is on to uncover the killer's identity and fight back or die.
A surrealist Filmmaker struggles to find the end to his film, but when he falls in love with his Psychiatrist he finds that love is harder than making cinema.

When Emma moves in with her estranged, gay son, the pair must learn to reconnect through food where words fail, and face the foreclosure of the family's Chinese restaurant and a stubborn fear of intimacy.
A seemingly innocent man is abducted by a notorious L.A. serial killer, who forces his victims to role-play with him so that he can enact his capture, torture and murder fantasies.
A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

Two years into the outbreak, the remaining people struggle day to day for survival. With the infected more active at night, three people seek shelter in an empty home, but with supplies scarce, they'll be lucky to make it out alive.

When ex pro wrestler Buck Severs travels to an abandoned wildlife preserve with his friends for 'Bro's Weekend,' they become the targets of a deadly manhunt and Buck must find the fighter in himself before it's too late.

A delivery boy falls for a young girl who is hearing impaired. Comparing themselves with "water birds" and trees, together they are going to break the barrier and pursue their dreams and take their relationship to the next level.

movie_name: Task Force Retriever: Out of Angola
description: A brilliant but disgraced surgeon joins a top-secret CIA mission to rescue a wounded spy who's been captured deep behind enemy lines in Angola and may hold the key to ending the ongoing civil war.
When the love of Maddie's life gets engaged to her best-friend, she puts her feelings aside to be a bridesmaid at their wedding in Ireland.
An American soldier master and champion of Taekwondo WTF is forced to fight in a tournament with no holds barred Vale Tudo to save his fiancee kidnapped by criminals.
A wealthy London banker, his wife, his mistress, and his family and servants all get into hijinks when they swap birth-control medicines in an effort to deceive each other.

Carolina Santos is a successful owner of a wedding-planning company whose own marriage was derailed by a runaway groom. She suddenly finds herself teamed up with the brother of the man who left her as they pursue a business opportunity.

A group of strangers who wake up in what appears to be an abandoned building, unable to remember how they got there, find themselves haunted by strange visions and are forced to face all the wrongs they have done in their lives.
Despite a returning Marine's mundane reality, his haunting wartime past shepherds him into a magical and destructive new existence to expose his ultimate truth.
Police try to capture someone who is commiting ritual murders of women during Mardi Gras in New Orleans.
A werewolf samurai walks the countryside, finding himself in the middle of a village of monsters who feed on human flesh.
Bodie and Constance meet, fall in love, face conflict, and make decisions in a world where metaphors shape reality.
Two high flying owner of an executive jet charter company have the fun sucked out of their lives, as they try to keep the identity of their new business partner a secret.
A young Prince is visited by the Ghost of his father and compelled to vengeance - but can he stop thinking for long enough to do it?

A man finds out by letter that a distant Uncle has died and he has inherited property. He and his wife go to his solicitors where the solicitor reads out the will and explains to them both that they have inherited a Graveyard.
An impoverished mentally disabled boy in Vietnam learns to deal with the loss of both of his parents.
Circumstances force a young divorcée to move back in with her parents in suburban Connecticut, where an affair with a younger guy rejuvenates her passion for life
When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.
What if... the pilot about to land your plane has become incapacitated, but you don't know about it. Worse still, neither does he.
A young mother reconnects with her larger-than-life playboy father on an adventure through New York.
Jim is a retired firefighter who suffers from PTSD. KC is a single mother raising a problem child. James is a drug addict who tends to find himself in constant trouble trying to get his next fix.
A chronicle of the life of surrealist painter Salvador Dali, with a focus on his success in America and his later misfortunes.
During WW1, the destinies of British officers Michael Andrews and John Stevenson seem intertwined on the battle front as much as on a more personal level.

When the master of martial arts, ex-gorkha soldier, uncovers widespread sex trafficking network in his own backyard in Los Angeles, with the help of runaway victims, he orchestrates a massive attack on the traffickers.
In the tradition of THE GODFATHER, BLACK CAESAR and GOOD FELLAS comes a tale of family, trust, honor and betrayal. The story of the mob's first Black don.

Nela, a plain-faced girl from a poor family, falls in love with George, a wealthy blind man. When George begins a procedure to restore his eyesight, Nela fears that he will find her ugly and put an end to their romance.
The rude, lewd and crude Spanish ex-police officer Torrente finds himself facing jail time. Can he survive a twisted irony that places him where he has put so many others, both guilty and innocent?

The Weaver family buys some farmland in California, but the headmaster of a nearby boys school doesn't want them as neighbors, and before long the boys at the school are causing trouble for the Weavers.
A film archivist finds his sanity crumbling after he is given an old 16mm film reel with footage from a horrific murder that occurred in the early 1900's.
A mild-mannered doctor develops a taste for blood after the hiring of an assassin to kill his wife gets the attention of a gang of corrupt cops.
A dying father's last wish is to bring his rebellious son back home and into his loving and forgiving arms and reunite his family once again.
A wealthy man, Prashant, falls in love with Sreedevi, who is from a middle-class family. His father opposes the relationship as he wants her to marry Baby.

Kafka's Supermarket is an experimental surrealist science fiction dystopian horror film that concerns the issues of a current capitalist America, focusing on the alienation and dehumanization of commercialism.

When a strange event speeds up the rate of decay, a bloodthirsty cult arises believing they have found the one thing to stave off the death process. One man leads a small group of survivors across the apocalypse toward an unlikely cure.
The story of the heroic exploits of PC Ranger Captain Laudemer Kahulugan (Fernando Poe, Jr.) tasked to hunt down Huk dissident leader Casto Alejandrino (Van de Leon).
Two young brothers, who, after hearing their Mother's haunting bedtime story, are terrorized when it comes to life.
Unaware of a dark entity in a nearby park, two black-American siblings, escape to hide out from a racist cop who unjustly murdered their mother.

Six years after students cheated death, another teen has a premonition that she and her friends will be involved in an accident. When the vision comes true, the student and survivors deal with the repercussions of cheating the Grim Reaper.

movie_name: Saint Seiya: The Heated Battle of the Gods
description: Hyoga is missing somewhere in Asgard... When Seiya and the others are looking for him, Athena is kidnapped and they have to rescue her from Dolvar and some mysterious warriors.
Surprise parties rarely go well. This one is no different, as a group of 30-somethings head through life, love and a day in New York City.
It tracks the travails of wasted pulp fiction writer Sagar Kottapuram and his friend Ramakrishnan, who are dragged into a lawsuit by a vengeful Tahsildar S.Priyadarshini.
A young, lonely, emotionally challenged teenage girl finds solace in burying dead animals after the sudden traumatic death of a childhood friend ten years earlier.
Three men attempt to steal a precious artifact, but are arrested. Upon release they seek the statue again and during the hunt their loyalties start to wain.
When a crown prince visits, the princess's mother tries to push the prince into marrying her daughter by presenting a "rival" at the ball - her children's handsome tutor.
Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.
A notorious terrorist manipulates an Indian army major's jilted lover into helping him obtain a classified military code.

movie_name: If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
description: The humorous adventures of a group of American tourists taking an 18-day guided bus tour of nine European countries.
Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe, Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.
A story of a revenge taken by Vir Singh in greediness to get the throne of his brother, who was the real king.
The story of two guys and two girls who meet and fall in love in an amusement park on the last day of summer. All the while outwitting three moronic would-be jewel thieves.
A disturbed and damaged drifter must return to the place she fears most, she must return to - Franklin Avenue.
An architect is struggling to get over his wife's death. He meets a young woman who brings him happiness only to find out she is his son's girlfriend.

The story revolves around the life of the protagonist---a fearless and brave man fighting for his love against the whole corrupt system trying to separate the couple with their power, leading to consequences.

Kunjananthan thinks the only way out of his problems is to end his life by suicide and fails at it every time. Things change for him when he gets a job, and falls in love again but his whiny personality persists.

movie_name: Wat doen we met de liefde?
description: Five rather frivolous musicians seize the opportunity to perform on a cruise in the Mediterranean. Alas: they are under contract to engage a female singer - and they fear to fall in love with her, which would endanger their friendship.
Chased by two androids programmed to kill him, Zerph puts down his flying saucer in Auvergne while waiting for help.
Richard Henderson and his oddball crew Know how to survive in the zombie post apocalypse. A new character arrives in town leading an army of the dead bent of finishing off humanity.

movie_name: La ragazza dalla pelle di luna
description: Alberto, an engineer, and Helen, a magazine photographer, have been married for a few years, but their marriage is in crisis. They decide to take a trip to the Seychelles, where everything will happen.
Expensive diamonds are stolen but before the thief can fence them he is strangled by ex-con Cueball, who then takes the gems and continues murdering people he believes are trying to swindle him.
About a young man set to win a pokertournament, but eventually he finds himself in the dark underground of Stavanger.

A beautiful girl, expert in robbery, participates in various scores as an infiltrator, actually working for the police. Until, during yet another robbery, she is the one to be scammed, finding the bounty is made of fake jewels.
A vampire posing as a priest creates a cult of bloodthirsty humans and organizes a number of killings, beginning with a massacre at a church.
Lovecraft visualizes 3 stories in Necronomicon: The Drowned, The Cold and Whispers, about bringing a dead wife and child back to life, extending life and aliens.
A young caregiver believes that she's being possessed by the spirit of her benefactress, while her friends question her sanity given her family's history of schizophrenia.
In Bihar, a politician's daughter rebels against her father when he plans to marry her off to an ally's son. Aided by her college friend, she elopes with her lover, intending to secretly marry him.

A penniless drifter (Gary Cooper) is recruited by an ambitious columnist (Barbara Stanwyck) to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

Follows a contract killer stuck at the end of his career who gets thrilled when The Company pulls him back in the field. He is charge of training Gen Z newcomer Wihlborg, a prodigy assassin with an attitude.

Gary Hemming, Legend, Asshole, Enigma, Hero. People would follow Gary Hemming anywhere: into bed, into trouble and up the most dangerous mountains in the world. Gary Hemming - climber, renegade, poet, free thinker.
Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.
A teen's life turns upside-down when her boyfriend impregnates both her and a new student at school.

A ruthless vehicular gang rules the post-apocalyptic wasteland. That's until a muscled hero named Slade builds the ultimate machine gun - Equalizer 2000, and declares a one man war on the gang's "piece of garbage" leader.

The First Family moves into their new home only to discover that the most famous house in the world is haunted by a dark entity bent on possessing their daughter and driving the man with the nuclear codes out of his mind.
The dark underworld builds in power led by the Martinet and Katasha. As their evil plans unfold only one true hero can stop them.. but he strays from the path of fate not ready to accept who he is.
After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

Addison travels with a picky billionaire as an assistant in her brother's place so he doesn't lose his job. She clashes with the billionaire until both start to see more in each other than they thought.
What was supposed to be summer school in England becomes an adventurous, exotic and romantic journey for a beautiful teenage girl.

The film revolves around two college friends where one is a new student. The new student falls in love with his friend's sister without knowing she is his friend's sister. The plot forms when he realize the truth.
A shy, lonely film buff embarks on a killing spree against those who browbeat and betray him, all the while stalking his idol, a Marilyn Monroe lookalike.

A rich business man, Mr. Kowalski, is sent to the Northern Cape, to asses the potential of building a state-of-the-art casino. Kalahari Harry -opposed to this - sets into motion a series of ingenious plans to prevent this from happening.

A band of outlaws appear out of nowhere on a ranchers property and viciously shoot him down. They steal what they can from his ranch and kidnap his wife. They make for the Mexican border, but something starts stalking them.

Widower Henry Hobson (Charles Laughton) is a successful bootmaker and a tyrannical father of three daughters who all want to leave him by getting married, but he refuses because marriage traditions require him to pay out settlements.
Joseph ran away from Saddam's agents because he didn't want to fight in Iraq Iran war. Nobody has any news of him for 21 years. After the Allies invade Iraq, some news is heard about Joseph
A ruthless moneylender must tackle a wicked man's plan to outsmart his way out of the debt to achieve what's rightfully his.

Ty Sabala wants to change his life. After living on the fringes of society and scraping by in the underworld on the strength of his fists alone, he returns home to find that things there have changed as well.

In the wake of oppressive, dystopian oppression and destruction that targeted the most prosperous regions on planet, a few lone survivors must outwit and out-fight each other to survive in a post-apocalyptic wasteland ravaged by war.
Aaru, henchmen of Nathan who seeks revenge when Nathan betrayed him by killing his friends for personal profit.

Jersy, a self proclaimed King of Gamblers hears the story about his idol, Cool, he hopes to find him. His girlfriend decides that they should go to Tokyo. They goes to a Chinese restaurant, where the owner turns out to be Cool.
An inquisitive spaceship computer tasked with overseeing a safe voyage must cultivate a deeper sense of humanity in order to be effective amid the spread of cabin fever.
A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.
Plot kept under wraps. Described as a horror thriller set on an island that is a combination of Misery and Castaway.

The Japanese government suppresses the horrifying news of Godzilla's resurrection as political tensions increase between the United States and Soviet Union, both of whom are willing to bomb Japan to stop the monster.
A war vet turned long haul trucker becomes the focus of a Govt. experiment that unearths an occult entity at a mom and pop truck stop.
While trying to rescue her kidnapped sister, a rebel gun-woman faces a group of bandits and a man protecting a cursed treasure.

movie_name: Midnight Forever: A Hotline Miami Film
description: A war veteran turned hitman working for a lucrative and powerful criminal organization called 'Hotline Miami' carries out killings for cash on a regular basis, until one day a mysterious girl enters his life and everything changes.
An American filmmaker in Malta has a life-changing encounter with a Spanish lover who walked out five years earlier.
A remake of the South Korean thriller about a shopkeeper who gets caught up in a drug-trafficking ring.

A gang of escaped convicts take over a farmhouse and hold the woman living there hostage. It turns out that her husband is a cop, who among other things is in trouble because he has accidentally killed an innocent girl.
A family of bloodthirsty monsters descends on the city to take revenge on the man that caused the death of so many of their own.

Struggling to sleep and running out of time, a young woman and a young man, come to the realization that the very same thing stopping them from falling asleep is also keeping them from falling in love.

movie_name: The Shape: A Halloween Fan Feature
description: After Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution, a group of friends is caught in the wrong place at the wrong time.

A disc golf player name Junior Chainz just became best in the United States, problem is the other countries want in on it, Those Canadians aye, send a girl spy to take down Chainz, but does her emotions get in the way?
When a thirty-something 'suit' breaks into a music festival to retrieve his stolen belongings, he ends up finding love and freedom instead.
A criminal kidnaps a young girl on orders from his boss but later falls for her and attempts to redeem his life.

Haunted by her childhood trauma, Ferrall hid memories of that terrifying Wolfwood night and her father's death even from herself. Now she has discovered a pattern of evil stalking Wolfwood, and to face her guilt she will take her revenge.
The group that comes together realizes that they are not alone on the big plateau after midnight. The moment has come. Because the owner of the door is an ancient demon, AFARID jinn.
A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped, and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.
Two couples get more than they bargained for after playing a Ouija Board they found in their new condo.
When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces

movie_name: Stepfather II: Make Room for Daddy
description: After escaping the insane asylum in which he was incarcerated, Jerry Blake (Terry O'Quinn) impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient (Meg Foster) and her young son (Jonathan Brandis).
A mild mannered cleaning and maintenance specialist suffering from Parasomnia roams the streets at night under the vengeful guise of his sleepwalking alter ego.
Monica, a witch vampire, has the power to invade with vampires. They can destroy everything that exists on earth. The situation worsens when Monica is working with Cooper, the master of the seas.
Paul, a bag man with no positive attributes decides to take a chance corrupting his work life, to win back his love.
A domestic Iranian flight is taken hostage by a man Ghasem who is a refugee of war and has financial problems. He will go any distance for his family and wants to find a better place for living.
Two skateboarding gangs battle each other for supremacy, and a member of one gang falls in love with the sister of his rival.
Mario is a young fisherman who dreams of becoming a poet. He gets a job as the postman to Pablo Neruda when the legendary writer moves there after being exiled from Chile.
A career criminal takes the staff and residents of a hotel hostage after he is tipped off that there is 5 million dollars somewhere in the hotel.

Yuntum (Sanely Insane) is the story of love and an illusion of love, a decay of an instrument, a boy in the dilemma with a special gift, a girl bounded by fate, a man caught in the past and the divine intervention of God.
After the suicide of Valeria, a 16 year old girl who has suffered both socially and in the field of love, a group of friends, through the game of Ouija, invoking her spirit.

Ten year old Anne adopted by a Vampire Slayer (Wraith) kills a ruthless Vampire. 25 years later and now married with two teenage kids. The Vampire comes back to exact vengeance on the family by picking them off one at a time.
A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

Frank Courtney is the heir to great wealth, but his guardian Norman Bryan secretly plots to do the boy in and steal the inheritance. Only Frank's friend, radio operator Bob Whitlock, and Frank's wolf-dog stand between him and disaster.
Steven thinks his time defending the Earth is over, but when a new threat comes to Beach City, Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.
When a serial killer loses out on his latest kills, because of the actions of another murderer, he knows he has to go head to head with the other killer to determine who is the real Alpha.

In a small European country, the king is scheduled to visit a small, quiet and "safe" village. It turns out that while the village may indeed be small, it's neither as quiet nor as safe as it's expected to be.
Tshiong tells the story of A-Tek, a rather rebellious youth whom spends his time between protesting against social injustice and performing as the lead singer in a metal band.
A woman paints her face and starts a life of crime to survive in the apocalypse and keep her family safe. With ghosts, magic and a deal with the devil she might just survive.
Present day, A cab driver lives a tough life. He meets an old friend and they remember the good old days.
A family is trapped in a desert town by a cult of senior-citizens who recruit the town's children to worship Satan.

After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.
A man and his friend invent a powerful new super-buggy. A beautiful woman then hires their services to help her break a motorcycle gang.
Emeka found a property that he thought was a bargain until he moved in with his wife and they started experiencing very strange and frightening things. It was haunted.

A 20-something soldier takes 3 friends on a camping trip before returning to service. Things start to go badly wrong when the ghosts from his past start haunting the group with horrific and tragic consequences.

The protagonist is a lonely 40-year-old Petr, who works as an immigration officer in London. He returns to Prague when a woman, who dies in hospital after a car accident, calls him the father of her eight-year-old daughter Ema.

Sheriff is aided by Laramie who pretends to be an outlaw to infiltrate a gang of bootleggers. Laramie is attracted to Ellen, who is trying to activate an old mine. He helps her with the mine and captures the bootleggers.

When a gang shoots his father, Bookman (Fred Williamson) returns to his hometown, rounds up some of his own people and begins an all-out war to restore the neighborhood to its rightful sense of justice.

The movie is about the life of a dacoit, Thakur Suraj Singh (Raaj Kumar). He was the son of a zamindar, but his parents were killed by the dacoit Zaalim Singh. In the confusion, Suraj got separated from his brother and sister.

Christy Taylor a successful wedding expert falls for bombshell Bobby Jean. CJ explores pansexuality and a whirlwind wedding in her small Oklahoma hometown. Old flame Bud Barnett complicates CJ's plan as she swirls in this romantic tornado.
A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over, but one young man wants revenge above all else.
Things go horribly wrong when Catherine and Rebecca, two Catholic schoolgirls, knock on the wrong door while selling religious paraphernalia.
The trials and tribulations of an up and coming R&B group coming off the road. The guys take time to re-examine their relationships.
After an irreversible tragedy, a cardiothoracic surgeon puts his career in jeopardy by drowning his sorrows, systematically destroying his life.
A suspense filled action comedy about Dutch, a deaf, otherwise would be average Joe trying to clear his name after being accused for the murder of a stranger
Two show-business wannabees get their big chance to show off their big-time act and talents in a nightclub,and bomb. Othet acts come on---endlessly---and do well, but the kids will be back.
Based on real events - banned from the blackjack table, a professional card counter finds a way back onto the casino floor by outsmarting the unbeatable game of roulette.

A young boy who sees his father gunned down kills the assassin. Years later, he has grown up to be a successful bounty hunter who is feared by many. And then one day he discovers secrets to his past...

Five college students on a backwoods excursion encounter a deadly, nocturnal presence. As horrific events unfold, the group joins forces with a town local and a prison escapee and attempt to survive the night.

Seemingly everyday housewives have been targeted and kidnapped, used as blackmail to their high profile husbands, these women must prove more than their worth in life, they must prove it in the the fight ring to sadistic drug dealers.

In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage gamer, must survive thirty sessions in order to be set free.

When David moves his family into a new lake house despite his aqua-phobia, things spiral out of control as he struggles to decipher whether his haunting experiences are due to anxiety or actual paranormal activity.
In the fall of 1972, a former NASA engineer travels west to rediscover himself through the lens of his super8 movie camera.
It's a Panna Rittikrai war movie from Thailand (1992) with quad-cut stunts, a ghost, squibs, explosions, savage beatings and M16's.
An ambitious ex-con tries to save his uncle's shop from closing, while entertaining an unexpected romance with an R&B superstar.

This thriller follows two sets of couples, Franklin and Bella Sloane and Rod and Carol Everett, as they end up trapped in the Sloane house during a snow storm. Soon they begin to be picked off by a mysterious killer.

Prema Geema Jaane Do is a soft romantic comedy. The movie is about the protagonist setting up a journey to a new place and meeting new people.Why he hates love and what is in his past forms the main crux of the story.
A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.
Three life-long friends work the bars in 1980's Atlantic City performing the songs of the 60's girl groups in this self-indulgent comedy.
A financier's daughter spars with a newspaper reporter: he by writing about her, she by announcing their engagement.
A group of students on a class assignment travel to the infamous Camp Blood woods in the hopes of debunking a local legend.
A border region village between the Czech Republic and Germany tells the love story of Tommy (19) from a socially disadvantaged background and Julia (18) from a wealthy family.

When young Arthur is handed a mysterious comic book on Halloween night, little does he know that its hold on him will blur the lines of reality that have kept him blissfully ignorant of the danger our sister planet presents.
