After witnessing the brutal death of his family, an embittered ex-army officer agrees to infiltrate a gang of terrorists.
A romantic holiday turns into a quest for survival when a city boy and his hot-headed fiance-to-be stumble on the killing of a big shot CEO in the South African wilderness.

Igor is ready for anything for the sake of Polina's happiness and, in order to make up for the loss of her son, the spouses decide to adopt. But instead of an ordinary boy from the shelter, their family gets not just a "difficult" child .
Alan Whitmore, a young American researcher, goes to Budapest to visit Professor Roth, with whom he collaborated on a secret project called "Intextus" while a mysterious killer in on the loose...
Eddie Kapinsky, a retired professional ice hockey player comes to terms with his retirement and starts a romance.
a guy travel to turkey and work there and finally became a dealer and there he met with his old enemy who married to the girl that he loves
Two small-time hustlers try to get their payday any way they can, while dodging more jail time. They soon learn that cash is king, even above loyalty.
The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.
A young athelete becomes the unlikely star of an itinerant wrestling troupe, and a rival promoter will go to any length to steal him away.

movie_name: He's a Woman, She's a Man
description: A singer is so desperate to meet a famous record producer and his singer girlfriend that she disguises herself as a man, resulting in a wild love triangle.

On the eve of Victory Day, three elderly friends, veterans from the front lines in the Great Patriotic War, meet in Moscow. They soon involve themselves in an operation involving the Russian mafia and FSB.
When a young systems engineer blows the whistle on a dangerous technology, Charlie's Angels are called into action, putting their lives on the line to protect us all.
Two white traders in the darkest Africa of the 1870s find a missionary's daughter, who was captured as a child by a savage tribe and now worshiped as a goddess.
A neighborhood in the Hollywood Hills is terrorized by a group of self-described modern day vampires who then collide with a disgraced LAPD Detective and his rebellious teenage daughter.
The relationship between four long-time friends is put to the test when two of the friends get engaged.

When an attorney disappears when meeting his terrorist clients' backers in Pakistan, his headstrong fiancée goes to find him, risking her life in a confrontation with a terrorist cell and her own country's clandestine intelligence service.
Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.
When a married couple hits a jogger while driving, they think their night can't get any worse. But after heading to a remote location to bury the body, they realize their nightmare has just begun.
When a nobleman is threatened by a family curse on his newly inherited estate, detective Sherlock Holmes is hired to investigate.
A young girl flees her hometown and arrives in the Australian Alps, where new experiences help her learn the differences between sex and love.
When a frumpy divorcee leaves her philandering spouse for the company of her best friend's classy stable of escorts, romantic misadventures begin.
After her neighbor's family is slaughtered by the mob, GLORIA finds herself in custody of an 8-year-old boy with trained killers hot on their heels.
An evil demon that inhabits a monkey doll takes over the mind of a suburban housewife to carry out its plans.
After returning home from war, an ill-tempered young soldier must deal with his sweetheart having married another man.
A carefree young man who works as junior lawyer turns into an honest lawyer to avenge his sister and brother-in-law by punishing the villains without taking the law in his own hands.
Jimmy needs $900 to clear a gambling debt but a series of lies leads to Ray trying to raise the cash from friends who owe him money.

An attractive and successful doctor places a personal ad in a newspaper to try to meet (and eventually marry) Mr. Right. A succession of blind dates ensues, featuring men who are lonely, desperate, dangerous and perverted.

When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

A desperate family has exhausted all avenue's to save their gravely ill young child... except one. They seek help from a relic hunter to track down "Buddah's Tooth", which is believed to have supernatural healing powers.

After four friends in Hong Kong find a ruthless triad plans to destroy their poor neighborhood they plot to bring down the organized crime entity once and for all escaping on motorcycles and igniting Asia's own action auto franchise.
Usha is heartbroken after she loses her lover Ravi in a railway accident. Things take a turn when Ramankutty falls in love with her.
One night with a total stranger. And fate brought them together once again. That's where their whirlwind romance started.
A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.
Balram, an honest police inspector, turns to drinking and womanizing after facing several hardships in life. However, when a criminal he nabs gets acquitted by the court, he decides to fight again.
A gifted young mountain bike racer, retired after a near fatal accident, is forced to compete in the most extreme cycling race to save his family from financial ruin and his brother from prison.

Lun is devoted to Moon since he was young. However, Moon disappears in a summer. His friends See and Wah gasp for hearing Moon is dead. What's worse, Moon died for Lun. While everyone is worried about her, the spirit of Moon returns.

NOTE: Sequel to Addicted to Murder: Tainted Blood (1999).It is 1999. Joel Winter, now a vampire hunter, is living in New York. He still hunts vampires in retaliation for them making him ...                See full synopsis »

Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

movie_name: San Martín: El cruce de Los Andes
description: The story follows a 15-year-old Manuel Corvalán, who decides to leave his upper-class family and be disinherited by his father to join the newly formed Army of the Andes, commanded by the General José de San Martín.

Written, directed and produced by Saran, the movie features Vinay in dual lead roles, accompanied by three newcomers: Samuthrika, Swasthika and Kesha Khambhati. It focuses on a large scale money laundering and hawala money transaction.
A story of 4 techies, a social media addict, and a CBI officer, whose lives are blessed with happy-go-lucky moments until they are heavily struck with a terrorizing incident.
A troubled young girl gets a job at a modeling school where she is tortured by the voices in her head and the sounds in the walls.
Three struggling theatrical performers meet a famous songwriter who is trying to convince a wealthy oilman to finance a musical he is scripting, promising them stardom if it comes to fruition.
Only legendary Japanese garage rock band Guitar Wolf can stand between a race of aliens from destroying earth with an army of zombies.

A Catholic deacon returns to the city in which he grew up to find that evil is all around; demons, angels and human terror. He takes up a life of vigilantism, questioning his actions to God, and pondering the salvation of his own soul.
A super smart woman breaks away from her evil bosses and, with the help of two rogue detectives, works to survive.
A man has a psychotic break and forms unnatural bonds with his pet rabbits as he terrorizes a community from his remote cabin in the mountains.
Khosrow is a wealthy man who is still not married because ha hates women. But when his friend brings a saleswoman Soheila for playing a fake role he falls in love this time.

Takeshi, an alienated young man spends his lonely days obsessively following total strangers. He is employed to observe the movements of a beautiful but disturbed doctor, whose behavior is causing concern.
A teenager finds himself in the midst of a monster's onslaught of terror in his small town. As he and his friends try to survive, he must battle something much scarier in the process - young love.

After an unsuccessful marriage attempt Sasha needs to leave Budapest and her Hungarian boyfriend to continue her studies in the US. As the day progresses, their special bond makes separating in the morning a difficult choice.
After a San Francisco detective's partner is murdered by Northern Irish terrorists, the officer joins the bomb squad in order to bring them to justice.

2228: On the eve of take-off, an elite space pilot abandons his lover, the space program and his place on the 30 year colonization mission to rescue his brother before the earth is destroyed by a rogue giant star.
Albert Brooks directs himself as a successful film editor with far too many issues that affects the relationship between him and his remarkably patient girlfriend.
Guarding their new clients Melanie and Jennifer, "the corps" accidentally stumbles upon an international deal to sell a nuclear weapon.

Twenty-something Adele is haunted and hunted by zombies. She desperately seeks help but no one hears or believes her. In Adele's lonely struggle to fend off her zombie stalkers, what will she do in order to survive?

Follows Irati, a young girl who will guide a group of christian and muslim warriors through a journey in an ancient mythological world where everything that has a name exists, in an attempt to recover a lost treasure.
A border police officer helps a woman cross between West and East Germany with her son. Despite being increasingly united by love, the distance between them increases as border security tightens.
the life journey of the dreaded dacoit Shiv Kumar Patel who ruled the lands of Bundelkhand for twenty-eight years and had the entire police, administration and the politicians being obedient to him.

Accused of carrying out a campaign of psychological torture on the woman who left him a decade earlier, an antiquarian book-dealer must battle to prove his innocence and confront an evil that threatens to destroy them both.
After retiring from being a hit man due to a physical disability, a man returns for one final job to take care of his struggling family.

movie_name: The Dark Knight: Knightfall - Part One
description: Danny begins to reject the idea of being a superhero, craving a normal life, as danger lurks in the distance in the form of the Crimson Empire.
A group of teens entertain themselves by telling an anthology of famous urban legends with a modern twist; including make-out-point, monsters, psychopaths, and ghosts.

A man likes his lifelike realistic doll more than real women he soon starts to compare his girlfriends to his doll none of which can compare in his eyes. One jealous girlfriend attacks his "doll" triggering a train of horrific advents.

Jeffrey is stuck in another city...in another person's body. Apparently he has a date with his body's girlfriend, Alex. In survival mode, he plays along as his body. But as the night progresses, so do their relationship.

Forced to travel with her boyfriend, Laine begins to experience premonitions associated with the urban myth of The Creeper. She believes that something supernatural has been summoned - and that she is at the center of it all.
A couple come into contact with stolen mob money, gamble it away, and end up on the run from gangsters.

Beth, a teenager in the midst of a painful moral education, is put in the unenviable position of holding her family together and debasing herself at the suggestion of both her scornful bedridden mother and her no-good boyfriend.

This is my last letter I forced to leave / I'm afraid of this love please understand me / I'm afraid to love please understand me Impossible love story between Nilufer who come from rich family and Ahmet who is taxi driver.
A baby girl is abandoned in front of the residence of a well-off family. She'll be brought up by the owner of the house and her son, without knowing that the baby is actually his daughter.

A catastrophic volcanic eruption releases ancient dragon-like creatures on the surrounding areas. Scientists believe this could start a chain reaction of volcanic eruptions giving way to a global Dragon Apocalypse.

Kylie Winters, a bullied teen, is forced to babysit at an isolated country mansion on Halloween night. When a small boy in a pig mask appears at the door trick-or-treating, Kylie's night transforms into a horrifying game of cat-and-mouse.
Some friends visit the infamous Garchampa Palace which has a horrifying reputation for blood-sucking entities and spirits that were petrifying the locality.

As a zombie virus breaks out, one ragtag group of trapped elevator passengers must pull together for a fighting chance of survival against an infected rider and the clever horde that awaits them outside.

Red is a local goon who is passionate about reforming children via education and development. While working towards his noble causes and dealing with his rivals, he also tries to help a girl he loves.

The Skinwalker leaves a bloody trail through town until a Guardian, an Aboriginal hero from another time, is summoned to return from exile. He bands together with the three lone survivors to defeat the creature before it moves on.
Native son returns from school in Spain to California in 1855 and finds corrupt politicians stealing land from old California families. He becomes a sort of Robin Hood in order to fight them.
After a zombie outbreak sabotages a high school party, five unwitting teens must work together to survive the final days of the apocalypse.
The story of a special operations team headed by elite pilots , being ordered to test new fighter jets. Test flight after test flight, they continue to challenge the sky and the limits of themselves.
During their last weekend together, a group of friends staying at a reclusive mountain house have their fun suddenly interrupted by a knock at the door.

Scream Test was designed to look like a found video. Two bumbling brothers audition actors for a film, but inadvertently kill the would-be stars. The entire film was shot in the attic of Robert A. Burns' Austin home.
What should have been a para-military training exercise turns into a fight for survival against a seemingly unstoppable foe.

A blind man Pyare and his deaf friend Mohan fall in love with twin sisters Preeti and Priya. But their relationships spiral into chaos when the sisters get falsely implicated in a murder case and the men have to find a way to save them.
When CID officer Chandran, who is working on a tedious case, gets murdered, officer Nazir takes over his case and endeavors to catch his killers.
While camping in the mountains, tragedy befalls a group of friends, and a bizarre supernatural terror follows in its wake.
Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented, and awakened.
Several fantastic stories follow one another in the zone of silence, in Mexico, about the robbery of a train, a treasure guarded by a ghost and an evil car.
The story of a young doctor who lives a luxurious life based on credit cards, chasing girls and his bad intentions once he goes bankrupt.

A girl (Palmer) has a pigs heart flung at her chest by a mumbling old lady (Jackman) on the subway, she thinks she's been cursed. She slowly goes crazy and ends up killing someone. Was she really cursed or was she always crazy?
Krishanunni (Mammotty) is a graduate comes to the city in search of a job after having some troubles back in the village. How he becomes the Collector forms the crux of the story.
The story of an investigative reporter and former colonel delving into military secrets to uncover the source of a corruption case.

Mady and Cody are about to get divorced when their minds are transported to two dolls that their daughter, Rose, made to represent them. Now they must embark on a journey to find a way to return to their bodies.
In small town Kalgoorlie, teenager Ben Wakeley and his loved ones are pushed to their limits. Targeted by mysterious masked criminals, they're forced to fight back.

movie_name: Glastonbury Isle of Light: Journey of the Grail
description: Follows the legends of the Holy Grail and how it came to Britain in the first century. Joseph escapes peril in Jerusalem with the chalice and implores the help of the British warrior Caractacus who has set up resistance to Roman domination.

Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men, now one kick away from pulling their hamstrings. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.
A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality television star fiancée talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her television show.
A reclusive programmer, his sister and her new boyfriend are held hostage by a rapidly evolving computer virus.

At a secluded school for girls, suspicions are aroused when a new girl arrives and anybody who interferes with her ends up dead. But it is not by her own choice, rather that of the powerful spirit that has been attached to her since birth.

A disgraced former Kung Fu expert makes a living as a merchant with the help of a hot headed friend. When the men are harassed by gangsters, the merchant decided to teach his friend monkey boxing so they can defend their business.
A highly successful and well known illusionist challenges four participants to endure their stay in his very own infamous house where terrible murders have taken place.
Presented as cerebral puzzle using fragmented memories, we piece together the events surrounding a cursed inheritance.
When two students move into a former tuberculosis hospital in East Tennessee, a deep wound that they share slowly opens wide and threatens their sanity.

After becoming a licensed engineer abroad, Lucyna comes back to Poland and looks for a job. Because her wealthy father thinks it's inappropriate for a girl to work, she decides to put on men's clothes and get a job as Julian Kwiatkowski.
After losing her job and her boyfriend, an aspiring romance novelist moves from her London flat to a beach house on the Sunshine Coast, where she discovers that love can be both perfect and messy.
An alpha New York City male is magically transformed into a beautiful girl, falls in love, and learns what it means to be a woman.

As the rest of the world finds its equilibrium in the aftermath of an undead apocalypse, one emotionally unstable man abandons friends and family to go live among the few remaining zombies before they're all gone.

Leon Lai Ming, village chief and bored rural cop, lands his first urban assignment. He thinks he'll be protecting Tung Chee-Hwa, but in fact he must go undercover, as bodyguard for up-and-coming pop sensation Cinderella.

At the beginning of Paris fashion week, a beautiful young model is brutally murdered. Investigative journalist Madison Castelli, certain that it is more than the "crime of passion" the French press says, comes to Paris to follow her story.
A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

In 1927, Carl Brown marries Annie McGairy and goes to college, but taking his young wife with him creates difficult challenges for both of them, for their parents back home, and for the campus faculty.
Two outlaws, Rio and Esqueda, raised together as stepbrothers, have a showdown over the issue of whether to evict new settlers from their territory.

At a Japanese restaurant nestled within the busy streets of Beijing, Li Dong convinces his older brother Li Chun to travel together to the Japanese city of Yanagawa to find and catch up with their childhood sweetheart Liu Chuan.
Trouble strikes when an exhausted pop singer, sent on a vacation to a farm, realizes that the farm's owner raises deadly bees.

A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.
2 families looking for a new home go to an isolated open house, but when they find a girl with no tongue, they soon discover they can't leave.
A Chicago cop is caught in the middle of a gang war while his own comrades shun him because he wants to take down an irresponsible cop.
Space aliens arrive on Earth with their giant shark and intend to take over the planet but they must first destroy Gamera.
In a city where the paranormal and ordinary co-exist, the Libra organization battles to ensure peace and order.
The Earth grapples with the sudden appearance of a godlike being, who presents himself as a benevolent god, while another just like him appears simply to malign and oppose him.

Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.
Dixon Wells and his family live in a small town called Broo, and are enjoying a night of s'mores in the cool fall air. Like life however, things do not go according to plan.

10 horror tales about the dark goings-on in Hotel Darklight. This full-length horror feature is comprised of 10 segments from ten different writer/director teams. It was shot over six days in one location with no budget.
When an unscrupulous law officer's underhanded activities are uncovered by a movie film crew, people begin to disappear.
When Lisa and her friends go looking for answers behind her brother's mysterious death, they discover he was a victim of the infamous Christman demon.
The daughter of a psychotic magician must stay in his mansion for seven nights in order to inherit his fortune.
Two engineers arrive in an isolated mountain village to install a cellular radio tower and soon become the target of the villager's collective hatred, instigated by a powerful and shadowy local man.
A quiet woman is stalked as she encounters sudden violent confrontations while investigating her friend's murder.
Sudeep accidentally knocks down Radha on the railway tracks and looses her leg. Filled with guilt, he offers to marry her without letting her know that he was behind the accident.

What a Man: The young teacher Alex is abandoned by his girlfriend Caroline and therefore begins a journey in search of himself. But how he overcomes the pitfalls out there for a modern man? And what is it that makes a man a man?
After a peace-loving Japanese immigrant and his family become victims of a crime syndicate, a master ninja emerges.
A vulgar private detective is hired to find a missing groupie and is drawn into a mystery involving a series of murders tied to the music industry.

Identical twins Alice and Lacey are mistaken for each other on a retreat. They decide to go with it just for the trip, soon they realize that they may have been wrong about who and what they needed in their lives all along.
Failed experiment, created ages ago, struggle to survive in the wastelands as she is thrust into a battle for her existence against a decades old menace.

The upholsterer Hans Moll and his wife, the television announcer Mrs. Wellinek and her husband, as well as the German-Russian Jewgenia have a lot of things that one needs to live: food, drink, an apartment. What they don't have is work.
Lil becomes a dealer in a gambling casino in order to get the information she needs to clear her father of a murder charge. She also falls in love with lawyer Brewster.

Follows prince Karl Johan and newcomer Lena, who have feelings for each other but are aware that their relationship might put them in an impossible situation, while he has to carry a nation on his shoulders, she carries lies on hers.

A disillusioned widower begins getting weird e-mail messages and duly heads to a strip club. Unfortunately, once there, he sees his supposedly dead wife lap-dancing; even more unfortunately, she also happens to be a vampire.

Find a chair and you can stay, But if you don't you'll go away. The last survives another day... Pop Goes the Weasel. Welcome to Junior's world where six invited guests, trapped in a room, play a deadly game of musical chairs.

Chained to his job, Dave has no time for his family let alone a good night's sleep, so when his neighbor warns of Coopersville's pending doom, it falls on deaf ears. -That's until Dave is awoken by something standing in his living room.

Aiming to develop "the perfect human" through a secret scientific project reaching the present day from 1958, Cemil Sulhi Dimra is unaware that he started the greatest war in the world with this initiative.
A girl named Amy is visiting her mother and her father for the weekend when a Earthquake happens Amy has to survive and keep everyone she loves alive.
In seeking to avenge his father's murder, a young man puts an entire village at risk of retribution.

In the shadow of Acropolis, an honest man dreams of marrying the charming daughter of a poor pedlar; however, a chance encounter with a professional philanderer will fill her heart with delusions of grandeur. Are they meant to be together?
A Marialist nobleman falls in love with a fado singer, who puts an end to the ephemeral relationship, accepting the love of a teenager, recently arrived from Africa.
Lesbian couple Jamie and Jill explore the underground world of S&M while their friends David and Lola compete to see who's cool enough to go through with a threesome.

A pimp unwittingly opens a doorway to Hell in the San Francisco of 2179, releasing a monster dog and a demon bent on possessing a human soul. Sci-fi horror film HOUNDZ FROM HELL tells the ...                See full synopsis »
On a bloody night in a place where we are supposed to feel safe, a young man and his beloved are struggling not to reach the hospital, but to run away from it. They are trying to survive the night.
A young man from a farming family falls in love with a politician's daughter, but her family does not approve of their relationship.
Set over the course of one night, a detective finds himself haunted by a supernatural force while transporting a mysterious item in his unmarked police cruiser.
Meet Citizen Normal, a man with zero tolerance for the trivial, and a violent lack of sympathy for the mouth-breathers he's forced to live with.
When a grieving former spy gets a distress call from her estranged son, she travels to Morocco in search of him, unearthing a viperous maze of lies, terror, and his many secrets.
An arrogant spoiled brat learns the value of hard work and discipline after spending a year in his father's friend's village.

During a power outage, two strangers tell scary stories. The more Fred and Fanny commit to their tales, the more the stories come to life in their Catskills cabin. The horrors of reality manifest when Fred confronts his ultimate fear.
When a group of teens watch a mysterious DVD dropped by their librarian they see things no person should.
Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.
Suffering from a terminal illness, a young loner makes plans for the little time he has left while coping with the five stages of death: denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance.
A young woman finds herself as the intended victim of a murder plot on a transatlantic flight from London to New York.
Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

The passionate romance between an Irish-American man and a Japanese-American woman is threatened when the Pearl Harbor attacks happen and the woman is forced into a prison camp because of her ethnicity.
With the help of a younger man a mature woman finds that the fires of passion can melt the icy darkness of pain and despair.

Janumada Snehitharu follows the story of a group of friends who step into the world of small-scale entrepreneurship. How they overcome various obstacles on their way to achieve their goals forms the crux of the plot.
A woman forced to work for the Russian Mafia as an assassin agrees to help her next-door neighbor kill her abusive husband.

In the year 2077, the nefarious world government Entercelt is planning to go back in time and squash every popular movement and revolution in history. A band of time-travelling rebels (and a few historical figures) will try to stop them.

La Bella Lola is a struggling singer trying to make a living for herself and her sister Ana in late-19th-century Spain. She falls in love with a high-society young man but his family refuses to accept her.

Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.
A group of brokers stumble onto a gangster-manipulated stock and descend into distrust and betrayal.
A feature film based on the popular video game set on the abandoned fictional planet of Pandora where people search for a mysterious relic.

On a secretive outing to a bizarre strip club, Tom Kingsford is unaware that his life is about to take a dramatic turn. The club owner, and real estate mogul, William O'Toole, is a sadistic voyeur whose desire for fear and torture.
When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.
Johann Bach teams up with the mysterious Josh after he is resurrected by a failing rap artist. Thus ensues a murderous rampage that can only be quenched by one thing: cop John Cannon's magnum.

movie_name: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Baby
description: It's Christmastime in Aldovia, and a royal baby is on the way. Amber and Richard host royals from a distant kingdom to renew a sacred truce, but when the treaty vanishes, peace is jeopardized and an ancient curse threatens their family.

movie_name: Costa Chica: Confession of an Exorcist
description: An ex-priest, also an investigator documenting true events of demonic possession, comes to the rescue of a newly possessed daughter of a Baptist minister.

movie_name: Nikto ne znaet pro sex 2: No sex
description: Psychologist Arabella Kukushkina and infamous TV-producer are starting new reality-show for married couples with sex- addiction named "No Sex".

Following the death of his wife, a broken man spirals into an abyss of night tremors and depression and finds himself in the home of a deranged cannibal who convinces him to take his own life in the most horrific way imaginable.
PREMAM is a story about Sanju (Babusan) and Padmini (Prakruti).Sanju will go to any limits for Padmini. This film shows how a small mistake in a person's life can create a big problem.

movie_name: Strike, Dear Mistress, and Cure His Heart
description: Newlyweds David and Madeline Middleston have just purchased a historic hotel near the town where Madeline's estranged mother Dianne resides. When Dianne comes to visit she brings with her an uninvited guest.
Romance blossoms between two rival families practicing Shaolin and Wudang kungfu respectively. despite familial opposition - until they overcome a gang of scheming bandits together.
A developmentally disabled man harvests eyes from dead bodies to make his dolls more realistic, protecting his sister from an abuser with unique, desired eyes.
A tough but unhappy Broadway star re-evaluates her life when she crosses paths with a blind pianist.
Jay doesn't believe in love Stories, and Simran, is a girl who's in love with the idea of Love itself.
After catching his lifelong best friend sleeping with his fiancé, a serial monogamist must learn how to be single for the first time.

Two young couples take the vacation of a lifetime to Rio De Janeiro, Brazil. In search of escape and adventure, they explore the abandoned tunnels under the Statue of Christ. Once inside, they realize just whose yard they've stepped into.

When high school junior Benjamin Gold finds himself struggling to juggle his college dreams with his personal life, his girlfriend is forced to question if their relationship is worth saving if their paths are inevitably going to diverge.
Two women who have been best friends since childhood, must find restoration and eventual redemption after an unforgivable act of betrayal.
A hustler has dreams of being a superstar dancer, but finds himself in a world of trouble leaving his older brother to save him before it's too late

In 1945 a psychic war journalist gains a telekinetic link to a murderous puppet and uses its help to sabotage a top secret Nazi experiment that involves using a Death Ray to transform people into zombies.
The spiteful ghost of Sadako, a murdered woman whose body was thrown down a well, reaches the Internet searching for a host in order to live once again.
Drama is in fluid supply at the TV renuion of the reality tv show Ulterior Motives, but so is murder.
Woman Has an unexpected connection with an internet technician, leading her to have a Valentine's Day that she'll never forget and evaluate her current relationship with her boyfriend.
Fighting against pirates at the turn of the 20th century, the Hong Kong navy are failing miserably. It's up to Sergeant Lung (Jackie Chan) to take matters into his own hands.

A group of friends from the city of Oropel since childhood are wrapped in their feelings restricted by the harshness of drug trafficking in which situations create a violent lack of control to the point of losing their minds.
Desperate to save his family from death threats by a notorious drug dealer, Mateo Cruz steals the venerated image of the Virgin of Guadalupe causing pandemonium throughout Mexico.
In 1990s Pittsburgh, a medicine peddler starts a relationship with a young woman suffering from Parkinson's disease.

Behind the appearance of a quite family hides an unsettling secret. Everything will change for Samuel, Neila and their daughter Vicky. A unique police commissioner has to deal with an something which would have been better not to reveal.
Two inventors head to propose a machine for easy soap packaging while evil capitalist tries to destroy the machine and gaslighting friends.
Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.
A paranormal investigator is troubled by strange occurrences in a small town that are mysteriously connected to experiences from his past.
A mentally unstable young man goes on a mission to hunt down and murder all the therapists he blames for messing up his mind and his life.

Sagar, known as Jackie, among the criminal underworld, is called by his friend Indu for rescuing her husband Manu from the Rozario gang who kidnapped him. Jackie rescues Manu with ease, but it ensues a gang war.

Two passionate lovers have a relationship that was doomed from the start. Father Williams, a catholic priest and young Rosemary begin a seemingly innocent association, but the relationship quickly turns intensely physical.

Thomas McKenzie has been searching for the perfect girl his whole life. When he meets two women who pique his interest, he learns that the love we are searching for is not always the true love that makes us whole.
Eighteen-year-old Noah finds a connection with Diego on a gay dating site and they arrange a meeting. But not all as it seems.

A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.
As a series of strange and violent events begin to occur, an alcoholic policeman realizes that he has been turned into a werewolf as part of a larger plan.

movie_name: Hotel Inferno 3: The Castle of Screams
description: Frank, although you have retrieved the Fire element, you are still trapped in the hellish Hotel Inferno. Now you must retrieve the Ice element, and take the second step towards your resurrection.
Escaped convicts from the Mainland bound for Taiwan collide with the Taiwan police in a murderous shootout. An explosive, action-packed underworld thriller that indeed proves deadly.

Two female college students stumble across a Russian witch in a vodka bar in suburban Minneapolis. Soon, they find their lives being erased as Baba Yaga pulls them toward her, demanding a horrifying deal.
In 1828 Scotland, Edinburgh surgeon Dr. Knox does medical research on cadavers he buys from murderers Burke and Hare, without questioning the unethical procurement methods.
The Grim Reaper takes the form of a Prince in an attempt to relate to humans and, along the way, also learns what it is to love.
Gu Hui, a member of the 'Wolf Head Gang' becomes unhappy after their new chief decides to abandon their old code of conduct.
Disgraced and exiled for falling in love with a wealthy woman, a healer is forced to become a bandit.
A recovering substance-abusing country singer and his brother exact revenge on the singer's manager, who has cheated him out of a substantial amount of cash throughout the years.
When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.
A young radio cop and a beautiful girl try to stop an international criminal gang from getting their hands on the formula for a new bulletproof steel.
In Mexico City, rich American Karen Harrison falls in-love with famous bullfighter Luis Santos who hides a personal secret regarding his young protege bullfighter Rafael Reyes.

A boy and an adult witch live in the same building in Tel Aviv. The boy falls in love with the new girl who came to the neighborhood, a retired witch. The connection between the two teaches both that in love there is no magic.
Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.
College student Ali Hooper and her little brother are attacked by a masked maniac, and the key to them surviving the night lies in unlocking a secret from the killer's past.
A couple struggling to start a family makes a decision to adopt only to find more than their adopted child has come home with them.
5 Friends takes a trip to Los Angeles for Gay Pride Weekend. A weekend of fun and partying soon turned deadly. A weekend that they will never forget.
A young couple visit a property left from the late father's estate. A haunted and disturbing past unravels. The main character has to overcome his personal issues and learn how to move forward.
A samurai with a high skill in chess makes friends with Zatoichi, who finds that things become peculiar in his presence.

Fall Break in Knoxville, Tennessee, 2010. Four college students escape for a few days to camp at a local deserted quarry. They were not alone. Their camera was found two days later. The investigation is still open.
Two women fall in love in nazi-occupied France, and must fight to survive the war. A task made more difficult as one is a jew on the run from Germany.
In 2011, five Medical students investigated an abandoned mining town in search of paranormal evidence... They found them.

To find real happiness, you need only to look within yourself - but what these characters find is revolting. An anthology of only the most disturbed short horrors. Only palatable after the sun goes down.

A surreal sci-fi romance wherein a beautiful young woman and strange metaphysical forces threaten the reality of a reclusive video arcade technician, resulting in bizarre biomechanical mutations and a shocking self-realization.
A group of friends come together for a battle of the sexes party that has become a single sex affair. To stop the party from ending prematurely, they tell stories to Keep The Party Going.
Exploring issues of class privilege among Rio's decadent elite, Casa Grande depicts a teenage boy's struggle to escape his overprotective parents as they covertly spiral into bankruptcy.
Çiçek is a girl who grew up in a small village. She has so many questions about her own life with no answers. And then her life is changed by Dogan, her literature teacher.
A mother and daughter head off for a secluded weekend to reconnect little do they know the sordid past of the home there staying in or the strangeness it attracts as they descend into madness.
Longing to escape his older wife and marry his young lover, a penniless playboy pays a psychopathic killer to do the deed so that he can inherit her millions.

Eve and Damien have formed a loving couple for seven years now. Following a tragic event, their relationship begins to run out of steam. When Eve realizes that she might lose the man of her life, she tries everything to keep him.

Rajiv has just finished his studies. He is a young man from a good family and his widowed mother now thinks to marry the daughter of an old family friend . During one of his walks , Rajiv ...                See full synopsis »
A group of college students on a weekend getaway accidentally summon a supernatural entity intent on using them for its deadly ritual.
A mid-19th-century mulatto slave is torn between his success as a pit-fighter and the injustices of white society.
Two students find themselves homeless and expelled from their college. As they hunt for a house and a job, the two fall in love but their struggles escalate.
A young actress must convince her family to shelter off the grid after a mysterious countdown appears in the sky.

A love triangle, it tells of how two women loved the same man and each in her love for the happiness of the other. The mischievous one, who silently loves the station master is reluctantly ...                See full synopsis »
Chemistry teacher Ana Rosa hears about a bank robbery in which criminals threaten to kill several hostages if they don't let them escape.
After the renewed flings with their former lovers prove to be disastrously unlike the romantic memories, an unfaithful couple returns to each other.
The Earth shortly before its end. The houses in the cities are deserted, the streets smashed. The sky shimmers dark gray.
Too self-conscious to woo Roxanne himself, wordsmith Cyrano de Bergerac helps young Christian nab her heart through love letters.
While on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a parasitic life-form.
Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.

A housekeeper drawn into a terrifying world of vengeful apparitions. According to the Chinese calendar, the seventh month of every year marks the time when the spirits of the dead break free from the gates of hell to mix among the mortals.
A career military man reflects on his life while on his deathbed when he is shot trying to foil a petty crime at a local neighborhood market.
When God decides to destroy Earth, four angels aim to redeem mankind through a young man and woman with their own troubles.
Based on the hit video game "Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge", the movie follows Nathan Zachary and his crusade to avenge the death of his oldest friend "Doc".
A young man, who is being stalked by a cloaked figure, must utilize the help of a mysterious stranger in order to unlock the secrets of his past.

movie_name: What Everyone Says About High School
description: 6 High School students' stories intertwine as they go through their separate struggles while preparing for a peer's party.

A legit-weapons dealer has 3 sons. Shiva is one of them who is subdued by his brothers. He rescues his kidnapped brother only to find himself shot by them. Then he uncovers the mystery of his father's death and takes revenge.
The murder of a recluse by small town religious fanatics forces the dead man's lover, a divorced police detective, to find the remains of his former lover and come to terms with his loss.
A former Confederate officer and a Mexican try to prevent a former Confederate colonel from selling stolen rifles to renegade Apaches in Mexico.
Even after knowing that the girl of his dreams and the one he is in love with has been promised to another man, Sai intends to win over her father's heart to ask him for the girl's hand in marriage.

Welcome ladies and gentlemen to The Midnight Matinee. You will be entertained by five stories of deceit, deception, and of course.......horror. So enter if you dare. And sit back, relax, and enjoy the show.

The rich widow Leila disguises herself as a maid and falls in love with her employer Fergus who is a rich Canadian bachelor. Their wealth depends on each getting married within the next year. Whose fooling who in this comedy love affair?
A corrupt cop makes one wrong decision after another to cover up his misdeads. A remake of Kim Seung-hun's South Korean thriller 'A Hard Day'(2014).
A motley crew of vacationers in New Orleans' French Quarter end up trapped inside a movie theatre where ravenous soul-sucking ghouls descend upon them for a night of pure, unadulterated horror.

Persephone is a beautiful Island noblewoman with a lust for life and taste for the macabre. Death is a decadent intellectual who doesn't recognize what is missing from his existence until he spies Persephone and vows to make her his.
An insurance investigator is visiting Paris on assigment. He is soon made the object of a seduction bet amongst three ladies. Problems arise when the girls realize they are really falling for him.
Three friends throw a party to make their high school dream come true, but when it spirals into a deadly siege they're forced to find out what they'd sacrifice in order to get what they truly want.
The occupants of a van transporting a wounded excursionist have to avoid sitting next to her during the trip.
A lesbian daughter fights off an arranged marriage in India while a religious fundamentalist targets an anti-extremist scholar in New York.
A taxi driver with a tragic past sees an opportunity for redemption when he encounters a woman sold into prostitution. Wanting to help her escape, he has to deal with the wrath of the brothel madam.
Gangster Benson is on a train with G-man Evers and newswoman Marvis. First these two have to get the gangster, then they have to get each other.

movie_name: The Beast and the Magic Sword
description: In the 16th century, lycanthrope Waldemar Daninsky travels from his native Europe to Japan, seeking a way to cure himself of being a werewolf. Only a Japanese sorcerer named Kian and a magic silver sword can save him.
A female CIA agent is assigned to train and lead an all-female squad to Colombia to stop a renegade agent who has hired himself out to a drug cartel.
Monjiro, reunited with his long lost sister, is pursued by a yakuza gang because he killed their boss. He also meets a fellow gambler who idolizes Monjiro.
When teenage rebel nicknamed "Zero" tries to turn his life around, the events on one early summer's night turn for the worse.
When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces.

Five unsuspecting strangers are are trapped in a Los Angeles jail on the anniversary of the 1951 Bloody Christmas riots. They must find a way to stop the vengeful spirits spawned at the violent event before they all die.

During Civil War Reconstruction, the Connelly family is romantically restored to their former glory when Will Connelly marries a Yankee farm girl, Joanna Tate, despite the objects of his temperamental father Bob Connelly.
Expecting to put on a musical show, singing and dancing college students are brought to a struggling hotel to be guinea pigs in an ancient Greek-themed eugenics experiment.
A gnome vigilante terrorizes a bus load of American tourists after their tour bus breaks down in the Canadian wilderness.

"Bonsai Tree" A recently divorced middle aged ex-patriot goes on a world journey in an effort to discover himself. He lands in Paris and begins to discover his true-self through the eyes of a beautiful young French woman.
A young recruit to a mysterious agency of assassins finds himself going rogue on his first assignment, tracking down a dangerous group of human traffickers.
The sole survivor of a blood-drenched massacre must team up with a rag-tag bunch of rookie cops and lawbreakers to defend a police station from an invasion of monsters from another dimension.

Dan leads his friends to the outskirts of town to stage a surprise welcome party for his sister. The friends will go through the test of their lives as each person will eventually realize that there might be no going back home.
Les Hackel is a guy down on his luck who wakes to find an explosive device has been implanted in his neck.

movie_name: The Truth About Jane and Sam
description: Sam, a Singapore guy who works in Hong Kong, falls in love with and opens up the wary character of Jane, a Hong Kong girl.
John Weston leaves his wife and kids to marry adventuress Doris Clark and loses his mind when he realizes his mistake.
The setting is the underground lair of Devil's Gate, home to the ruthless and extremely powerful King Hades Yen.
To earn some quick money through betting, Ravi, a jobless youngster, crosses path with Bittu, a criminal, by foiling his bank heist. Since then, Ravi has to use his wits to escape the wrath of Bittu.
A mattress salesman's plan to adopt a Chinese baby is augmented by the arrival of a young woman who comes to his workplace, falls asleep on one of the beds, and upon waking starts to affect his life.
MPDC officer is only the witness of the cold blooded killing of a stranger and exposing her as the terrorist suspect.
A couple experience an intruder during a night of apocalyptic world events and somehow she knows every detail of their life.
A man convicted of murder breaks out of prison to clear his name and is sought after by every bounty hunter in the business.

Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.
An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.
A traumatized young man seeks revenge on the corrupt officials that have wronged him and his family.
Teenagers accidentally resurrect a satanic killer who targets the local police captain's daughter to birth the antichrist.
A team of U.S. government agents are sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

A 50-year-old unmarried milkwoman Minako one day delivers milk to the house of her first love Takanashi, who is now married and whose wife is terminally ill. This meeting will bring unexpected changes into their lives.
Krishna refuses to accept Kamini's love for him. But when Kamini dies and her ghost possesses Krishna, his wife, Gayatri, tries to save him from this situation.
After being slain for professing his love to a Kingpin's daughter, a young rose gardener returns from beyond the grave to exact revenge on his killers.
A beautiful woman (Mori) decides to transform into an ugly duckling in an attempt to ward off men and avoid more romantic disappointments.
During the Vietnam War, a guerrilla group abducted influential people to demand ransom in favor of the Liberation Front.

After her husband is devastated by a tragic accident, a devoted wife obsesses over a mysterious portrait that resembles him as he was; but when it starts to terrorize her, she must decide if it's possessed or if she's losing her mind.
A reclusive author of spiritual books is pursued for advice by a single mother and a man fresh out of rehab.
A sharp-witted comedy that follows a group of apparent strangers in interlocking stories taking place in ten different bars during the course of one evening throughout Los Angeles.

movie_name: Yakuza deka: Oretachi ni haka wa nai
description: Detective Hayata's friend is killed by criminals at a jewel business. In order to clarify the case, Hayata works in the ranks of local small community with the aim of getting closer to the big bosses responsible for the murder.
A barista that's given up on love serendipitously meets a poet with a past he wishes he could forget.

Genoa, 1945. The war is over but not for 4 partisans who still try to capture the remaining fascists. They are not satisfied with the concept of justice that the new born Italian Republic tries to instigate.
Follows Myriam who is fighting against the construction of a roadblock, and Greg, a police officer who goes undercover to gather intelligence on this movement of protesters.
An International businessman and playboy tries to avenge the death of his girlfriend, who was murdered by a gang of robbers, by entrapping them through a reality TV show.
Bartender on parole gets re-involved with his previous girlfriend, only to discover he's part of her criminal scheme.
Teri Braniston is a quirky stage actress/artist whose failed attempts at romance lead her on a madcap quest for love.

movie_name: A Viking Saga: The Darkest Day
description: Hereward, a novice monk, must deliver the Holy Gospel of Lindisfarne to the safety of the Iona monastery, while being pursued by a Viking death squad hell-bent on its capture.

Carla lives and works in Mexicali, Mexico. When her brother is killed, she's forced to run. In the desert of Imperial Valley, she's now trapped in a deadly game between the CIA, Government Informants, and the Cartel.
A Hollywood screenwriter looking for inspiration for his next film goes to Mexico, where he runs into a beautiful Mexican girl who sets her sights on him.
Two neurotic strangers meet amid an odd group of passengers on the red-eye flight from LA to New York on Valentine's Day.

Kiara, a veteran turned lawyer trying to do good to make up for her past. However, when her informant is murdered, and she is left for dead, Kiara is forced to use the skills from her past to take down the crime lord.
Nandini and Purushottama, who are in love with each other. When they are about to get married, tragedy strikes as Nandini is abducted by a gang.
A group of actors put on an unorthodox, but acclaimed Passion Play which incites the opposition of the Catholic Church while the actors' lives themselves begin to mirror the Passion itself.
When Yoo-mi searches out her mother's friend at a hotel to drop off her younger sister, she falls into unexpected mystery and horror.
Debbie Rochon plays horror hostess, Mistress Misty, and introduces 4 stories about the Grim Reaper in various forms.
"My Dying Heart" is an experimental mystery film that chronicles Jake as he explores his isolation, anxiety, and loss in the midst of a global pandemic.

Two Moscow students are mostly concerned with scoring with women but their lives change radically when one of them falls for a Jewish girl whose family is being persecuted by anonymous anti-Semites and is preparing to emigrate to Israel.

movie_name: Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea
description: Our heroes must protect the Prince of the Sea, Manaphy, from the evil pirate Phantom, and return the young Pokémon to the Sea Temple with the help of the the People of the Water and Jackie the Pokémon Ranger.
Two marginal youths who are friends fail miserably on their first drug transaction. Risking their lives, they embark on an uncontrolled crime spree in order to repay the money within two days.
Sibling rivalry takes a deadly turn when a young man's jealousy of his adopted brother pushes him to the breaking point.
A Los Angeles crime saga focuses on a detective who turns his back on his drug lord younger brother.

Recovering from a psychological breakdown a college professor returns to her small hometown. But there is an evil that resides there. What starts as noises in the night becomes actual presence lurking in the dark. But is it in her mind?
When five robbers robbed a bank, they thought that the robbery itself was the hardest part of the job, but soon they came to realize that one of them decided to be smart and play a double game.
In this romantic comedy, several friends, each dealing with unhappy love lives, turn to each other for help - but not always with the best results.

movie_name: Rite of Passage: The Steamfunk Movie
description: It's the tale of the city of Nicodemus, Kansas and the special souls that have gathered to protect it.
A sister and brother discover their grandmother acting strangely upon traveling to tell her of their mother's (her daughter) passing.
An engineering college student invents the first of its kind robot in the Middle East, in an attempt to avenge his father's death and achieve justice, which gets him pursued by the authorities.
Upon his return home to wed a chosen bride, Ikenna meets and instantly falls in love with another maiden.

When a couple of low life thugs get away from a heist they just pulled they never think about the outcome after stashing there money in the woods only to find a woodsman who will do anything to kill and disappear into the night.
A documentary filmmaker, his assistant, a grieving widower, and a hermit cross paths with the legendary "Boss of the Forest".

The story begins with Ye Zhenyun and Yechuan, uncle and nephew, coming to find opportunities in Guangzhou, and meeting university student Liu Fang along their journey, during China's initial reform period.
Dr Murali finds out that Venu, the patient he is treating, is his former lover Sita's husband. Knowing that Sita would commit suicide if he dies, Murali dedicates himself to saving Venu.

movie_name: Invasion of the Not Quite Dead
description: Sam Peterson returns home after 15 years to find all is not 'WELL' nor what it seems in his home town.

A man is haunted my sins of of his father when he and his ex-wife become trapped in a derelict sanitarium for one night. A series of ghostly visions push our heroes to point of madness. Can they survive until dawn?

movie_name: Ai no kotodama: sekai no hatemade
description: Hirofumi and Shinji are colleagues at the same advertising agency. Hirofumi works in IT, and Shinji is on the company's elite fast track. The two start off completely on the wrong feet, but later find themselves falling for each other.
L'Inferno (1911) was the first Italian feature production in history. It was originally filmed in black and white and as a silent film.
Two Navy SEALS, Trevor and Doug, are sent to an abandoned island in search of a package, but instead of being the hunters, they find they are being hunted. During their escape they come .
A woman haunted by her abusive past discovers that the monster of her childhood nightmares is real and closer than she ever imagined.
An international expedition is sent into Cambodia to destroy an ancient formula that turns men into zombies.
With the death of her partner Nancy, Finn must raise their daughter alone while receiving death threats at the abortion clinic Nancy founded.
After years on the run for deserting their clan, a dysfunctional ninja family, who tries to live a quiet ordinary life, is forced back into action to rescue one of their own.

Kumaran, who is from a poor family, and Lakshmi, a rich girl, fall in love with each other. However, when Lakshmi's father learns about their love affair, he tries every possible way to separate them.
Prabhu is a no-good wastrel who abuses his friendship with Srinivas by sharing his room and money. Srinivas genuinely loves Anjali, their neighbour. But, Prabhu manipulates her into hating Srinivas.

A band of mercenaries led by Captain Curry travel through war-torn Congo across deadly terrain, battling rival armies, to steal $50 million in uncut diamonds. But infighting, sadistic rebels and a time lock jeopardize everything.
Two suicidal girls become friends and try to help each other with reasoning out their problems, while searching for boyfriends.
A woman who loses a lover and suffers from a taste disorder knows the secret habit of a young man in a florist who can not overcome his death.
Bodies stack high when a group of hooligans break into a tiny unassuming grocery store and end up the newest victims of a family of depraved and sadistic serial killers.
The comic misadventures of two young boys and an anti-militaristic grocer who are recruited under protest for naval training.

Jung-jin is a criminal profiler and Yoo-min is a detective. They are called to the special investigation headquarter for a secret meeting, where they receive an order to take down the untouchable boss of a criminal organization.

movie_name: The Bloody Slaying of Sarah Ridelander
description: A serial killer murders a businessman's wife, then blackmails the man into procuring young girls for him to murder. The businessman hires a gang of renegade motor-cyclists to kidnap girls for him.
A paranoid teenage nerd comes to believe that an escaped lunatic may be hiding in the neighborhood Halloween house of horrors, and slowly starts to descend into madness.

The Mexican Government follows the tracks of a suspected terrorist into the U.S only to find themselves in the crossfire of something absolutely horrific and sickening and the first problem of its kind.
For rookie cop Linda Blair and serial killer Clive Barker, the biggest challenge they'll both face, is looking in the mirror.
Police officers team up in order to stop not only a group of corrupt cops from providing automatic weapons to L.A. gangs, but to try and stop the gangs from destroying a city.
Two geeky video bloggers are sucked into a truly awful Z movie. On their return to the real world, they discover they have been pursued by the tropes of the trashy films they adore.

The first child in 25 years has been born; he's a miracle, but the rebels vow to kill him; his parents are forced to put their trust in strangers to save his life because the world's fate is in their hands.
A kung Fu expert travels to America to take out a gang of mysterious villains responsible for the murder of his best friend.
When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.
Reporter Clint Harrison is sent to investigate a massacre at a Louisiana campground and finds that it may be linked to the Dansen clan an old local family thought to have died out years ago.
The gateway into your world is not made of iron or wood. It is flesh...human flesh. And it is sin...mortal sin...that unlocks it.
A young woman comes to discover just how far she will go to achieve immortality while receiving the role of a lifetime in a mysterious stage play said to be cursed.

movie_name: Outlaw Street Cars: Death or Glory
description: Street Racing at it's best. This film will take you closer than you will ever be to the danger and excitement of the street racing underground. Girls, gambling and guns are a way of life for these kids.

The story plot centers around one woman (RUBY) the Protagonist of the film, and her parents MARK and BETTY, despite the many overwhelming obstacles, near death tragedies, physical abduction...                See full synopsis »

A young 19-year old girl Anastasia (O.Bobyleva) comes to a big Siberian construction site. She dreams of being a welder, but at the moment there are no vacancies, and she has to begin her ...                See full synopsis »
Sylvia Walton returns from Harlem to take over a Jamaican plantation from her vindictive half-sister, amid the growing sound of drums.
A retired ex-criminal, the notorious Mister X, must clear his name when an up-and-comer commits a heinous copycat crime.

In a violent and corrupt prison, decorated cop Louis Burke must infiltrate the jail to find answers to a number of inside murders. What he finds is a struggle of life and death tied in to his own past.

Jai Kishen decides to join police force and marry Naina against his parents wishes. On the other side MLA Sadakhare along with Pandey brothers hires Sikander Supari and plan a bomb blast .But will Jai be able to solve the case ?
Erich Bauermann is a smart, young, good-looking guy (he thinks). His life becomes troublesome, when he first meets a very unusual woman and an even more unusual bank robber.
A reformed sociopath journeys to a remote island to investigate the mystery behind his brother's demise, but soon ends up facing off with more than he bargained for.

"Cantante Cornelio Reyna regresa Guadalajara a proponerle matrimonio a su novia de la infancia Silvia. Esto deprime a uno de los pretendientes de Silvia, quien pronto va a desatar una serie de infortunios"
A childhood injustice and given responsibility set the son of an assassinated tribe leader on a deadly path of revenge for his father and justice for his tribe.

A hired assassin goes rouge, killing her sister, to expose the boss, her mother's empire of murderous corruption and uncovers a small town's dark secret while fighting emotions for her partner and hiding from her boss' wrath.

A wager is made, a book of horror fiction is written. It becomes know as, "Frankenstein, or a Modern Prometheus", by Mary Shelley. Though what happens if fiction was fact? Can a soul be immortal. Is everlasting life worth such misery?
When a man falls for a sexy bombshell he finds himself an accomplice to her particular predilection: cannibalism.
The story of Sir Miles O'Hara and his daughter, who rent out living quarters to a poor family, the O'Sheas, who cannot pay rent on time.
Hillbillies with internet access use a website to lure sportsmen to their isolated cabin with the promise of cheap room and board, then release them into the woods and hunt them.

Rebel forces, influenced by the advice of a witch doctor to attack Kurume, find two "gifted" children with albinism, whose blood will help bring them victory. Can these two kids continue to live their lives and dreams under the sun?

Five fellons are running from justice in search of freedom. During their escape, they run into María Flores who joins them on their journey. They will do what it takes to cross the border ...                See full synopsis »
A troupe of beautiful young dancers find themselves stranded in a sinister, spooky old castle, not knowing that it is home to a group of vampires.
On a tropical island shooting a bikini calendar, 5 models become infected by a mystery virus, causing them to hallucinate and attack one another, including their rescuers once they become stranded.
A young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring. Her sister Windsor begins training under a respected ex-fighter as she searches for the killer.
A love-struck man discovers he has an incurable illness shortly after meeting the woman of his dreams.
His wit and cunning, his agility and daring, his gun and knife, these are his allies against death that lurks in every corner.
Linked by a rare psychological disorder, Noah Greene and Emily Gates must uncover the mystery of a tragic past in order to find hope for the future.

Tanner Hall is a vivid peek into the private world of an all-girls boarding school. In a cozy, but run-down New England, the knot of adolescent complexity is unraveled through the coming-of-age stories of four teenage girls.
An anthology of stories involving meth addicted white supremacists, a man looking for his kidnapped wife and an Elvis impersonator.

A young woman is hired as a theater usherette and encounters her matinée idol, who helps her become a hit, and soon she finds herself engaged to another man, prompting a battle of romantic wits ensues.
An obsessive food collector, determined not to desecrate his precious vittles, resorts to the alarming act of cannibalism.

Bullied Jotia throws heavy stone to an incredibly long distance and attracts the interest of the world records committee. But, the only motivation for wannabe record-holder is to be told swear-word again.
A teen age girl enters the nightmares of disturbed patients at her father's clinic and is hunted by a serial killer.

A young girl Vesna goes on a skiing vacation to Slovenian Alps, where she is being looked after by her aunt. Her family gets worried when they meet Vesna's boyfriend, and try to marry the couple thinking that she may be pregnant with him.
Personalities and relationships are made and un-made in this story about dance contests and the contestants. Precode romances in this short-ish B film from Warner Brothers.

Nick Rainwood and Allie Yorpin are a modern day Romeo and Juliet living in southern California, separated by the unbridgeable gulf of their backgrounds and torn between loyalty to their "gangs" and their real desires.

After moving to an isolated cabin, Jacob Taylor vanishes without a trace. With the help of footage he leaves behind, his family members, friends and a detective try to find answers to the strange events that are centered around him.
Set in San Francisco, The Market Street 6 chronicles the final hours of six people who are forced to evacuate a subway train.
A Paleogeneticist and Mother tries to cure her son using DNA from a cloned dinosaur. Trouble ensues when the pharmaceutical company tries to take it all away before she can save her son.
A child murderer and black magic practitioner transfers his soul to a doll before death and wreaks havoc in the lives of the doll's new owners: a boy and his elder sister.
A gentle, sweet, funny, romantic story of love in later life following a couple in their sixties, Dave and Fern, who get to know one another over the course of 23 dog walks.
A young girl is the sole survivor of an attack on her temple. She learns taekwondo from a local merchant. Taking the name 'The Invincible Young-chun', she sets out on a quest for vengence.
A New York City cab driver in need of $200 picks up a movie star in his cab, and schemes to get the money from her.
A rich Greek-American spends his holidays in Greece with his daughter. The entrepreneur was a surgeon, but he abandoned his profession, considering himself responsible for the death of a boy.
A connection of murders take two detectives on a sick and disturbing ride using twisted clues as the only link to find the killer.

Emily is sent to work and live in the Sovereign's castle. She manages to escape into the woods, where she meets some lively hookers. Together they become «Robber Girls» taking a stand and fighting the patriarchy.
An irresponsible Utah student body president faces impeachment as he attempts to sweet-talk his way into Yale.
Papas is the story of Priest who ventures on a dark and emotional journey after laying down his faith in God to find the killers of his little sister Eleni.
A family leverages their nest-egg purchasing a century-old house in Roe County, but the deal comes with strings.
Mehmet, who decides to take revenge on Ekrem and Reyhan as soon as he is released from prison, is forced to face facts he does not know.
A young man Ajay (cancer victim) meets two lovely women Renu (wife) and Vidya (journalist) in his life.
A look at life on the streets focuses on Hispanic brothers who operate on opposite sides of the law in crime-riddled East Los Angeles.
A con man must pass himself off as the owner of a château on the French Riviera when he is expected to host his estranged daughter's wedding.
When some college students get together for a hot tub party, they're shocked to find out that their party is being crashed by some tiny, uninvited guests who are hungry for flesh - human flesh.
A girl falls in love with her classmate. While everything seems right, a worker starts dreaming of marrying her and another classmate tries the same by force.
On their release from prison, two criminals join forces to prove the innocence of a wrongfully convicted fellow prisoner and in the process, also learn the truth about their own missing parents.
A Bachelorette weekend goes awry when the girls are robbed, stranded, and forced to take shelter in a deserted Mexican resort that is haunted by the unspeakable atrocities of past.

An American couple on a business trip to Bangalore, India is dragged into the theft of a ruby called 'Bloodstone'. The wife is kidnapped, and the husband teams up with a resourceful taxi driver to free his wife and retrieve the ruby.
With cards in his left - a sword in his right - a gleam in his eye - he's out to get the man responsible for the death of his father.

Cosme, a boy of fifteen, lives with his parents and his sister in a terraced house. The monotony of his life changes when he falls in love with his neighbor Merche, a beautiful woman who is almost twenty years older than he.
On her eighteenth birthday, a woman is granted by Satan the power to make all of her sexual desires reality.
A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.
A young man is trapped in a post-apocalyptic shack with his father. The radiation and atmospheric conditions of the world outside make them prisoners of their own home.
At Passover, Reuben, a French-Jewish man living in Finland with his Nordic boyfriend, finds himself back in Paris with his zany family after a lovers' quarrel.
Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop a zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatens to destroy humanity itself.
A college student joins a group of friends on vacation and returns as the only survivor of a deadly massacre.
An exasperated husband hires a fading playboy to seduce his annoying wife in order to speed up a separation from her.
In a post-Apocalyptic world after an atomic war seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.
Perennially unlucky in love, twenty-something single girl Steph decides to embark on a dating app adventure whilst attending yet another friend's wedding alone.
The human tragedy and the suffering of the Crimean Turks who were taken hostage as prisoners of war in German prison camps during World War II.
In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.
The story of a good guy who happens to indulge in bad deeds due to circumstances. Later, he realizes his mistakes and tries to find the way back to just deeds.
Swiss Professor Raimund Gregorius (Jeremy Irons) abandons his lectures and buttoned-down life to embark on a thrilling adventure that will take him on a journey to the very heart of himself.
Stockholm 1956. The Swedish botanist, candidate and lieutenant Nils von Ekelöw, presents his research to a panel of professors.
A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.
A hit man is sprung from jail to kill a socialite, but strikes up a romance with a pretty parole officer instead.
A group of friends went to shoot their film project, but never returned. A few days later, their camera was found.
An aspiring actress is haunted by her past and future during the production of a low-budget horror movie about a killer ramekin.
A US weapons manufacturer tests its 4 killer robots on heroin producers in the Golden Triangle in SEAsia. It goes haywire.

A drama centered on a Russian soldier who wants to defect to the West and a young Czech whose dreams of going to England to pick strawberries for the summer are dashed when Soviet tanks converge on Prague in August 1968.
A girl bumps into a handsome and good-looking young man, who later joins her brother's workshop. For her it's love at first sight but he doesn't reciprocate. She is not the one to give up.

When a young woman relocates to a small town in Europe, she notices the place has something weird. As time goes by, she starts to fear for her life. Based on actual events and in the book the day she became plastic.
The story of this action-packed road movie centers around to unequal brothers, a suitcase with stolen documents, the local mob and a bunch of weird characters they meet along the road.
In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

Emily's arrives for her first night-shift as a care-giver, to an elderly dementia patient. In an isolated house her night turns into a nightmare as she is tormented by a vengeful spirit, and starts to uncover the house's dark secrets.
A woman is accused of murder by her aunt, gets arrested, and saves her innocence through her boyfriend.
A war vet with severe PTSD is threatened by a online video gamer crew for being too good at beating them. He finds out about a personal connection to him that makes him snap.
Pandiyan is a police officer whose sister's husband goes missing. In order to find him and catch the culprits, he goes undercover.
Two ronin - an ex-samurai and an ex-farmer - get caught up in a local official's complex game of murder and betrayal.

A woman marries a gambler, thinking she could straighten him up, but he loses all their assets, even their own house, and tries to commit suicide. But one of the winners falls for his stepdaughter, and this could change the situation.

A bookkeeper who wants to marry the company's secretary, is strapped for cash, and gets fired after persuading the boss's son to elope with his sweetheart, ultimately uncovers a crime and discovers that he owns property worth $100,000.

A retired world champion fighter is lured to a secret location in an effort to rescue his abducted wife. He is now a part of their game. He is a part of the show. Fight, to live. Lose, you die. Once you check in, there is no way home.

The El Condor, the fabled Mexican stronghold rumoured to contain Emperor Maximilian's mythical reserves in gold, will attract two adventurous fortune seekers, who with eyes gleaming with desire, will shortly know that only fools rush in.

It would seem that Marie has it all: a loving husband, a charming child, and a good job. But something elusive with a terrific force continues to pull her to another life to another man. (French with English subtitles).

After narrowly escaping the clutches of a deadly stalker, a young woman flees to a remote town where she rebuilds her life and finds the man of her dreams...until the man of her nightmares tracks her down.
