description: This film is about one's attitude toward other people. If one recognizes that others can see what he or she can't see, one would appreciate the existence of others more and be more humble to others.
A detective goes undercover and poses as a gangster to infiltrate a powerful criminal organization connected to a large drug deal.

Lina is strong willed and self confident due to her life without a man on her farm. Still she longs for the man in her life, but have never seen the opportunity to live out her longing. But then Gilbert is back after 20 years in America.

movie_name: Let Me Make You a Martyr
description: A cerebral revenge film about two adopted siblings who fall in love, and hatch a plan to kill their abusive father.
Amir who was in jail for a murder gets free after twelve years behind bars and finds that now there is a huge gap between his generation and his brothers'.
A drifter and a faded film star, both traumatized by Hollywood, arrive to the guy's hometown, where the old bitter memories revive again.
A couple becomes hostage when a frantic soldier takes over their house. This social drama depicts the state of the Israeli society following the devastating 1984 war.
A look at the relationship between a young blind samurai (Kimura) and his wife, who will make a sacrifice in order to defend her husband's honor.
Fate unites 4 different people with different situations and brings a little bit of surprise into their lives.
A romance between a soldier and a country boy, wrapped around a Thai folk-tale involving a shaman with shape-shifting abilities.

movie_name: There Are No Kangaroos in Austria
description: The story of Austrian art history student Lena and economist James explores the potential outcomes of that first conversation. It's a tour de force of Scotland, an homage to seizing the day and the adventure of love.
Vijay falls in love with Soniya in the dancing school where both are dance instructors. Thakur who is a confirmed bachelor is also drawn towards Savitri Devi; who is being impersonated by Soniya.

Diana O'Toole has a perfect life, she's climbing in her career, and she and her boyfriend, Finn, are about to embark on a romantic getaway to the Galápagos. Everything is about to change when Finn has to stay back in the city.
Yen Yuejun works as a truck driver in Mongolia and marries Ling Ling but his love for her has to be sacrificed because of his passion for Chinese opera.
A family of ragtag vagabonds sets up a makeshift home on a Florida beach after becoming marooned there, prompting an uptight local bureaucrat to attempt to evict them.

movie_name: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
description: A group of motorists witnesses a car crash in the California desert, and after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, they turn against each in a race across the state to get to it.
Bodies begin to pile up the moment George Adam's wife leaves town for the weekend. George's past comes back to him, but its nothing like his current life in a safe, calm suburban home.
A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

Two childhood best friends take a gap year from university with the desire to seek an adventure. They find themselves in the midst of a deadly pandemic leaving them on a secluded island. Their adventure turns into a fight for survival.
An aging actress living in her Hollywood mansion with a retinue of elderly servants employs a new, mentally disturbed, personal assistant who schemes to take over the large estate.
Priye hides her feelings from her best friend. Each moment away from him brings pain and clouds her thinking. What will she do?

FBI agent Jeff Gordon is to investigate the theft of a US missile prototype. The suspect Anderson, however, is found dead. Jeff Gordon's only lead is the photograph of a woman that Gordon finds among Anderson's papers.

No Means No is a cross-genre action-packed, teenage musical love story, a courtroom drama that's more like the thrill of a roller-coaster ride as each twist and turn begins to unravel to reach a conclusion that calls out for justice.
A team of thieves use a drug that allows them to trade consciousnesses with their future-selves in order to steal tomorrow's secrets.
From the producers of SAW, VLOG is a groundbreaking extreme-horror film about a real-life webcam girl whose online murder is not what it seems.
One Army captain must use her years of tactical training and military expertise when a simultaneous coordinated attack threatens the remote missile interceptor station she is in command of.
Five black urban strangers acquire powers while in a hospital. Hidden in general population four of the strangers are requested to stop the maniacal fifth.
A young American takes a trip to Russia in search of a bride, but when he meets the girl of his dreams he must survive to get back home.

In a vehicle for energetic musical star Marika Rokk, she is unwilling to pose as an artist's model, until an act of male deception is contrived. There is a dance number involving a lady cursed to wear a mask, until love redeems her.

movie_name: The Exiles: Ivy and Maxim Litvinov
description: A high-ranking Russian-Jewish diplomat works against the clock to convince complacent and greedy political leaders of Hitler's murderous intentions before it is too late.
In the present day two agents working in the clandestine services of their respective nations meet to cooperate and discover they have a linked past of ninja ancestry, and could be enemies.
After a young woman witnesses the murder of her sugar daddy, she finds herself caught in the middle of a twisted game of life and death.
A group of friends on a stag weekend in the mountains of Argentina are picked off by a dark force called "The Hunter", but all is not what it seems.
An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.
Following a series of unresolved robberies, the authorities decide to give Carte Blanche to the Commander Clara Damico to neutralize a particularly organized gang.
This film is about a woman who has been betrayed by her own husband and she is now planning a revenge with a camcorder.This Film Carries a Message for Today's Man Dominating Society.
The Captain of the search and rescue vessel "Gemini-Wolf", has been hired to complete a rescue operation in deep space.

A young girl is drawn back to the village where her father went on a killing spree fifteen years earlier to the day of this solar eclipse. At first, it seems disturbingly quiet. Then all hell breaks loose...

A group of college students go on holiday, the aspiring photographer in the group buys a camera that was used by a crime photographer. For years it captured violence and death, now it has a new purpose and a new owner to work with.

With his career failing, a vain YouTuber believes he can get famous making paranormal videos. But when a mysterious creature starts eating his crew, he must let go of his pride before it consumes them all.
On the night of the apocalypse, a young couple spends their last hours struggling to stay alive long enough to be together before the end.

movie_name: Blade Maiden and the Platinum Assassin
description: A timid gamer obsessed with playing an assassin mistakenly posts a boastful profile on the Facebook for killers becoming the target of the world's deadliest assassins.
Afro-Supernatural spin about a downtrodden heroine's quest to save her teenage son from joining an intergalactic pusher-woman planning a zombie cannibal Armageddon.
After his wife is shot and daughter kidnapped, a Marine veteran and recent amputee has his consciousness transferred into an unmanned combat drone in an attempt to save his daughter.
A hard living dreamer is tasked with looking after her uptight sister's three privileged kids for the weekend. What's the worst that could happen?

Forced to choose between the woman he loves and the dangerous, fast-paced life of motorcycles, what will our hero do? Will he toss the bike aside and pick the girl? Or will he leave the girl in favor of the bike?

In 1972, the patients and doctors at Stephens Sanitarium were brutally murdered. Over forty years later, the only known survivor returns only to find the ghosts of the past have not been resting in peace.

Arvid and Lilli Ekman is a senior couple with one single adult son, Arne. They find out that the son is secretly engaged with the young Margit Berg - and that they already have a three-year-old son together.

Great Britain in 1720. Sophia is raised in the forest to be a fantastic warrior and hunter who fights against slavery. Action and adventure ensue with political intrigue in Britain when the first Prime Minister wins power.
Anne wants to quit her job at the Glossy because she can't write the way she wants, but when she gets to work together with the handsome Rick she changes her mind.

movie_name: Once Upon A Time in Australia
description: After her indigenous mother and adopted Chinese father are murdered, Marli seeks vengeance against those responsible and all the psychopaths who stand in her way.

Rémy is a young Parisian with an unskilled job. Mélanie is a young Parisienne who works in scientific research. Two depressive moods living in close proximity, but being unaware of each other. Will they ever meet?
When a man finds himself in a snowstorm, he is forced to retreat in an isolated household where things are not as they seem
Her vacation turns into a horrible nightmare for a young female doctor Laura when a nuclear meltdown in the nearby power plant destroys everything she believed in. And it's not over yet.
An Oakland widower's thirst for justice is rekindled when a local killing is oddly similar to his wife's unsolved murder from decades ago.
When a group of Sorority girls become the latest targets of a serial killer, they decide to fight back full force and show him they're not the helpless victims he assumed they were.
Student girl goes to a mansion in Petrópolis, Brazil, to babysit two children, while their parents are away for the weekend, and is terrorized by anonymous phonecalls originating in the house.
Freely inspired in Hitchcock's Vertigo, tells the story of Ramiro, a fat depressed journalist hired to look for a Chilean rock legend.
After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

Mongols with the help of an insider, ambush the influential Yang Family, defenders of the dynasty. The Mongols must hunt down all Yang survivors so their insidious plot to overthrow the dynasty will not be uncovered.
The life of private eye, Mort Madison, is spiraling downward, when a beguiling, slightly familiar woman hires him for his most unusual case.
A suspected suicide turns mysterious when the victim, the worlds most famous singer, returns to do one final concert...Live.
With the Feds and a journalist closing in on the fentanyl-laced drugs dealer, Uzi, an ex-Mossad agent, wastes no time and wages an act of revenge on the responsible supplier's network.

Following the courageous military medical evacuation "medevac" lives of our service men and women. Sarah Winters is determined to complete her mission, even after receiving devastating news from back home.
An adaptation of Shakespeare's play set in a modern day high school. Cast and crew was comprised entirely of students from East Hollywood High School in Salt Lake City, UT.
Two Treasury agents after an income-tax evader track him to a ski resort high in the mountains, and wind up getting involved in a series of murders.

Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna.

Fascinated from childhood with the myth of Lilith, Milena has devoted her life to the search for immortality at any cost. The arrival by ship of a strange box from China coincides with the death of some children in the city.

For decades, Pennhurst psychiatric hospital has been haunted by turbulent supernatural forces. When a television crew embarks on a mission to capture this paranormal activity, they discover something completely unexpected.

A toothpick manufacturer is so sports-minded that only athletes can work for him. The fate of many jobs and the outcome of various romances all depend on whether or not the home-team wins the big soccer game.
Follows 3 actresses who play themselves as they appear on a paranormal television show to investigate the exorcism of the Kaneda family.

movie_name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
description: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.
A dangerous contract killer arrives in London to hunt down a weapons engineer, but discovers the deeper truth behind his mission.
Sam-dol takes revenge on the five gangsters who killed his brother by tracking them down one-by-one.
A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

An accident will force 'Vivien' and Royan to come to a stop and reclaim their lives, one minute at the time, and finally start living in a present that perhaps will prove to be more exciting than any predefined.

movie_name: Heisei fuzoku-shi: Ano toki mo kimi wa ero katta
description: The Showa period was ending and the era was about to change to the Heisei period. Newlyweds Chikage and Ryuhei argued over trivial matters, but at night they made up for it with sex.

A renegade DEA operative, on the run from law enforcement and the Mexican drug cartel he double-crossed, finally gets held accountable for his sins by the ghosts of his past -- both the living, and the Dead.
Days before graduation, two college best friends go on one last road trip where they settle how they really feel for each other. But to put it upfront, this is not a love story.
A Nazi scientist and a woman known as a "spider goddess" attempt to develop a nerve gas made from spider venom.
An notorious business man comes to eliminate alibhai and his people from palayam market science he has childhood enemies.
The uncredited adaptation of Stefan Zweig's novel (1922), made five years before Max Ophüls' more widely recognized "Letter from an Unknown Woman" (1948).
Poltergeist Encounters is a found-footage horror film, set in an empty suburban home, filled with dark secrets.
A New York chorus girl (Madeleine Carroll) comes home to claim her family plantation and must choose between two men (Fred MacMurray, Sterling Hayden), one rich, one not.

A drama set in a border town gambling saloon. The owner falls in love with a promiscuous young girl. When she has an affair with another, he tosses her out of town. She gets revenge by marrying his younger brother.
A drug-dealing teenager tries to break free from the trade before college, but gets dragged back in when a deal goes south.
A teenage boy moves to a small New Hampshire town with his mother, only to discover that it is being run by an ancient Satanic coven.
WESTERNIZED KOREANESS= HYBRIDIZATION AND, LOVE is a serie composed of 6 videos featuring archetypal characters, interpreters of «love-stories» in which we find the characteristics of Korean dramas.

Santiago de Chile, Carmen (35) takes a trip for work to the neighboring city of Mendoza, Argentina. An unfinished love story. "what is" and "what could be", "lived experience" and "imagined" two roads crossing finally becoming one.

Set in the 1980s, an estranged family hires a cult deprogrammer to take back their teenage son from a murderous cult, but find themselves under siege when the cultists surround their cabin, demanding the boy back.

Five City slickers go on a weekend hunting trip that they will never forget, if they come out alive. Being on the wrong side of a property line can be deadly, especially when your standing in the middle of a southern family feud.
Mario is a master in the art of pranking but not so much in the art of love. After years of searching for 'The One' he finds her, but all great love stories have complications.
Jade Leung, a deadly and gorgeous cop, teams with another sexy policewoman Ellen Cheng, track arms dealers in Singapore.
International students at an elite Prague school are stalked and murdered while holding a party in an abandoned water park.
A group of terrorists kills the Indian Home Secretary Rajan Varma's nephew. NSG Officer Shyam is appointed to protect Rajan's sister Usha and her daughter.

Claire and Benoît arrive in the countryside to sell the family house in which Claire's brother recently committed suicide. Claire, from the first evening, is convinced that they are not alone in the house.

Set during the Civil War, two women will stop at nothing to get the justice they seek: Anna Hoyt, out to kill the man who caused her sister's death, and Hattie Virgil, a slave who will guide them in exchange for her chance at freedom.
A single mother juggles corporate and call girl demands, but things get jiggly when an old flame re-enters her life.
When three romantic couples win tickets to the Terror Ship, a haunted tour attraction on a decommissioned WWII battleship, they find themselves trapped and stalked by a real, serial killer.

Dick Hallan, a journalist for the Herald-Tribune gets mixed up in international politics through a series of incredible coincidences and is finally coerced by the CIA (not really) to follow the intrigue to its unremarkable end.

A poor young man, working hard, manages and becomes a captain on a ship of the shipowner, in whose home his mother worked older as a shipwreck. But he resigns when he discovers that the ship is dangerous.
Young South Seas native boy is sent to the U.S. for his education, returns to his island after his father dies to try to stop a revolution.

Nikola watches as her friends are murdered by a gang of bikers for unwittingly photographing their crimes. But fate is not set as Nikola uses the power of an ancient coven to bring them back to life to exact revenge and obtain immortality.
After the death of his mother, a man agrees to travel to Europe as a tourist guide falls in love with the head of the agency.

A rational professor is sent to Africa to dispel the myth of an evil presence by a wealthy property mogul. After arriving at a large Victorian-built house, he is met by something he could never have expected.

Former Scissor Gang leader Eun-jin (Shin Eun-kyung), who now suffers from amnesia, nevertheless defends Jae-cheol (Jun Gyu Park), a restaurateur who employs her, from a gangster who wants his business.
A doctor hunts a vicious, man-eating tiger that terrorizes a native jungle village. In time the doctor experiences a personal change when he accepts their native customs and beliefs.
It follows Robert Sand, an American soldier in Japan who learns the most powerful martial arts, and embarks on a mission to stop dangerous forces who threaten everything he holds dear.
A grieving British girl unravels her murdered mother's secrets connected to a South African witch doctor's curse.
When a young man becomes possessed after playing a Ouija game,a ghost hunter investigates the evil spirit dwelling within him.
A black boy, orphaned by a Chicago gangster, grows up on a ranch in Wyoming. Fate compels him to learn "some bad blood can only be settled face to face - in a shootout."

An affectless writer is lured to a couples weekend getaway by his wife and friends, only to uncover a tumultuous secret and a perilous obsession that threaten to change the course of his life in intense and surprising ways.
Cheatin' Hearts is a seductive romance about a husband (Greg) and wife (Shawnda) whom after 6 years of marriage find themselves straying outside of their union.
After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.
A woman is possessed by the Angel Of Death and marries a rich business man in order to acquire his soul.
Returned soldier Ben Cross is a man who will stop at nothing to find his missing sister and save her from a serial killer deep in the Australian outback.
Three students at a Swedish university make a discovery that will change their lives forever. A story about love, ambition and finding yourself.
A court-room drama in which Robert Strickland (Bert Lytell) finds himself on trial for the murder of his friend.
Pan Zicai wants to arrange a marriage for his daughter that will gain him an appointment to the court but his daughter loves a young man without influence.
A young, second-generation Asian-American woman struggling with her cultural identity finds love in the arms of an Indian immigrant while carrying out her deceased grandmother's wishes in Macau.
A young TV-news presenter and his producer end up bringing evil into their own homes when they cover a case of demonic possession.
A Comedy/Horror feature film about two dysfunctional filmmakers who go out to uncover the truth behind sightings of a black panther in the English countryside
A story about a young man tempted to kill his rival for a girl, only to find out that he may be his illegitimate son. The story is set in XIX century Dubrovnik.

When a small-town raffle goes wrong, the Christmas tradition of generosity becomes endangered. Two strangers must split the grand prize. But how does one exactly go about sharing a Portuguese Water puppy?
A discharged soldier's home comes under siege when leaked info about a military cover-up is traced back to him.
When five young women gather to play a witch-themed board game, they begin to suspect one of them may actually be a witch.
A good man tries to help a blind girl to see again but he doesn't have enough money for the operation.

movie_name: Return of the Living Dead: Rave to the Grave
description: A college student creates a drug called "Z" and sells it on campus, inadvertently resurrecting the living dead, who wreak havoc at a Halloween rave.
Lance Hayward, a silent movie star, appears as various characters, killing quite a handful of unfortunates, using various weapons.
The story of a happy-go lucky country bumpkin whose life takes a strange and hilarious turn when he suddenly inherits a fortune.
Newly-dumped thirtysomethings Peter and Emma team up to sabotage their exes' new relationships and win them back for good.
A group of high school students are afflicted by an STD known as "teen plague" or "the bug." Symptoms may include flaky skin, rash, growing a new limb or turning into a new kind of creature.
Bhadran, an efficient police officer, fights against all the injustice in the society. He faces many challenges when he encounters Devarajan, a smuggler.
He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate group frames him up and massacres his family.

It follows an unemployed actress as she tries to run away from Christmas, but she is offered a commercial by a lonely ad exec if she convinces his Christmas-obsessed staff to finish an ad campaign on Christmas Eve.
A horde of murderous crab monsters descend on a sleepy coastal town on Prom night, and only a ragtag group of outcasts can save the day.
A frozen Ming Dynasty royal guard and the equally frigid rapist-killer he's tracking are thawed out in modern-day Hong Kong.
In the near future, mental time traveling will be invented. A hitman will use this untested technology to prevent the murder of an innocent person caused by a conflicted gangster.
A luckless architect discovers a social activist to be his lucky charm. Unfortunately, she's protecting the community center he's aiming to win a contract to tear down.
Two bumbling hustlers in the 1920s attempt to gain the fortune of an heiress. Nothing will stop them, not even murder.
A deadly pathogen is unleashed and unknowingly carried to Dana Overbeck's 30th birthday party, where her estranged father, Rufus, is coming to make amends.

A love story between an Argentinian model and a Hungarian mafia guy who can not reveal his real identity. Her curiosity and obsession took her to spy him and find out a whole different world that she didn't know that can possibly exist.
Cowboy is wrongly accused of a bank robbery, or is he ? The courts story of what happened is different from his story....Did he or did he not, that is the question. You'll have to figure it out.

After a breakup, Wes ends up at a remote rest stop. He finds himself locked inside the bathroom with a mysterious figure speaking from an adjacent stall. Soon Wes realizes he is involved in a situation more terrible than he could imagine.

Damien lives with his mother Marianne, a doctor, while his father is on a tour of duty abroad. He is bullied by Thomas, whose mother is ill. The boys find themselves living together when Marianne invites Thomas to come and stay with them.

movie_name: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
description: The untold story behind Helm's Deep, hundreds of years before the fateful war, telling the life and bloodsoaked times of its founder, Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan.
A comedy set in a traditional neighborhood where a young mechanic working in a workshop falls in love with an engineering student and tries to get close to her but fails.
After waking up in a refrigerated meat locker, a man engages in a battle of wits with his captors, a group of Russian gangsters.
Chanti who gets beaten up black and blue is rescued by a girl who takes care of him in the hospital, till he gets fine. He falls for this unknown girl. Will he ever find her and convey his feelings?
When his only son dies in an accident, Balraaj urges his depressed daughter-in-law to marry a man who has long loved her in silence.
A story of love lost and one man's search for his identity when love ends. A writer comes to terms with his identity as an artist, and the introduction of new love.
On the night before Yuet's wedding, best friends Nam and Yuet recall their time together in school, when they shared a relationship that was more than friendship, but also perhaps not quite love.
An evil martial arts school attempts to take over a small village, killing the benevolent head of a security service in the process. Revenge is of course the order of the day.

When an online romance turns serious, Scout and Steven rush to the altar. They move to the US to begin their life together. As the horrors of his real personality emerge her only escape from the torment and abuse, is to fight for her life.

As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
Winona is a vampire who was imprisoned in her grave for fifteen years. Now she's back and thirsting for blood - and revenge!
About a tragic love triangle story involving young painter Hye-young, Interpol detective Jeong Woo, and professional hitman Park Yi.
Two bipolar patients meet in a psychiatric hospital and begin a romance that brings out all of the beauty and horror of their condition.
A horror mockumentary anthology about a town in rural Australia tormented by paranormal occurrences.

Thangamalai Thirudan is a 1986 Indian Tamil film, directed by A Kodandarami Reddy and produced by T Trivikrama Rao. The film stars Chiranjeevi and Radha in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraja.
Jennifer and her group of friends are stalked and terrorized by a mysterious man on the roof, Leading them into a deadly game of cat and mouse.

movie_name: Nocturna: Side A - The Great Old Man's Night
description: Ulysses is a hundred-year-old man, battling for redemption on his last night on earth. Faced with imminent death, he is forced to rethink his past, his present and his take on reality.
A young girl, Archana, falls in love with Sukhendu, an educated young man. Her father gladly accepts Sukhendu as his son-in-law. But Sukhendu's income and nature come in way of this marriage.

A group of GP506 soldiers have been brutally massacred, leaving only one alive but comatose. A military police investigator has only that night to uncover the facts, but ends up discovering a terrifying truth.
A battle-hardened Moorish mercenary, trained in the legendary Shaolin Temple, becomes a reluctant kingmaker when he transports a young prince back to the land of his awaiting throne.
Two friends are top contenders in a competitive basketball championship. With high hopes for the win, they'll do whatever it takes to walk off the court as the champions.

When a woman takes a new job, she discovers the skyscraper she works in is haunted by victims of a corporation's pursuit of profit. Unable to ignore injustice embodied by the disembodied, she sets out to reveal the truth.
A divorced dad and his teenage son team up to coach poodles in a dog sled race along the Oregon coast against a bully and a team of littered-trained huskies.

When several women are found mutilated and murdered, the Paris police are baffled as to who the killer may be. All evidence points to Dupin, but soon it becomes apparent that it is someone (or something) stronger and deadlier than a human.
Anna and Emilie are 14 and 15. They are sisters and orphans. Hardly have they been in their new home when a strange event turns their world upside down.

In 19th century Holland, a professor of fine arts and an unlicensed surgeon run a secret lab where the professor's ill daughter receives blood-transfusions from kidnapped female victims who posthumously become macabre art.
Joe heads for South America to fight the Latin champ. Shipboard, he helps federal agents fight counterfeiters. He also spars with love interest Anne Howe.
A nerd spends his time at an allotment shed away from his wife. When the zombie apocalypse begins, he and his nerdy friend try to make it through and save the wife and her cute friend.

On a desert planet, warlord Jared-Syn is trying to convince a tribe of mutants that he's their messiah and gain unlimited power hidden in a crystal. Ranger Dogen and explorer Dhyana, who's father was murdered by Syn, must stop him.
Follows a troubled law enforcement agent who discovers more than he ever imagined and his world gets turned upside down after traveling to West Virginia.

When a masked killer begins to terrorize the small town of Citrus Springs, a reluctant psychiatrist and an inexperienced police detective must aid each other in catching the killer, and restoring the American Dream once again.
The devil grants people wishes using the "Wishing Stone", but they must follow the strict rules or very bad things will happen
Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a helicopter crash.
Ring whose previous owner was a prostitute with supernatural powers causes double personality in a young woman about to marry. After some time, her face gets disfigured, forcing her to wear a mask.
Mervi and Kata, a lesbian couple living in Helsinki, are considering coming out of closet. They soon realize that they are not the only ones with secrets.

Ah Lang (Bruce Leung Siu-Lung) is the brawn before brains type. His dad (Ku Feng) prefers a quiet life. Ah Lang's attitude costs his dad and friend their lives. Ah Lang must find a patient teacher who'll train him so he can exact revenge.
A masked killer prowls the beaches of Argentina, injecting beautiful girls with heroin, and then using weird organ music to make them his zombie slaves.
About Adnan, a motorcycle racer who fall in love with the rich girl who really hates motorcycle racer. Can he sacrifice his passion for love?
A young lawyer is involved with a ghostly woman in his new house, where the builder and his fiancée died shortly after it was built.
Over the course of one torturous night, a suicidal woman and the violent home intruder that saved her life test the limits of human endurance and the boundaries of forgiveness.
On the day Abbey is diagnosed with ovarian cancer, she and her girlfriend, Miranda, are invited to dinner with Miranda''s former self-help group to celebrate the return of her friend Scott.
An eccentric entomologist tells three dark tales about the creeping crawling insects that burrow through the walls of homes, eat through our intestines, and for some of us, drive us slowly insane.

A professional contract killer, haunted by visions of his violent past, spirals out of control. His work compromised as he reaches breaking point, he is forced to defend his family from his ruthless employers.
An idyllic rural family life of a couple is thrown into turmoil when their son starts acting out of character.
Three creatives team up to write a screenplay chronicling a string of murders in their town, but one of the three may be closer to the story than the others realize.
In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.
In Mexico, at the dawn of the automobile, modern bandit Santiago burglarizes train freight cars and falls in love with a poor farmer's wife.
A general goes on a search for a book that reveals the names of revolutionaries in the area, leading to a showdown at a Shaolin temple where he faces off against the revolutionaries.
A womanizer finds a wife willing to accept the kind of open marriage he demands, but soon finds himself falling for her.

When Johnny and Mendez argue, the lights go out, and in the ensuing gunfight Johnny thinks he killed his friend Dick. Now refusing to wear a gun he crosses the border. But it is not long before he runs into Mendez and more trouble.
The film tells about the journalist Pavel Denisov, who broke up with his beloved woman Larisa and went to the mountains, where he met another woman who fell in love with him
A young man is torn between his friends in town and responsibilities to his family and his father's ranch.

Two brave swordsmen fight for supremacy in the martial world and for the hand of a mysterious maiden in this lavish sword picture from kung fu icon Raymond Liu-Top notch choreography from Pang Gang the man who brought you Shaolin vs Lama.

A con-team couple (Andy Lau & Rene Liu) head west after taking a city businessman for his BMW. But an encounter with a naive young carpenter travelling home with his life savings challenges their fate as thieves.

Nathan and Salma enter the world of social activism. Salma chooses to express himself digitally while Nathan chooses to take to the streets. This difference sparked a big fight when Nathan is involved in a big riot at a demonstration.
A man tries to save his relationship with his girlfriend by hiring a dating guru and revisiting failing relationships from the past.
Imprisoned and tortured by the Russian state police for sharing his faith, a young man escapes into the wilderness and becomes a fugitive running for his life to the Norwegian border.
Relationships are magnified and intertwined through fate and coincidence. An ensemble of conflicting characters all connected by a young, Award-Winning Author.
A young college professor and three of her students seek shelter during a storm in the rural farmhouse of a strange woman who collects lifelike mannequins.
Based on Stona Fitch's novel, this is the story of a wealthy US businessman (Behr) whose brutal kidnapping and torture are streamed online as part of an ultra-violent reality TV show.
Teenagers run away during the Great Recession and find a treasure map pointing to Black Bart's long lost treasure that may help them finance their future presidential campaigns.
Girls with repulsive desires and hideous dreams play a secret dating game in dark resulting in most menaced murders they have ever seen.

movie_name: Rose Blood: A Friday the 13th Fan Film
description: Takes place 13 months after Friday The 13th Part VII. We follow Tina Shepard as she is held and studied at the infamous Camp Crystal Lake Research Facility. Tina realizes that she is not alone. There in fact is another New Blood. Rose.
A young man who is born in the age of reality-show television and the challenges he faces in this digital era, is now being screened in theaters around the country.
A tough priest with a troubled past is called to root out a murderous demon from a household of suspects.
100 Million worth diamond which was supposed to reach the regional office of Royal Bank gets stolen while on its way for the delivery.
A crass, clandestine private investigator undertakes his strangest case when a string of murders is blamed on a serial killing ghost.
Unromantic comedy that follows the on again - off again relationship game of two hapless twenty something couples.
A group of American adventurers discover a bed of black pearls off a South Pacific island. When one of them is shot dead, a young girl in the group is accused of the crime.
An African American soldier faces racism during World War II, while trying to defend the same freedom as the other soldiers. Based on the play by Leslie Lee.
A group of N.R.I.'s return to Hyderabad only to unknowingly reignite they're feud with the localites once again and what follows is a hilarious mayhem.
Descendants of a serial killer play a game of life and death with a wedding party in a small desert town.
A fun-filled romantic movie in which two strangers from diverse backgrounds meet on a journey from Ooty to Kerala. The journey advances through different circumstances and coming across new people.
Manager-summoning control freak Kallie Jones attempts to rescue her husband from a "wellness center" with the help of a washed-up expert Cult Buster.
Looking for a new outlook on life after a tragic accident, Rachel moves to a new home and finds a mysterious fortune teller arcade game left behind, who offers her one wish.
To save her dying mother, Lupe, a Mexican-Navajo mechanic bands together with an outlaw cowgirl. Together they must travel across the desert, outrun criminals, and confront a corrupt landowner.
A detached university student faces the consequences of astral projection when he uses it to reconnect with his dead mother.
Handsome top-secret American agent Matt Helm must recover a laser-weapons inventor who has been kidnapped by arch-villain Julian Wall.
Project Dark Forest has been stolen. The Red King has dispatched his soldiers. The Chimera is hunted. Death to all.
Our hero Adam gets drawn into a web of intrigue as evidence is planted on him of a gay royal affair.
Eric is marrying Louise. His brother Anthony has been married to Helen for eight years and wants to warn Eric marriage won't be that great. Helen's not too happy either.
A story about accidental killing of a woman by a herd of men. After the incident, the woman got up from his grave became Pocong and Kuntilanak to avenge his death.

Rage in the Shadows is the story of a genetically enhanced Federal Agent who goes out to rescue her kidnapped family while trying to find a cure to a genetic serum which is quickly poisoning her body. It's a race against time.
Ajay, (Mahesh Babu) an undercover cop, is assigned to catch a dangerous mafia don with whom he has a personal score to settle.
A small town in Siberia is trapped for many months of quarantine. People die from a mysterious disease, which comes from water.
A psychopathic cannibal, fed up with his lack of ambition, tries his hand at stand-up comedy in an attempt to satisfy his appetite for normalcy.
A deliveryman has to run for his life when he is he falsely accused of killing a presidential candidate in a car explosion.

Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.

Two brothers, experts in martial arts, have to separate their paths due to a fight in which one of them is badly wounded. Years later they are reunited in a world where organized crime controls everything.
Tales of mystery and terror intersect when Billy Pilgrim learns of his destiny to find the fabled River Child and bring her back to Shadow Falls.
When a criminal gang slaughters an entire family, the baby survives. He is taken in by a family and the forces of nature work together to bring him face to face with the gang again when he grows up.

Set against the backdrop of 1960s San Francisco, BIRTH OF THE DRAGON is a modern take on the classic movies that Bruce Lee was known for. It takes its inspiration from the epic and still controversial showdown between an up-and-coming Bruce Lee and kung fu master Wong Jack Man - a battle that gave birth to a legend.
A small town guy tries to make a movie with his friends while his girlfriend pushes him to move with her to New York.
On the brink of adulthood, two lifelong friends are forced to reconcile their homosexual love for one another with their evangelical Christian upbringing.

Based on the true life story of American necrophile Karen Greenlee. Karen relives the most important moments of her life through a video diary: from childhood to first love, to the scandal about her sexual attraction for corpses.

Their social insecurity competes with their intense hunger for affection, when a romantic relationship begins between a blind musician and an attractive girl whose face is extensively blemished by a large redish-purple stain on her skin.
After year's of friendship, Jay finally has realized his feelings for Victoria. He now is determined to defy all the obstacles and proclaim his love.
A depressed hospital surgeon David is drifting into contact with a malevolent ghost following the death of his mother and the discovery that his wife has been unfaithful.

Alone and wounded Spy J.D, is on the hunt for members of a dark agency he used to work for, White Crow. This will push his skills to their limit, and maybe uncover a dark and sinister conspiracy that could change the world as we know it.

An international arms dealer will stop at nothing to retrieve a stolen Chinese nuclear relay hidden in a jade Buddha figurine. It's up to a group of undercover federal agents stationed in Hawaii to stop it falling into the wrong hands.

A group of mercenaries, goes on a rescue mission to save a group of soldiers in enemy lines, but when they get there, they find something never seen before, now they must join forces to survive this hellish nightmare.

In a very old textile mill with a serious rat infestation, deadly accidents start happening, but the corrupt foreman continues to put his workers in danger, until they discover a horrifying secret deep in the basement.
A group of day backpackers out on a day trip into the Shadow mountains, and find they are being hunted by zombies.
A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

movie_name: Lugosi: The Forgotten King of Horror
description: The first-ever authorized film about the legendary horror actor, Bela Lugosi, the man who portrayed Dracula, Hollywood's most famous Vampire.
A bumbling and inept serial killer stalks the residents of a sorority house and finds himself up against a murderous competitor for the body count.
The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.
A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.
A pair of debt collectors are thrust into an explosively dangerous situation, chasing down various lowlifes while also evading a vengeful kingpin. -Samuel Goldwyn Films-
A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.
An innocent girl following clues to the mysterious disappearance of her father finds herself undercover as a prostitute in the dark underworld of the Russian Mafia.

The film describes the events leading up to, and including, the massacre of the adults of a small town in Nebraska by their children, after the adults' irresponsibility ruins the crop and the children's future.

Sridevi is a young fashion designer from Hyderabad. Shoban Babu is a big-hearted guy from Anakapalli. Both of them meet in Araku valley and fight over a property. What happens subsequently forms the story.
Two detective brothers look for the criminals who killed their brother, as they catch drug dealers and interrogate thugs in the name of the law.
A man kills women because he was not loved by his mother and in his puberty he was dismissed by girls as sexually unattractive. And whenever he meets women now, he just cannot control himself.
Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.

When an executive returns home to handle succession issues for his dying father's business, he uncovers a dark secret that threatens his life and the life of any person who seeks to expose the scientific horrors done in his family's name.
Sakala Kala Vallabhudu is a Telugu movie starring Tanishq Reddy, Meghla Muktha in prominent roles. It is a commercial entertainer directed by Shiva Ganesh.
A man tortured by guilt meets a psychopathic killer who forces him to revisit and conquer his personal demons in order to save his only daughter and survive the day.

movie_name: The Killer Clown Meets the Candy Man
description: Have you ever wondered what might have happened if serial killers John Gacy and Dean Corll met Charles Manson? That is the basic premise of this semi-historically accurate dark comedic tale of horror.
Romantic musical entertainer with series of romantic mishaps and goof ups packed with superlative performances.

Divya, a woman grieving over the death of her lover, is convinced into an arranged marriage with Chandra Kumar. Over a year the couple attempt to adjust to each other's presence and live with each other.
The descendants of two men who betrayed a royal family centuries ago are caught up in events that involve ghosts, revenge and kidnapping.

movie_name: Gendai Kaiki Hyaku Monogatari: Kaidan Tanhenshu
description: A collection of short ghost stories by ten up-and-coming young directors and veteran filmmakers of various genres.
A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss after jumping bail.

The story based off of the controversial manga by Suehiro Maruo takes place where a little orphaned girl joins a freak-show circus troupe whose members rape and abuse her. She then finds a glimmer of hope in the enigmatic magician who joins the group.
A Thai human trafficking ring abducts the daughter of a renowned Muay Thai champion. What they don't realize is that she's every bit as deadly as her father and quite determined to escape captivity.
A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.
The film is a historical drama speculating on the fate of the missing Kruger millions. Could love and intrigue have played a role?
A woman is trapped inside her apartment by an ancient demon as a policeman is in a race against time to save her.
A couple are given a camera and a set of instructions which they must follow or else someone will die.
A sheriff in a small Nevada town goes up against a gang that's using his town to illegally dump toxic waste.
An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

A cowboy finds himself in jail for rustling cattle. His buddy gets the idea to form a lynch mob in the hopes of arranging his escape once the mob takes him out of jail. However, things don't quite work out the way he planned.
The rivalry between two former college friends comes to a head when they both attend the same glamorous event.

A hair creature, attaches itself to a woman, later exposed to radiation. She buys a potion from Gypsies, which kills people, but it makes her hair poofy. The poofy hair then goes on a killing rampage through the city, by itself.

Regular guy Ed (Marcus Carroll) awakes one morning to find that his Grandmother has become one of the living dead. While trapped in his home Ed tries to survive the day, keep his house zombie free, stay alive and save the day.
Ilgin and Neva have not been with anyone else until the age of 25. Although it sounds extraordinary for the day, will this story continue with happiness as it begins?

A psychological thriller following Jake, a reclusive news editor, who is inadvertently sent secret dashcam video evidence that points to a possible conspiracy and cover-up involving high-ranking government officials.

A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.
A young woman arrives at the home of her socialite cousin, and soon finds herself sucked into the woman's complex web of deceit.

movie_name: Even Though I Don't Like It
description: Suki Demo Nai Kuseni is a Japanese romantic drama.This sensual drama follows a young woman in a love triangle with two young men.

Donnalina Cameron, a Missionary in San Francisco in the early 1900's fights against corruption in order to save thousands of young Chinese girls trafficked into California from Asia for a life of sexual slavery under the ruthless Ah Toy.
A young lawyer is taken on a hilarious and eye opening road trip adventure by his Eco warrior Cousin in an attempt to salvage his relationship with the love of his life.
Discovering that Beth is immune to the ZnMBe compound, Jack must perfect the cure and also protect the immune from forces both within and without.
Puerto Rico becomes a battleground as one man takes on a powerful local gang after his brother is kidnapped.

A mad scientist uses an army of androids and a device that can disintegrate metal to try to steal microchips containing top secret information. The government dispatches a beautiful female agent to stop him.
An overbearing mother asks a witch doctor to help bring her dead son back to life, which leads to disastrous results.
Kara Pierson a high school student is pushed into transferring to another high school and going undercover to find out what happened to her cousin who has committed suicide.

Felix Wilson suffers from a rare form of OCD and must be institutionalized, but when strange things begin happening in the hospital, he recruits a fellow patient to investigate whether or not a vicious angel is behind the occurrences.
Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his ex.
A depressed college student attempts suicide only discover a world beyond our own, forcing him to wrestle with his inner demons.
Kevin and his sister grew up with a father addicted to drugs. When Kevin's younger sister overdoses at a party he decides to take down the drug underworld of Molde, Norway.
In colonial Mexico, a wealthy plantation owner forces his slaves to taste some-times poisonous mushrooms, which are used in a family recipe and served at lavish parties.

Archduke Rudolph, unhappy with his marriage, is a classic drunken womanizing playboy, until he accidentally meets the young Maria Vetsera. The chance meeting blossoms into a clandestine romance that soon has all of Vienna gossiping.
Based in British occupied Egypt, Ibrahim (Omar Sharif), a member of the resistance, seeks refuge in the house of a politically passive family after killing the prime minister for his acts of treason.

A military special operations team, led by a CIA case officer, are on a mission in the harsh and hostile terrain of Afghanistan where they find themselves in a Middle Eastern "Bermuda Triangle" of ancient evil.
Is Karmen's ability to write a gift or a curse? She is about to find out if her entire life is a lie.
Adaptation of a popular earthy comedy from the 1920s about a vineyard owner and his desire for his son to produce a child as part of the inheritance for the property.
As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.
A night club DJ fakes interest in the green movement to win the love of an environmental activist who has become a fan of his music.
Fresh off the boat Irish lass is courted by wealthy political boss, ends up with her long-time plumber boyfriend. Much singing and dancing.

At a leading ad agency, the battle for the top job between Rahul Verma, the advertising CEO, and Maya Luthra, his ambitious protégée, takes an ugly turn when Maya files a sexual harassment complaint against Rahul.
A Navy detective enlists his brother, a former gambler, to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.
When her daughter is kidnapped in Belize and held hostage to be used for human organ trafficking, Kate Johnson goes on a crusade to infiltrate the cartel and rescue her.

One week in Louise's professional life, her interviews, her resumes, her briefcase, her rejections, her commitment. One week in Louise's personal life, her ex-boyfriend, her small flat, her friend's boyfriend, her dealer, her abortion.
1980. Against the backdrop of political and cultural uncertainty, a young and pulsating creative subculture emerges.

After separation from his wife Robert moves to Vichy where he observes beautiful Juliette. Her fiance Patrick becomes jealous and attacks Robert. When Patrick disappears Robert is suspected to have killed him.
Lancelot is King Arthur's most valued Knight of the Round Table and a paragon of courage and virtue. Things change, however, when he falls in love with Queen Guinevere.
On a mission to save spring break, two badass bionic bros must fight and (more importantly) party their way through the zombie apocalypse. And hopefully defeat satan, who killed both of their moms.
Hard-boiled underworld melodrama, with gang wars and gunfights, in which criminal lawyer turns prosecutor to avenge a friend's death.
In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

In spite of her best efforts, a Manhattan model falls in love with a country-hick census taker, while trying to help out her sister and the sister's jobless husband. She also finds time to get involved with a gangster from Chicago.
Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

Islam and terrorism have nothing in common. The lack of purpose in life encourages young people to join the radicals. The main goal of the film is to show the audience the reverse side of the romanticized life of ISIS fighters.
As the community quarantine puts the nation on hold, a political science major and a student working part time as a delivery driver butt heads online but soon find themselves falling for each other.

movie_name: The Island of the Mapmaker's Wife
description: Collector Finley Descotes is passionate about antique maps to the point of fetishism. She travels to Amsterdam to meet Bernard Ivens, a mysterious art dealer who owns a legendary 17th century map which holds a secret. Love affair blooms.

An outlandish, romantic comedy about a recent widower and the antics surrounding his attempts to end his son's relationship, with whom he believes is with his long-lost daughter, due to a promise he made to his dying wife.

It follows Alex as she joins a restaurant as their new waitress. Despite her quickly winning the heart of Enrico, she falls for the restaurant manager Max, but Enrico begins to unearth disturbing clues about Max's dark and mysterious past.
The movie is set in 2007, taking place before or right after the first part of Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty.

movie_name: Hot Bath an' a Stiff Drink
description: Marshal Vance Dillinger makes a shocking discovery -- his twin, presumed dead 30 years ago, is the notorious outlaw 'The Lucky Bandit.'
A luckless army intelligence lieutenant finds himself stationed on a remote island army outpost during World War II, where all the action is between the sheets.

movie_name: Un soir, une nuit ... et puis?
description: Fabien, a French singer, and Mathias, an artist from Germany, meet at a party and feel an immediate attraction towards each other. Unfortunately, they don't have much time to figure out if there's any chance for them to connect.
Two young men from different backgrounds find their destinies linked when they meet up in the world of illegal bare-knuckle fighting.
It is about a guy who thinks he already knows someone just because he's been watching her life through photos and videos.
An animal reincarnated as a human girl in an anti-humanity purgatory believes there's more to know about a wandering sadistic out to damn her and seven others.

The dream of a fresh start in Berlin becomes a nightmare for the photo artist Ina and her husband Hannes. Ina has to accept her dark heritage to fight the evil power in the haunted house to safe whats left of her family.

A sword that bestows power upon its wielder was divided and hidden. A rebel seizes power and stages a massacre, leaving only one survivor. Now, the daughter of a great general is all that stands between a tyrant and his domination.
THE BIGGEST SWASHBUCKLING ACTION COMEDY OF THE YEAR. - THIS ACTION-COMEDY MOVIE HAS THE PROVINCIANO TULUME PLAYING AN UNLIKELY ZORRO.
Family and personal life is messed up for a cool dude, when suddenly his possessive wife doubts/links up a relationship with a girl from his office.
Set in Rajasthan, this love story explores how the protagonists deal with issues like differences between castes and honor killings.

La gran sangre ha enfrentado a enemigos crueles, pero ninguno tan despiadado ni sanguinario como el mexicano, el adversario al que tedrán que hacer frente en la gran sangre: la pelicula, ...                See full synopsis »
The story of an adult male who, after the successful removal of a benign tumor resting against his pituitary gland, experiences all the changes and effects of puberty over a three-week period.

Violence and death stalk the Chinese of a big American city, but one man, Dr. Chang Ling, and his daughter, Dr. Mary Ling, defy the racketeers who are responsible, and, against terrific odds, bring peace to their oppressed neighbors.

Rich Spanish landowner Alvaro is torn between his wife Elvira and two other women in his life. He's also worried about the fact that both his father and grandfather were murdered by Spanish revolutionaries in the house he's inherited.

movie_name: This Dark Endeavor: The Apprenticeship of Victor Frankenstein
description: A young Victor Frankenstein and his friend embark on a quest to find rare ingredients for a magical elixir that will save his brother.

A fishing community on a remote Maine island finds itself suddenly cut off from the rest of the world after the ferry stops coming. When people start to vanish, the terrified survivors realize that someone - or something - is hunting them.
A district attorney investigates three white teenagers accused of murdering a blind Puerto Rican kid.
Two documentary filmmakers investigate the legend of a panther in the South-Eastern countryside, but as they get closer to the truth they soon realise they are in over their heads.
A commitment-phobic 27 year old's relationship is put to the test when she and her new boyfriend go to 7 weddings in the same year.

Mili watched her mother's murder 11 years ago. Mili now has a family with the Jiu Jitsu team, but the gang she once ran with decides to teach her a lesson. Now Mili must risk everything to save her friend from a life of sex trafficking.
A young girl is torn between honoring the customs of her people or bringing them into the twenty first century.
An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.

Four college boys discover an ancient monastery that offers eternal life. But they soon learn the offer is good for only two of them -- the other two must be sacrificed. Based on the acclaimed novel by Robert Silverberg.
Five friends go unannounced on a vacation. Soon they discover a cave entrance, which they decide to explore.
21 year old Abhi is on a mission to bring down the empires of few millionaires with the help of Ria and Sunny in his college summer break.

Trump and - Zombies? In this action-comedy, a Zombie Apacolypse takes over Manhattan and two bumbling drug dealers are caught in the middle. The Media pounces, the Generals rebel, and the leader of the free world attempts to save the day.
Two brothers, one of whom is involved in smuggling, compete for the love of an orphaned girl whom the nurse back to health in their home after a traffic accident.

Miss Ng and Kong operate a whorehouse. Kong's apprentice Yat fails to get along with Ching due to a misinterpretation among them. Fortunately, the perception of a murderous rapist assists to deal with the misunderstanding between them.

movie_name: Bloody Muscle Body Builder in Hell
description: Trapped inside a haunted house, a body builder must save himself from a gruesome ghost hell-bent on revenge.
Two boys are becoming real adults during a turbulent time as they experience a world that doesn't go their way.

When a psychiatric doctor researches a young girls' diary to find out why she murdered her entire family, he begins to fall into the same state of insomnia and confusion that led her to lose her mind.
Mountain guide, Emily Wilks, is forced to lead a group of men up the perilous Devil's Peak. But leading the group up Devil's Peak is just a stalling tactic until Emily reveals her own dark secret.

Nationalistic, romantic war film glorifying the role played by a group of Italian mercenaries fighting on the side of the Spanish who were battling the French for control of the peninsula during the Renaissance.
Bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson is receiving death threats from a criminal he helped put away. This while his girlfriend is about to give birth, an event he isn't looking forward to.
An evil alien brain from the planet Arous hijacks the body of an Earth scientist in order to control the Earth.

By using a mass-control radio-wave emission, a cannibal dictator brings Taeter City's crime rates next to zero, recycling the criminals' bodies as food. Then, the ultimate mutation emerged. Can the elite police squad clear the mess up?
A young woman struggling with grief in a disjointed family, meets a boy that turns her life into the fairy-tale she always wished it to be.

movie_name: Trees 2: The Root of All Evil
description: Having already faced the Great White Pine in TREES, Ranger Cody is now faced with the task of battling an entire feeding frenzy of geneticly enhanced trees created by the government.
A woman has five daughters and still want a son, that makes many troubles for her husband, her daughters and many other people.
A suburbanite fan-fiction writer falls for a predator who uses her stories to pretend he is the man of her dreams.
Under fire for giving a student her copy of a romance novel, Prudence resigns from her teaching position and sails for Italy.
An unemployed actor takes matters in his own hands. He decides to commit a robbery with some old friends.
Bhageerathan is a renowned Ayurvedic doctor in a village. He is in for a shock when he learns that according to his daughter's horoscope her husband will have an unnatural death.

California 1867 - A recluse and his new bride become swept up in a debaucherous and sinister game, when a mysterious Voodoo man takes up residence beside them and a pregnant prostitute arrives on their doorstep.
Fadil is back with a new mission with higher stakes - he needs to shut down Chow Han's evil conspiracy while he is being hunted by King Cobra who is seeking revenge.
While on holiday, Avi meets Naina and falls in love with her. Smitten, he decides to stay and work in her cafe. He confesses his love in a letter, however it's Naina's mother who mistakenly reads it.

A tour guide in Venice romances a visiting American tourist whose father owns a chewing-gum factory back in the U.S. She sets out to convince her skeptical father to bring the tour guide to America and give him a job in the plant.
Two rival South L.A. gangs, one Black and one Latino, battle for money, respect and territory in the city's largest underground lowrider championship.

Sahara Pookkal shows the emotional and physical struggles endured in re-marriages. Step-parents clash with step-children. Yet, there is hope for Oviya and hopeless romantic Sangeeth but even love can be threatened by family ties.
Mary Follet, a wife and mother in 1915 Tennessee, copes with the loss of her husband and the necessity of raising their children alone.
Sparks fly in Glasgow's south side when a young Asian man enters into a relationship with a Caucasian woman.

Anson has always wanted to be a successful businessman and a good father to his son. The Gambler is a story of this father-son duo, as they go through various struggles to win what is important to them.
Three young American women have a wild drunken fling south of the border. They find some rough folks to party with at a Mexican mansion, a Mexican jail and the U.S.-Mexican border.
In May of 2011, three film students travel to Calcata, Italy to make a documentary on the Vatican relic that went missing in 1983 and its connection to Clarissa Anguillara.
A womanizing art dealer and a painter find the serenity of their Riviera vacation disturbed by a third guest, a vivacious bohemian woman known for her long list of male conquests.
When five childhood friends reunite for a weekend in the country, old jealousies resurface, sexual debauchery ensues, and it quickly becomes clear that time may not heal all wounds...

At an anger management camp for teenagers, someone is getting rid of the counselors and campers using very sharp instruments. By nighttime only a few are left, but who can they trust when they know one of them is the killer?

movie_name: The Magic Door (A Rec Room Movie)
description: A group of 3 friends All group up for the first time in a while and go to play basketball in their old hang out spot, After a series of events they're all sucked into the Door and must try find a way out.
The crew from paranormal reality TV show 'Bloody Legends' go missing while hunting down the mythical Yaramayahoo in the Australian bush.
In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.
A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

A young charismatic preacher and his hot Latina girlfriend travel Route 66 scamming the small churches along the way only to find that the bogus healing powers he portrays become real. The healing powers serve as a blessing and a curse.

A cop is killed investigating a strange case of resurrected corpses. His partner and a pathologist resurrect him, but he only has a limited time before he starts to decompose, and he uses it to chase down the diabolical man who killed him.
On this train ride, 7 people will have a chance to be comical, informative, explosive and very much reveling of the laughs, the lives and the tears shared on Trakks Railways.
Shiva, a young benevolent man, leaves no stone unturned to fight for his brother in order to reunite his family and bring back their lost happiness.
In this high school romance Hiro is dismayed to learn her new love Shu will be going away to college in Tokyo. She asks him not to go.
A faux-documentary investigating a jealous influencer who spent three nights in the house of a recently dead woman and promptly vanished from the public eye.
A reporter collects stories from a supposed "haunted" apartment complex and the tenants who have gone missing.
Mainland cop travels to Hong Kong to team a Hong Kong police officer in order to investigate a case involving a brutal killer.
Ninaithathu Yaaro is a film about youngsters and modern relationships. The film stars an all new cast with Rejith Menon and Nimisha Suresh playing the lead pair.
Lok, a Hong Kong undercover policeman, struggles in the conspiracy between gangs and the police in order to investigate the truth of gangs' drug trafficking.
A young woman visits Ireland on a "Lucky in Love" tour to find her soulmate. Little does she know that it's an enchanted tour of a magical place.
The story of the tempestuous affair between the world's most famous woman, Maria Callas, and the world's richest man, Aristotle Onassis.

Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one another's loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.
Riley searches for a cure to the virus that took over Samantha before it consumes him and the entire world.

movie_name: Jesus Shows You the Way to the Highway
description: CIA Agents Palmer and Gagano are tasked with the mission of destroying a computer virus called "Soviet Union". They enter the system using VR but the mission turns into a trap.

movie_name: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
description: A serial adventure writer with problems in his personal life lives out the adventures of his literary hero, King of Adventurers.
Following the murder of half her family in the midst of a drug war, a young Isabella is forcefully recruited to become an assassin by one gang to kill their rivals.
It follows Fiona "Phoenix" Grant, a U.S. Army veteran Sergeant teaching hand-to-hand combat skills in Afghanistan. She receives word that her father has been killed in Florida.
A high-powered attorney duct tapes her adulterous husband to the toilet ... right before their home is invaded by burglars.

A scientist interested in the laws of heredity, impregnates a prostitute in a laboratory with the semen of a hanged murderer. The prostitute conceives a female child who has no concept of love, who the professor adopts.

Three young men from the countryside spend their lives in Tokyo alternately complaining about their boring existence and brutalizing people. When they come to violent ends themselves, they claim to be victims of society.
A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.
Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.
John heads to Paris hoping to meet his ex from 9½ Weeks (1986), but instead ends up with her former friend, Lea.
Behind the mask of Mardi Gras, something sinister stalks the streets of New Orleans. Filmed on-location during the final days of Carnival, a group of friends is preyed upon by a mysterious killer.

Contemporary Moscow. Nikita and Afina are the perfect couple: young, smart, attractive, and in love. Well, perfect, that is, until Afina suddenly leaves Nikita for a 40-year-old dentist. How will Nikita win her back?

movie_name: The Man in the Iron Mask
description: Despotic King Louis XIV discovers he has a twin brother who has grown up under the tutelage of his foster father, the patriotic musketeer D'Artagnan.

Young Q incidentally joins a brotherhood of Black Cowboys to compete in an illicit horse race set amidst an inner-city world of drugs, gangs, and poverty in North Philly from which he's desperate to escape.

After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organization in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret agencies must band together to defeat a common enemy.
A filmmaker struggling to make a horror film goes to extreme lengths to make a realistic film, unleashing his inner demons.
CIA washout, Kaya Nova, investigates the murders of two young Native American scientists, killed after discovering a way to extract an infinite supply of free energy from the ionosphere.

After being accused of murdering his former girlfriend, a private investigator stumbles onto a secret government project that is creating super soldiers. In order to find her killer he must expose the project as flawed.
A girl in the Philippines works as a prostitute, and all the male villagers want to have sex with her. After 30 seconds or so, she gives in and has sex with them, which she appears to enjoy greatly.

A baby sitter is stuck watching over a young brat on Halloween night who keeps playing vicious pranks on her. To add to her trouble the boy's deranged father has escaped from an asylum and is planning on making a visit.
Through the freedom of information act, a serial killer's home videos were released and assembled into a feature length film exploring the inner workings of a psychopathic killer.
Zombies are on a rampage around the world, Joseph Kales begins a quest to find his girlfriend. Combat operations and zombie attacks, complicate his effort, making it unlikely he'll succeed.
A group of friends stay in a notorious vacation home on Halloween night where a past sacrifice awoken an ancient spirit.

A newly reunited young couple's drive through the Pacific Northwest turns into a nightmare as they are forced to face nature, unsavory locals, and a monstrous creature, known to the Native Americans as Oh-Mah.
In order to retrieve her power of healing, a woman with agoraphobia must dive into 'The Killing Fields.'

Rob's successful life is interrupted when he crosses paths with smart beautiful Leslie. After being suddenly and mistakenly arrested, Rob begins a city-wide search for the woman of his dreams unsure of her last name or where to find her.
The film is set against an urban backdrop and Satya Dev will be stepping into the shoes of a middle-aged software employee who has endured several heartbreaks in his quest to find true love.
A cop investigating a hiker's disappearance and amateur filmmakers investigating an urban legend converge on the same path leading to a terrifying and gruesome serial killer.
While on a camping trip, a young girl is captured and almost raped by four drug runners. She escapes, and instead of running away, determines to get her revenge on her attackers.
A fearless fighter forced to run around in search of his beloved one, in an act of revenge, is what the movie is all about.
A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.
An ambitious Italian arrives in San Francisco to unravel his father's secret and becomes embroiled in a former federal conspiracy.
Roscoe the Rainmaker is invited to California (with sidekick "Billy") to relieve a terrible dry spell and to save the community from an unscrupulous businessman who stands to profit from the drought.

The movie tells the story of So Yeon, who has Gender Identity Disorder (GID). In the story, So Yeon falls in love with her roommate Yuki, while Yuki likes So Yeon's friend Hajime, who is in love with So Yeon.
Take a trip into the world of cannibals, psycho killers and the deranged as we discover the heart of horror in a shocking horror anthology themed around food, consumption and devouring.
A retired child psychologist travels the country searching for cases of children suffering from night terrors to find the monster that killed his son five years prior.
An Olympic skier falls from grace and is transformed in to an ice man who takes his revenge when the temperature reaches -18.
After the death of their birth mother due to a drug-overdose, two young children are placed into the care of their prospective adopter parents, Michael and Asif.

Six months after the outbreak, a man and woman have survived by isolating themselves in a remote cabin. Starved for resources, they must confront the horrors that threaten them from outside and from within.
All hell breaks lose when a popular Tok Mudim dies and starts to haunt uncircumcised boys and men in Kampung Seri Menawan.
Faith has it all as a mother and wife, but a year after what she believes was a car accident, Faith discovers that she is an Army special ops lieutenant with classified information.
With shared focus and rage, two notorious vigilantes team up to take down a band of above-the-law billionaires and their island of abuse.

movie_name: The Vampire Santa II: The Vampirates
description: Nicholas is on a ship bound for the colonies, when it is attacked by pirates. The blood from the battle awakens his "blood-lust" and he finds himself overcome by his "need to feed".
A group of youngsters go out to a disco on Christmas Eve and accidentally run into a shepherd who has prepared himself for a night of pure insanity.

movie_name: Para ligo, para ponto, para triha
description: The dead end of a love triangle. A woman in love with two men, in a relationship where they can not touch each other and break their bonds.

A strange psychological thriller about Tsidi, who is forced to move in with her separated mother, a domestic worker who obsessively cares for her catatonic white "Madame" in the wealthy suburbs of Cape Town.
Shinobugawa depicts the emerging love of a student, identified only as "I", for a young waitress named Shino.
In order to prevent a recent high school graduate from getting engaged, two friends intervene by taking him on a cross-country road trip.
Captain John Smith overcomes the treachery of some of his men and resentment of the local Native Americans to establish the colony of Jamestown.
When a struggling artist gets a referral to a mysterious life coach, she must decide just how far she's willing to go to get the success she so desperately wants.

movie_name: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai Dobara
description: After killing his mentor, a gangster comes into power to rule over Mumbai. In the process he falls for an aspiring actress, nevertheless he finds that his protege has fallen for her too which leads to enmity between them.
Seok-bul goes to the mountains and marries the daughter of his father's friend. His father-in-law has a long lost son who is engaged in drug-smuggling and who is out to kill his father.
A police inspector gets beaten by the goons and loses his sanity and is taken care of by the village headman's daughter. But the inspector's girlfriend arrives from another village to take him back.
A Ronald Reagan-obsessed serial killer targets a bunch of hippies who are heading to a weekend-long concert.
After an exorcism goes horribly wrong a team from a shadowy religious order must determine who among them the demon has possessed, or all their lives are forfeit.
A deformed criminal mastermind plans to loot the city of San Francisco as well as revenge himself on the doctor who mistakenly amputated his legs.
