In a showdown of man versus machine, Martin plunges into a chaotic nightmare trying to save his mind from the megalomaniacal corporation.

movie_name: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
description: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.
Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.
An unlikely love triangle between a beautiful country teacher, an ailing sanatorium patient and his close friend takes place somewhere far away by a lovely lake.
Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.
A teenage girl has to ask her mother, who's a Miami Detective to help save her life after she convinces her boy friend to rob an infamous drug dealer to support a career in Donk Racing.
Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.
A psychiatric hospital comes under attack when a crew of killers show up for the mysterious patient, Jane Doe.

movie_name: No Man's Land: The Rise of Reeker
description: A sheriff and his son chase casino robbers, only to find the all of them are being chased by something else.
A mostly silent version of Edna Ferber's original novel, with some songs from the musical as a last-minute addition
The struggles faced when a Hindu man falls in love with a Muslim woman and the disapproval of her family.

Marietta, a successful singer, has everything but love. Then she meets Hans, a polo sportsman who knows nothing of show business, and finds herself divided between her love for him and her career. Music by Franz Grothe.
A modern soundtrack enhances five of the weirdest short silent horror films ever produced, plus a creepy feature involving a stalker within the walls of an old mansion (Midnight Faces).
Stacy seems to have everything. She's young, beautiful, with a great career, and friends, but one thing keeps getting in the way of finding true love....Stacy's a werewolf.
On New Year's Eve in 1955, Richard Howell, a patient at the Hillcrest Sanatorium, went on a bloody rampage, killing three children before he hanged himself.
A quirky but beautiful young woman finds more then she bargain for when she poses as the Employee of the Year for Financial & Marketing Firm.

Terrifying French horror movie about a journalist who arrives in Paris to film a documentary about the "European dream". A series of poor decisions and bad luck derail his project and drive him to a devastating state of madness...

A reformed murderer and stand over man sits on death row when he is informed that his daughter has been raped and murdered, he breaks out of prison and goes on a violent rampage for the men who raped and killed his daughter.
A beautiful musician and a serious Wall Street banker cross paths and fall in love with each other over one magical New Year's Eve.

A squad of special forces storms a Detroit skyscraper to apprehend a ruthless drug lord. While the team is making progress, the skyscraper is surrounded by mercenaries. What does the newly elected mayor have to do with it?

In the exciting sequel to the hit movie 'evolution', Orlando Jones reprises his roll as the whacky volleyball coach/geologist. But he finds out that being a whacky volleyball coach/geologist is much harder than it seems.
A helicopter traffic reporter for a major Los Angeles radio station is live and on the air when her and her pilot witness the murder of a prominent dignitary from the air.
A Survival-action Thriller about a Father and his twin sons trying to survive Ferocious Creatures that attacks their remote farmhouse
Injured Carlton College quarterback Ken Thomas promises his girlfriend that he will not play again; when she relents, he is kidnapped by crooks hoping to make money from The Big Game.
A love story where the paths of two strangers cross, only for them to be promptly separated by chance. Though physically they'll only be a few feet away, if only they knew this.
A detective must solve a case where a girl was murdered in a room--and all the doors and windows were locked from the inside.
A hapless filmmaker documents the weird, violent, and surreal torments of an extraterrestrial clown.
MMA fighter wakes up to find blood and his fiancée missing, told he's been poisoned and has 72 hours to find the antidote.
When Chloe and Michael Carpenter rent out the cottage behind their house to charming romance novelist Robert Mars, their American dream soon turns into a suburban nightmare.

A spiteful and jealous woman decides to destroy the happiness of a young couple and enlists the help of a vengeful sailor. Now, a hideous lie threatens to ruin a friendship and a marriage. Will truth and love prevail?
A demon is running an underground poker tournament where the players are unknowingly wagering their souls.
A sexy crime syndicate who pull off "impossible jobs" by posing as high class escorts, plot to heist a billion dollars worth of black market merchandise from the most ruthless men on the planet.
An imprisoned murderer who targeted mothers and their infants agrees to recount his story to the police before being executed.
The inhabitants of a small Illinois town begin disappearing after a strange cone is found sticking out of the ground nearby.
Seven young Tokyoites get scammed into working as hosts for "Dog Days" bar. Will they be able to overcome their individual differences and keep the club open?
At the beginning of the 18th century, king of France exiles two duelists from the state: one to Russia and another to Sweden, which are at war.
A detective's hunt for the man who murdered his friend takes him to the Caribbean, where he finds himself enmeshed in a web of corruption and murder.

When death is just the beginning, how important will it be to survive the end of times? Featuring 5 horrific tales from 5 up-and-coming indie filmmakers, Morbid Stories will become the latest horror anthology to die for this Halloween.
A witch-finder general falls in love with the village beauty, who has supposedly made a pact with the devil.
A wealthy young lady marries a reporter on a bet, but things might not work out so well when he finds out the truth.

Thirty years after realizing they had both found that rare once in a lifetime love, a man and a woman separated by fate decide to take a second shot at romance despite the fact that both had moved on with their lives a long time ago.
After a suspected terrorist is transferred to a black site for interrogation, the group of government agents stationed there soon discovers that a dark and deadly entity has come in with her.

Two young actresses fall in love with each other while filming a lesbian love scene, then break up months later, and then are forced to reunite in order to re-shoot the love scene for the movie's distribution.
In 1948 the corrupt in-law of a newly appointed minister in the Nationalist government in Chongqing travels with the minister from Xinjiang with a collection of loot which attracts robbers.

movie_name: Lone Wolf and Cub: White Heaven in Hell
description: In the sixth and final film of the Lone Wolf and Cub series, the final conflict between Ogami Itto and the Yagyu clan is carried out.
Alex, high school class president, nerd and a straight A student, has been dating Claire a long time. They decide to sleep together but then he meets a gay guy and he's confused.

The Blonde Squad are in a race against time to go deep undercover to stop the evil Contessa Dell"Oro ,the leader of an army of commandos who plot to destroy all human life on earth with the devastating X-bomb Nuclear Missile.
A forest ranger with the ability to visit the past by looking at photographs attempts to solve the mystery behind his father's sudden death.
Follows a young girl who's beautiful life is cemented on a lie, her redemption, sacrifices and her path through the acceptance of unconditional love and healing.
A Mysterious Fortune Teller, brings a group of women to his fortune house, to tell a tale of Love Dilemmas involving the women's futures.

Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.
Various eccentric misfits each play their part in fulfilling an ancient prophecy involving an evil demon.

Three British women from London, consisting of a YouTuber and her two friends, go missing from a motel in California while travelling from Los Angeles to San Francisco after posting on social media using the the hashtag #followme.

Miguel, a teacher, assigned to a creepy village feel's a fascination for Dorinda, who has an affair with Mauro who was found dead hanging from a cherry blossom tree. Miguel begins to suspect that his soul is still roaming the village.
A father, daughter and son are thieves, specifically thieves of great and expensive art. On a journey into the dangerous, cutthroat world of international art theft.

A long hot summer in rural Norfolk and a rough coming of age for Goob Taylor, fighting with brutal, womanizing stock car racer Gene Womack for his mother's attention, and falling for the exotic charms of a pretty foreign field worker.
A journalist attacks the campaign of a mayoral candidate who has gained the endorsement of a rival newspaper.

movie_name: Tales of Terror: G Men Isolated Island
description: The latest installment of the popular psychic documentary 'Tales of Terror: G Men' returns. In this film, they infiltrate an isolated island with a volcano in the middle of the ocean.
A new detective was sent to investigate unusual events in a rural village in the north-east of Thailand which was believed to be involved with the mythical giant snake called Nakee.
After the head of the corpse of a teenager she's restoring is stolen, an embalmer encounters the organ black market and a necrotomic religious cult.
A serial killer is loose at an all girl school, where he strangles girls with a piece of barbed wire.

movie_name: La luz, tríptico de la vida moderna
description: A three-part love story: Alborada, Cénit y Ocaso (Sunrise, Noon and Sunset). A dying prince (Agüeros) lives a stormy love affair with a "femme fatale" (Padilla) who doesn't care for his feelings.
A retired film star's wedding to her fourth husband brings chaos when their families (and her ex-husband) show up for the festivities.

A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.
Bloodsucka Jones rises from the pages of legend to help a chronically confused David and would-be vampire hunter Tony, save David from his vampire girlfriend's brother and his pop-collared cronies.

A special operations unit races to find and prevent the construction of a devastating micro nuclear device created by a group of radical mercenaries whose political beliefs blur the line between terrorist and revolutionary.

Traumatized as a child, an awkward yet brilliant designer of surveillance gear obsessively chronicles his life using his own inventions, but when he unwittingly records something he shouldn't, he becomes the target of a deadly conspiracy.
A couple expecting a baby travels to Jalisco, ignoring the grandfather's wishes to have the baby in Chihuahua.

movie_name: The Biker Warrior Babe vs. The Zombie Babies from Hell
description: A botched demon summoning causes three friends to become the de facto saviors of their hometown, Cranberry Lake. It's a race against time to correct the ritual before a legion of demonic zombie babies eat everyone in town.
A 28-year-old I.T. geek suddenly finds himself the object of affection for five attractive women who all live in remote corners of Hong Kong.
Gia discovers her recently deceased, loving husband, was actually a serial killer who fed his victims to her. Now a copycat killer intends to continue his work and will make her his last supper.

Something stalks the Pine Barrens of New Jersey. A demon said to inhabit the dark forests of these lands has stalked and terrified the locals for centuries, but what is the story behind its dark origin?

Did the date go well? Bad? She liked your Facebook picture but hasn't responded to your text. How Chad solves these modern day dating mysteries is explored as he tries to win back the love of his life.
Eight actresses are thrown together in one house, and are competing for a role in a low-budget horror film. Before long, they encounter an entity that is Hellbent on revenge and exposing her killer.

Puli Bebbuli is a 1983 Indian Telugu film, Directed by K S R Dass and Produced by R V Guru Padam. The film Stars Chiranjeevi, Jayapradha and Radhika in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Rajan Nagendran.

Saabi grew up watching his father race death everyday and grew up to be a showman himself but not for the survival of the family. His passion and love for the wheel of death takes him to the world of crime.
An anthropology professor's obsession with a paranormal mystery threatens her job, marriage, and sanity as she fights to find a missing student.

Gustav from Interpol, finds out that his brother is involved in planning a major terrorist attack in Stockholm. In all secret, locked in a sinister hotel room, Gustav has to make a big choice, that may end in destroying parts of Europe.

A struggling novelist and her ex boyfriend travel to a friend's wedding only to find out that she has mistakenly ended up at the wrong venue. The guests of this joyous celebration conceal a sinister secret worse than any scary movie.

Acting boss Hirotani of the Ohara gang uses his friendship with corrupt cop Kuno to usurp a staged land deal that rival yakuza gang Kawade had arranged through local politicians. Open warfare erupts between the two gangs.
A prostitute looking for her next meal hitches a ride with a trucker that leaves her praying for her next breath.
Eda's quiet and small environment changes when she meets undercover cop Sarper. An unexpected love reveals all the secrets.

movie_name: Chirkut Chandan Ki Anokhi Prem Kahani
description: A comedy short film set in a small north Indian city called Kanpur, depicting an innocent teenager boy trying desperately to make a girl friend.
A woman with no memory of her past life finds she and her family are the targets of deadly assassins.
A series of love lessons, at first seemingly disconnected, that build up to a revelatory insight about how we love, and why we love, who we love.

A diabolic influence tempts a priest to help the Devil incarnate in a child, yet his birthplace keeps him imprisoned under a divine curse. Years later, filmmakers arrive at the Devil's house, a chance to escape his prison finally comes.
A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.
Set in the 80s, A man has an affair with his nephews teacher, but just before the wedding he gets married to another girl.
Within the city limits of Devilin lies a home the towns folk call "Hell House". A house that was once the home of a family accused of mass murder. A family known as the Reapers.
A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

A father takes his daughter, who is traumatized by demon attacks, in a rest house in time for holy week. He enlists the help of his spiritual healer cousin to protect her. But as they go nearer to Good Friday, the dark force intensifies.
When Murali, a ruthless man, tries to rape Suma, her lover, Pradeep, and Madhavan Thampi set out to fight his evil intentions.
The lives of three women all come crumbling down after one of the women discovers a secret letter written by her husband.

Young man who had lost his father falls in love with the local Chieftain's daughter, who opposes the romance. Only a miracle can save the couple's love affair and Our Lady of Charity intervenes in the name of justice.
In 2040 when there's no more water, Michelle a 12 year old girl never loses hope. But hope is not the only thing that she needs to survive in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world.
To save their real estate agency, an ambitious businesswoman and her entitled boss must convince an investor that they're married - despite hating each other.
Sundaram, a member of a musical band goes to chennai to earn money for his sisters marriage but his look-alike brother Ranjit, tricks him. Ranjit carries out his illegal trade without any trouble.
A stranger arrives to the small town of Passo Fundo, south of Brazil. And he's on a manhunt of a killer that turns in a giant drug conspiracy running by an international conglomerate.
A group of friends in Nuevo Laredo, Mexico "Villas", recording the destroying process of using drugs in a friend call Jorgais.
A story of love, friendship and the pursuit of adventure during the bloody and brutal reality of the 1944 Warsaw Uprising.

A female press agent must select a "Mr. Manhattan" and "Miss Brooklyn" for an ad campaign mounted by a struggling soup company. The Mr. Manhattan chosen is a singing soda jerk who doesn't want to play along.
A film about a husband of a mentally ill wife who goes on a last trip to Europe to see Venice before he is due to put her in a care community environment for the rest of her life.
We all do what we gotta do to pass - except Marc. Desperate to somehow finish his final final paper, he struggles to cram all night in the library. But the library has other plans for him.
After witnessing the sudden tragic death of his father; a masked vigilante takes on the path of vengeance to go after the man responsible, the notorious criminal...Mr. Razi.
While doing community service at a special needs home, a rebellious teenage girl develops an unlikely friendship with a young mentally handicapped man who lives there.

The storyline is loosely-based on Buffalo candy-maker August Merckens' opera-singer daughter Baroness Platon Von Wrangel, who married the Russian leader in the fight for restoration of the Russian monarchy.
Madhu and his two friends try to kidnap his girlfriend but gets the wrong girl. Soon the trio becomes involved in an extortion scheme
Students fear for their lives as mutant deadly killer bees invade. Horror and panic sweep the campus. Will anyone survive?
Jack and Mary Brown inherit an old cluttered house, but don't know that their daughter has become best friends with a homicidal psychopath who lives and hides in the garage.
Two Chinese-mainlanders living in Hong Kong form a close friendship. Over the years this grows into love, but there are obstacles.
Allen Quinton writes a fellow soldier's love letters; tragedy results. Later, Allen meets a beautiful amnesiac who fears postmen...

Tristan (Reza Rahadian) is the owner of the shop that buys and sells ex-lover items for people who want to move on. Suddenly, Laras (Marsha Timothy), his ex-lover, comes and makes his life turned upside down.
Set on the planet Draiga, this steampunk action film features world-class female martial artists and follows Azura as she tries save her dying race.
Baron Frankenstein, with the aid of a young doctor and his fiancée, kidnaps the mentally sick Dr. Brandt in order to perform the first brain transplant operation.
The art blood attracted Arika to Gatta who was passionate about dance. However, her mother did not like her being attracted to the world of dance, especially loving a dancer.
Satire on radio, built around the supposed feud between bandleader Ben Bernie and journalist Walter Winchell.

Six friends on a camping trip think they have discovered, and killed, a sasquatch. But what they have actually unleashed is something more evil, more ancient and more deadly than they could ever imagine - an army of supernatural terrors that will hunt them until no one remains.
Things get out of control when Doman, an eager and saintly traffic cop, is asked the play the role of the bank robber in a robbery intervention police training program.
A restless hit man in Mexico must hunt down a thief and the mysterious box he has stolen to save his love from a sadistic Kingpin rumored to be the devil.

movie_name: Lupin III: Legend of the Gold of Babylon
description: Lupin squares off with two criminal families and Inspector Zenigata's new female patrol to track down a hoard of biblical-era treasure.
A twenty-something tennis instructor/gigolo gets embroiled in a scheme involving seduction and insider trading.
A group of campers take a trip into far-off woods for a weekend of camping and partying, only to find out they're not alone.
15-year-old dropout Mike takes a job at Newford Baths, where inappropriate sexual behaviour abounds, and becomes obsessed with his coworker Susan.
Over-imaginative 12 year-old Sam heads off to the woods to summer scout camp with his pack convinced he will encounter a monster...and he does.
A collection of characters threaten to cross paths, unknowingly, during a night in the big city. The film focuses on two hit men who are bound to collide with Cates, a beautiful prostitute.
Mr. Abdi wants his son, Indira to get married soon because he doesn't want his son to be lonely like him. Indira is an independent woman and does not feel there is an interest in getting married.
After reuniting for their 10 year high school reunion, a dark secret from their past prompts three friends to seek revenge on the teacher who ruined their lives.
This tragic story revolves around the licentious Duke of Mantua, his hunch-backed court jester Rigoletto, and Rigoletto's beautiful daughter Gilda.

"Iskra" is the code name of the plan of the operation of the Soviet troops to break the blockade of Leningrad. In January 1943, the blockade of Leningrad was broken. Between Lake Ladoga and the front line formed a corridor 8-11 km wide.

A model and wannabe Bollywood actress, Sanjana, experiences bizarre supernatural events that make her boyfriend, Rohit, mistrust her. To get things back on track, they go to Lucknow on holiday, where things turn more dangerous.

A group of elderly Stunt Performers contemplate life while resident at the 'Magic Hour' Care home. They find themselves thrust in to a race against time when they get caught up in a kidnapping that's not quite all what it seems
Corbin Bernsen starts in this children's adventure where only the pure of heart will be able to find the key to breaking the curse that holds real pirates captive.
Sage's story continues after high school graduation as she grows her young surfer career by returning to Australia for the biggest surfer competition in the world.
Set in the fictitious European kingdom of Balanca, Prince Michael IV is being coerced, by his advisers, to marry a young woman of royal blood. However, he has fallen for a peasant.
A lawyer investigates the case of a woman who is adamant about taking the rap for a murder, although the details of the case don't add up.

A week before her marriage, a woman injures a man in a car accident. As she helps nurse him back to health, she starts to doubt the course her life is taking. Her father, a powerful dictator, is not pleased with the change of plans.

In a small Danube port, two women secretly board an Austrian ship: Haricleea, who, after losing her husband and son, wants to reach Istanbul and redeem the throne with the immense wealth looted from the boyars.
A group of genetically altered children mature much faster than the military had planned and must defend themselves and their suburban stronghold against special forces sent to shut down the program.
In Denmark, during the 6th century, Danish king Hrothgar and his warriors kill a troll whose son, Grendel, vows revenge.
Mathieu, 18, spends the summer at his mother's summer house, in Brittany. On the beach, he meets Cédric, a boy his age. A love-story begins between the two boys.
The story of a Naval officer who falls in love with the gorgeous daughter of a harsh and disapproving Vice Admiral.

At first, they make love even if they are not in the same country. She's in Paris, he's in Tel Aviv. Time passes and over-communication kills their privacy. In the end, they fall in love for the first time.
When Hunter wakes up from a fever dream, he's in a world he never envisioned; one filled with monstrous beasts and humans who appear to be melting at the seams.

Machine depicts the story of racing enthusiasts , who meet each other under mysterious circumstances. As their bond becomes stronger, they eventually fall in love. However, new things begin to unfold, which change their lives forever

As Poland is placed under martial law in 1981, two confidence tricksters try to evade both the police and the army. They become embroiled in a web of schemes engineered by the secret service, fellow criminals and the democratic resistance.
A federal agent poses as a criminal to infiltrate a gang of parolees seeking vengeance on the lawmen who jailed them.
After years of delaying having a child, a couple finally decides to have a baby but find that these days with fertility clinics and new technology, it is not as easy as they thought.
A transit correctional unit becomes the slaughter grounds for an evil creature that has found its way inside from beyond the walls.
A man is on a secret mission to retrieve an influential senator's son who has gone missing during active service. What he finds will change his life and question his perception of reality.

Inspired by actual events in the mid-1400s, the mighty Albanian king, Skanderbeg, returns home to reclaim his throne, and protect his people and a continent from the cruel conquerors who stole him as a child.

When a quick-witted but co-dependent college girl helps her best friend land a boyfriend, she's left on the outside looking in and is forced to deal with the realities of adulthood for the first time.

Nina (Bridie Latona) and Fynn (Ross Forder) fall in love at first sight on a late night train ride. Their relationship is rocky and leads to a painful breakup. But Fynn can never forget the woman he loves.
As a boy and his guardian wait to be rescued, they soon encounter the mysterious Yeren-- an elusive ape-man creature.

Two of the city's top detectives Kevin Tate and Smith Teasdale are caught in a web of betrayal and back stabbings while criminals scramble to get their hands on 100 million dollars of laundered funds.

movie_name: Untitled Benji Sandergaard Political Dark Comedy
description: After the accidental murder of an opposition member, an element of the country improves. Once the cabinet members realize the situation, they start to commit ritualistic murders to improve their country.

A coming of age story of triangular romance between a boy and two girls that explores the twin emotions of true love and teenage infatuation in a boy who perpetually finds himself in complicated situations both at home and outside.
A look in the lives of three friends, Charles, Manu and Raphaël, living and working in a skydiving center. In their own way, they will struggle to deal with issues that life puts in their paths.
Molti, Spotzl, Eigi and Pichla fall into the hands of a serial killer. Only their fans can save them.
Katie McCallister, an overachieving valedictorian, has her perfect life turned upside down when she's possessed by a malevolent demon, and it's up to her ragtag group of friends to save her.

Ririn refused to be forced to marry Jarwo because she loved Rangga. As a result of Ririn's behavior, Jarwo set a scenario of his death, where he was still able to terrorize Ririn via magical texts and calls.

As the staff of Good Friends Church Camp prepares for a spring break filled with "Fun Under the Son", a demon logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak his vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims.
Karuthamma, the daughter of a Hindu fisherman, falls in love with a Muslim fish trader. However, social prejudices seem to ruin their love life and invite the wrath of their communities.
An elite team of hand-picked saboteurs arrives in German-occupied Greece to complete a dangerous mission.
A film company arrives in a small town to shoot a biker movie. The film's director encourages his actors to "live" their parts, and the results are clashes with the townspeople that end in murder.

movie_name: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
description: A master call Fire Cloud is a bad guy, he wants to fight people but a hero from China don't like it and stop him. People is save again.
A young woman becomes filled with a horrible dread when she discovers that her brother may actually be something other than he appears.

Right after winning a fight in Las Vegas, Kurt Sloane is sedated and taken to a prison in Bangkok, where he's forced to fight a 6'10" giant for freedom and $1M - but this will require some intense training.
While filming a musical version of Gone with the Wind, a production company faces major set backs, including an invasion of zombies. A parody of "Making of" features attached to DVDs.
A homeless man unwittingly gets caught up in the life of a Russian mafia member who is trying to escape his past.
Vincent and Isabella experience instant attraction when they meet, but their life falls in danger when he accepts a job from the mafia to transport a sum of money.

Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

A priest estranged from the holy vows marries Clara and starts raising a family. After several incidents, he becomes wracked with melancholia and wanders aimlessly, unable to come to terms with his personal truths.

United States, early 1940s. A talented self-made aircraft creator Igor Sikorsky decides to construct the world's first serial helicopter, and his life-long dream turns into an adventure that takes him to the verge of life and death.
Seven unrelated people wake up on the 8th floor of an abandoned hospital. In order to escape, the seven strangers must fight through 7 levels of hell, consisting of various horrors.

Upon falling into New York's sewer, Alice is confronted with the fates of people affected by her family's Swiss bank and she attempts to rescue them at the risk of compromising her own protected life.

When an alien fugitive crash lands into a local puppy farm and begins turning people into machines that feed on puppy flesh, Dylan and her BFF Eddie have to decide whether or not to take on the SheBorg menace, and save the world.
Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.
A director and screenwriter pen a script and, in the process, blur the line between fiction and reality.
After the death of his father, a brilliant college student returns to his family home where he learns that the horrors from his childhood aren't as dead and gone as he once thought.
When a Foster Home is stricken by tragedy the few remaining children make a pact to always keep in touch.

movie_name: You Are the Apple of My Eye
description: In Japan in the early 2000s Kosuke Mizushima is a popular yet childish high school student living a comfortable life. He wants to start a relationship with his classmate, but she's a serious honors student.
A playful young man leads a very happy life, but everything changes when his father witnesses a heinous crime.

Antonio is a man who was born with unusually large incisors; his freakishly huge teeth make him an outcast from his peers as a child, and he attempts more than once to break off the offending choppers.
An inept gunslinger with an egotistical talking horse is recruited to save a town besieged by outlaws and evil aliens.

Samantha is kidnapped by a serial killer, locked in a cage, and forced to witness dozens of people being killed. After 10 days in captivity, the killer begins to fall in love with her until she is rescued by police.
After suffering a horrific tragedy while camping, a young woman's life is plunged into a dark, nightmarish world of chaos, where the lines between nightmares and reality, are strangely blurred.
The GI Joe force is reinstated for a confrontation when the Cobra terrorists acquire a deadly new weapon.
An alcoholic mother trying to flee her life, moves to a new house with her young son where she must battle her addiction as she is confronted by a real-life monster.

Buying a house was supposed to be a dream come true. But for Drew and Kara Townsend the nightmare has just begun as they are both afflicted with sleep paralysis and nightmares, while something sinister watches them sleep.

Life is difficult for fifteen year old Peter Parker, after being bitten by a genetically enhancer spider at Stark Labs several months previous. Balancing school life, homework, friends and girls with being New York's savior takes its toll.

Ali and Ava, both lonely for different reasons, meet and sparks fly. Over a lunar month a deep connection begins to grow, despite the legacy of Ava's past relationship, and Ali's emotional turmoil at the breakdown of his marriage.

Two dreamers meet on the Santa Monica Pier. A year later, Bobby follows his heart and flies from Detroit to Ukraine to visit Katya. Secretly, he wants to propose, but cultural shock and vodka keep getting in the way.
After an horrific accident, Will puts himself into a coma, leaving Subconscious stranded out of Will's head, so he makes a desperate attempt to get back to Will to wake him up.
Maya, who is from a rich family, leads a very happy life. However, her life turns upside down when she learns that she is an adopted child and she decides to look for her biological mother.
In 1937 Milwaukee, widowed Irishwoman Sara Flannigan and her five children meet German-born Nick Souter and they become one family in a public housing project called "Parklawn".
Ever Since We Loved, a story of a group of students in medical college in the 1990s, is an adapted screenplay based on Feng Tang's novel, Everything Goes.
Dr. Bernard Adrian is a kindly mad scientist who seeks to cure a young woman's polio. He needs spinal fluid from a human to complete the formula for his experimental serum.

When the U.S. Navy repealed the Combat Exclusion Policy in 1993, Missy Cummings stepped forward and maneuvered around a boys-club culture to become one of the first female fighter pilots and setup a world where future women could fight on.
A Parish Councillor and criminal take refuge at a remote countryside Inn, unaware that flesh-hungry werewolves inhabit the surrounding woodlands and are ready to feed.

When two Americans are kidnapped in south-east Asia, a black-ops team is deployed to do a snatch and grab, but they inadvertently opened up an ancient evil. Now they fight to survive from unseen sinister forces.
A disc with the names of Triad members is taken away, and when the gangsters try and find about where it is, they kill the only person who knows the hiding-place.
When his dead brother's dog tags turn up at the scene of a murder, a man consults with a scientist to piece together a mystery but finds deadly results.
TRICK is the story of three bad-intentioned trick-or-treaters invading the home of a young married couple on Halloween night - The wrong married couple.
A SWAT Member had assigned to destroy a chain of International Drug Mafia gang ,after disappearance his wife assigned to find out him.

Svetla, a widow who lost her job recently is living next to the Bulgarian-Turkish border. There are many cases of refugees in her village due to it's location. One day she meets a refugee from Africa and this changes her life.
The true story of Cindy Morgan, a single mother who when faced with losing custody of her kids, takes a high paying but dangerous job as a civilian truck driver for a government contractor in Iraq.

Brenda is brought to a satanic ritual by her evil cultist boyfriend. She refuses to join the cult, so they deem her traitor and take brutal revenge. She's framed, jailed, beaten and raped. Her defense lawyer, John, is her only ally.

A film director dreams of 2 young people in love. But the girl's father interferes with the director's dream and tries to prevent this love. The director resists the entanglement and does not change the story.
An electronics expert creates a huge bookie broadcast system for his crime boss, and takes over operations when his boss is murdered. His greed leads him on a deadly destructive path.
A rag-tag team of divers attempting to salvage a sunken car from a river are thwarted by a highly aggressive bull shark.
After trying to go straight, an ex-con is drawn back into the criminal underworld when his old gang kidnaps a woman.
When a family relocates to a remote, country farmhouse, a teenage skeptic uses science to investigate supernatural occurrences before ghosts of the "Grim Sleeper House" claim their next victim.
A small town Sheriff and his Deputy must investigate a series of shootings occurring around town before an angry town takes up arms and makes the situation worse.
A romance of extremes in Athens tomorrow. A cashier finds true love in the face of a young waitress who has just been released from prison. When he looses her, he travels all the way to get her back.

An insurance investigator tries to debunk claims that a couple's death was caused by a haunted house, but his doubts are challenged by a psychic and the mysterious occurrences he witnesses with his own eyes.
A girl moves back to her home city and struggles to maintain an old friendship whilst a new & exciting one emerges.
During last two hours of the year, the three stories are happening in the dark and deserted streets of coastal town of Split, separated from the wild New Year's Eve parties.
During the Korean War, a man takes a job as a war correspondant. His girlfriend hears nothing from him and is shocked when, years later, she learns that he is alive.
After returning from prison, Raja works as a social worker. But he makes many enemies who constantly try to plot against him.
The film centers around a juror on a high-profile case who is blackmailed into fixing the verdict after his daughter is kidnapped.
A gifted PhD. in Psychology ventures out to help a traumatized veteran where she discovers a war on child trafficking and an unexpected romance.
A cinema director who is in an emotional and professional crisis thinks that he has discovered a French star when he meets an ordinary dancer.
A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.
A strict headmistress runs a secluded school for wayward girls in 19th century France, whose students are disappearing under mysterious circumstances.

Robert, actor, is depressed. This is why he decides to go to his sister Gisèle's. Robert's return will somewhat upset his sister's life in a positive way and give him the strength to live his illicit love affairs.
A betrayed married woman's life change in one day after running into a man whose life has reached a crossroad. They make the right choices and their lives change between forever.
Amir is a reckless Naval Academy student trying so hard to impress the father of the girl he loves, who happens to be his academic professor and neighbor.
Abandoned in the wild as a child She Is feared by all who come in contact with her - but some have their own reasons to hunt her down.
After experimenting with mysterious substances, four chem students find themselves addicted in the worst way possible: they'll die unless they take more.

Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.
A husband, involved in an illegal arms exchange for blood diamonds, must fight a network of Somalian pirates after they seize his yacht and kidnap his wife and daughter.
During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.
Edgar Allan Poe's macabre masterpiece of murder and madness re-imagined as a modern day revenge thriller.

After reserving their dream wedding package at Niagara Falls, Dean and Darren learn they've booked themselves in a run-down motor lodge sandwiched between two chemical plants run by some guy named Shibbawitz and a Burmese refugee family.

A dark ambient alter-ego of film and music, showcasing one's ambitious, dreams, duty, and where life takes us in a cinematic experience that creeps slowly and dynamically within an entirely different headspace and experience.
Ming dynasty traitors have sent a secret message in a jade goddess statuette, containing their plans of treason to help tribal warlords usurp power from the Ming government.
Patsy Kelly as a prizefight manager who helps a truck driver be a champ. Good kelly comedy, Also with talents of great silent comedian, Charley Chase.
An orphaned boy falls in love with and writes anonymous letters a to 30-year old woman because she reminds him of his mother.

Said, the main character in the film Another Place, lives in Sweden but longs to be somewhere else. His integrity is suddenly and brutally violated when the police ransack his apartment and brand him as a terrorist.
A young man and his family encounter one of the many spirits that lurk throughout the Rio Grande Valley. He and his family must confront the evil head-on in effort to be freed from its grip.
A woman inherits a bakery in a small town, so she decides to trade her city life for a small town one.

Six friends celebrate the end of high school in a remote cabin in the woods of Colorado. They'll seek an adrenaline high in the form of a "suicide run": a night race to the river through the woods to fill a glass of water and return asap.
Three Brooklyn artists must discover that to find inspiration, a kiss of the muse is not enough... so they have sex with her.
After an attack on a Han village, Jade Tiger rallies survivors and unites others against the Tu Xi Empire and their leader, Absolute Ruler.

Alexey went through a lot. After cults, serial killers and old gods, nothing seems to surprise him. But his life is about to turn even crazier. Now he has to return to his sunken hometown for his last battle against the Great Old Ones.
A martial arts girl (Tamara Guo) teams up with a female cop (Farini Cheung) to smash and kick their way to final justice!
A group of strangers attend a psychic party and unexpectedly contact the spirit of a young murdered girl, unraveling the darkest secrets and deadliest of consequences.
Julia travels to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during World War II on the insistence of her lover Billimoria, and ends up falling in love with a soldier there, Jemadar.
A Spartan warrior faces off against mythological creatures in an effort to defeat Ares, the god of war. Feature film adaptation of the video game.
Shiro Kakei lives with his boyfriend Kenji Yabuki. Shiro works as an attorney and cooks well. He is meticulous and also thrifty. Kenji is a hairdresser with a good personality.
Nightclub entertainer Jean Clery discovers too late that the 'baby' he agreed to take care of is a wild, shapely sex kitten.
Suspense/Horror film set in real-time leading up to the clock striking 11pm. This is the time when most disappearances occur, leading to the premise of this feature - 'Never be alone at 11pm'

Rajan is a villager, marries Kavita, the daughter of his wealthy employer, when her marriage is called off due to unforeseen circumstances. Kavita, on the other hand, cannot tolerate Rajan and maintains contact with her ex-fiance.
The gendarme Cruchot meets the widow Josepha. They quickly fall in love but Cruchot's daughter doesn't like Josepha and is determined to prevent the wedding by all means necessary.

A young woman is invited by her girlfriend, who lives in an English country mansion, to stay there with her. The estate, however, isn't quite what it seems--and neither is the friend who issued the invitation.
The spectre of a disfigured man haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.
Raven, a recently freed man from prison must confront the people who put him inside. However, revenge is not always the answer, redemption is.
Three superheroes oppressed under the hands of a powerful monarchy, escapes, returned to their roots and bonded together to save the world?
Munna has been studying in the same class for 4 years. Now he is studying with his 5-year-old younger sister Jhuma while failing. You may think that the boy is a bad student but that is not the case.
A drug lord under arrested threatens the judges and the police. Meanwhile an undercover cop approaches the drug lord's girl to collect evidences.
High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?
Together with his best friends, Pasha planned to propose to his girlfriend Lisa. It turns out that Lisa broke their relationship because she chose another man. Pasha now is heartbroken.
A British intelligence officer in Allied-occupied Italy falls in love with an Italian woman, and risks losing his job as a result.
When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.
When India's top batsman goes missing in the Middle East, two mismatched cops must team up for a 36-hour manhunt before the cricket final.
Jake, thought dead, is back and finds many changes have taken place during his absence. His twin brother Chris is running things, funding a drug factory by organizing elaborate security van raids.
The erotic goings-on among the staff at Mr. Pawley's school in Jamaica are of great interest to young Sylvia, but her curiosity results in tragedy.
Ted is riding for Pa Martin against Cooper in the big race. When Cooper has his men capture Ted, Peggy overhears them and sets out to free Ted in time for the race.

The ex's friends decide to play match maker at the office Holiday Party; thinking the magic mistletoe and the season will be on their side. The result of might not be the fairy tale ending the friends were counting on.
The Mangled tells the story of a family who would stop at nothing to get their missing daughter back. But their secrets go back further, as the night unravels so do the Bates.
A man trying to survive in a post-apocalyptic world while searching for and reliving memories from the old world. A comedy exploring themes of loneliness, loss, darkness, happiness and adventure.
The attack of 8 Iranian F4 planes on the H3 base in Iraq near the border of Jordan. Based on a true story.
Detectives on a case involving a string of murders which seem to be carried out by victims of previous murders. 2 girls attempt to have a girl's night by ordering a man off of Craigslist.
A slacker gets a chance to save his family's boxing legacy, but on the way his car breaks down making his journey the biggest opponent he's ever faced.
After Selina's father dies, she's offered a job as a teacher in a small town and a new chapter of her life begins.
The main couple went on holiday to spend quality time together but there they meet Soledad's ex which provokes jealously into Mario. Together they come to terms with their relationship and jealousy.
When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?
A ninja fighter and his American girlfriend journey to Hong Kong in search of the man who murdered her father.

An aging hoodlum wants to turn over a new leaf and decides to invest in a tea-house. However, when the tea-house stands in the way of a development project supported by a rival gang, he must call upon his old gang friends to save his tea-house.

A Russian Special Forces member is falsely imprisoned on the alleged charges of murder and is sentenced to death. Once arriving to jail, he gets a choice between death and being a fighter in the underground prison rumbles.

Two brothers can no longer afford to keep their father in an institution, they take him to their old family home to settled back in. But old habits die hard, and the former torturer can't help but act according to his nature.

A writer, director and producer go to a cabin in the woods to write a film. They start well, before quickly disagreeing and debating films and the meaning of life. Things get heated but they are soon interrupted by strange goings on.
This is the story of a young, immigrant couple, whose love is tested by real life struggles and challenges on a foreign soil.
When a group of survivors on a remote island are sent a series of mystery packages, the future of their existence and fate of their land is decided upon their next actions.

A rock star-turned-bum, his vocal chords severed at the height of his career for the love of a woman, reclaims his forgotten past after viewing a music video and seeks revenge against the mobster who maimed him.

A young woman stumbles on a magic edible cookie that gives her the ability to leave her body and battle the demons that torment others. After losing the secret formula, she sets out to regain her powers and face her greatest enemy.
Based on the events surrounding the grotesque murder of Sister Margaret Ann Pahl by Father Gerald Robinson in Toledo, Ohio in 1980. A real life version of ROSEMARY'S BABY.

movie_name: The Moon Is... The Sun's Dream
description: A gangster in Busan is caught having an affair with his boss's mistress. The two decide to run off with the organizations money, leading to dire circumstances.
Eight classic monsters fight to the death in an explosive wrestling tournament set inside an abandoned and cursed graveyard.

During a remake of the play Tristan and Isolde, actors Peter and Ana fall in love. While the characters live an idealized love, the interpreters are living a true story, which they try to spice it up with the intensity of the fiction.
A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

Starblack is a hero who dresses in black and his face is covered by a black scarf and he carries in his shirt a black star, which he always leaves at the scene of his enterprises, as a symbol of justice.

Géo Paquet, aka The Gorilla, breaks from jail. Now an escaped convict, the elite agent must infiltrate a dangerous gang working for a foreign embassy as their leader, a spy enjoying diplomatic immunity, can't be arrested by regular police.
A wealthy business man, out of touch with real folks, decides to mingle and see what it is really all about.
An officer embarrasses a singer by walking away during one of her performances. He later apologizes and the two become closer, eventually falling in love.

An amusing minimalist frieze in fifteen episodes about human behavior (Desire, Submission, Love, Jealousy, Wisdom, Honesty, Sincerity, Passion, Faith...) situated between two fantastic stories about Willpower and Doubt.

Suraj is the grown up son of a wrongly accused woman who tracks down his father and uncle who banished his mother before he was born. There he meets his step-brother Pawan and tries to avenge the wrongs done to his mother.
When her husband comes home with a bloody shirt and a gun. Honey takes action with a basic instinct to save her husband from the night from two killers and the cops.
The son of a notorious pirate is placed on the path of righteousness by his love for a beautiful young woman.
Based on the true story of a German mailman who delivers love letters to a magical tree with matchmaking abilities.
In 1954, during the French Indochina War, an Eurasian female smuggler and a group of French Foreign Legion mercenaries, infiltrate the enemy territory in order to destroy an arms depot.
When a lonely girl encounters a disgruntled plumber over the Christmas holidays, an unexpected romance begins to blossom.

In 1946, a group of German POWs are mistakenly sent to a Soviet female transit prison camp and must cope with the hostility of the Soviet female inmates and guards, under the orders of cruel camp commander Pavlov.

In a world of darkness and fear, ruled by mercenary's and savages, the search for the ring of INFINITIUM, has led a girl and her friends to a forsaken land, after discovering the secret of the ring, she must reach safety.
When a woman trying to outrun her past ends up trapped between a zombie outbreak and warring militia groups, she must fight to find her way back home.

One man's son studies at the same college as another's daughter, but they are deadly enemies, whereas the fathers want them children to get married. Rajashree becomes friendly with both of them and plans to break their relationship.
The story of Borley Rectory, said to be the most haunted building in the world before it was mysteriously destroyed by fire just before WWII.
An artist gets a job at a beachside sandwich shop, where she hangs out with a techie, a flirt, a rocker, a hippie, and a Wiccan.
A traveling family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.
In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

The plot consists of different course of events, feelings and colorful pictures in a staggering tale of war, rivalry, betrayal and forbidden love. A story that lies in events recounted by descendants of Ninni and John's reality.

Dark Sunrise, a suspense horror thriller, has deep roots in the underworld. Three teenage girls arrive at a summer resort with their families, to discover a menacing creature has invaded their innocent world, with unwelcome results.

Based on the notorious Bangkokian gangs of the 1950s-60s. The story follows a newly released prisoner who desires to live straight, but knowing nothing else but the life of a gangster, he returns to his old gang.

movie_name: The Legend of the 7 Golden Vampires
description: While lecturing in China, Van Helsing agrees to help seven kung fu trained siblings reclaim their ancestral mountain village, now the domain of seven powerful vampires and their army of undead slaves.
Transhuman follows a young journalist into the underbelly of a transhumanist cult, spanning generations leading back to the nazi's during world war two.
Like Father, Like Son shows the extraordinary circumstances that test the loyalty shown by family, old friends, and strangers in a world in turmoil. Set in Afghanistan.
A camping trip turns into a living nightmare when a blizzard traps four friends in 36 inches of sudden snow -- and shrieking alien sounds outside of their tents.
A story of various vignettes about the insanities of LIFE, LOVE, and LOST. It's told through the lenses of 9 different filmmakers, multiple genres, with the use of the exact same dialogue.
After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.
Ali and Said two young people who grew up together in a city where poverty turned them into hungry beasts of money and wealth, then they use all means to become what destiny is not allowed them.
A small group of 'cleaners' are hired to clean up five dead bodies in an old warehouse, only find out that one of the bodies isn't quite dead.

In town to scatter the ashes of a beloved married couple, two frenemies join the debate over a bridge that benefits tourism and drug trafficking. The longer they linger, the greater the odds of their ashes being added to the urn.

movie_name: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - The Movie
description: Ultraman and his comrades from M-78 (including a new Ultraman, Zero, the son of Ultra Seven) join forces with other allies to fight a massive army of giant monsters led by the evil Ultraman Belial.
The demonic forces in the haunted Long Island house escapes to a remote home where it encounters a struggling family living together by uncertain means.
Chandramukhi visits Shimla and learns that she is a reincarnation of Paro, a girl who was raped and murdered. Plagued by her dark past, she attempts to bring the culprits to justice.
Rizal, a smoker, decides to quit after seeing his cousin Nizam cough up blood. The story follows his trials and tribulations as he overcomes the need for nicotine.

movie_name: Zhu Ge Si Lang da dou shuang jia mian
description: Silver Mask and Gold Mask and their gang of animal themed henchmen are after a magic sword entrusted to a little boy. It's Taiwanese madness with the star of King Hu's Dragon Inn.
An international team of scientists are summoned to a remote location in eastern Europe in an effort to breach the quantum barrier and travel to another dimension.
Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.
A clean cop gets assigned to a corrupt precinct, leaving him with two options: either give in or be next in line to have an "accident" wearing that badge.
A journalist uncovers a government conspiracy to unleash virus-carrying killer bees that could wipe out humanity.
After 3 years from hunting down androids, SEVEN is back and so is his past. In this psychological action thriller; he must once again conquer his inner demons and trust a few old friends.

Ryan Willburn (Stephen Baldwin), a Green War rebel Agent sent on a mission to collect evidence against the Confederate Central Government, for its heinous crimes. The mission quickly turns chaotic when he meets Tuag (Neva Leoni), a mutant survivor.
TV viewers love seeing the two reporters with opposing views on the show "He Said, She Said". Womanizer Dan and Lorie fall for each other. Love?
Exploding before you with raw, unrelenting fury and high-voltage talents that promises to be a jolting force in Philippine cinema. Smashing to a climax that shrieks with truth and passion.

A duo of gamblers is winning large sums of money at the casino. Two great private investigators are on the case; but, providing proof of foul play is easier said than done. Can they find the lair of the "Godmother", the elusive medium?

Bai Ji, a highly feared businessman, gets tricked by Boota Singh, a street smart, into unknowingly hiring him and his entire family. What follows suit is a comedy of errors as Boota Singh and family try to hide their true identities from.

movie_name: This Is for the Mara Salvatrucha
description: A drama focused on the life of former MS-13 gang member Brenda Paz, who left the gang to become an informant for the FBI.

A story starring Tamaki Hiroshi, Konishi Manami, Ikeuchi Hiroyuki, Hirayama Aya and Kamiki Ryunosuke. It tells the sad story of a student who wants to love but cannot because of a strange fate: people he befriends always pass away.
Two very dangerous young people, who despite the corrupt and lethal world they operate in, find a soulmate in each other.
A bounty hunter pig finds himself trekking the globe with a free-spirited elephant he intended to capture.

Armenian Affairs is a love story inviting us into a family circle and a glimpse of Armenian Culture. It's a story of survival and the relationship the main character shares with her adored King of Armenian Love Songs, Paul Baghdadlian.

Sudsy Slim Rides Again" is an action-comedy-heist movie about two fugitives who break out of prison and in an attempt to escape the town they're held up in, kidnap the town's most famous resident - The mummified body of Sudsy Slim.
Death Bell 2: Bloody Camp is about a group of high school students and teachers who get locked in the school after the swimming instructor is murdered.
Nirbaak is a medley of four tales of silent love, involving one woman (Sushmita), three men (Anjan, Jishu and Ritwick), a tree and a dog.

Famed director, Camille Stone, returns to her childhood home and only asset, a run down theatre her mother left her. Now she must fight for the theatre she didn't know she wanted and the friends she didn't know she needed.
Vincent Wong (Leo Fong) has a son who is kidnapped; he, his partner (Cynthia Rothrock) and a martial arts expert (Richard Norton) is put on the trail of the kidnappers for the showdown.

Jonas stumbles into a mysterious tavern which is detached from time and where people from all kinds of different eras meet. He falls in love with a Jazz singer from the 60s. But the time between the two will become their greatest enemy.
Ah Lung is a decent Law biding citizen armed with deadly martial arts skills he discovers he has a brother who is a gangster, Man Ho.

While in the employ of Mr. Worthington, James, Mickey and Whitey have made several successful and uneventful pickups, but one last pickup will prove to be an adventure and the difference between life as free men and life behind bars.
A coming-of-age story about young drug dealers' trials and tribulations in the pursuit of his dreams.
Historic swordplay of epic proportions tells the story about a hired assassin paid to assassinate the king
A soon-to-be stepmom is snowed in with her fiancé's two children at a remote holiday village. Just as relations begin to thaw between the trio, some strange and frightening events take place.
A fierce rock'n'roll band (OLGAS) decides to lock themselves up in a haunted house for songwriting inspiration. A cascade of voodoo shenanigans, zombie vomit and drug-fueled killings ensues.

Everywhere you look love is causing chaos. This is a story about love, friendship, deception, betrayal, and all of the chaos that ensues when a group of ten old friends reunite at the wedding of William and Katie.
Bea, who's going through divorce, meets Denis when he breaks into her home intent on robbery. Rather than turning him into the police, she starts talking with him.
A beautiful young woman is taken in a wild and hilarious journey through the heart of the lost American dream.

When a young Prince and his trusted aid learn of a beautiful Princess's cursed eternal slumber, they embark on a journey to rescue her. They must battle an evil queen and legions of undead monsters before she will be free.
Fan film following the events of John Carpenters 1978 Halloween with a bizarre twist introducing Donnie, the supposed Grandson of Michael Myers Dr Sam Loomis.

A single mother moves into a new house with her daughter. Soon after the young girl has her first baby tooth fall off, she begins to recount that she is having nocturnal visits by a tooth fairy. It seems the house has a sinister history.

When Alex buys some new tech designed to improve lifestyle, they realise they have become "haunted" by something unexpected. When things get too much, Alex flees to Rome for some headspace, but this is when things get really unnerving.
As the Russian Revolution in 1916 gains momentum, an idealistic youth joins the rebel forces leading the Bolsheviks to overthrow the Czar.

At first sparks fly when a beautiful gypsy widow and a lawyer widower meet. He later tries to get her to sign a settlement concerning the death of her husband and in the process they get to know each other better as do their daughters.
A professional fighter decides to quit the sport and go to college, but he finds out that his sister has gotten mixed up with gangsters.
A man whose life seems straight out of a classic Kannada movie faces highs and lows in life and love.

Part relationship drama and part sex comedy follows a middle-aged man who loves women and sex and can't stop cheating. He gets a divorce from his angry wife, but then cheats on his lovers. However, one of them decides to get even.
A journalist pursuing the identity of a notorious terrorist finds his deeper agenda threatened when a rookie analyst with the CIA begins peeling back the layers of his own hidden identity.
A married woman falls in love with an Economics Professor and becomes pregnant and insane by the physical relationship outside her married life.

"Can You Feel This" explores the queer identity, following McKinsey Collins, a questioning young woman struggling with trauma. McKinsey is court ordered to therapy where she discovers her true identify and uncovers her painful past.

movie_name: The Haunting of Eastern State Penitentiary
description: A team of Paranormal Investigators go to the most haunted prison on the planet, Eastern State Penitentiary, to disprove and logically explain why people say it's "haunted."
Suraj spots a couple making love on a golf course and video films the entire event. He blackmails the couple and asks them to ensure that he has a luxurious life in return for the footage.
A campus love story where the daughter of a policeman falls in love with a poor boy but, her parents wish for her to marry a policeman. Will the young lovers be united?
When the two brothers Daniel (Aaron Dill) and Josh (Jacob Tolle) are having to fight for their lives when an intruder enters their house.
Poor bookkeeping saddles stock car driver Steve Grayson with a huge bill for back taxes which hampers his ability to continue racing competitively.
Set during a record-breaking snowstorm in Massachusetts, on a house with a small, secret room hidden beside the fireplace.

Cult Members make an old Toy Maker create a demon puppet he names Krampus to bring fourth the full power of Krampus. Krampus must feast on the lives of children. Will he claim all the kids he need or are they strong enough to fight back?
Yong hears a stranger's voice from the future, connecting them to each other and sharing their love stories.
A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

In the late 1890s, a young widowed woman becomes a successful farmer and can send her son, nicknamed 'So Big', to college. After graduating, he finds a job as an architect, but forgoes his dream in favor of an immediate financial success.

A reality TV show is about to be cancelled due to low ratings when one of the contestants accidentally becomes a Zombie on live TV. As the ratings soar, the producer tries to keep the show going until everything spirals out of control.
Zinat is the maid of Salar Khan's house, in a border village, she is expelled from her house while she is pregnant.
When a madman kidnaps a young boy and rigs him with explosives, Ray defies his captain and takes matter into his own hands. Now he must beat the clock and save the innocent child.
When a stymied NYC deli owner discovers he's actually the product of an illicit affair, he sets out to bond with his real dad - who just happens to be the biggest mafia Don in Italy.
The simpleton identical twin brother of a filmmaker not only gets his hands on this brothers camera but he also gets his hands on his brothers girlfriend.
Love Me Anyway is a sun soaked drama about a filmmaker in love with a surfer, and a young wife exploring the greener grass of an extramarital affair with another woman.
After being slain by a group of criminals, a man is reborn with animal-like superpowers and makes it his mission to right the wrongs of his city.
Sing Incense And Peppermints in the Style of "Strawberry Alarm Clock". Stingray Karaoke Rock, Classic Rock, 1967, English, Key Em.
Relationship expert Amor Rose helps couples bring back the spark in their relationships by teaching them to understand their spouses' love language.

A mature woman tries to persuade a friend, known from childhood, to marry her in order to collect a will.. In the meantime, a friend of hers, which is a musician falls in love with the daughter of the groom's to be boss..

He thinks he's a spaceman...they thinks he's a killer. Peter goes on a journey to save the world, encountering fragile young Lizzy, whom he saved from an awful fate, and finally finds his way home to reconcile with his father.

Fredo, an assistant to scientist Prof. James Manalo, becomes the superhero Fantastic Man upon discovering an ancient orb and must battle against Diabolica, not knowing that she's his girlfriend who's possessed by an evil alien spirit
An action packed trilogy following world in which evolution and creation coexist, and a battle to save humanity.
A hairstylist becomes a serial killer and blames his abusive upbringing for his murderous tendencies.
An English explorer disturbed by the practices of an isolated tribe attempts to rescue a native girl with whom he has become fascinated.

movie_name: At Home Among Strangers, a Stranger Among His Own
description: Set during the Civil War between the Reds and the Whites that followed the 1917 revolution in Russia
The story of the nineteen-year-old Christian hymnographer, Kassiani, and the young ruler, Emperor Theophilos, in sixth-century Byzantium.
During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.
Days before her wedding, Kiki finds herself waking up next to Jack. However, Kiki isn't the only guilty party in the relationship.
Mothers - This is your story, daughters - this is your picture, See this and look at yourself in the mirror without butting and eye.
Pure evil has no religion. A new film from Robert J. Mulligan III, starring Ken May and Erik Anthony Russo.
An Irish fisherman discovers a woman in his fishing net whom his precocious daughter believes to be a selkie.
Vithal, a fearsome gangster, hates women and is a bachelor at the age of 45. However, the prank of a college student, Kaveri, makes him fall in love with her.
A man trying to get away from it all finds both love and conflict in the woods in this offbeat drama from Lithuania.
A mysterious martial arts master takes revenge on the black Dragon gang for the murder of his father.
Sky's last night in DC before she moves to NC is sidetracked by a chance meeting with an attractive stranger.
When strange beings called Mingebags invade the servers of the popular game Garry's Mod, one player must try to survive while searching for his friends amid the chaos and war.
Veronica, 22, meets a writer and a drummer hunk at a club on Halloween. Why choose when she can have both? 3some? But then a third man comes along.
Patrick fights his deepest fear when a sinister threat from his childhood returns to haunt him, only this time he fights not just for himself, but for his family.
Two long-distance best friends change each other's lives when she decides to pursue a lifelong dream and he volunteers to keep an eye on her teenage son.

Sex drugs and the outdoors. Turning 30 does Kit become a responsible women or keep following her hedonistic lifestyle thats leading to debt and destitution, as the party goes on forever. What does it take takes to grow up at 30?

Elephant poachers Joe Collins and Bob Warren plan to steal a load of ivory which the natives want to give to the missionary, Miss Banks, but Bomba the Jungle Boy calls on friendly elephants to trample them to death.
After what happened in outpost 31, a team at McMurdo station, his sent to investigate, when they get there, the base is destroyed and they find two dead bodies in the ice.
When violence erupts at a detention center, a police officer combats armed prisoners - as his wife goes into labor without him. Inspired by real events.
A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

Six friends get together for a New Years party. When the guests leave, an old man enters and offers these six friends an opportunity to see the next year of their lives. What they will see, will forever change their lives and destiny.

movie_name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
description: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

This is a touching and somber journey of Lasya, who lives with her father Karma and younger brother Chomo in a remote village in the Himalayas. Pristine snow capped mountains surround their...                See full synopsis »
An ex-con is deported to the Dominican Republic, where secrets from his past will force him to forge alliances with the prostitutes.
Story of a bus driver who had to deal with unexpected, pitiful events caused mainly by his rebellious little brother.
A criminal gang of old timers attempt to pull off the largest burglary in English history at an underground safe deposit facility with an estimated value of £200 million.
An innocent man is implanted with a bomb, on a race to save his life teamed with an alcoholic LAPD Bomb Squad cop looking to save his career and to possibly save a life in the meantime.

The caliph of Baghdad must go into hiding with a group of traveling performers when his brother usurps the throne. Both brothers desire a beautiful dancing girl, who is torn between power and true love.
Young women are being abducted by a masked killer. Graverobbers and poison darts also feature as our heroine discovers which of the men in her life is the psycho.
A married teacher/closeted lesbian meets a young, free spirited singer who will allow her to rediscover herself.
A college professor who teaches a class in the paranormal takes his students to a haunted asylum for the night.

A vampire named Saya, who is part of covert government agency that hunts and destroys demons in a post-WWII Japan, is inserted in a military school to discover which one of her classmates is a demon in disguise.
A simple handyman at a drive-in movie theater tormented by his alter ego, a gorilla mask wearing psychopath, preys on the theater's patrons.

20 years after the death of his parents, a martial artist sets out to avenge their deaths by pretending he doesn't know kung fu. But when it is revealed that he does know kung fu, the killer sets to kill him and his friends.
Six ex-classmates decide to spend some holidays together in a manor house in the countryside. Very soon, the jovial mood progressively deteriorates as strange paranormal phenomena start to happen.
A Girl with name Nidhi lost her memory and mental balance after getting shock . A Man with name Shyam fall in love with Nidhi while taking care of her.
Carla is abandoned by her husband while vacationing on a national park. There she finds herself stranded with a Norwegian backpacker and a former pop star.
A woman finds romance through an online dating site, but her ex-boyfriend has plans to win her back.
During a slave revolt in 1844, a British mercenary helps an Antilles island colony gain independence from Portugal, but later returns to hunt down a local rebel leader and former protégé.

The government cover-up of the causes behind a massive explosion in a futuristic UK metropolis spur photo journalist Jennifer Preston on to search for the truth and in the process blow open a paranormal phenomenon haunting the city.
An escaped convict and the detective tasked with hunting him down end up working in parallel to clear the convict's name and nab the gangsters that framed him.
When a mysterious symbol appears on the hands of a group of friends they discover that they are marked to be the next victim of a killer that no one can ever see or hear coming.
When a special forces soldier loses everything he ever loved, the only thing left is redemption - Without any remorse.

movie_name: Vamos a soñar por el amor
description: Two friends celebrate the triumph of their team, leaving their wives alone, who decide to celebrate on their own.
Hari and Meera are close friends who work in an IT company. Their life takes a turn when one of their close friends gets murdered.
Min-jae leaves behind his beloved Eun-ji in order to make money. Five years later, they meet again but now he's a playboy and she is a mistress of a military officer. Their love rekindles.

A woman gets engaged with her current boyfriend, a mysterious and secretive businessman, when she starts getting messages by who seems to be her old teenage love. Soon, she'll start finding out the dark trues of the two men.
A bank robber meets a girl after having achieved a coup and while trying to flee from the police, this meeting will represent the possibility of changing his destiny.

A young man sleeps for a living, giving his surplus sleep to an unstable, violent TV executive, experiences a breakdown between his real life, his dreams and television as an actress from the small screen enters his real life.

While on an archaeological expedition on a remote mountain, a group of young people stumble across a piece of jewelry that belonged to Belle Starr. One of them steals the piece and incites the wrath of Belle's ghost.
When a city is infested by crime, a notorious gangster makes an unlikely friend and changes the community.
Karan and his mother live a happy life and he is soon to be married to Kajal. But on the day of his engagement, he discovers his mother is not his biological mother.
Four Dungeons and Dragons players get more than they bargained for when simultaneously meddling with the occult and hacking the government mainframe.

Tyra, a young and wealthy schoolgirl, violently crosses paths with Tyson, a working class guy trying to save his family's house from foreclosure. This fateful encounter leads to a string of bank robberies and dead bodies.

movie_name: Mariannes bryllup eller hævnen er bitter
description: Jørgen is a gambler - always short of money. He marries a rich man's daughter and gambles in the inn, while she waits for him in the honeymoon cabin. Love?

While visiting family in Mexico, teenage Alex gains an unlikely companion when he discovers a young chupacabra hiding in his grandpa's shed. To save the mythical creature, Alex and his cousins must embark on the adventure of a lifetime.
In a dystopian snow bound America, a grieving husband enlists the skills of his gun slinging brother to exact revenge upon the marauding sadists who murdered his wife.
A lonely woman living in Tokyo decides to take an English class where she discovers her alter ego, Lucy.

Gamal AbuElhassan disappears in an abandoned palace by abnormal forces, his brother try to find him with the young author of horror stories and his friend, and they find out that this strange palace is possessed by evil powers.

Directed by Edu Felistoque and Erik de Castro, the film "Amado" was inspired by a real events. Blind to color, creed or sex, the police officer doesn't care if the individual is a thief or a policeman.
A young student tries to determine if his reality is descending into madness or if there's some possibly more malevolent force at play.

movie_name: The Making of the Anna Sophie Story
description: A movie crew while on location in a haunted castle experiences paranormal side effects. It is up to the management team to keep the production going and finish the movie.
