Covering up her failure at exams, careless girl plays tricks at her family and friends, finds herself juxtaposed to her fellow-villager namesake with flawless career, and finds the love of her life.
In purgatory for his role in a botched bank robbery, former carnival barker Billy Bigelow (Jackman) is sent back to his old life to for one day, where he's to fix the problems he left behind.
Ashley, who has weird "special" feet, pairs up with amateur shoemaker Chuck for a shoemaking contest. While making the perfect shoes, the unlikely pair becomes the "perfect fit" for each other.
Tres hermanas cubanas llegan a madrid en busca de una situación mejor. En Madrid encuentran a una tía que emigró mucho antes y a oytro cubano que intenta seducirlas y...explotarlas.
An explorer's return from 'death' kills his French wife and he marries the girl who adopted his son.

A rock & roll romantic comedy set in NYC about the pursuit of love, passion, and the meaning of life, all punctuated by an original, pulsating soundtrack and live performances by the all girl group MaxiTit.
During the German occupation, Greek commandos secretly disembark on an Aegean island, planning to eliminate the German guard.

The wife of a galactic dictator makes the decision to leave her husband and take her three kids: Aine, Adam, and Puck, to her home world. But the dictator husband, with armies at his disposal, isn't going to let her go without a fight.
When a young businesswoman deals with the devil, she goes through hell to keep her ever-lasting soul.
Justine is kidnapped by Professor Robson's arch nemesis in an attempt to force her to reveal the location of the jeweled "The Eye of God". Can Professor Robson rescue her in time?
Doctor Selda wants Ozan helps to get back with her beloved Caner, but he started a new relationship to forget his old love.
After an unknown virus spreads throughout the country, the decision is made to evacuate Great Britain. Unfortunately, many were too late.
A young boy discovers an old chest hidden away in his father's storage unit, unaware that inside lives a mischievous demonic spirit that will do anything to get out.
Zaur and Tahmina are deeply in love. But Zaur's mother is not thinking highly about Tahmina. Further incidents affect him.
The investigation of the video files documenting an online support group's eerie encounters over the course of several days. As the shocking case is unraveled, the unthinkable is revealed.
An unaccredited tour guide and a heartbroken tourist form a romantic bond as they explore the wilds of Philippine Islands.

Ajit a notorious gang leader falls in love with a gorgeous girl Sonali accidentally. However, his life turns complicated as an enemy tries to kill him. Sonali believes Ajit is killed. She marries another man, but he returns for revenge.
A group of friends play an online game that forces them to reveal their true selves in order to claim a large cash prize.

Atrocious serial killings on holidays in Gotham City send The World's Greatest Detective into action - confronting both organized crime and a unified front of classic DC Super-Villains - while attempting to stop the mysterious murderer.
A down on his luck street magician and his con artist ex-wife reunite to swindle an accounting firm.
A director's dream job quickly descends into a nightmare when he is forced to film a real-life murder.
An Indian spy takes on the leader of a group of mercenaries who have nefarious plans to target his homeland.

Tale of a female nurse trying to maintain a balance between her professional life and her emotions who falls victim to the natural feeling of love and compassion when a person takes care of another person.
Life is a balancing act and most fulfilling when we embrace its dualities; the ups and downs, good times and bad, and all the joys and challenges in between.
A sword dealer/martial arts instructor uncovers the history of the Spark Blade, a priceless, ancient samurai sword, as he faces off with a gangster who'll stop at nothing to have it.
A man becomes destructively obsessed with killing a dangerous rat, which has taken residence in his recently renovated house.

movie_name: The King Kong That Appeared in Edo
description: In part one of this silent two-part film, an ape nicknamed King Kong by its master kidnaps the daughter of a wealthy man as part of a revenge plot by one of his lackeys. The story concludes in King Kong Appears in Edo: The Episode of Gold (1938).
A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.
During the early 1980's two young couples, along with mysterious security guard become trapped in a warehouse amidst the zombie apocalypse.
A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.
A psychology student with a severe fear of being alone imprisons himself in a house for one night to face his fears. Only, not all those fears are unreal...
The third movie of the trilogy about Armenian Bolshevik revolutionery Kamo. He is sent abroad to his last assignment.

Retired over the hill Secret Agent Nick Souls is called back for one last mission. The nation needs someone to go it Old School because of certain things that has happened to modern technology which has put a hold on everything.
After visiting a funeral, six friends are slowly hunted one by one during their trip up north together as the full moon rises.

movie_name: Zhongkui: Snow Girl and the Dark Crystal
description: Legendary Chinese anti-hero Zhong Kui, a young man endowed with mysterious powers who is forced into a battle among the realms of Heaven, Earth and Hell in the course of his attempt to save his countrymen and the woman he loves.
Set in late Qing Dynasty, the heroine of Tianhu lake protects national treasure against foreign powers.
Sometimes love blooms once again at the most unlikely stages of ones life. These are stories that are a little bit exceptional. And Jara Hatke is one such story.
A bounty hunter with a pregnant wife who is urging him to get a regular job gets framed for murder and trapped in a war between Russian gangsters.
A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

movie_name: Ambiguity: Crónica de un Sueño Americano
description: Ambiguity is an action, drama, thriller, adventure film that brings to light the reality of illegal immigration to the US.
Michael tried to protect three children as he is chased by Mr Big and his army across a city. Excerpt from Moonwalker 1988.
Brad and Gregor, two broke medical students in their final year and debut to a loan shark, must resort to contentious lengths to finance themselves. A fresh comedy with scruple less students.
In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

After returning home from war, veteran Josh Cameron discovers the source of his PTSD may be more horrific than he imagined. Josh learns that he never made it back home from Iraq and that he was actually in purgatory.
An FSB spy hunting a rogue oligarch join teams to stop a Russian terrorist attack against NATO Headquarters

Police officer Patty Butler, alias "Chicklet," is the live-in girlfriend of Thomas 'Stick' Henderson to gather evidence. Detective Bo Lockley is instructed to try to find her, not knowing she's also a cop.

After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesn't die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

movie_name: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
description: As part of a sorority ritual, pledges and their male companions steal a trophy from a bowling alley; unbeknownst to them, it contains a devilish imp who makes their lives a living Hell.
Two couples rent a secluded house for a weekend getaway, and encounter an odd caretaker while facing a dangerous secret.
An eccentric scientist teaches a student in his own manner while he looks for a way to clone his deceased wife.

Starring Kristy Swanson. After her dad dies, Kilee feels the world is against her, until she finds a doll, riddled with pins, in her backyard. Believed to hold supernatural powers, Kilee is concerned when the doll starts acting on its own.
A devoted and single woman and her daughter. The mother's nickname is 'Bokuseki' (wooden head) because of his supposed stubbornness.

After an artist is threatened by the yakuza into creating valuable but highly illegal pornography, the law aims to execute him. Zatoichi, having been honor bound to protect the man and his family, must now run against the law.

Follows a fictionalized version of Kevin Hart, as he tries to become an action movie star. He attends a school run by Ron Wilcox, where he attempts to learn the ropes on how to become one of the industry's most coveted action stars.

Once upon a time, a princess named Erin Almeda played the innocent heart of their school geek, Leonard Jamieson. Seven years later, they crossed paths. And it seemed like their roles have been reversed.
There's an old tale about three Mexican witches who performed abominations at an old eerie mortuary along the border of Texas and Mexico. New haunting's have occurred.
A mysterious woman called Rose hires an assassin to kill five men but the situation becomes more complicated for him as agents from both North and South Korea become involved.
A rich businessman wants to marry his secretary, but first he has to pass muster with her middle-class family.

An intimate story set during the 1860s in which a young Irish woman Sarah and her family find themselves on both sides of the turbulent wars between British and Maori during the British colonization of New Zealand.
Handsome bachelor Giulio finds himself seducing woman after woman. But his seductive ways take a dangerous turn when the young playboy finds himself in bed with a powerful mobster's wife.
In a small Mexican town, a Catholic priest (Sir John Mills) and a local bandit (Sir Dirk Bogarde) clash, but the brave priest ultimately wins the outlaw's respect.
The protagonist, who's a bit rough around the edges, falls in love with the sister of a friend, but the road to romantic bliss is not to be a smooth one.
Lance and his team are bodyguards for NSA's head, who is sent by the President to a secret meeting in an empty hotel outside Bucharest. During the meeting, the hotel is attacked. By whom? And why?
Before the premiere of 'Metamorphosis', Two women fell in love with the same actor who is kidnapped by a helpless aboriginal father. They must rescue their lovers at the soonest.

A blind boy, who lives alone with his mean sister in a rundown hotel in Venice, receives a vision that warns him of the upcoming birth of the Antichrist. Soon, his sister mysteriously becomes pregnant.
Seven friends take a vacation to remote town, but the fun suddenly stops when they encounter the residents of this small town in the boonies.

Sir John Locksley, the greatest jewel thief, decides his most prized possession, the Shalimar Ruby, should be passed on to a worthy successor. He invites the best rival jewel thieves to his island estate to participate in a deadly contest.

Eddie, a small town ex-con, discovers he has talent for selling anything and everything. Eddie sees a way to rise above the low life by setting up on his own. What he didn't bargain for, was the murder and mayhem along the way.
Mahendra, a multimillionaire businessman, chooses a wealthy young man for his daughter, Lahari. However, she insists on getting married to her boyfriend, a mere car driver.
Vijay, a Tamil professor, is in love with Uma, a lawyer. Along with Ravi, he fights to put an end to prostitution and the production of illicit liquor in their locality.

Ramana falls in love with Sulochana but their relationship fails to materialize due to which he decides to end his life. He then meets a soul that communicates with him to make him realize the importance of life over love.

A low-budget film producer begins shooting his next two epics, "I Rip Your Flesh With Pliers" and "Werewolves in Heat." What he doesn't know is that his sexy young wife wants him dead, and plans to use the films as a cover to do it.

After the death of the elderly Matilde Cisneros, her three daughters set the wake before a neighbors that turns its back on them, a priest in war with the family, and the unexpected arrival of his eldest son.
When the agha dies, his son, Dervis, returns to his village to end the blood feud and restore peace. But the peace cannot be achieved.
A teenager is trying to balance his life as his alter ego vigilante Cuervo, to serve justice and find all the people behind Raven's death.
Ex-military commander David Guerra is hired by shady millionaire Anthony Levin to rescue his wife Valentina who was kidnapped by Javier Martinez, leader of a guerrilla group.

After being denied an American visa, a Bolivian professor becomes involved in a web of criminal activities, holds-up the American consulate and falls for a beautiful prostitute from the Bolivian lowlands.
The summerly adventures of Kurt (Tucholsky) and girl friend staying in a Swedish castle whilst the political changes in Germany in the thirties.
When a black ops team is sent to investigate the crash of an unidentified aircraft, they soon find themselves being hunted by the former occupants.

A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

While on wire room duty, a federal agent listens in as the target is attacked in his home by a hit squad. Without burning the wire, he must protect the investigation and the target's life from the confines of a room fifty miles away.

After Finland's Independence Day celebration is interrupted by a terrorist attack on the Presidential Palace and distinguished guests are taken hostage, a security service officer tries to uncover who is trying to destabilize Europe.
A group of lovely pearl divers on the Taiwan coast call on the help of an expert martial artist when they start to get exploited by a group of ruthless triads.

In the Sudan, in 1884 to 1885, Egyptian forces led by British General Charles "Chinese" Gordon (Charlton Heston) defend Khartoum against an invading Muslim Army led by a religious fanatic, Mohammed Ahmed el Mahdi (Sir Laurence Olivier).

When a career criminal is double-crossed he goes after his money and revenge but quickly finds himself knee deep in cannibalistic clones, flamboyant gangbangers, and absurd doses of crimson blood and gold teeth.
Mumbai Pune Mumbai 3 shows Gautam and Gauri's after marriage life. It is the sequel of the 2015 film Mumbai Pune Mumbai 2 (2015).

A compassionate captain takes a homeless stowaway in his house to live with his money-grubbing family; however, when he is lost at sea, they will rush to take control. But, is he truly dead? Can his "resurrection" force a change of plans?
After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.
A specialist carrier is hired to deliver a mysterious case to the underworld's most dangerous hitman.

A story of trust, death, friends and the end of the world..Three friends trek from place to place looking for family and provisions, in a time when the world has ended. The moon glows red, ...                See full synopsis »

A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.
A volatile young married couple moves from Los Angeles to Vermont in search of a geographical marriage fix.

In 1942, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, a casino is organizing a farewell party for its patrons, since it's about to be turned into a U.S. Military base. The guests drink, seduce, and gossip, but some also plot against each other.
A Story About A Young Manger, Unknowingly Fall In Love With His Friend'S Sister. But He Faces Lot Of Issue With His Love Life And Finally He Manages To Find His Love Of Life

An outcast returns to his stomping grounds to settle a score with the crew that betrayed him. He soon finds himself in the cross-hairs of a dangerous power struggle, and must choose between the seductive lure of money and the sweet revenge.

When a group of friends enjoying a bachelor cruise in the Caribbean stumble upon a research facility on a remote island, a deadly virus is unleashed. The group must find a way to survive before the flesh eating virus consumes them all.

Six friends journey into the mountains in search of a thirty year old plane crash. In a horrifying turn of events, they soon find themselves the prey of flesh-eating creatures that relentlessly pursue them through the wilderness.
A man believes he is losing his mind because his new wife seems to have the supernatural power to haunt him.

A small-town group of friends are capture by mysterious futuristic soldiers and taken to a massive spaceship in the clouds. Now they must work together to escape, but will this event bring them closer together, or tear them apart?

Nancy Allen plays an investigative news reporter Jillian Gray, who, along with her daughter is kidnapped by white slave king Cicero, after getting too close with her investigation. Now that she has escaped, she seeks revenge on Cicero.
Scarlet and Lionel traverse the world in a race against time to stop the Werewolf pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.
JUNE is a 9-year-old orphan girl who shares her body with an ancient supernatural being whose mission is to destroy mankind to allow nature to prevail on earth.
A group of people go camping in the woods for the weekend only to become terrorized and hunted by a man who has snapped into a psychotic rage.

A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

Paul Hanganu loves two women. Adriana his wife and the mother of their daughter, the woman with whom he's shared the thrills of the past ten years, and Raluca the woman who has made him redefine himself. He has to leave one of them before Christmas.
A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.
Several attractive actresses in their 30s are in difficult financial situation and schemed a cunning plan...Each of them will seduce the same rich man and rob him without having sex with him.
A young breakdancer experiences a series of complications involving a poor opera performer he befriends, his older sister and jealous cousin, a female student, two rivals, and a lunatic.
While traveling across country with her fiancé, Beth wakes alone in an isolated clinic to find her unborn baby has been removed. Just how far will she go to get her child back?
An orphan working as a Pizza delivery boy and the daughter of a caste-based politician are forced to get married in an unforeseen situation.
Find your husband in 60 minutes. An informational and motivational film about how to successfully pursue the matrimonial journey.

Maxwell Anderson, a leading, world renowned Doctor and biologist, who specialises in bacterial, virulent and parasitic pandemics, is recruited by a secret department at the Ministry of Defence to investigate a new disease.
A badminton club is on the verge of bankruptcy. In order to save their club, the owners organized badminton match hoping to restore its old day glory.

On October 31, 2012, in North Hollywood, California, a group of high school friends decided to document their Halloween night out. Upon stumbling a horrific bloody attack, it soon quickly turned into the worst night of their lives.
An international action drama, The lost Number is the story of a redemption-seeking English woman going against all odds to save a remote slum in Africa.
A visual incursion into the troubles psyche of a young boy whose unstable and manipulative mother committed suicide in front of him.

Two contractors are shot down by terrorists testing a new EMP weapon. The two now forced to team up with an impossibly actress, are now the only people standing in the way of a successful attempt on Air Force One.
A beauty pageant sets the scene for Miss Hoo-Ha! Little do the Beauties know that a killer is stalking and killing each one.

Andi's life is a constant battle for his home, his three children and the woman he still loves. He only has two weeks to pay her back the borrowed 5,000 EUR. When he loses his job, an amateur boxing tournament looks like the only solution.

The Manhattan General Hospital admitted a string of young women raped by something otherworldly. Dr. Pace and Detective Andriotti try and isolate the strange organic material found on the victims to find the fiend.
The whole story of the film happens in one night. It starts with the film's hero Murali accidentally meeting a young girl Meera on the day he wants to end his life.
Five modern day criminals are hired for a job - only to find themselves facing their own redemption.

movie_name: Operation; Get Victor Corpuz, the Rebel Soldier
description: The man had to be stopped from using his expertise for the NPA. - this action-drama is based on the true-to-life story of PMA officer and gentleman, Victor Corpuz, the rebel solder defected to government enemy lines.
The relatives of a recently deceased man named Kovac gather at is creepy mansion for the reading of the will. Before the will can be read, however, the relatives began to be murdered one by one.

A snake demon in Changshou City mutilates living beings. The Descendants of the Seven Swords, adhering to the duty of guarding the peace of the world, fought the snake demon on the Black Devil Cliff and sealed it.

The students are told that they will either succumb to the persistent bad luck of a curse placed upon their families or find a way to apologize to the fallen cult leader. The students decide to have a séance in the cemetery.

Cosette is cursed. Demons Ghouls and Ghosts from the darkest corners of Hell are summoned to bring her to the other side. Now Cosette and Klaus her protector must face an unspeakable evil in an attempt to free her from this demonic curse.

When Lucy, a young grieving woman who's lost the will to live, is in danger of going back to jail, a mysterious man with psionic powers helps her out, only to realize that he has a dark reason to keep her alive.
A farm boy recruits a band of outlaws to save the planet Akir from forces that threaten to wipe them out from the face of the universe. A battle stretching beyond the stars begins here.
Raja and Madhu fall in love and decide to get married. However, her brothers are against the alliance and devise a plan to drive the two apart.

The wife of a murdered CIA agent awakens from a five year coma focused on finding the person who put her there, who murdered her husband, and what the assailants have done with her three year old daughter.
Two survivors, who appear unwilling to answer questions, are the only links authorities have to a spate of attacks that have hit rural South Africa.
For love is our anthem, our dream and golden flame--to make beautiful tomorrows as we burn yesterday's sorrows.
Based on the myth of Frau Perchta, a witch that comes on the 12 days of Christmas taking children each night.

One day Chazaj pays a visit to the poor artist Simon and asks him to paint his portrait. Simon agrees but in the end he commits suicide. After Chazaj's death, the picture changes hands and brings misfortune to all who own it.
Justin is an awkward teenager by day and an expert lock-picker and poet by night. He attempts to win the heart of April Grace.
Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.
Captain Gopinath, along with Serina, the daughter of a Pakistani army general, must derail Pakistan's plans of using a nuclear bomb against India in the wake of their lost war.

Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis, who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees, is sent to a secluded halfway house in the countryside, where the killing of a young man triggers a brutal series of murders in the area.
When Michele Chadwick's best friend Sophia accidentally awakens the spirit of a malevolent witch that died centuries ago, Michele has to find a way to save her soul from eternal damnation.
A tough, hard-driving business tycoon suffers a broken leg and is left to die in the desert by his scheming wife and her greedy lover.

A family is hired as caretakers for an abandoned church. Years before a man had murdered his entire family in the church, and on the day the family is to move in, the killer escapes from prison and heads toward the church.

A war veteran goes back home to sell his dead foster mother's house of horrors, and as he continues to struggle with PTSD from childhood and war trauma, he can't tell what's real from what's inside in head."
A stressed single mother enlists a psychiatrist to help with her troubled teenage son's behavioral issues, but she soon discovers a deeper, darker secret lurking inside him.
Emily's life falls apart when she gets dumped by her married lover. A modern day version of the life of Emily Dickinson illustrated with her poetry.

When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.
Chairman and Counsellor hunt down previous Symmetry organizations by reverse engineering their own Symmetry.

movie_name: The Ceremony Is About to Begin
description: Madness, mayhem, and mummification rites ensue when a documentary filmmaker visits the rural commune of an Ancient Egyptian inspired cult to interview its enigmatic leader.

After the events of Spiders (2000), a scientist conducts genetic tests, and a couple becomes the perfect host. Now, the hunt is on, as an army of arachnids is after the succulent human flesh. Who can stop the spiders' feeding frenzy?
A young orphan girl obsessed with finding her father gets adopted by a traveling church. She grows up and gets engaged, but her obsession with locating her father is about to turn deadly.
A dysfunctional couple at the crossroads in their relationship, take a week-long holiday in their mountain-lodge and find themselves under siege by an other-worldly creature.
A sexy but poor young girl marries a rich man she doesn't love, but carries a torch for another man.
Tori and Tom move back to his hometown to help take care of his parents - it is there they both are haunted by their own ghosts in this gothic chiller.
Jana always stands for his villagers, against the atrocities committed by Veerapandi. Manimegalai, Veerapandi's daughter, falls in love with Jana, but is stunned when she learns about his past life.
Yong-pal goes to Los Angeles to look for his sister who has not contacted the family in a long time. He finds that she has become a drug addict. Yong-pal fights to bring the dealers to justice.
A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.
A 17-year-old high school student who's obsessed with sex tries to seduce both his beautiful older neighbor and the shy new girl in school over a bet, only to end up falling in love.
When a treasure hunter seeks a downed airplane in the jungles of Africa, he encounters one of the passenger's young daughter, now fully grown, and with a gorilla protector.
James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
Following the fall of the Roman Empire, a Roman woman plots to make her son the new Emperor and to fulfill the former glory of the city.
Back in 1982, a Texas University student who was curious about the male sex fantasies he had been having, decides he needs to hook up with an out gay student on campus.
A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.
A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.
Siva, a medical college student, falls in love with his classmate Mahalakshmi. Trouble begins when he fights against a gangster who also falls in love with Mahalakshmi.
Harsha meets Ganga and falls in love with her. However, trouble ensues when his father asks him to marry Ganga's sister, Tunga.
A producer puts an unknown European princess (Constance Moore) in his show, and she falls for its author (Dennis O'Keefe).
A rich English boy meets an orphaned French girl and as they become friends, create a world that is far away from the adult world we live in.
An American in Japan recruits the help of a ranger to guide him through a forested area where the spirits of suicide victims haunt the living.

Nine pretty boys resist becoming ugly adults, building a robot with human intelligence to help them achieve world domination and kidnap a beautiful girl. As their robot learns what it means to be human, its creators lose their humanity.
The life of a successful sculptor is turned upside down when he begins receiving mysterious messages from someone who asks for his help.

Hot News (1928) is a silent film comedy produced and distributed by Paramount Famous Lasky Corporation, an amalgamation of Famous Players-Lasky and Paramount Pictures. Clarence Badger directed and Bebe Daniels starred.
A law-abiding parolee is pushed to his physical and psychological limit, forced to execute a ticking crime spree through a dark underbelly.
A young woman is a sole survived witness to a murder ; Special agents go into hiding in a big secret house to protect her until the law-court
Four naive Americans, in need of easy cash, decide to fly to Colombia and raid the safe of a notorious drug lord with connections to the corrupt military regime.
Mars Heflin and his Protection Incorporated security team are the only force standing in the way of the ancient, ravenous species known as The Z as they seek to destroy the city.
A young teen gets ready for her first time baby sitting alone, when she soon finds out that she's not alone.
A young woman reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but struggles to tell them about her dark past.
A young woman is held captive by an unhinged lunatic intent on transforming her into his latest blood-splattered masterpiece.
A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Set in the fictional Midwestern town of Springwood, Ohio, the plot revolves around several teenagers who have been stalked and killed in their dreams. The film centers around a live streamer's final video and his struggle to stay awake.

Story follows an actor who is confused with a thief he is playing on a crime re-enactment show. His mistaken identity thrusts him into the spotlight of law enforcement and the underworld as he attempts to clear his name.
A woman begins working at the same company as a security guard that she believes might be a former sumo wrestling serial killer.
A series of misunderstandings leads to a chorus girl traveling to Paris to represent the American theater, where she falls in love with a befuddled bureaucrat.

After the untimely death of their parents, two estranged siblings come together and discover their family's involvement in a string of Robin Hood-style bank heists forcing them to unite and finish what their parents started.
When the progress of robotics makes Paralympic athletes the new sports stars, Maria dreams of competing against her sister. For that, she will have to enter a world of crime and violence.
Renegade Marshal Matt Cooper will stop at nothing to save his family when a chemically altered killing machine from his past returns with a vengeance.

Rabid desires and ungovernable passions rule the lives of mortals, as impatient wishes and blind hopes interweave in this triptych of disastrous human flaws. The glowing fire of love, or the lack of it, engulfs us. Can we have it all?

Voted Reddit's "Scariest Story of 2015", "Paradise Pine" follows a group of five childhood friends who meet up at a rural cabin to help their ex-military friend get through his PTSD after returning from war.
When a transgender teen discovers a new app is turning their classmates into zombies they must stop it for the most noble of reasons -- getting into college and to impress their crush.

An ornithologist investigates reports of a monstrous new species of bird just as a teenage girl is gifted an amulet found on mysterious atoll. As the creatures begin to attack, an ancient guardian with a bond to the girl emerges.
A Beverly Hills teen who doesn't speak Spanish must hide his wild granny, after she illegally hops the US-Mexico border and is pursued by ICE.
Alice and her boyfriend move to Portland. Their new house is haunted. At first scared of the ghosts, Alice realizes they are there to help her get free of the abusive boyfriend.
A fashion shoot in the desert goes horribly wrong when two hard-up rockers try their luck at robbing it.

Former superhero Midnight is serving a 65-year prison sentence for vigilantism but is released from prison early when he is asked to help the police combat his old arch-nemesis, who has seemingly returned from the dead.

The storyline of the film is based on apprehension of co-founder of Indian Mujahideen and conspirator of several bom blasts in India, Yasin Bhatkal, by National Investigation Agency near Indo-Nepal border.
An antique book dealer finds himself haunted by the ghost of a young boy, he decides to investigate the strange occurrences within his life.

Juwita, a heavily overweight girl, almost gave up on her life after being hit by the ninth times heartbreak. Hope comes when she has a chance of transforming into Angel, a super gorgeous, golden-voiced girl.
Rama Rao fails to get a job with the police force due to his father's connections with a gangster. But when his brother is killed by the gangster, Rama Rao becomes Baadshah to oppose him.
A young woman named Shirley befriends a lonely blind man named Roy. Together, they find love - even though Shirley's father opposes the relationship.
Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.
The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.
A general goes on a search for a book that reveals the names of revolutionaries in the area, leading to a showdown at a Shaolin temple where he faces off against the revolutionaries.
AN OPPRESSED PEASANT JOINS THE UNDERGROUND MOVEMENT, DISILLUSION WITH A SOCIAL SYSTEM THAT ENCOURAGES INJUSTICE AGAINST THE POOR.

Down on his luck and unlikely hero, Jim Crawley is having the worst day of his miserable life. He decides to end it all and even fails at that. An improbable event changes everything and he becomes a half man/half creature.
Drugs are hidden with weapons shipments of the Chinese Army during the early anti-Japanese war in Inner Mongolia.
A mad scientist unleashes three mischievous little creatures to spread terror on mankind in this loving homage to the little monster movies of the past.
A story that follows a group of close friends over two decades, through their respective lives and loves.

movie_name: The Hollywood Strangler Meets the Skid Row Slasher
description: Hollywood Strangler ("Johnathan Click") kills young models... Skid Row Slasher kills winos ... What will happen when they meet?
A drama with a two-tiered storyline concerning a mother and daughter who try to form a bond after the young woman's difficult childhood.

Marino, 18, a young foreign film student, meets Esmeralda, 20, a student and a painter, in whom he finds the muse he always wanted for his camera. Soon he sees himself wanting to be what she is to him: her muse.
With a little help from her friends, teenage Red Hood becomes Earth's savior after defeating the Wolf Gladiators terrorizing her desert village.
A Muslim police lieutenant takes on a criminal syndicate behind the kidnapping of a Muslim princess.
Two private investigators navigate a rapidly changing industry, a criminal underworld and the great Canadian Wilderness.
A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.
A young Roman reporter is sent to Rimini by his boss to carry out an investigation into the world of discos and night clubs.

The world's most notorious Mexican wrestler bargains his way out of an eternity of fiery damnation by returning to Los Angeles to play guardian angel to Belisa Montoya, a troubled teenager whose not what she seems.
Three college students try to create a device capable of reaching beyond the boundaries of the known universe. Unfortunately for them, they succeed...
Two high profile couples are forced to examine the cost of success when they're invited to an exclusive self-help retreat with a sinister side.
Two old girlfriends re-connect after an alien invasion ravages Earth. One is a divorcee putting her life back together. The other is one of Earth's Most Powerful Heroes.
An archaeologist continues her father's search for a lost civilization and finds out more than the truth about his mysterious disappearance.

A career CIA hitman who's been solely using the wanted section of various newspapers to receive his orders suddenly learns from his estranged daughter that his division's actually been shut down for years.
A teenage girl summons a demon to better her life but it ultimately backfires throwing her and everyone close to hers lives into absolute chaos.

Gao Jai is a young man with minimal Kung Fu skills who spends his time spotting wanted criminals, then finding bounty hunters who fight the villains and claim the reward, in the hope of earning a percentage.

movie_name: Mat Moto: Kami Mat Moto Bukan Mat Rempit
description: The film follows the journey of fellow "mat moto", also known as bikers, who share the same interest in motorsport. On a journey across Malaysia, the bikers discover the true meaning of friendship and the joy of sharing the same hobby.
A husband who had divorced twice because he had been betrayed by his former wives, takes his precautions to prevent the did to happen a third time. And yet it does.

Set against a white out in Buffalo/Niagara Falls, two brothers who are entangled in web of crime, attempt to save themselves from their past transgressions and the blizzard that has paralyzed the city.
When a small village near a forest is under the threat of man eating tigers and a drug mafia, the villagers seek the help of an unstoppable force, a hunter invincible.

Barbara is a young mother of two in Hungary whose everyday life is abruptly collapses when a friend in Poland dies. Barbara travels to the funeral and meets an actress and experiences an intense love story.

When a mysterious carnival shows up in town and seventeen year old Christie goes missing, it's up to her father and boyfriend to track down them down and get her back before she becomes the newest attraction in their man made freak show.

ISHQ TERA is based on real life events of a woman with a broken mind and a man with a broken heart. The story of how men prey silently on this one disturbed Woman as her man fights to free her mind and win her heart - Again and again.

Scrolls of Auristria follows a few characters on their journey facing different personalities and life choices which eventually bring them together. Their differences bind them together to defeat a greater threat than themselves.
The Wound tells the story of a woman who is recovering from a hernia surgery when one day a voracious creature emerges from her surgical wound and eats her visiting nurse.

Hakeem and A-Mac are like brothers. Together they face immigrant life in Montreal, while 'spotting' cars after school. Boost gives us a glimpse into the awkward adventures of teenage boyhood, then the jolt, when that innocence ends abruptly.
A provocative, sexy and insightful exploration of relationships between men and women and why we all still yearn for love despite the trouble with romance.

In a tense alternate world, where believers are no longer welcome, le a crocodile farm operated by two families is about to become a Sanctuary for misfits. But in the meantime, they will have to face the ire of shareholders.
The Incredible True Story of Scotty Smiley, the first active duty blind Army Officer, and his wife, Tiffany, who gave up everything to become his full time caretaker.

A recently separated Argentinian couple, along with their two teenage children, go on a family vacation to Florianópolis, Brazil, where they become delightfully and problematically involved with the family from whom they rent a house.
Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.
During the events of "Zeus: Rebirth" Zenobios Iron's older brother Hayden was visited by Rhea who finds him trapped in TARTEROUS after committing suicide.

movie_name: Making off Sangriento: Masacre en el set de Filmación
description: Ricardo chosen as an actor for a short of the faculty, kills the director and the actor. Driven by a love of cinema, and determined to finish the short marred by tragedy, they regroup, find a director, and shoot it all in one night.
A mother and daughter escape a biochemical attack only to find ancestral horror waiting for them in the woods.

Based on Neil Simon's Goodbye Girl it is a romantic story Nasim who is from Abadan and Shabnam a widow who lives with her girl. When they both rent the same house they have to deal with each other until find a solution.
James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.
A kebab shop owner's son, Salah, turns vigilante after his father's death in an effort to clean up the relentless onslaught of boozed up thrill seekers waging war on his doorstep.
An incredibly beautiful young woman loses her husband and in order to pay off his debts, she decided to set-up a raffle in which she is the prize.
The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.

A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by the rise of flesh-possessing demons, thrusting them into a primal battle for survival as they face the most nightmarish version of family imaginable.

A young rebellious MMA fighter struggles with the traditional philosophical methods of his new coach, which forces him to internally confront his ego and troubled past. This is a film about a person's path to enlightenment.
An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.
After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Hani and her college friends are fond of playing pranks on other students. Their latest victim Puteri is so traumatized she almost kills herself. A masked killer starts to terrorize Hani and friends on the eve of her 25th birthday.
A tabloid photographer is given the assignment to follow a politician suspected to have sexual relations with an underage girl.
Trolley car conductor Clyde Jones (Clyde Cook) and bus conductor "Terrible Bill" Jones (William Demarest) are arch rivals for the hand of coffee-shop owner Mary Smith (Louise Fazenda)
A young couple unknowingly discover the underbelly of society after deciding to take the leap, and experiment with a #UNICORN on a dating app.
An industrialist benefactor offers a young couple three wishes.He wants to be an inventor, she a singer, but things don't turn out exactly as each of them hope.
A detective sets out to capture a psycho who kills women, but the psycho turns the tables and goes after the detective's girlfriend.

Xinling Zheng was a care free rich girl until her mother was taken away from her by a car accident. Xinling was taken to treatment center for her depression. Strange things started to happen in the treatment center.
An campy anthology of terror, horror, pain, suffering, death and destruction, with no mercy for kindergarteners.
The Unbidden is a thriller about four women confronted by a mysterious young man who knows a dark secret from their past.
An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

A dramatic story in the genre of Midnight Express, Papillion, and the Shawshank Redemption. Two Americans cross the Mexican border in the 1970's they are imprisoned, tortured, and eventually risk all for a chance at freedom.
Biopic of Spain's Juan Carlos Delgado "El Pera", a young delinquent in the 1980s, who is now a car driver and a sport journalist.

Two disillusioned twenty-somethings have the perfect chance encounter. But when circumstances prevent them from exchanging numbers, what are they to do? Find each other on Facebook. Unless of course, they want to leave things up to fate.

An aspiring artist is commissioned to create a life-size sculpture of some perfect men, but soon finds herself spiraling down a path of unspeakable psychopathic terror and murder as she frantically tries to complete her masterpiece.

Set in the 1930's. This story takes place in the middle of a crisis between two people who cannot help their daily life. They got stuck in a pointless paranoia and guilt that will explode in an unexpected way we could ever imagine.
Catastrophic war, destroyed ecosystem, brink of extinction. War for the most valuable treasure of the time: water.

An heiress with a penchant for speeding runs afoul of a traffic cop. Romance develops between the two, but it's soon complicated when he believes she is responsible for killing someone by reckless driving.

After spending seven years in prison, Salah works with his cell mate Saad in trading currency with a powerful man, and he makes a big fortune, while His lover Ilham got married during his imprisonment to a big currency trader.
The story of Charlemagne and the 12 Peers of France, transposed to Northeast Brazil, with Western elements.
Steve, suffering from a collapsing marriage, invites his three closest friends on a weekend retreat to the mountains only to discover his real troubles are in the trees that surround them.
TWO WOMAN, FORMERLY THE BEST FOR BEAT OF FRIENDS, BECOMES THE WORST OF ENEMIES WHEN THEY FALL FOR THE SAME MAN -. ADULT ONLY
Video game adventurers George Stobbart and Nico Collard battle evil forces across the globe for ancient relics of power.
A woman undergoing therapy seeks retribution against a Japanese crime lord while struggling to unravel the mystery behind the deaths of her parents.
The spirit of a long-dead warrior possesses the body of an Indian medicine man and turns him into a homicidal maniac.
Arriving in Moscow, Danila discovers Konstantin dead and he sets out to avenge his death; a journey that leads him to Chicago and a whole new experience.
In Afghanistan, a Spanish medevac is sent behind enemy/Taleban lines. Bad landing destroys the rotor. They are spotted by the Taleban. Can they and the chopper be rescued in time?
Follows a rebellious teenage girl who is sent to stay with her grandmother in a sleepy town whose quirky traditions include a curfew banning anyone from going out at night.
A courageous journalist find herself caught in the middle of a criminal investigation against her, after taking on a political scandal in Colombia .
A regular guy finds himself through his journey of finding love, lust and heartbreak and his real purpose in life through encounters.
In the Canadian mountains, a trapper goes on the run accused of a crime, and is pursued by a rugged and determined lawman of the Royal North-West Mounted Police.
A wealthy male starts to self-destruct after he finds that his childhood sweetheart is now his sister-in-law.
A rag-tag group of seven mercenaries turned bank robbers, set their sights on a Cartel as their next and final heist.

The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".
A backwoods trip turns deadly for a group of hunters after they accidentally kill their guide's mentally handicapped brother.
After Sandhya is attacked by the men of Bhikshapati, a landlord, her boyfriend Sree rescues her and learns that his father has a history with him.

movie_name: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water - The Motion Picture
description: A teen acrobat of mysterious origins and a young inventor find themselves entangled in a sinister plot that involves the fate of the world.

A Neo-Western that follows a woman who returns home to save her family's ranch from financial ruin when she discovers widespread malicious maltreatment of undocumented workers throughout the community.
Two couples on a picnic are attacked by a gang of vicious bikers, who beat up the men and rape the women. One of the men finds out who the bikers are, arms himself and goes after them.

A second-coming-of-age story about a struggling filmmaker/cinephile who falls for a webcam mistress and faces the challenges of having a relationship in front of the all-seeing eye of the World Wide Web.
Zhang is a Bond-like international spy who must find the headquarters of a villainous crime organization by seducing their boss' daughter, Julie Tan.
La Soga Salvation is a suspenseful thriller and love story, where a former hitman fights to rescue the love of his life, while confronting his inner demons and violent past.
After helping the police foil a violent heist, a sharp minded young man must evade the criminal mastermind whose plans he has thwarted.
Li Wenbao is a security guard being paid to escort a piece of cargo to its proper destination. His daughter Xuehong accompanies him on his assignment.
A cowardly fighter becomes the head of a once prestigious martial arts school, when its founder dies.
After an accident during their vacations on a paradisiac island, a group of friends is stalked by a large shark.
On his way to Cyprus, the young businessman, Alkis Galanis, meets Martha, the wife of Major Gordon. In Nicosia, the situation is tense, as the resistance against the British continues.
A small-time con artist gets more for what he bargained for when one of his would-be victims falls in love with him.
A young man tries a mobile phone-calling system to find his soulmate, but the results are more complex than he expects.

The trials and tribulations of two high school students deeply in love with each other, but facing the challenge of their completely different social backgrounds, during the twilight of the communist Romania.

A Viking Princess is forced to flee her kingdom after being framed for the murder of her father, the King. Under the guidance of the God Odin, she travels the world gaining wisdom and building the army she needs to win back her throne.
Picking of episode 46 left off, Ryuki and four other Riders remain standing, but one of them, somewhat-related to Ryuki, threatens to speeden the deaths of the remaining Riders.
A serial killer is using an internet chatroom to find victims, but soon two police detectives start putting together what is going on. Will they stop the killer before they become the next victims?
A mildly tragic story of how the Vietnam war has bad and good ramifications on the characters lives.
Strange Western in which a Satan worshiping madman gives his supernatural medallion to the town loser and has him swear to Satan to avenge his death.
A South American fashion photo shoot turns into a diamond mine seeking adventure for an American photographer and his model.
A student poet seduces his college President's wife, daughter, and girlfriend over lost financial aid.
Inter High is over and the third years will be graduating soon. But Team Sohoku receives an invitation to one last race, the Kumamoto Fire Country Race.
Hakan, who is a dance teacher, learns that a Marid demons has been sealed in an old vase inherited from his family.
Out of the blue, an incident took place that brought utter chaos to Hirantha. Yet, he did not hesitate to make every effort to extricate himself within the split second that he was granted.

A 10 year-old girl, mourning the death of her mother, becomes possessed by a demon who has been preying on her female ancestors for centuries. Years later, the demon starts to take over, both mentally and physically.
In the process of arresting a smuggler, the criminal's wife is killed. Twenty years later, the smuggler is released from prison and vows to murder the wife of the policeman who killed his spouse.
An aging ruthless businessman swaps bodies with his grandson in the wake of getting into a car accident.
Part machine. Part animal. All killer. The Evolver is an indestructible creature that can adapt to any conditions, overcome any weakness and will fight to the death for survival.
A hard-nosed, spouseless cardiac surgeon finds herself reconsidering her career-driven life choices as she bonds with her lighthearted new artist neighbor.
A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

movie_name: Once Upon a Time in Phuket
description: Average Swedish guy Sven, bored with his life, decides to go to Thailand to write a novel and "get away from the rat race". He meets a range of peculiar characters and learns a few things about love, friendship, and himself.
At the stroke of midnight, past sins come back to haunt a group of friends, as they fight for not only their lives, but also for the good of mankind in this mind twisting horror.

movie_name: The Suicide Squad: A Typical Tuesday
description: When a fairly routine extraction mission goes belly up, Deadshot and Harley Quinn must figure a way to salvage things before their heads are literally blown off! (This non-profit fanfilm is not affiliated or endorsed by DC Comics)
In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
The next installation of the Lucifer series, this movie will detail the events before and after the incidents shown in Lucifer. It is not a continuation of the first film but a standalone project.
A Chicago waitress falls in love with a Minnesota farmer, and decides to face a life in the country.
A naive cowboy from Omaha, Nebraska takes his mother's inheritance to Las Vegas. He becomes a compulsive Blackjack gambler and sets up a counterfeiting ring to support his habit.

Released from a POW camp at the end of WW2, a French soldier tricks the wife of a fellow French POW into believing her husband was killed by the Germans and seduces the grieving woman, but the 'dead' husband eventually returns home.

movie_name: Shui jing bian de chu lian
description: A love story during the Chinese cultural revolutions. The two main characters are each other's first love but they cannot be with each other due to political reasons.

movie_name: Leon - Glaub nicht alles was du siehst
description: Leon fulfills his dream of having his own restaurant by the sea and moves to the Baltic Sea with his son Oskar. There he meets a woman who looks like his deceased wife.
After waking up from a horrific car accident, April must find a way to work through her trauma and a will to survive a recovery from hell.
After having entered remission from terminal cancer, writer Colton Reznik learns that there are macabre repercussions that come with defying the odds and outwitting death.

When Kyle comes back home from a hunt only to find that most of the city is dead due to a virus that kills everyone who falls asleep and his family is missing. He must fight against time and save his family.

Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

After spending time together for two years, Dave (Dimas Anggara) decides to marry Caramel (Michelle Ziudith). They travel to Bali where Caramel is reminded of her past. Dave and Caramel face a tragedy that changes their lives.

After being infected with a mysterious experimental parasite, two lost, lonely people begin hearing the same mysterious voice in their head, a voice that may or may not be manipulating them for its own sinister ends.
Eight Mexican directors unite to bring tales of the most brutally terrifying Mexican traditions and legends to vividly shocking life.
Doctors Scott and Bach inject the dying Kyra Zelas with a formula which saves her life - but also renders her almost immortal and wickedly evil.

"Death World" is a zombie anthology film of 3 stories. "The Fittest" is about college students surviving, "Lifeline" takes place in a zip-lane park, and "Reflex Action" is about a security guard driving a VIP to her concert.

Kickboxing has always been Dennis's passion. So when his brother Wulf - a professional kick-boxer- is released from jail and promises Dennis fame and fortune as a fighter, it's clear that Dennis hops along for the ride.
A man's fight for justice. He struggles between love and principles. Is he guilty? Is he lying? See the intrigues, action, romance, and drama in the most talked-about picture of the year.

An American journalist travels to India to cover Bollywood weddings, only to uncover a mosaic of cultural clashes, transgender tangles and lost loves with her travels culminating at a destination where the only journey is the one within.
A husband and wife are forced to re-evaluate themselves and their relationship through the reality of the COVID-19 lockdown.

The film is set in a post-apocalyptic world in which civilisation has crumbled. A massive electromagnetic pulse has killed all children on the planet with the exception of Molly (Billie Rutherford), the daughter of Jake Slater (Jake Ryan).
A woman attracted to her brother-in-law must care for him after he's seriously injured in a car accident.
Created by his father, a young man who struggles to be normal falls in love with his next victim and discovers they both are normal in their own way.

In the days leading up to her daughter's 16th birthday, Charlotte's sordid past resurfaces in the form of gruesome deaths that threaten to destroy the very life she has fought to attain. There may be some sins that are unforgivable.
David's brother, Kurt, defeats Po in Kickboxer (1989). A year after Po kills Kurt, David, who has a kickboxing gym in LA, is manipulated into a match against Po.
Svetlana and Nikolay loved each other to the envy of the whole village. The matter went to the wedding - And everything collapsed at one moment due to the usual gossip.
A schoolteacher is forced to confront a brutal act from his past when a pair of ruthless drifters take his family and him on a nightmare road trip.

With the arrival of a self-confident and rebellious beautiful girl in the village, a romantic 16-year-old will be in for a surprise, as the unprecedented feelings of love and passion will offer a gradual but marvellous passage to adulthood.
Ex Police officer flies to Thailand to solve the mysterious disappearance of his younger brother. With local gangsters chasing him, he must find a way to escape certain death along with his brother.
During World War II, an Italian-American commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines in North Africa.
This is the story of a brother who wanted to give his sister the best of everything.. a pure sentiment story on family.

Released from prison, Stick meets up with a friend and joins him on a job delivering a bag. His friend gets killed in the setup. Stick gets away and is ready to forget all and see his daughter, but they won't forget.

After a day of filming her television series, hostess Katherine returns to her hotel room to find Clifford, an ex-CIA agent who reveals a saga of a worldwide organization that seeks to destroy the economic stability of every major country.
A secret agent, who wants out of the business, has an accidental encounter with an undercover cop investigating the criminal underworld.

movie_name: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison
description: Naruto Uzumaki is framed and sent to an inescapable prison where he must escape by any means necessary.

movie_name: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
description: Three brothers-where the two younger siblings must wait to marry until their elder brother becomes attached.
After abortion, a woman's life takes an unexpected turn when she is visited by the foetus, who is now grown up and is visible to her.
After his gang disbands, a yakuza enforcer looks forward to life outside of organized crime but soon must become a drifter after his old rivals attempt to assassinate him.
An aging safe-cracker recently released from prison is asked to put his old skills to use and risk his freedom to save his son's life.
A thriller centered on a couple who makes an old estate their new home and soon begin to see the spirits of dead children.
Treatment: Five different characters, five different lives and five different reasons to agree to take an impossible risk.
A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.
A country man comes to city to meet his friends and with ego, he pretends as a dumb person for the sake of friendship with his girlfriend.

In a modern-day Romeo and Juliet, Mikey James, a street hustler raised on the streets with his two brothers, goes to work for the Fasano family as he desperately tries to find a way out of his hustling lifestyle.
After a family tragedy, a former special forces soldier turned mercenary retires and returns home. But a vengeful organ trafficker won't let him off the hook so easily.
When a group of friends break into a building to steal from a safe for financial gain, they slowly discover a horrifying secret awaits them inside.
The son of a courtesan retreats into a fantasy world after being forced to end his relationship with the older woman who educated him in the ways of love.
The crew of an Air Force bomber arrives in Pearl Harbor in the aftermath of the Japanese attack on December 7, 1941, and is sent on to Manila to help with the defense of the Philippines.
Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.
A petty thief falls in love with a beautiful student from a wealthy family. Can he ever convince her and her family that he is the best man to be her husband?
Following a traumatic event that leaves her unable to conceive, a desperate young woman becomes an unwitting vessel for the Antichrist.
Story follows an out-of-work steel worker as he struggles to provide for his family and avenge his brother's death by fighting in a mixed martial-arts match against a dangerous opponent.

In a village with greedy property fights among the families, Jagadish (Nani) carries on his father's legacy to reform all the property issues in his village while trying to reunite his family, which is also split due to property issues.

A Roman military commander falls in love with Ranjana, a devout Christian. The Roman Empire's atrocities toward the Christians prompt the commander to become a rebel soldier to protect the Christian community from the Roman Emperor.
A woman gives birth to a monster and is compelled to protect her child even as it commits heinous acts of violence.
A married couple rents a beach side Airbnb only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. They soon discover to be in the grips of a mysterious cult and their ancient sea god.
A group of six teenagers find themselves haunted and terrorized by a Kuntilanak when they try to find their missing friend inside Lawang Sewu, a supposedly haunted building in Semarang.

Father Thomas, a priest in 18th century France, employs his younger brother, Marcus, to renovate his dilapidated cathedral. Using satanic practices, Marcus unleashes a blood curse on the townsfolk that appears unable to be reversed.
Based on the true story of the "Necrophil Brothers", two young brothers who were accused of brutal murders in the 90's, in Brazil.
Ken Castro, a humble single father, working hard to make ends meet, suddenly finds his life turned upside down, when a savage crime family kidnaps his young son.
An evil Voodoo Witchdoctor runs a murder-for-hire business. He'll do away with your unfaithful wife, your unappreciative boss, or your back-stabbing friend - but the price is your soul!

The Dawson Farm has long been the subject of urban legends and scary stories in the town of Taunton, no one dares go there at risk of finding themselves at the end of Old Man Dawson's shotgun. But the truth is worse than you could imagine.
Sinister events occur when a single mother returns home to her wealthy estranged family after the death of her grandfather.
16 year old Rika wants to leave a murderous cult but she is sent to Hell where she meets demons and souls who have committed heinous and outrageous crimes.

Consumed by her career and a multitude of professional obligations, an industrious female solicitor neglects her husband who concocts a bold plan to make her jealous. However, two can play at that game. Will he get his woman back?
An elite team of soldiers descend upon the backwoods of North Carolina to recover a deadly bio-toxin before it's unleashed by a rogue general-turned-domestic terrorist.
Tharadas plans to take revenge on Rajesh who murdered his uncle. Rajesh marries Thulasi who was involved with Tharadas in the past and the complications in their relationship spoil their lives.

Robert Taylor and Eleanor Parker star as a Kentucky backwoodsman and the woman who will NOT let anything interfere with her plans to marry him in this humorous romantic adventure through the American Frontier of 1798.
A small American contingent tries to train rural tribesmen to defend themselves against fanatical Muslim radicals in 1906 Philippines.
Two young American girls get attacked by a local Albanian mafia at Montenegrin sea coast, and get saved by an old local grave digger, who turns out to be a hidden former Mossad hunter for Nazies.
An evil mastermind, known as La mano negra, attempts to steal a formula that creates synthetic drugs but a masked avenger known as La sombra will do anything to stop him.
Freshly paroled former Green Beret John Canyon finds himself trapped in New Jersey suburbia when former enemies resurface.
A snake-oil salesman is chased across the desert by a gang of Mexican bandits. He finds out, however, that he is being protected by the spirits of Davey Crockett, Pecos Bill and Johnny Appleseed.
Fifteen years after a horrific incident causes Mary to sever ties with her mother, her homecoming proves that some bloodlines can't be cut.
After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.
Nani plays the gang leader of five women belonging to different age groups, helping them to plot revenge.
Trapped in a room and given the option to make a choice based on the dead body of a child in front of her, Maria is riddled with confusion and has only a few hours to make sense of her predicament.
A young man just released from prison and living with his sister crosses paths with two children, also brother and sister, who are on the run from their child pornographer foster parents.
Driving to a music festival in Ireland, a new couple become lost and are then set upon by a tormentor with an unknown motive.

Alby and his mentally challenged sister, Alice, adore each other. But when two strangers, Sophia and Victor, enter their lives forming strong bonds with them, it leads to tension between the siblings.

Estrella is cheerful, positive and generous with her surroundings, although it seems that she has forgotten to take care of herself. But she soon discovers that she has a gift for flamenco and the right to be happy.
Private investigator is lead on a horrific journey, of conspiracies and insanity, following the murder of his partner.
Regroup and plan, find the missing boy, confront an evil spirit, perform an exorcism, survive, escape.

movie_name: Father Thomas and the Tattoo Nun
description: A thriller set in the United States, France(Cannes), Europe, Eastern Europe and Arabia with spys, German and Russian bad guys, White Trafficking, car chases, sex, redemption and love. I am the writer/producer.
A young bride realizes that she is ill-prepared for the demands of married life, especially housekeeping, in this romantic comedy.
Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.
Vicky meets Vijaya in college and both keep quarreling with each other. However, Vicky soon falls in love with Vijaya and he tells a lie that he has cancer, only to get her attention and love.
A young woman relay races across Canada with her boyfriend and another couple to bail her brother out of a marijuana charge.
The tranquility of a Romanian village is shattered by the arrival of a beautiful unknown coinciding with the discovery of a new star by a modest professor of astronomy.
A sleazy but affable guard dog trainer is blackmailed to steal a manuscript for a tell-all book from one of his clients.
Homeland Security agents transporting a legendary sicario back to the United States come under attack on the wrong side of the border by the cartel who will stop at nothing to get their man back.
After her husbands untimely passing, a religious mother becomes negatively obsessed with her gay son and his lifestyle. Tragedy and murder ensue.

A Filipino produced action film directed by Joe Mari Avellana starring Ghazi Abudanud, Carlos Adams, and Peter Afridi. Leon Damian stars in this Commando knock-off directed by elder ...                See full synopsis »
A London laundress attempts to rise above her station in order to capture the love of a wealthy young man, thus missing out on the truer love of one of her own class.
A young man, Victor, will do anything to reconnect with the only woman he's ever loved - even if that means entangling himself in an international criminal investigation.

The Romans occupy Britannia and Hadrian's Wall divides the land, built to keep back the warrior tribes of Caledonia, and something far more dangerous; savage wolf-like creatures which roam the lowlands.

Perfectionist law student Blair drives her slacker ex-boyfriend David cross country from New York to California so he can more safely quarantine, but during their road trip, the feuding exes encounter a number of dangerous weirdos.
After a politician's daughter is kidnapped by a ruthless gang, a brutal policewoman is released from jail and sent after them.
Writer Ryan Cole and his Wife Kate go to an off season vacation house where he intends to finish his second novel. But their plans are changed by a devastating mental illness.
BTS of Case Files. The Dead are no Longer Lonely. Insight on characters. Visit the cast and crew of Case files.
In a post-apocalyptic land, a man rebels against a corrupted society in search for a cure against the deadly disease that killed most of humanity.

Following the end of WWII, war-monger Sir Eric Hazarias (Lionel Atwill) sets the wheel in motion for WWIII. His search for Meteorium 245, the only practical defense against the atomic bomb, leads him to mythical Pendrang.

movie_name: Wounded Warrior: Doing the Right Thing
description: When a career minded woman moves into her new home she is unaware of something left behind by the previous owner.

movie_name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Mt. Natagumo Arc
description: Tanjiro teams up with Zenitsu and Inosuke to investigate missing person cases on the mountain Natagumo. They slowly begin to realize the entire mountain is being controlled by a family of Demon spider creatures.
When a couple's relationship is threatened by sudden tragedy, one of them goes to unthinkable lengths to preserve their union.
To avoid scandal, a rising scientist scrambles to retrieve an inscribed garter from an old flame on the eve of her wedding.

When a woman is forced into a Japanese sex trafficking ring while on a vacation, she must survive by eating the flesh of others to survive after the owners of the ring leave them trapped in an attempt to escape from the police.
Which wine or story do you want to choose? A Story of the Sweet Taste, a Story of the Luxurious Needs, or a Story of the Passionate Matchmaker?
Joe is a twenty-something gay man who decides to film people he meets on the street with a camera given to him by his boyfriend.
A martial arts instructor tracks down his ex-girlfriend's killer and shakes up a political Rat's nest.

A coup in North Korea forces an agent to defect to South with unconscious "Number One". While operatives from North hunt for both of them, the agent has to work with South Koreans to stop the nuclear war.

movie_name: The Lethal Force THE DREAM II
description: Two years after the creation of The Lethal Force franchise, its creator Deathor, decides to produce the next installment. However something dark was born and it will curse everyone involved with the franchise.
A soldier will have a mission of rescuing his partner kidnapped in the Colombian jungle although he will miss a dating with a beautiful girl that is his partner's sister.
Kathir, who hates marriage, comes to Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra, a neighborhood girl. But, his dream shatters when he finds that she loves her friend.

In a world ravaged by inhuman predators, an isolated girl struggles to cope with the grief of losing her family by befriending a storytelling radio operator. This is a film about guilt, grief, and the creative spirit.

Violet, an aspiring dancer, has been involved in a 10-year affair with her uncle until she meets Nick, a boxer with his own gym, who after getting romantically involved, saves her from the unhealthy relationship.

A man repeats the same day running from the Yakuza. A woman encounters her violent mirror image. A woman and her laser gun fight a shadow demon. And a man is cursed to become a werewolf pining for a prostitute.

Trapped in a life of crime, a mysterious getaway driver, lives with this code of conduct and protects his only friend. When he meets someone who can potentially change his entire world, he yearns at a chance for redemption.

An unusual proposition and a reluctant agreement bring together a man living on the margins of society and a statuesque young streetwalker. Is this chance encounter the prelude to a deep, passionate love?
Maggie wants to have a baby, raising him on her own, but when she gets romantically involved with John, a married man, things get complicated and all the balance of Maggie's plans may collapse.
Young reporter Joanie Craven goes missing in the small town of Beansboro. Now it's up to her father and a skeptical local police detective to thwart the efforts of the villainous Blood Cove killer.
Young woman brutally raped and murdered on her wedding day, returns to terrorize, haunt and kill from her grave.
This uproarious action fantasy sees its heroes facing off against all sorts of unholy threats seeking to terrorize the land of the living.
The story of a young couple's relationship told through video footage recorded by themselves beginning from the very first time they see each other.

Raja Babu is a 2006 Indian Telugu film, directed by Muppalaneni Shiva.The film stars Rajasekhar,Sri Devika, Sharada, Vijay Kumar and Brahmanandam lead roles. The film had musical score by S. A. Raj Kumar.
Nazli is18, born in Iran, raised in Sweden. She lives with her father Abbas and her older sister Mahin. Nazli, who want to blend in calls herself Sara. One day Abbas tell her how he sees her future.
On Christmas morning, Chloe Parker opens a present from her parents that will change her life forever: an antique teddy bear possessed by an evil spirit.

A group of pioneers heading west take an alternate route that ultimately leads to death. A nurse desperately fights a mysterious sickness racing through the group. While a psychopathic killer is picking them off one-by-one.
In ancient times, a female warrior conquers a castle in the name of her father and becomes its mistress.

movie_name: The Strange Color of Your Body's Tears
description: Returning home from a business trip to discover his wife missing, a man delves deeper and deeper into a surreal kaleidoscope of half-baked leads, seduction, deceit, and murder. Does anyone in the building know something?
Follows a country music duo who seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.
A single mother, who is fired from her job and thrown out of her house, goes to a resort for a vacation.
A woman who, as a child, witnessed her prostitute mother getting killed by a client, marries an abusive man, and is suffering from homicidal schizophrenia.
When a Thai girl with mythical powers goes missing, Axe and his old team unite in attempts to bring her back.
A quiet observation of the triumphs and defeats of daily life, along with the poetry evident in its smallest details.
Three college girls, on their way to a hill resort, meet a stranger. Though he is a nuisance for them at first, later they become friends and by then he is missing...

The vampire countess is trying to bring her master Dracula back to life and create a new kind of immortal creature - the doppelganger. But for this, she needs innocent blood obtained voluntarily, and this is a very difficult task.
A farmer turned congressman, seduced by dark forces and prosperity, fights for the land of his people but at the cost of his convictions, friends, and family. Will he choose power or love?
