A cop(Jarrod Crooks)is demoted to watch his boss'(Greg Kuper)daughter(Katrina Simyab)while she is on vacation with a friend(Shannon McDonough)
A mentally-unstable author moves into an old house owned by her boyfriend's husband, only the find the place inhabited by a vengeful ghost.

Katherine "Kat" DeLisle is the sheriff of a small town living in fear. A serial killer is stalking the highways and Kat's mentor claims he's supernatural. Everyone knows - the killer is one flat tire away.
Mackenzie takes a job babysitting for a lonely young girl named Peyton only to find out that something sinister may be happening in her home.
A businessman makes a regular arrangement with a Ukrainian prostitute, despite the youngster's involvement in a controlling street gang.

movie_name: The Bowery Boys Meet the Monsters
description: Slip, Sach and the rest of the Bowery Boys enter a haunted house, where they engage in slapstick with the Gravesend Family which has one Creepy Butler, 2 Mad Scientists a crazy old woman with a Man eating Plant a Savage Gorilla, an 8 foot tall Robot and a Vampiress.
A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.
A love story between a army officer and a normal Kashmiri girl in the mountains of Jammu and Kashmir.
In 1894, Brant Royle shocks the aristocratic tobacco growers of Kingsmont by planning to mass-produce cigarettes.
A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.
A hardened career navel officer must come to terms with adapting to civilian life with the help of a waitress that can see through his tough veneer.
A seemingly naive and devout young woman finds her way in the underground world of truck stop sex workers a.k.a. "lot lizards."
A rich society girl is recruited to go undercover and expose a drug/blackmail/prostitution ring in her small town.

If you thought life was normal, Then you thought wrong - Gregory thought the same, until one Halloween night when a piece of candy that had fallen from a UFO into his bag of candy,changed everything from normal, to The...Strange.
A gender bending tale of Filipino transgender woman and Korean discreet gay man who meet and date each other.
A woman eager to have children consults a faith healer and is driven to extreme lengths to get to the bottom of her apparent infertility.
Velayudhan is a good hearted drunkard local rowdy that lives in Mullankoli village. Gopinathan tries to ruin his life and does evil things to the village. Velayudhan has to get rid of him.

96 follows 3 different groups of Marines over a Holiday weekend - Each different group of 3 Marines are close friends - We follow these 3 groups as they each deal their individual tests; Fate, Chance and Design.
After a horrific tragedy, an isolated mother and daughter dealing with grief develop terrifying sleep disruptions that manifest into a sinister reality.
After being bitten by a cursed white snake, a model turns into a demon-possessed seductress who causes the death of anyone who sleeps with her.
A Midwestern interracial couple moves to a Miami suburb that is haunted by El Afilador, a Hispanic knife sharpener that has the entire neighborhood under his control.
A small noodle merchant learns kung-fu to deal with the gangsters (and their masked leader) harassing him for protection.

An inspirational expedition of a Government official and his team to expose a "No Identity Land". A gripping and heart warming journey to connect a remote Indian village to the system of communication and networks.

Kimmy and Dora Go Dong Hae, who are identical twin sisters, cannot be any more different from each other. Life turns out to be even more complicated as the twins become rivals both in life and in love.

Jean-Paul is a Frenchman who yearns to live in communist Czechoslovakia. His wish is granted when, mistaken as a masseur of a French boating team, he manages to elude the democratic authorities long enough to scamper over the Czech border.
Pyotr Drozdov, a high-ranking government official from Moscow, is summoned by the local governor to a provincial museum of a half-forgotten classical writer.
Arimath and Preetha, caught between their conflicting families, run away to marry each other. However, their fathers, who are famous liquor barons, chase them to prevent their union.
A young boy, Minku, ridiculed by his friends, begs the gods to send him down to Earth, and his wish is granted.
Takes us on a journey between heaven and hell, where Demons and Wingers fight for human souls in the ultimate battle for Supremacy.
A struggling author and his wife suddenly become wealthy and move to the suburbs. Divorced neighbor and "companion" aid marital misconstrue which almost culminates in a divorce.

Some years after realizing his love letter never made it to his high school crush, a writer travels from New York to Los Angeles to deliver it in person in hopes of getting the life he always dream't of with her.

Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Proving the difference between lotus flowers and teratai requires Akbar and his friends to travel into the forest. The forest they enter is controlled by a syndicate of illegal gold miners led by Marco.
The group of the women-mercenaries hired by the crooked American tycoon to steal the mysterious and dangerous ancient artifact from the Indian Crime Boss.

After losing her husband, Cennet is working in bars to provide for her sick daughter. Orhan, who comes to the bar with his friends, becomes aware of Cennet's situation. He helps Center financially and they fall in love and get married.

The Bradford family is back attempting to rebuild their lives after it was revealed that Dallas Grey, Camille's charming ex-fiancé was the driver of the vehicle that hit and killed the beloved families patriarch Charles Bradford.
A young girl, bored of her life being scheduled by her dad embarks on an adventurous trip to Madras to only find her life upside down.
PHLO: A fiction feature film that chronicles the life of a young child who is taken and raised by his kidnappers who also happen to have an insatiable taste for blood.
Watch your nose in the hallways, these guys can really kick. In this fight flick, the students of a kickboxing academy take on students from a rival school.
The 9th and final Super Giant film, in which he fights a group plotting to assassinate a Middle-Eastern prince for his country's treasure.

movie_name: Final Demand: Action & Martial Arts Thriller
description: Forced to fight in a Martial Arts full contact tournament, Chris Vincent must stay alive to save himself and his family
When the FBI can't protect a witness, it's up to ex-agent Price and his own protection program to take them under.

A young group of friends that are on a straight and narrow path are awaiting their faith. As one of their friends, Eddie, decides to live on the edge and take them for a ride on life's fast...                See full synopsis »
The Panther women are worshipers of Satan and perform rituals in their honor and sacrifice. The fighters will face them up and down the ring.
The supernatural terror centers on a small family consisting of Adrian and his wife Sandra, along with their two children, Niki and Kinan, who are on vacation out of town.

Peter was just your average mama's boy - until he met the Head. Now things are different. Momma doesn't say much anymore, and Peter's free to love as he sees fit. He loves the Head. The Head loves blood.
A married couple living in Berlin decides to move to a town in the province of Orense, in Spain, and start a new life. But in that town there is a secret of death.
A mysterious diary written by his future self sets Zahid, an emotionally conflicted medical sales rep, on a frantic twenty-four hour journey that will change his present.
Four young college women battle vampires and several other supernatural forces as they try to join a strange sorority.

A French lieutenant makes a bet that he can seduce any woman in town in the two weeks before his regiment leaves for maneuvers, but his chosen target (a Parisian divorcée) isn't like other girls he's known.

movie_name: Celluloid Bloodbath: More Prevues from Hell
description: A collection of 62 over-the-top horror movie prevues from the golden Grindhouse age, spanning the 1960's through the 1980's.

Jamal, motorcycle taxi drivers who like to play chess, had a dream to open a the motor wash near his base. Rodiah, Jamal's mother, threatens him if not promptly changes his life, the family land quota for him will be his cousin.
Two military pilots are close friends, and share in a lot of hazardous missions while engaging in a series of good-natured romantic rivalries.
A former Cosa Nostra henchman seeks greener pastures. Hiring himself out as a hit man, he immediately lands a job. His mission: wipe out his old boss.

Five troubled teens are sent to summer camp at an old farm where the barn unleashes an evil force on whomever enters it. The teens are forced to face not only the outside dangers, but also their own inner demons in order to survive.
Hate turns to love as a man begins to appreciate living in forced proximity with a lovely Canadian-Indian woman.
A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.
Follows the turbulent relationship of Cole and Maya as they struggle to survive in a world where the human population has been decimated by an extra-terrestrial attack.
Cesare is a ticket collector on a bus who is competing with the driver, Bruno, for the love of Rosella, a naïve waitress who's been mugged on the bus.

Bandipotu Simham is a 1982 Indian Telugu film, directed by Muthuraman and Produced by Srinivasa Rao. The film stars Rajinikanth, Chiranjeevi, Sridevi and Nalini in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by M S Viswanathan.
Kabir wants to test every new thing in life for which he travels and wants to use his experience to live life but he never wants to return from this journey.

An activist named John is being stalked by notorious OfficerHunter.No matter how much he tries, he can not escape officer.In what plays out as haunting psychological thriller,He must find a way to conquer his fear and defeat OfficerHunter.
Planet Earth. USA. 2015. The natural oil resources are running out. The hatred between East and West has spread like a plague all over the world. The planet is on the brink of World War III.
Krozon Lake, it's a horror movie about a man who cheats on his wife and goes camping in the woods with his lover to have a romantic weekend break.
"Badass Bunyip" is a a schlocky, gory, Australian Christmas movie. When Shazza and Dazza accidentally choose an sacred Aboriginal site to have their Christmas lunch, all hell breaks loose.
A restauranteur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter.
A happy-go-lucky man accidentally falls in love with a woman whose father despises him. To further complicate matters, his lover has another suitor, who is deemed more worthy of her.
A post-modern romantic comedy about luck and timing in relationships, missed opportunities, unrequited love and how the grass always appears to be greener on the other side.

When one man raises his sword against the world's biggest empire in a quest to free his land and people, he embarks on an heroic battle against all odds and carves it onto the pages of history for millenniums to come.

Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made middle school hell for generations of students.
A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

A nurse loses her job after selflessly taking the blame for a fatal mistake her sister and co-worker made; she is subsequently employed at a poorly-equipped hospital, where she finds romance and tragedy.

When Paul, an unemployed writer, decides to rent and live in a house that's rumored to be haunted, he puts his life and his relationships in grave danger as he obsessively attempts to get the story that will finally make his career.
Veterans wake up after a night of partying to find out that the zombie apocalypse has spread across the United States.
The Ronin is a free Samurai who only follows his own faith. The faith that pursue the ultimate skill of his sword fighting. When two Ronins meet each other, the battle and the story begins.
Two obnoxious and dim-witted misfits attempt to save a school for needy children by attempting to sneak into the wealthy high society of Palm Beach to get the money needed for their cause.

Sophie uses the online service switch.com to switch a Paris apartment with her Toronto sea house for a holiday, to try to find work. After a dream day the police raids her apartment discovering a corpse, and suspect her of the crime.
On a Blood Moon night, a dysfunctional family celebration unleashes a torrid of unexpected secrets, murder, and a chilling prophecy.
A creature has come to our planet. It's only purpose is to eat all the calcium and then move on. It has a taste for bone and it will not leave until it has eaten everyone's.

After being held at gun point a lonely, disillusioned janitor falls in love with his brash and wildly philosophical assailant, only to find that she has a stalker; a mild mannered writing hopeful intent on using her to sell his script.
A young man who leaves a life of immense wealth in search for a life of his own and finds true love and real friends along the way.
A dying man returns to the family home; an encounter with somebody (a mirror of himself) reveals hidden truths leading to revenge/retribution both natural/supernatural.
An uptight, leather-clad female alien, armed with a ray gun and accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect Earth's men as breeding stock.

Led by a madly enthusiastic director, a team of amateur filmmakers hole up in a former undercover DOD research facility to make a film about a dream researcher who disappeared while in the midst of a secret neurological experiment.
After purchasing a used car from an auction, Alex Dunn comes in contact with the previous owner as things take a strange turn between the two men.
"Mrs K" is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.
A man and a woman from two different religion fall in love. But their religion become obstacle of their love.

Tiger is an action packed thriller film led by Pradeep who dreams to become a police officer which is against the wish of his father played by the well known actor and also a very famous Ex IAS officer K Shivram.
A gang of ruthless highway killers kidnap a wealthy couple traveling cross country only to shockingly discover that things are not what they seem.
An insurance investigator arrives at a creepy mansion to protect a millionaire who has had death threats made against him.
An actress, her married ex-lover, her current lover's wife and other guests gather at a circa-1900 estate.
Toni Veronese, small strike, attacks the interests of the Perez brothers, mobsters wanted throughout the country.
An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.
A girl discovers the tragic love story her mother had in her youth with a struggling actor who committed suicide, and decides to summon his ghost to give them a chance to meet again.
An aimless student is banished from his home by his father. When his brother, a boxing champion, gets injured, the student must step up and take his brother's place.

Anthology movie by, and starring, Michael Jackson in his prime, combining a number of music videos from his bestselling "Bad" album with a fantasy tale of Michael's confrontation with a ruthless drug dealer known as Mr. Big.
An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.
Two Dacian warriors arrive into our era, discovering how their nation has evolved. In a last battle meant to end a conflict lasting over 2.000 years, Romania's fate will be changed forever.
Jack Dalton, a Texas Marshal, is teamed up with a bounty hunter, Nathan Steele. Both are tracking a terrorist bomber who's been screwed over by the U.S. Government.

movie_name: Sleepy Eyes of Death: Sword of Satan
description: Tsurumatsu, a young boy, is supposed to be a new Lord but he's not really interested, he would rather be a carpenter. So he gets kidnapped and it's up to Nemuri Kyoshiro to save him.
When a colleague tells him that he is likely to be overlooked for promotion at work as he is unmarried, an ambitious young man seeks out a wife to rent.
An aspiring photo-journalist and a no-nonsense wilderness guide are forced to flee for their lives after a horrific encounter in a remote area of the rugged and forbidding Oregon Cascades.
Martha tells her friend and coworker about how she saved her son from death. By drinking the blood of the "Natural Father", told to her by a witch woman.
Four young people spend their time living the wild life - until one of them is brutally murdered in a burglary.

A Korean journalist living in Hong Kong, returns to Korea to cover the outbreak of the war. He leaves behind the woman he loves. He returns three years later, but many things have changed for both of them
For a young, Indian-Filipino named Nandi and a beautiful, free-spirited Filipina named Ella, love is not to be arranged but to be found through the intercession of fate.
A stagecoach stop employee and a stranded woman traveller find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws intent on robbing the next day's gold shipment.

"SPOOK BRIDGE" is a horror film that follows a Reporter, Clyde Adams, a man in search of the cause of the recent mysterious deaths of teenagers on Spook Bridge. See RKDSmedia.com / SpookBridge.com for more info.
An action/comedy about two off-beat film-makers reuniting the East Asian bad guys from action films from the '80s and '90s to carry off one impossible mission.
Three beautiful women,two handsome ghost hunters and a a famous mountain lodge with a grudge. Secrets,lies and a dead dude out for blood.
As an English soldier fights in the horrific trenches of northern France, he is haunted by the memories of his forbidden love affair with a French woman.

Vijay Kumar, a forest officer returns to the forest where his dad met an untimely end. Will his secret plan to snare poachers succeed? Sandalwood, ivory,animal hides and raw power is at the nexus of money and corruption.
A sexy, free spirit meets her match in a photographer and serial bachelor. Both of them turn up the personal fires, but neither can commit. Starring Marcia Cross and Joshua Beckett.
A good lawyer loses his cases in court when he's up against women. He's too shy to look them in the eyes. That all changes when he finds himself in a cute woman's body.

A rapid spreading virus which transforms people into intelligent, ultra-violent, extra-fast zombie hunters. After each wave of attack by the monsters, they're left incapacitated for 32 seconds while they recover their strength.
After the death of her husband, a renowned author retreats to her secluded home in the woods. There, she tries to rebuild her life amidst increasingly strange and malevolent occurrences.
a virgin girl was killed by a boy who rape her and then she try to kill that boy.but, will that be easy because she has been a ghost.
An insomniac Gamer uses cryptocurrency to rescue his innocent cousin from a corrupt centralized government prison.
A farmer hell bent on a revolution locks horns with a powerful and greedy industrialist, who is responsible for the plight of farmers. Will he be able to grant his people the life they deserve?

A biker's brother is killed while investigating the kidnapping of a young boy, the byproduct of a war between two crime families. The biker vows to get revenge by finding the kidnapped boy and destroying the two families.

The first adaptation of American novel Wieland. and the inspiration for Mary Shelley's Frankenstein. Religious fanaticism, schizophrenia, supernatural powers and repressed sexual desire combine into a deadly family drama.
Two women are abducted by a serial killer in a van and must work together to escape before it's too late.
Vijay and Sanjay become best friends after Vijay saves him from a tragedy. When he learns that Sanjay has filed for divorce, he takes it upon himself to unite the couple.
A psychopath pimp takes revenge on a man by luring him into a depraved brothel, where a sexual paradise hides his worst nightmare.
Friends travel to a secluded campsite where they are warned not to ring a bell and go against that advice summoning sinister creatures - along with Hank.

USMC Jack Forrester returns home from the Mid East wars to find his father dying and family ranch in foreclosure. He uncovers a conspiracy leading to the highest seats of power in government and business and moves to expose the threat.

When four friends end up stranded in the small town of Spaulding, one local family offers help. The family's real motives become terrifyingly obvious, as the couples find themselves fighting for their lives.
Shabari falls in love with Devi and decides to get married to her. However, he and his parents are in for a shock when they learn that Devi is speech impaired.
A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?
Williams, a convict in prison, comes to know that it was Hariprasad who killed Lakshmi, his daughter's friend. Enraged, he tries to find out the entire story from Hariprasad.

Henrik, a much beloved priest, doesn't believe in hell. Upon receiving the news of his fathers death, he starts a journey that will take him through terrifying secrets, distorted childhood memories, and shake the foundation of his belief.
A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.
Set in an alternate post apocalyptic zombie infested universe, a black op commando is left for dead returning to hunt down his team mates down one by one.
When a child-eating witch is accidentally resurrected, an unsuspecting young girl must embrace her Wiccan roots to stop her blood-thirsty ancestor's reign of terror on an entire town.
What happens when you mix the perfect script, a fast talking con man and the most ruthless cartel this side of the 405?
A young man meets a woman and falls in love with her. It is later revealed that their lives were destined to be intertwined by a fateful incedent from their past.

A robber who carries out a bank robbery is sought everywhere, and the thief seeks shelter in Cevriye's house, seeking help from her. In time, a relationship will arise between the two that rebelled against all life and identities.
Rahul, a prizefighter who hails from a poor family, is smitten with Ruby, the daughter of a rich and powerful man. While their love blooms, her father opposes their union fiercely.
Three rival families in an affluent suburb wage war upon each other in this phantasmagoria of love, lust, murder, betrayal, and moral torpor.
A meteor falls on Earth and the pieces are scattered everywhere. And the future of humanity depends on a mute and paranoid scientist and a man who doesn't want to hear or understand anything.

Six university students come to Safranbolu for an academic study, and hire a mansion. When the night comes down, the mansion locks down and the teens will have to face the consequences of a sad event happened a year ago.
A young Danish man traveling through Texas hooks up with an Austin girl, and even though they're not planning to see each other again, tragic circumstances lead her to his doorstep in Denmark.

Tae-rang is a successful upscale shaman with great looks. Unfortunately her love life is stunted by a prophecy that destines her to marry the unattractive and lazy Seung-won. As an alternative appears she must choose between love and fate.
Survivors of a plane crash discover a dilapidated island used as a gaming arena where the wealthy elite can hunt the living dead.
An acting coach makes it big ... Not in Hollywood, but by coaching criminal defendants on how to win over juries. But when one of her clients turns on her, she's now the one being judged!
The story evolves around Basheer and Suhra's love and it's influence over the whole Chakkarakadav village.
Six elite hunters pay to hunt down a man on a deserted island, only to find themselves becoming the prey.

movie_name: Paparazzi for the Dead and Dying
description: The violent and tragic story of war photographer Jason Howe's love affair with Marilyn Solarte, a female assassin for Colombia's Paramilitary.
The U.S. must join forces with the U.S.S.R. in order to destroy a gigantic asteroid heading straight for Earth.
After his wife and servant are raped and murdered by past criminal associates who also steal his treasure map, Markoni sets out for revenge.
Hannah house-sits her parents' home, following a break in. A chance encounter leads her to confront her demons, resulting in blood-soaked revenge.

After a man goes back to his father's flashbacks the man he never met he is on a quest to discover who killed his father while there's a dangerous homesteader who steals from the poor and decides to keep everything for himself.

In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

Maverick scientist Gwen makes a discovery about the cognitive effects of the Northern Lights on human behavior until, her breakthrough is threatened by the effects of a solar storm and the arrival of a ruthless younger scientist Emily.

movie_name: The Boy We Hurt in High School
description: They put her son in a wheel chair in high school. Now Agnes is back to put them 6 feet in the ground.
Love's wires are crossed in this hilarious caper; strategems and misunderstandings abound as the young protagonists struggle to navigate their way through life, land jobs, and find a place to live.
After a young woman begins her new job a sinister evil from her past returns to threaten everyone she comes in contact with.
A Grammy Award winning singer struggles to break through a slum in her career as she battles with herself to ignore the voices of others and live an authentic life.

Charming, affluent--with his father's money--and self-assured, a frivolous son who can have any woman he desires falls head over heels for a beautiful Italian student; however, she is a hard nut to crack. Will he manage to impress her?
A blind martial arts practitioner is out to find her father's killers and hopefully regain her sight in this chop-and-kick-filled combat film.
Michael and Gabe have abilities that are out of this world and universe. They will come to realize they are meant for more, and they aren't the only ones.

Five contract workers have taken on the task of tracking a huge old sanatorium for hazardous waste before demolishing. They realize that the job is more than a search for asbestos and mercury. The enormous building has much darker secrets.

A wealthy kind-hearted boy named Pavan falls in love with Malmi who comes from a different background. Their parents refuse their affair due to family status. However, they get married secretly with the help of friends.
There is a serial killer on the loose in Madrid. A bunch of friends don't take the threat seriously.
A Hollywood agent returns to his Alabama hometown for 15 year high school reunion. His old schoolmates think, he's dating and bringing a famous movie star with him. He asks a cute client for a favor.
During World War II, a squad of Soviet soldiers use the luxurious Mercedes belonged to Nazi officers for breakout behind enemy lines.
An ex-con with ulterior motives convinces the struggling inheritor of a sawmill to use convicts as affordable lumberjacks.
Neelakandan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.
Georg Hammar works at the General Hospital and is engaged to the famous professor Berg's daughter Inga. But he is also drawn to the nurse Maria.
An idealistic doctor must make some hard choices between his dedication to the profession and his personal life.
One day Molly must release that she has given up her own life.. she wakes to find she is raising Charlotte children and that the abusive husband is deeply involved in her life.

A madam in a cabaret has worked hard to earn money for her elderly mother and to marry off her sisters to good husbands. She herself has dreams of marriage but, because of her seedy occupation, her dreams may never be realized

Candace finds herself back on the island of Ischia, this time for her estranged husband's funeral. As she explores her past and present with friend Lukas, the memories that once haunted her are eased by their growing affection.
Yong-pal fails to realize that his new employer is a drug runner, but when he picks up a package full of heroin, Yong-pal finds himself the target of a gang of drug dealers.
Falling in love with the aristocratic Sylvia Robertson (Elizabeth Allen), Max poses as a European prince, enlisting the aid of an amiable Ruritanian monarch (Lawrence Grossmith) who owes him a favor.
Two women go undercover in Naejeong Castle to seek revenge against its lord who killed their parents.

6 pledges of an elite fraternity must survive one final night of hazing in order to gain entrance into a clandestine organization that relies on an ancient codex known as the Devil's Bible to maintain their political power.
A ruthless loan shark takes pleasure in putting a hit on anyone who dare not pay him back. This shark soon finds out that some borrowers bite back.
A medieval reenactment troupe struggles to maintain its family-like dynamic amid pressure from local authorities, interest from talent agents, and their "King's" delusions of grandeur.
A local gangster in Madurai bids adeiu to his past life. Years later in his late 50's, he falls in love with a girl which changes his life
In the early 1930s, a young man leaves Shanghai to come to Europe and reunite with the love of his life.

A burnt-out, legendary spy turned CIA instructor must go back into the field to hunt down his own student - the agency's most deadly new operative - after the young spy goes rogue on his first mission.
A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.
Twenty-four hours in the life of Pina and Adolfo. The story of a 36-year-old woman and the flashbacks that show the pair's lives and fills in some details of their other relationships.
West Point cadet Edgar Allan Poe and four other cadets on a training exercise in upstate New York are drawn by a gruesome discovery into a forgotten community.

When inexperienced criminal Ben holds up a small-town restaurant, the poorly-planned robbery spirals into a hostage crisis beyond his control. Trapped inside with him is his girlfriend, manager Adie Graham, a cunning sociopath.
Beauty on the run, every friend a suspect, every breath a gasp of fear, and only one gallant to brave all odds.

A group of teenagers are mysteriously invited to a skiing workshop in the mountains. There are eleven of them, but the camp supervisors insist that there should be only ten, and that one of them is an intruder.

In 1920s New York, a detective investigates a mysterious murder with the help of two renowned illusionists, who happen to be real magicians connected with a secret society attempting to save the world from evil.
A mumbai based investigating officer set out to find a group of kidnapped teenege girls in a sex racketing and one among is his own daughter
A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.
Kunjan is unhappy with the fact that no woman is ready to marry him because of his hunchback. However, his life changes for the better when Chembakam, a woman with visual impairment, enters his life.
An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.
Fikret goes to Istanbul. Would hope that will be a great opportunity for their lives against a day Asim learned from him.
An cyborg warrior woman seeks to regain her memories as she joins three-way battle between the machines, the military, and humans.
Nicki and Karen are twin sisters who think the same, feel the same and are subject to the same moods. Only when choosing a partner, the two attractive young women go different ways.

Vienna, around 1900. Since the pretty Elisabeth has doubts about the loyalty of her husband Georg, she persuades her friend Helene to test both Georg and Helene's husband Paul at the upcoming Vienna Opera Ball.
When a group of colleagues seek shelter in a ruined farmhouse, little do they know, it may be their final destination ever.

A team of astronauts is sent to the moon to rescue an alien who is seeking help to save her dying race. They are attacked by a force of bandit robots and discover that enemy spies are out to kill the alien.

The action takes place in 1920 during the Civil War in Russia. The young Red Army soldier Alex sent to work in the Cheka. Alexey takes part in various operations, his girlfriend dies, exposing a gang of whites.

A respected CNN journalist travels to Syria to show the rest of the world the horrors that the government regime is inflicting on its citizens, making herself a potential target for government retaliation as well.
A journalist is illegally jailed for exposing two corrupt politicians, He exacts revenge through his new mysterious newspaper.

Haunted by dreams of an ancestral Okoroshi masquerade, a disillusioned security guard wakes up one morning to find himself transformed into a mute, purple spirit, in Abba Makama's surrealist romp through the sprawling city of Lagos.
An evil gang of martial artists fight for a healing elixir against a specialist that fights with boomerang blades - the Dragon Missiles!
A Paris night club proprietor falls from grace and is reduced, after going away for a while, to working there in a menial position.
A reimagining of the myth of Faust, in which a documentary director and her producer investigate a number of celebrities.
A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.

After failing to close a 100 million dollar deal, blackballed professional gambler Tommy O'Quinn recounts his deadly narrative to a film director, angling to recoup lost profits, and reunite with his estranged family.
The story of how Rasool, a Muslim falls in love with a Christian girl, Anna and how her family's strong disapproval makes their relationship change for the worse.
Cosmo Academy has set a test for ten of its applicants to survive on a spaceship for 2 months. But there is an eleventh member aboard.

Kiriko Funo has stayed in her hometown after graduating from high school and is working as a designer for the local town information magazine. Her shy personality has reached her mid-thirties without being proactive in her love or life.
Hung Chi Lung fail to get his past lover, Mandy in real life, but not in his dream. That will change his life forever.
Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.
This movie is about the life and love of a Chiperita. She makes and sells Chipa In the morning and tries to win the heart of the man she loves in the evenings.

Long after being forced to abandon his dream of becoming a fashion footwear designer to take over his father's shoe repair business, the Shoemaker becomes obsessed with making extravagant custom shoes for select customers.
Chen Zhen rescues a Manchu princess and helps the princess and a Chinese resistance fighter defend China from Japanese invaders.
Unrelated to the sequel titled Grease 2 a decade earlier, this is a sequel to an early incarnation of the play-turned-movie created by Jim Jacobs.
A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.
Petty thief Czarek takes part in a TV reality show to escape from the mafia. He is sent to a house on a desert island with 9 other contestants. Even the death of one of them does not stop the show.

movie_name: The Strange World of Planet X
description: A friendly visitor from outer space warns against conducting experiments with the Earth's magnetic field, that could mutate insects into giant monsters.
Muslim wedding in Malabar. "It's a love story-one that occurs between the time of fixing the function and D-day.

Pedro Ortiz, a brave charro, arrives to a fishing village that is passing hard times. There's no fish in the waters. His manners and his love for Maria, a local attractive widow, will get him into trouble
A woman reflects on her childhood relationship with her father, attempting to understand the depths of his despair and the truth of his myths.

Arun is an architect who has a loving mother, and a beautiful girlfriend. Things go haywire when he parks his bike in a "No Parking" zone. This takes him on a roller coaster ride full of lies and deceit.
When Madhavan gets to know that Moorthy, a criminal, is responsible for his brother's death, he kills him without leaving any trace of the crime.
A talented lady novelist falls in love with a Chinese traitor working with the Japanese during the WWII.

A young married couple who are pregnant with their first child moves into their turn-of-the-century home where they discover that a great evil has resided there for nearly a century, unleashed by a previous occupant.
Discovering a territory in the Sierra Nevada mountains that has been shut down since the 1950s because of mysterious disappearances, Loretta leaves to explore, her husband Randy goes in after her.
Krishna fights to avenge his sister's death and the future of medical students in this action-packed thriller.
Thomas loves Priya from their high school days but is afraid to confess. So he resorts to his friend Deva, to convince Priya. However, a tricky situation arises when Priya falls in love with Deva.
After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.
Terrorists are holding the U.S. Olympic swim team hostage, and only janitor Jack Bryant (Linden Ashby) can stop them.

The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.
Peter Thompson receives a mysterious package that contains a DVD, VHS, cassette tape, SDHC card and a piece of paper. With each viewing, strange things begin to happen.
A group of children struggle to survive in the brutal landscape of a diseased, post-apocalyptic America.
The year is 2030 and the goal is to locate the Scarlet Moon. A fist sized red jewel that is said to hold the power to control the world, loosely tied to ancient visitors from another planet.
A group of parents who have gathered to debate the sexual education schooling of their fourth grade children are forced to re-examine their own views of sex.
Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.
The drivers of the Sanggye-dong Supreme Team become mired in the slush fund investigation of a powerful person on the very day of the 1988 Seoul Olympics opening ceremony.
A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

It's a story of a little boy who becomes a gangster. He fell in love with a girl after saving her from committing suicide. But a rival gang leader tries to destroy his life and the people he cares about. So now he is seeking revenge.

An autistic high functioning mathematical genius wins a legal battle to join a top football program as a walk on quarterback and astonishes the nation when she leads the team to a National Championship and she a contender for the NFL Draft
A textile engineer Aydin comes to Cyprus to prepare artworks for textile factory which Ayse works. While love growns up between them, Ayse's mafia-like lover spoils the game.

Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

Eight secret agents are led into a trap by "The King" and the army. The secret agents must bet on their lives in the world's largest online gambling scheme whose players include renowned gamblers from around the globe.

A mentally unstable genius and his obsession for the Miss Universe makes him so possessive that he begins to kill people around her in order to come close to her. He succeeds in kidnapping her and keeps her in confinement.
A young woman drives a cab to support her younger brothers and sisters. She endures the rude remarks and suggestions of her customers and falls in love with a fellow driver
When an young programmer finds how his hacking software is self evolving and trying to kill him, he than tries to kill the program using a kill code.
A man in northern Mexico is threatened to hand over his property to organized crime and chooses to fight back.
A 9 year boy inadvertently summons a Nightmare Djinn while home alone. Can he survive long enough before his father returns home?
A famous Bollywood actress, Kiran, meets a lesbian journalist, Karen - 3 days before the release of her international film - 'A Himalayan Love Story'.
Taiwanese film - People are trapped on a boat and attacked by a gigantic arachnid sea monster - can 2020 get any worse?
A 4 star Generals son stumbles on his father's plan to Initiate a new world order!! And his fight to save Americans from destruction, greed and death!!

Quinn and Minnie are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldn't be more different. 30 years later they find themselves together again. Maybe it's time to take a chance on love.
A Man forms a passionate and sensual relationship with a woman in his dreams, upon waking up he must deceive his surreal hallucinations and Insomnia to find a way to re-unite with her again.

A young man and a group of friends travel to rural Norway in search of his missing sister and uncover a sinister and terrifying wooden statue possessed by an evil force, harboring back to an old Norwegian folktale.

The young girl suffers from a serious heart condition. In order not to shorten her life, she should stay away from all kinds of excitement, including love. When Göksel and Filiz meet, they are both unaware of this bitter truth.
The story of a man left at a crossroads who tries to stay honest in the days of overcoming cowardice and choose the most suitable person for life from among several women in his environment .
During a New Year's Eve celebration, a Los Angeles disc jockey receives a phone call saying that when New Year's strikes in each time zone, someone will be murdered - and she will be the last one.

A man returns home to find almost all he has ever known and loved has been taken away from him. Leaving him with only the rage and hatred of those who took it all. His mission now is to take back what's left. By any means.

Located among the haunting peaks and brooding mists of Tasmania's Central Highlands, RUBY ROSE is the story of a woman's quest to break out of the isolated an demanding farm life she lives and find something challenging.
In a housing estate in London, a house is haunted by an evil ghost child. The team investigate the continuing haunting and poltergeist activity with amazing evidence and a chilling conclusion.
Ever since he was a boy, Mickey wanted to fly planes like his big brother, Jerry, who was shot down during a mission in World War I. Unfortunately, Mickey is booted from flight school.

When a starving aspiring actor gets the chance of a lifetime working with a spoiled rich star, sparks fly. But they'll have to get past their personal insecurities to have a chance at more than an onscreen happy ending.
In a post apocalyptic world two lost young men struggle to survive, emotionally and physically, as they grapple with their complicated relationship.
In order to avoid a prearranged marriage, a rebellious French princess sheds her identity and escapes to colonial New Orleans, where she finds an unlikely true love.

In order to spend time with his family, Lieutenant Jack (Jonathan De La Mora) makes the difficult decision to leave the force. Feeling betrayed and abandoned his best friend Major Sergeant Tim (Fonsy Ponce) decides to get revenge.
While flying mail across the Andean mountains, Henri Guillaumet's plane has to crash-land, he must trek back to civilizatin on foot.
A Japanese club singer finds himself in trouble with the yakuza. He flees to Korea, where he meets an alluring lounge singer.
Ucult Studios presents a tale of the two brothers hustling to survive in the streets of Detroit. Zo the calm ambitious brother wants nothing more than to give his daughter a better life.
A travel writer (Graham) who begrudgingly assumes control of her father's wedding magazine finds the new experience might just change her take on love.
A man on the run takes another man's passport, only to find himself stuck with the identity of a street hustler.

movie_name: Da wu shi yu xiao piao ke
description: During The Ching Dynasty a Buddhist Priest of Martial Arts organizes a revolution against the rulers.

Infinity is a suspense, horror movie that elucidates what happens when a schizophrenic illness alters the lives of a family.A husband ,wife and 3 children.After a traumatic event they are delusional self deceptive and lost.

An unexpected love triangle, a failed seduction trap and an encounter that results from a misunderstanding, told in three movements to depict three female characters and trace the trajectories between their choices and regrets.
The Rental is a horror feature film about 4 girls who move into their first off-campus house only to find that the owner is a soul-eater.
When a young Organist takes a church job in a remote town, he begins to unravel a horrific incident from the town's past. But do the townspeople really know the whole story?

Sakura is a 20-year-old college student who has sex for money to fund her shopping addiction. After her customers leave her apartment, she spends her time spying on Leo, a male escort service across the street.
Three Girls going camping meet up with Three scientists who are exploring the mythical forest of iron. Undead vikings roam he forest and wants to awaken Månegarm, the mythical wolf.
A porter, educated in return for marrying a rich man's daughter, learns love after entering parliament.
A greedy husband (Hayayee) is found to be cheating on his wife, who immensely adores him. With the help of her friends, she plots revenge on him.
A newspaperman Paul Cluett (Jack Holt) gets rival reporter Linda Lawrence (Mae Clark) to admit that she is investigating a story in Morocco that guns are being smuggled illegally.

In cold Lapland Finland, under the eternal midnight sun, two ardent lovers reunite once again after a long period apart, governed by a powerful and eloquent circular motif woven by destiny, faith, and love. Can they deny their destiny?
Tomi finds himself in love with two women and his wife Maria finds herself in a situation where she has to deal with the fact that Tomi is the love of her life.

movie_name: Casseta & Planeta: A Taça do Mundo É Nossa
description: A satire about the dictatorship period in Brazil, in which communist militants try to steal the soccer World Cup Trophy from the players Pelé and Carlos Alberto Torres.
Danny is a young martial arts enthusiast who arrives in Hong Kong to head a school of Choy Lee Fut owned by his wealthy father.

A veteran of America's shadow wars around the world returns home to his family. Troubled by episodes of PTSD he loses his hold on day to day life, joining the ranks of the many invisible and homeless veterans inhabiting today's cities.

Berlin in 1945. The war is as good as lost, and in the east the Red Army troops are approaching the city. Kalle, just 15 years old, has completely different worries on his mind: his hormones are sprouting and he only has eyes for Inge.

A real life serial killer who murders call girls and surgically removes their eyeballs which would later be sewn into taxidermy projects of various kinds. This chilling horror thriller will leave you wanting more.
Secrets, rumors and betrayals surround the upcoming marriage between a young dissolute man and virtuous woman of the French aristocracy.
Prince of the Crimson Void the ninth film by Denver auteur filmmaker Dakota Ray-is a gothic, Absinthe and drug induced cinematic voyage into evil and decay.

Peter, a young aircraft engineer is deceived by his manager Jason into substituting faulty aircraft parts. When a part explodes killing a passenger, Air accident investigation find Peter responsible. Jason is found murdered.
A lumberjack knocks out a champion boxer in a brawl, gets drawn into the boxing world where he is unknowingly set up for a fixed fight.
Three years later Michele (The Invisible boy) meets his mother and his twin sister. Both have stories and superpowers but their intentions may not be what Michele thinks.

The Dead bring their unfinished business of lust and revenge to the door of a romance writer and her new handyman. Veronica arrives naked. Coby has blood on him. Then the Others come. It''ll be a night they won't forget... If they survive.

Amelia Rose moves into a run down apartment building to start work as a live-in carer for an elderly priest. Little does she realize the unspeakable horrors that await behind the building's mysterious doors.
Follows Inspector Khai, as he becomes desperate after an old grudge returns to haunt him threatening public with mysterious bombings.

A 24 y.o. wrestler/McJobroni man meets a mom 20+ years older at group therapy for family of murder victims (sister and husband). He helps her deaf teenage son. She invites him to weddings. They await convictions on the murder trials.
Joanna Mills, a traveling business woman, begins having nightmares of a murder that occurred 15 years ago. Soon she is drawn to an old farmhouse, where the murder took place.
In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.
The story of the tumultuous relationship between a Jewish girl called Noemi and a Polish art student named Kamil is set at the outbreak of World War II.

A small bus company run by a father/daughter team comes under attack by a group of "wildcatters" who want to put the company out of business so they can take over the profitable Los Angeles-to-San Francisco route.

A dockworker overthrows the tyranny of a cruel gangster but has to run away to make a new life for himself and his brothers. Fifteen years later, his past catches up with him as his old enemy resurfaces.
Portrayed the character of the hired assassin who plots the slaying of the lead character, played by FPJ.
A honest Police officer join with an underworld don Geevargees/GV when there is no another option against him.But GV tries to kill him in a bomb blast

Big and Little Enos are opening a sea food restaurant. They bet Sheriff Buford T. Justice that he cannot drive from Miami to the Enos ranch in Texas in a given amount of time. If Buford loses he has to give up his badge.
An innocent Ghanaian mechanic and a misguided Benin tailor inadvertently get mixed up with a dangerous drug and human trafficking ring.

In this musical-comedy, Dean Martin plays an American hotel mogul who becomes smitten with a young Italian woman (Anna Maria Alberghetti) when buying a hotel in Rome. To marry this gal, he has to get her three older sisters married off.
It's been 24 years since the serial killer Douglas Fisher was executed on Easter night. This year, a group partying teenagers not only raise some hell, but literally raise the dead.
An anthology horror film following 3 stories including demons, cannibals, psychopaths and demigods all intertwined, taking place in the final 31 days of earth.

Romance blossoms between Ike, a Greek-American insurance agent, and his new neighbor Lucinda, a dance company manager. Enter Connan, wealthy attorney and Ike's best friend. What follows is a comic tale of money, rivalry, art and true love.

Five bored teenagers hang out in the woods and meet Philip who shares a dark secret. Fascinated by the story, the kids decide to investigate and find themselves in the midst of a satanic cult and hunted by a serial killer.
4 Men of action against a horde of non-believers...charging...crashing...fighting...striking...terror into the hearts of the enemy.
A suicide bomber loses his memory and has a bomb attached to his heart. It is up to the police officers to prevent this bomb from taking innocent lives.
Guests at a mountain ski resort are terrorized by a local possessed by the vengeful spirit of an ancient Native mountain man.
Andrew Dice Clay takes over a hotel during a beauty pageant taking several pageant contestants hostage since one of them is a rich senator's daughter.

Gabriel is a jaded hitman hired by his old boss to kill his old co-workers and they can both retire. But if all Gabriel knows is how to end lives how will he able to begin one? More importantly, will anyone let him?
A construction worker resurrects on a Halloween night looking for the men that murdered him a year prior.
Despite being together for a while, Mithun and Kanchi don't seem to be serious about their relationship. Will the two find love and commitment?

A portmanteau film in which the producer, instead of as usual using already well known directors with a commercial draw, allowed five new young directors to each have a crack at an episode about romance.

Strange things happen when Chandru and Sangeetha decide to get married. To his horror, Chandru learns that they are being pursued and attacked by the ghost of Sangeetha's mother from her previous life.
Secret agent Nam-kung infiltrates a North Korean operation in Japan that is responsible for kidnapping travelling South Korean and taking them to Pyeongyang
A man, one corner of a love triangle, plots against his rival and eventually succeeds in having him sent to prison.
Ginger Rogers and Dennis Morgan, serving on a sequestered jury during a murder trial, fall in love. She is divorced, he is married.
Zenobia is Earth's only hope when it becomes threatened by a power hungry, vile being. She must learn to face her fears so she can lead an uprising before its too late.
Quarry is a mysterious, articulate stranger who draws a cult like following of local hippies. Rather than showing them peace and love, he has more sinister plans for them, as he is a vampire.
In 1864 Capt. John Hayes goes to Colorado to take over the stagecoach line and keep the flow of Western gold flowing and help the North win the Civil War.

A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.
Set in the year 3000 in New Tokyo where this time round, human beings with blood type B are being targeted.

Hope you're hungry...and ready to dig into this delicious cannibal comic romp. Two guy roommates lure lovely ladies back to their bachelor pad for a dinner they'll never forget - since it's their last.
A young couple decide to marry under the condition that they agree never to disagree. That agreement is soon put to the test when the husband finds himself attracted to a beautiful young woman.

A filmmaker attempts to capture paranormal events on camera all while trying to protect his children from the ghost that haunts their house. This is the 6th installment of "The Blackwell Ghost" series.

The inspiring and compelling story of how one woman risks everything to help a sex trafficked victim out of the world of slavery and into a world with a future and a hope of fulfilling a childhood dream of becoming a real dancer.

Amateur director, Khadir, on his journey to capture some of the most haunted places in India on film for an upcoming web series. The dark history of the fort comes out to play. Will Khadir and the others make it out of the fort alive

The world of Kumari, who is married off far away in Kanhirangat, a cursed land beyond Illymala, in the west. A naive Kumari arrives in the cursed land, where people are ready to sacrifice their lives to preserve tradition and power.
Apart from wanting to win the girl he loves, Gangaraju, a good-for-nothing guy, becomes a Gangster to save his village.
Raghava, a young man, runs an eatery in his village but wishes to open a small hotel in a nearby town. He faces challenges in his quest and must overcome them to succeed.
Wanting to raise their grades, a handful of college kids are randomly selected for a field trip to study wildlife, but don't get the chance as cliché horror film-style murders occur.
An epileptic girl suffers a breakdown during her first year at university, then decides to seek help from a priest in battling the troubles associated with her strict upbringing.
A small town in the pacific northwest becomes haunted by a unknown creature living in the mountains.
The military calls upon a group of mercenaries and scientists to assist investigations on a mysterious epidemic on an isolated mining region. Theirs is a terrifying journey of death and betrayal.
Sam and Disha fall in love , and all of sudden happen in life hell, sam trying to reach his goal and disha trying to hurdle every time.
When an accident leaves a young boy in a coma, his parent's love is put to the test as they resort to a dangerous plan to save him.
A member of a group of female ninjas in modern-day Tokyo is kidnapped and sold into slavery. Her sister ninjas seek to rescue her.

A young man tells the dream he had about running away with the daughter of chief of police to his grandma. People spread and exaggerate rumors as if it was a real story until it reaches to the chief himself.

2012. The dawn of destruction. As giant alien machines enslave and feed off humanity, the few remaining survivors band together to form a armed militia that will be the last stand against total extinction.
A film about a group of rappers and R&B singers lured inside a studio and murdered one by one by a killer bent on stealing their music.

Homeless ex- soldiers from around the world are kidnapped and shipped to a mad scientist in London England who has plans to repair, restore and send them on dangerous missions to take vengeance against corruption around the world.
A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.
Yong-su is accidently caught up in a North Korean plot to steal gold that has been hidden in a Japanese sub since WWII.

Alberto is born in wartime, where his father dies a hero. He grows up effeminate. His mother sends him to military college where Fernando bullies him, but they become friends. When war comes, he has to face his fears.
In this gritty action tale, a young wrestler competes in the world of underground fighting to raise money for his ailing mother. But will he survive his next match?
A college fraternity in the middle of hazing their new pledges during "hell week" incur the wrath of a long deceased pledge who died during a hazing gone wrong 20 years ago.
In the delta county of Louisiana, Johnny Duval is haunted by recurring nightmares of his wartime experiences.
Eight people left behind on earth communicate with their loved ones through the advanced technology left in the wasteland the earth has become, while facing harrowing struggles to survive.

An Internet-addict, Gero, is lured back to reality by the internet-based game 'geocaching' and discovers himself and the world anew - which positively affects his outlook on the future and his relationship with his faithful partner, Linda.
A talented high school lacrosse player deals with the pain from his military dad's death, a resentful new coach, and consequences of his own arrogance.

. - Hence the police go in search of the students to last located area - There they find the belongings of the students.(cell phones , cameras) Now are the footages and videos are real? Or is it a prank. Wait and watch the guess.

movie_name: The Phantom Lake Kids in the Day the Earth Abruptly Almost Ended
description: Phantom Lake County is known for its share of strange occurrences, from monster attacks to alien invasions.
On his deathbed, Surjit reveals the truth about the stepfamily of his son and requests him to mend the broken ties with them in Punjab. However, the revelation changes Varyam's life.

movie_name: Scandals on the Island of Love
description: Mina is a poor girl who arrives on Corfu for vacation. There, she meets Darzento, a rich man pretending to be poor, and poses as the daughter of a shipowner. Then, he shows up, and things take a new turn.
Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

Pulakeshi chooses to smile through his pain and refuses to emote for tough situations, until three different women enter into his life at different phases to teach him the true meaning of love and life.
A young woman, who is tormented by hallucinations and haunted by the memory of her dead father, struggles to regain control of her life and uncover the truth about her past.

Four teenage friends go on a road trip through Argentina. On their way, they find a castle left abandoned in the middle of a forest. They decide to investigate further, only to discover it's gruesome secrets and former residents.

A young father (SANTIAGO) runs from his traumatic home town and pregnant girlfriend only to be kidnapped and taken to the desert by a vagrant tramp (ROSS) who believes the CIA is after him. This spins into a cosmic rehab for him.

movie_name: Bai Ma Su che gou hun fan
description: Four rebels with special fighting skills are brought together to block a Eunuch's attempt to rise to power using Japanese influence.
A girl and her friends find a game in the attic that summons a creature known as The Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.
Reflections on life and death through the eyes of a medicine doctor, researcher on blood deseases, under the anguish of consulting a terminally ill young woman.

Sief, is a con artist who's hired by the beautiful rich woman Hala to help her get her money back from another conman, to begin an endless series of tricks and games in which the concepts of love, friendship and life get mixed-up.
A billion pound Fairy Godmother Trust is bequeathed to district nurse in the will of an eccentric patient with strict instructions to bring joy and happiness anonymously to the people of London.

Eric Hayes is a video vulture preying on human violence and suffrage, selling his footage to the highest bidder. Eric's about to discover something beneath the streets even hungrier for blood than he is. He's about to discover the ghouls.

A group of young horror fans go searching for a film that mysteriously vanished years ago but instead find that the demented killer from the movie is real, and he's thrilled to meet fans who will die gruesomely for his art.
Dying for Living follow the story of a vain, aging hitman who assembles his family (also professional hit people) that he abandoned a long time ago in Holland. Mayhem ensues.

To restore the kingdom of Thessaly, Jason assembles the greatest warriors of Greece to sail the Argo the far side of the world to reclaim a sacred Golden Fleece. Based on the ancient Greek epic poem 'Argonautica'.
A flamboyant gay teen finds himself in a mind-boggling love triangle while trying to fulfill his dream of becoming a dancer.

movie_name: Foreigner's Mistress Oman: Falling Autumn Flower
description: After having served a prison sentence Oman is released only to find that her sister is in the clutches of a group of Yakuza lowlifes. Once again Oman has to take action.
Un compositor español obsesivamente escribe canciones para una modelo que solo ha visto en fotografías, sin imaginarse que ella es vecina de el y su novia.
After a hospital worker with a violent past wakes up in a secured facility, his only way out is to complete a series of deadly evaluations conducted by an unknown organization with a cryptic motive.

Retiring director Chuck Steak wants to make his last film the biggest and most absurdly convoluted adult movie ever made. As a young documentary maker films this outrageously funny, quirky quest, everything that can possibly go wrong does.
The story is about heiress of the circus family who organizes show "Let's get married" right in the cage for the tigers.

movie_name: How to Kill Your Favourite Character
description: Famous chick-lit series femme fatale, Riley Goddard, must track down a killer. With the help of her friends Lilac, Mopes and the mysteriously dressed Minor Support Character, can she bust open the case before she runs out of words?
An action thriller that revolves around a dangerous drug dealer, who is able to manufacture new drugs and sells them but falls into many problems and is chased by the police.

Premasathi Coming Suun is a 2014 Marathi comedy about Aditya (Adinath Kothare), a young man in his early twenties who's family is looking for a bride for him, and Antara (Neha Pendse), the prospective bride with a hidden agenda.
Set in a sleepy town in New Orleans, a family grieves for their missing daughter while hiding a secret in the basement.
A peasant woman rescues a rich playboy from a car crash. Playboy sets up a fake marriage to get her and leaves. Peasant woman chases him to take revenge.
What does this mysterious title hide? A fusional love story, between sensuality and children's games. An intense encounter, a walk of memories, and the anguish of a woman in love.

An ever evolving alien life-form from the Dark Gaseous Nebula arrives to consume rampant pollution. Spewing mists of sulfuric acid and corrosive sludge, neither humanity or Godzilla may be able to defeat this toxic menace.
Aase lives together with her old grandfather above the city, and she dreams of going away. Kaare is in love with her, but her dreams seem to come between them.

Megan moves to New Orleans with her new older Boyfriend into his mansion to bring back Esner's Spirit and FBI Agent Beckett shows up to finally find out what happened in Las Almas, CA last year when he kids went missing.

movie_name: The Extraordinary Adventures of Adèle Blanc-Sec
description: An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.

Dr. Knoche, a German scientist in Venezuela in the 1800's, develops an effective technique to preserve bodies, embalming famous politicians and people of note, leading his contemporaries to call him the "Frankenstein of the Caribbean".
"A clever and intuitive young mobster; Gallo seeks liberation from the psychopathic Don (his Uncle Julius) and the mafia institution in which he is bound."
An unknown virus that turns people into dead people, ravages a large part of the world's population, leaving stranded survivors to the land for their survival, and fighting to preserve it.
A college student locks horns with a dreaded gangster after getting to know that his friend was killed by the latter.
T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
A determined sheriff pursues a robber and his girlfriend and lets nothing get in the way of catching them.

After a plane crash were a boy is the only survivor, a childless couple adopts him and soon discovers he is something very powerful, something very dark. This small boy is the Beast and with him he carries the Beginning of the End.

A young man and woman begin a sudden romance after he saves her from an accident in the forest. His dreams start becoming plagued with nightmares of a woman who looks identical to her, but seems to be from a different life...
Three youngsters play a prank on a wealthy jeweller but later find themselves framed for murder by a mysterious criminal.
Soldiers, slaves, or just your average Joe, all set off on the same mission, to receive a highly sought after target. For most of them, this means death, but for a select few.. Glory.

Dimitry hires German coach Rudolph Spitz to galvanize his ragtag team into the country's best football club, but then the first Nazi tanks roll in and Rebecca, a local banker's beautiful daughter, elopes with his star player.
After his wife left him for another man, Andrey unsuccessfully tried to found a new woman. Meanwhile, he found an orphan which was looking for his mother.

A monitor lizard hunter gains invincibility after killing a golden wild boar in the forest but which also rendered him cursed at the same time, transforming his head into a wild boar whenever he gets enraged.
Venezuela, 1935. During the dictator Juan Vicente Gómez' rulership, a couple of old lovers are reunited when Carlos Gardel visits their hometown.

Kinjou, who has become disgusted with his job and the world itself, takes a hallucinogenic red capsule that allows him to meet the person he likes for a few minutes and escapes by seeing his wife, that died, every day.

Paint-ball playing computer geeks who invent a computer chip which can keep the government or any agency from gaining access to computer files are targeted by government assassins during a paint-ball competition.

After opening a mysterious box, Pandora shares some fragmented tales about the forces of evil chaotically seeping into our world. Can you piece the tales together to unlock the mystery of Pandora's Box?
Martine is a tough female cop trying to solve the kidnapping of a young girl by a gang of pornographers.
Thijs uses the money he's offered to organize his best mate Ben's wedding to finance his own restaurant.
Police Junior is a Malayalam movie starring Kanakalatha Pilla, Narain Kumar and Shanavas Prem Nazir in prominent roles. It is a drama directed by Suresh Sankar.
A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.
As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.
A bachelor party becomes a savage fight for survival when the groomsmen unwittingly unleash a fabled predator upon the festivities.
A man travelling to the United States meets a mysterious woman and gets wrapped up in an investigation when authorities mistake him for a notorious criminal.
Five adults attempt to save a beloved summer camp threatened to be closed permanently due to recent unfortunate events.
The Mehra family must contemplate over their way of living and their love lives while on a cruise celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary.

After meeting an ex-lover Eva runs away from her marriage and family into a world of vaudeville and drugs. She becomes an actress that satisfies the men around her. Heavy addicted she understands where the path she has chosen leads.

"A loving but socially awkward long term couple wants to spice up their sex life by having a threesome. Now they must battle insecurities, social taboos and the dreaded internet to find...The Third Person!"

movie_name: Os Heróis Trapalhões: Uma Aventura na Selva
description: Didi, Dedé, Mussum, and Zacarias are sent on a rescue mission to the daughter of the Army's minister.

The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.
On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.

Doña Chonita es muy estricta con sus cuatro hijos, Luis, Antonio, David y Pichi, asÍ como con su esposo mujeriego, Lencho. David se enamora deFelisa, una mujer de clasa alta, a pesar de que ella está comprometida con Eduardo.

During a horse ride, Piotr, a young journalist, has an accident and is taken to hospital by an ambulance. He dies unexpectedly on the way. His friend Marek, trying to find out why this happened, finds a big scandal.

In a near future Vietnam where global warming and rising seawater levels have forced cultivation to be done on floating farms, a strong-willed woman has to make a critical decision about her ex-lover, a suspect of her husband's murder.

The master of a traveling acrobatic squad is bitten off, and gets, a hopping vampire. When he begins to terrorize the city, uses Grandpa and Tien Tien master students as bait, so ghostly warriors, to eventually capture the creature.
When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.
Running low on fuel, the Battlestar Galactica receives the help of the supposedly lost Battlestar Pegasus which is taking the offensive with the Cylons.
When a headstrong chef takes charge of her equally stubborn 8-year-old niece, the tensions between them mount... until an Italian sous-chef arrives to lighten the mood.
Both an homage and a new look to the old style anthology films. Five different films, five different styles.
A drug dealer with too many morals tries to bail out of the "business" but, is sucked back in when a black-out leads to the corpse of his dead girl friend, and he's to blame.
A young man visiting a house that turns out to be haunted is terrorized by the ghost of a man who had been murdered there years before.

The Mafia Ain't Dead is the dangerously enticing story about a washed-up boxer with a passion for the history of the Mafioso, who convinces his friends to successfully start their own mafia...Allegedly.

A teen science wiz tries to find the cure for the common breakup after getting dumped by her first boyfriend. She uses her geneticist's late mother's research to fix her love life, which leads to amusing and complicated results.

Adam is a Muslim medical practitioner who is unable to accept the fact that his wife is no longer in this world. Later on, he agrees to treat a depressed woman named Maria but strange and unsettling things start to happen.
A killer is on the loose in a small suburban town, a group of strangers have to find a way to survive the night.
In a village, cut off from the world, lives a community of dark secrets. Only those who can resist the desire to kill, maim or consume Human flesh will be freed from the curse of the Changed.
When Ravi is falsely accused of a crime and sentenced to imprisonment, his boss' wife promises to take care of his younger brother. However, Ravi is unable to find his brother after he is released.
Two losers believe they have found the lost national gold reserve of the Spanish Republic, thought to have been sent to the USSR.
Four high school seniors playing hooky on September 11th, 2001, ingest a variety of drugs right before the first plane hits the North Tower.
TV reporter Natasha McGrath is sent to a remote area. Along with her small crew and a couple of campers, they encounter a man who watches, taunts and kills them one by one: repeatedly.
A parody of the film The Godfather (1972). A young boy (Niño Muhlach) wants to follow the footsteps of his godfather as a mafia boss by imitating his actions and behavior.
Post World War III futuristic tale of collapsed governments & bankrupt countries heralding a new lawless age.

Many years later, in a fierce battle with the three-eyed God of War, Monkey King was broken and fell into the mortal world. Monkey King realizes self-salvation under the conspiracy of Mu Shen Jumang to bring disaster to the world..
Christmas dinner brings tidings of death when someone enacts revenge, and out of the bloody madness rises a hero who must face all odds to stop an outbreak before it's too late.

Three decades after their separation, Irina and Nana remain mesmerized by memories of earlier days, but when Irina returns to the small community she left to reconcile with the past and their complex feelings.
In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.
Two privileged besties become obsessed with a young woman through social media. Convinced their friendship can solve all of her life's problems, they lure her to a baby shower under false pretenses.

The Boo is a Southern-gothic thriller about a bereaved small town sheriff and his recently widowed, estranged, sister-in-law who must acknowledge the external forces they must extinguish to overcome the internal loss of their spouses.

movie_name: Behind the Line: Escape to Dunkirk
description: A group of British soldiers, retreating from the Germans toward Dunkirk in WW2 are captured. A renowned British boxer among them is forced in the ring to fight an equally talented German boxer as they struggle to escape.
An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

movie_name: Senzeni Na? What have we done?
description: A group of 50-something university friends get together and realise how much they have compromised their 18-year-old ideals. A Slasher decides to punish them each with a gory death.

movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.
Two brothers are drawn into a sinister situation when their girlfriend goes missing during a stay in an eerie village.
When the man Fletch is about to interview turns up dead, Fletch takes it upon himself to figure out who killed him.
After an unexpected death in the family, a mother and son struggle to find spiritual healing at a beachfront summer home.
